Ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗikima kwa̧ kwaŋgɔ nɛ nje ɓaka ɗikima toyɛ nyɛ kɛnjɛ ndiŋgile to soŋɛ pokɔ lɛpɔ nde: «Hey wɛ! Wɛ mɔ te ɛ lekɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ nje sumɔ ndi kɛ mɛtu yitati kɔ,
joŋgwɛ yotu yɔ nɛ ŋguru wɔ piyɛ kɛ kroa.»
Ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe teɗya mɛmboŋga ɗikima nyɛtɔ sendi nyɛ tandɛ yan lɛpɔ nde: «A ɗikima joŋgwɛ ɓaŋa ɓomɔ, ma a yeti nɛ ɗeti te yi joŋgwɛ yotu nɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ na.
Ma *Krist te kumande Isarayɛl pîkwɛ ŋgɛnjɛ ndana kɛ kroa, nɛ́ wusɛ ɓɛŋ, nɛ́ wusɛ tiki temɔ kɛ yenɛ.» Ɓotu ɓete yi ɓo ŋgbama ɓo ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus ɓaka ɗikima toyɛ sendi nyɛ.
Kɛ ɓembe yesɔ ma ɗya̧ kɛ́, ɛ yitil kelɛ kɛ ndiŋgɛlɛ mɛnɛti kumɔ kɛ hawa yitati te yi ɓekoko.
Kɛ hawa yitati ma ɗya̧ kɛ́, ɛ Yesus kembɛ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey lɛpɔ nde: «Elɔy, Elɔy, lama sabatani?» Yite nde: ‹Njambiyɛ wombɛ, Njambiyɛ wombɛ, wɛ léŋ mi kɛto ŋge?›
Kɛ ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte ɓaka ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nde: «Nɛ wôku ndi, a kɛ jeɓa Eli.»

Ɛ wɛtɛ mbam kɛ njoka yan sɛɗyɛ kɛ̀ ɓu̧ yiŋa yasi nda kusa tɔpɛ kɛ yiŋa ɗyanjina mɛnjam sɔmɔ kɛ jeti sambile nyɛ nyɛ nde, a hɔ̂ɓiya. Ɛ mbam te lɛpɛ nde: «Nɛ tîki, hɛ pa ɓɛŋ, simande Eli ta nje piɗyɛ nyɛ soŋɛ kɛ kroa.»
Ɛ Yesus kembɛ ɗetinate jɛyɛ gwe.
Ɛ nyaŋgwɛ lambɔ te yi ɓa̧ kɛsate kɛ mbɛy te yi nɛ kiyɔ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ́ nyaliyɛ kɛ ɓembe kandɛ kwey kumɔ nji̧.
Kɛ kum ɓesɔja gɔmay te ɛ ɓa̧ womɛte kɛ tɛri kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus kɔ ma ɓɛŋɛ nda yi Yesus jɛyma nɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Mbam kɔ ɓa̧ gbate Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ!»

Ɓaŋa ɓoma ɓa̧ sendi womɛte. Ɓo ɗikima ɗiyɔ nɛ naŋ ɓɛŋɛ yasi kɛnjɛ. Mariya te ŋgɔndu Magdala nɛ̀ Mariya te nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Yosɛs ɓenɛ Jak te ɛ ɓa̧ mɔnɔsikɛ kɛ njoka ɓɛsɔ kɔ, nje ɓu̧ sendi mbaŋa nyari nde Salome ɓa̧ kɛ njoka ɓoma ɓenɔri.
Ɓo ɗikima ɓeŋgwɛ Yesus kelɔ mɛsay nyɛ nyɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ nɔ kɛ Galile kɛ́. Yo ɓa̧ sendi nɛ ɓaŋa ɓuɗya ɓoma ɓe tɛmma nje Yerusalɛm ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus ɓaka.
Ɓekoko sima ɗya̧, yo ɓa̧ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɗiki komsa kɛte yí teɗye nde, ŋgimɔ mɛwɛɗya mɛte yi yesɔ *Saba ta ɓɛ kɛ kandɛ.
Ɛ Yosɛp te mɔ Arimate ɗya̧. A ɓa̧ kɛ njɔŋ nyaŋgwɛ jɔsi Ɓeyudɛn. Ɓomɔ ɓa̧ kɛ jɛsɔ nyɛ. Sendi, nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ ɓa̧ kɛ laɗye *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ. Ɛ nyɛ tiŋɛ temɔ kɛ̀ kɛ yi Pilat kɛ̀ diyɛ muŋ Yesus.
Ɛ Pilat ŋgbakima yí wokɔ nde, Yesus gwa̧ ɗete nɛ kpeteŋ. Ɛ nyɛ jeɓa kum ɓesɔja kɔ diyɛ nyɛ, simande Yesus ma kíki gwe.
Kɛ kum ɓesɔja ma lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde, Yesus gwa̧ gbate kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ jayɛ nde, Yosɛp ɓôŋ muŋ nɛ.
Ɛ Yosɛp ɓɔmɛ ndɔmbɔ kwa̧ piɗyɛ muŋ Yesus kɛ kroa ɓɔyɛ nɛ ndɔmbɔ kɛ̀ niŋgwɛ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ te yi ɓo timma kɛ wɛtɛ nyaŋgwɛ tari kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ nje ɓiŋgile wɛtɛ tari ɗiɓɔ nɛ numbu te.
Mariya te ŋgɔndu Magdala nɛ̀ Mariya te nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Yosɛs ɓɛŋma mbɛy te yi ɓo pumbuma nyɛ kɛte kɛ́.
Kɛ yesɔ *Saba ma si kwa̧ kɛ́, ɛ Mariya te ŋgɔndu Magdala nɛ̀ Mariya te nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Jak nɛ̀ Salome ɓɔmɛ yiŋa mɛmutɔ mɛte yi ɓa̧ nɛ kimɔ mɛtul, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ nyɛ kɛ yotu Yesus.
Ɓemɛŋmɛnɛ sut kɛ bosa yesɔ te ɛ kandɛ jɔnja sɔndi, ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ yí kɛ̀ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi njanjakwɛ nje nɔ kɛ́.
Ɓo ɗikima diyna nde: «Nda ta njeŋɛ tari soŋɛ kɛ numbu ɓoŋsɔŋ nyɛ wusɛ?»
Kɛ ɓo ma kaŋɛ misi, ɓo ɓɛ́ŋa nde, ɓo ma njeŋɛ tari yinɔri soŋɛ. Yo nde, yo ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛte ɓuɗyate.
Kɛ ɓo ma nyiŋɛ kɛ mɔy ɓoŋsɔŋ, ɓo ɓɛ́ŋa mbaŋa gwanjɔ mɛtiɗyɛ pulɔ mbam ɓɔ nɛ wumna gambo kɛ yotu. Ɛ ɓo gwe wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Nɛ tî gwaki wɔ̧ na. Wunɛ sáŋ Yesus te ɛ Nasarɛt yi ɓo ŋgbama kɛ kroa kɔ. A ma womiyɛ, a yeti se waka na. Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa mbɛy te yi ɓo niŋgwa nyɛ kɛte kɛ́.
Ma wunɛ kɛ̂n kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ Piyɛr nɛ̀ ɓejekɛ ɓete ɓari nde, a ma kandɛ kwa̧ nɛ wunɛ kɛ̀ pɛ Galile. Wunɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ mate nda yi nyɛ ma lɛ́pi nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ ɓo pundɛ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ sɛɗyɛ kwa̧ nɛ mɛŋgwaŋgwa, yo kwaŋma to yan. Ɗete, ɓo tì lɛpɛ yaŋa nyɛ mumɔ na, kɛto wɔ̧ kwaŋma ɓo ɓuɗyate.
Yesus womiya ɓemɛŋmɛnɛ kɛ bosa yesɔ te ɛ kandɛ jɔnja sɔndi. Ɛ nyɛ kandɛ punjɛ yotu nyɛ Mariya te ŋgɔndu Magdala yi nyɛ soŋma ɓeya mɛsisiŋ yitan jɔ yiɓa kɛ yotu nɛ kɔ.
Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ yekiɗye yo nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe joŋnama ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus ɓaka. Ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ wo yotu lelɔ.
A lɛpima nyɛ ɓo nde, Yesus nɛ joŋ, a ɓɛŋma nyɛ. Kɛ ɓo ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɓo tì jayɛ na.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus punjɛ yotu nyɛ ɓaŋa yiɓa kɛ njoka yan nɛ yiŋa yotu dɛlɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ kɛ̀ kɛ yiŋa mɛlunde kɛ́.
Ɛ ɓo yɔkwɛ nje yekiɗye sendi nyɛ ɓenjɔŋ ɓan. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì jayɛ sendi yasi te yi ɓo lɛpima nyɛ ɓo kɛ́ na.

Kɛ kɔŋte yinɔri, ɛ Yesus nje punjɛ sendi yotu nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kamɔ jɔ wɛtɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ ɗyena kɛ́. A ndeyma ɓo, kɛto ɓo ɓa̧ nɛ mɛso kɛ temɔ. Sendi, ɓo tì tikɛ temɔ kɛ yasi te yi ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓɛŋma nde, a womiya lɛpima kɛ́ na.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ kɛ̂n kɛ to mɛnɛti hɛnɛ kɛ̀ pelɛ Kimɔ Tom nyɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ.
Mɔ te ɛ ta tikɔ temɔ kɛ Kimɔ Tom te, jayɛ nde, ɓo tɔ̂pa nyɛ kɛ mɔrɔku, mɔ te ta ju̧. Ma yɔkɔ ɛ ta ɗiyɔ kinɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ Kimɔ Tom te na, jɔsi ta ɓalɔ kɛ to nɛ.
Ɓotu ɓete ɓe ta tikɔ temɔ kɛ Kimɔ Tom te ɓaka ta kelɔ kwalɔ mɛyekambiyɛ te yikɛ, yo nde, ɓo ta soŋɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ yotu ɓomɔ nɛ ɗinɔ ɗyembɛ. Ɓo ta lɛpina nɛ yiŋa mɛnumbu.
Ɓo ta ɓiye sendi ɓenyɔŋɛ lalɛ nɛ ɓɔ. Kɛ ɓo hɔɓiye yiŋa yasi te yi nɛ lɔku kɛte, yo tí kelɔ ɓo yaŋa na. Ɓo ta kasɛ mɛɓɔ kɛ yotu ɓotu ɓekɔn, mɛkɔn man má siyɔ.»
Kɛ Kumande Yesus ma si lɛpina nyɛ ɓo kɛ́, ɛ Njambiyɛ yɔkiɗye nyɛ kɛnjɛ ɗyoɓɔ. Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ kɛ mbam ɓɔ Njambiyɛ.
Ɛ ɓejekɛ nje kwa̧ kɛ̀ pelɛ Kimɔ Tom kɛ mɛmbɛy hɛnɛ. Kumande Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ kɔŋ yan, nyɛ ɓo ɗeti te yi kelɔ mɛyekambiyɛ, nɛ́ ɓomɔ duwɛ nde, lɛpi te yi ɓo lɛpɛ kɛ́, gbakasi.]
Luke: Nyaŋgwɛ mbam Teyofil, ɓuɗya ɓomɔ nya ɓɔ kɛ kɛtina mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋnama kɛ njoka wusu kɛ́.
Ɓo kɛtima yo ɓeŋgwɛ yasi te yi ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓɛŋma nɛ misi man wulɛ kɛ kandinate yekiɗya nyɛ wusɛ kɛ́. Ɓotu ɓete sendi nja̧ nje ɓɛ ɓotu ɓe lɛpina mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Kɛ mi ma si gɔsɔ to te ɓiye kimɔte wulɛ nda yi yo kandima nɔ kɛ́, ɛ mi sendi ɓɛŋɛ kimɔte nde, mi kɛ̂ti yo kɛtɔ nɛ nje te nyɛ wɛ,
nɛ́ wɛ duwɛ nde, mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓo teɗya wɛ kɛ́ kɛ nje gbate.

Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Herod ɓa̧ kumande kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Yuda kɛ́, yo ɓa̧ nɛ wɛtɛ mɔ nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ, ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ nde Sakari. A ɓa̧ kɛ njɔŋ Abiya. Nyari wenɛ ɓa̧ kɛ kandɔ *Arɔn. Ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ ɓa̧ nde Elisabɛt.
Ɓo hɛnɛ yiɓa ɓa̧ nɛ ŋgbeŋ kɛ misi mɛ Njambiyɛ. Ɓo joŋnama ɓakiɗye mɛmboŋga nɛ̀ mɛlɛpi mɛ Baba Mbokɔ hɛnɛ kinɛ mɔnɔ mɛjɔsɔ na.
Ɓo tì ɓɛ nɛ mɔnɔsikɛ na, kɛto Elisabɛt ɓa̧ kundu, sendi, ɓo hɛnɛ sima jombɛ.
Wɛtɛ yesɔ Sakari ɓa̧ kɛ tonjɛ mɛsay mɛnɛ kɛ mbɔmbu Njambiyɛ, kɛto yo ɓa̧ ŋgimɔ mɛsay mɛte yi njɔŋ te yenɛ.

A kelma ɗete nda yi ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ ɗikima kelɔ nɛ mɛsay man kɛ́. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite, ɛ ɓo kelɛ tay kɛ mbɔmbu Njambiyɛ. Ɛ tay teɗye nde, Sakari nyîŋa mbanjɔ Baba Mbokɔ kɛ̀ loɗyɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi nɛ kimɔ mɛtul kɛ́.
Nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ sɛ̧ kɛ ŋgimɔ loɗya mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓa̧ nɛ kimɔ mɛtul kɛ́.
Ndana kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ jaki Baba Mbokɔ pundɛ kɛ mbɔmbu Sakari. A ɓa̧ kɛ tɛri kɛ pay mbam ɓɔ kɛ mbɛy te yi ɓo ɗiki loɗyɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi nɛ kimɔ mɛtul kɛ́.
Kɛ Sakari ma ɓɛŋɛ jaki Njambiyɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɗyanɔ ɗyenɛ ɗimbiyɛ, ɛ nyɛ gwe wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate.
Ɛ jaki Njambiyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Sakari, wɛ tî gwaki wɔ̧ na, kɛto Njambiyɛ jayma mɛŋgwɛta mɔ. Nyari wɔ Elisabɛt ta ja mɔnɔ mbam. Wɛ ta lo nyɛ nde Jaŋ.
Wɛ ta ɓɛ nɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛsosa kɛto nɛ. Sendi, ɓuɗya ɓomɔ ta sosa komɛ nyɛ ta jaɗyɛ kɛ́,
kɛto a ta ɓɛ nyaŋgwɛte kɛ misi mɛ Baba Mbokɔ. A tí ɗye mɛnjam ho nyanna mɛnjam na. A ta ɓɛ tondunate nɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ kandɛ kɛ mɔy nyaŋgwɛ.
A ta yɔkiɗye ɓotu ɓe kandɔ Isarayɛl ɓuɗyate njesɛ kɛ yasi Baba Mbokɔ te Njambiyɛ wan.

A ta kwa̧ mbɔmbu nɛ Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande nda mɔ tomun Njambiyɛ nɛ sisiŋ nɛ̀ ɗeti nda Eli. A ta yeŋsa mɛtemɔ mɛ ɓesaŋgwɛ nɛ ɓɔnɔ nde, ɓo kwâɗyikwɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓan. A ta kelɔ nde, ɓotu ɓe mbandɔ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ ɗyanɔ nda ŋgbeŋ ɓomɔ yí kombile nɛ kimɔ kandɔ tikɛ Baba Mbokɔ.»
Ɛ Sakari lɛpɛ nyɛ jaki Njambiyɛ nde: «Mi ta kelɔ nan yí duwɛ nɔ nde, mɛyasi ta kwaŋna ɗete? Kɛto mi sima jombɛ. Sendi, mɛsew mɛ nyari mbɛ sima ɓuyɔ.»
Ɛ jaki Njambiyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo mi, Gabriyɛl. Mi ɗíy kɛ mbɔmbu Njambiyɛ. Njambiyɛ tomɛ mi nde, mi njâki lɛpina nyɛ wɛ, lɛpɔ kimɔ tom te yikɛ nyɛ wɛ.
Ɓɛŋa, numbu yɔ ta ɓɛ ɗiɓinate. Wɛ tí tapita se na kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mɛyasi maka ta si kelna, kɛto wɛ tì jayɛ mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ na, mɛlɛpi mɛte yi ta kelna tondɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi yo yâkaŋgwɛ kelna kɛ́.»
Ɓomɔ ɓa̧ ndi kɛ laɗye Sakari. Ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgbakima to te yi nyɛ kikɛ nɔ ɗete kɛ mɔy mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ́.
Kɛ nyɛ ma nje pundɔ kɛ́, a tì ɓɛ nɛ ɗeti te yi lɛpina nyɛ ɓo na. Ɛ ɓo duwɛ nde, a ɓɛŋma yiŋa mɛyekambiyɛ kɛ mɔy mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. A ɗikima pɛpiɗye mɛɓɔ numbu kɔɓɔ yí lɛpina nɔ nyɛ ɓo.
Kɛ mɛtu mɛsay mɛte yenɛ ma siyɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ ɗuwɛ kɛ̀ ɗya ɗyenɛ.
Mɔnɔ mɛtu kwaŋma kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyari wenɛ Elisabɛt ɓu̧ mɔy. Ɛ nyɛ sɔma nɔ ŋgwɛndɛ yitan. A ɗikima lɛpɔ nde:
‹Baba Mbokɔ kelma nyaŋgwɛ ŋgikwa nɛ mi. A kaŋma misi ɓɛŋɛ nɛ mi yí soŋɛ nɛ wuŋgwa kɛ yotu mbɛ kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ.›
Kɛ mɔy Elisabɛt ma kumɔ ŋgwɛndɛ yitan jɔ wɛtɛ kɛ́, ɛ Njambiyɛ tomɛ jaki wenɛ Gabriyɛl kɛnjɛ kɛ Galile kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya nde Nasarɛt,
kɛ yi wɛtɛ ɓindi ŋgɔndu nde Mariya. Yo ɓa̧ kponate nde, a ta kelɔ gwaki ɓenɛ wɛtɛ mbam nde Yosɛp kɛ kandɔ Davit.
Jaki Njambiyɛ nyiŋma tu̧ Mariya dolɔ nyɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mi kɛ nyɛnɔ wɛ, Baba Mbokɔ kɛ yɔ! A teɗya wɛ nyaŋgwɛ ŋgikwa nɛ.»
Kɛ Mariya ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɗyanɔ ɗyenɛ ɗimbiyɛ, ɛ nyɛ gwe wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate. Ɛ nyɛ diyɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ nde: ‹To mɛnyɛn mɛte yikɛ lɛ́pi nɛ ŋge?›
Ɛ jaki Njambiyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mariya, wɛ tî gwaki wɔ̧ na, kɛto Njambiyɛ teɗya nyaŋgwɛ ŋgikwa nɛ kɛ yɔ.
Dukwɛ nde, wɛ ta ɓu̧ mɔy. Wɛ ta ja mɔnɔ mbam, wɛ ta lo nyɛ nde Yesus.
A ta ɓɛ nyaŋgwɛte kɛ misi mɛ Njambiyɛ. Ɓo ta jeɓa nyɛ nde Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ te ɛ kwaŋma mɛyasi hɛnɛ kɛ kwey kɔ. Njambiyɛ te Baba Mbokɔ ta nyɛ nyɛ ɗiyɔ kumande saŋmbambɔ wenɛ Davit.
A ta namɔ kandɔ tu̧ Yakɔp kpo nɛ kpo. Namnate yenɛ tí ɓɛ nɛ njena na.»
Ɛ Mariya lɛpɛ nyɛ jaki Njambiyɛ nde: «Yo yakama kelna nan, kɛto mi tì pa duwɛ mbɛ mbam na?»

Ɛ jaki Njambiyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kimɔ Sisiŋ ta nje pɛ yɔ. Ŋguŋguɗyɛ Njambiyɛ te ɛ kwaŋma mɛyasi hɛnɛ kɛ kwey kɔ ta ɓusɛ wɛ nda wukumɛ. Ɗete, mɔnɔ te yi wɛ ta ja kɔ ta ɓɛ kiyɔ. Ɓo ta jeɓa nyɛ nde Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ.
Dukwɛ nde, toru wɔ Elisabɛt mɛ nɛ mɔy. A ɓoŋma mɔy nɛ jombiɗyɛ. Yɔkɔ yi ɓo ɗikima jeɓa nde kundu kɔ mɛ nɛ mɔy ŋgwɛndɛ yitan jɔ wɛtɛ muka. A ta ja mɔnɔ mbam.
Kɛto kinɛ yiŋa sulna yasi kɛ misi mɛ Njambiyɛ na.»
Ɛ Mariya lɛpɛ nde: «Mi kɔ, mɔ mɛsay mɛ Baba Mbokɔ, yo kêlnaŋgwɛ kɛ yotu mbɛ nda yi wɛ lɛpima kɛ́!» Ɛ jaki Njambiyɛ pundɛ kwa̧ lɔndɔ kɛ kɛki nɛ.
Ndi kɛ mɛtu te yite ɛ Mariya tɛmɛ ɓekɛ ɓekɛ kɛ̀ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Yuda, kɛ mɛnɛti mɛte yi nɛ mɛkeki kɛ́.
Ɛ nyɛ nyiŋɛ tu̧ Sakari nyɛnɔ Elisabɛt.
Kɛ Elisabɛt ma wokɔ mɛnyɛn mɛ Mariya kɛ́, ɛ mɔnɔ watɛ ɓuɗyate kɛ mɔy nɛ, ɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ tondɛ kɛ yotu Elisabɛt.
Ɛ nyɛ kembiɗya lɛpɔ nde: «Wɛ nɛ mɛkombila kɛ njoka ɓɛsɔ ɓoma. Sendi, mɔnɔ te ɛ kɛ mɔy yɔ kɔ nɛ mɛkombila.
Wuy, ŋge ɓa̧ kelɛ yi nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande wombɛ nja̧ ndana kɛ yasi mbɛ kɛ́?
Kɛto, kɛ mi ma wokɔ mɛnyɛn mɔ kɛ́, ɛ mɔnɔsikɛ watɛ ɓuɗyate nɛ mɛsosa kɛ mɔy mbɛ.
Wɛ nɛ mɛsosa, kɛto wɛ jayma nde, mɛyasi mɛte yi Baba Mbokɔ lɛpima nyɛ wɛ kɛ́ ta kelna.»
Ɛ Mariya lɛpɛ nde:
«Mi kɛ kanɔ Baba Mbokɔ.
Sendi, temɔ mbɛ nɛ mɛsosa kɛto Njambiyɛ, Mɔ te ɛ joŋgwɛ mi kɔ.
A teɗya mi ŋgikwa nɛ, mi mɔ mɛsay wenɛ. Kandɛ ndana kumɔ kpo nɛ kpo mɛkandɔ hɛnɛ te yi ta jaɗyɛ kɛ to mɛnɛti maka kɛ́ ta lɛpɔ nde, mi nɛ mɛsosa.
Kɛto Njambiyɛ te ɛ nɛ ŋguŋguɗyɛ kɔ kelma nyaŋgwɛ mɛyasi kɛ pay te yembɛ. Ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ kiyɔ.
Sendi, ɓotu ɓete ɓe kambɛ nyɛ ɓaka, a gwáki ŋgwɛtɛ yan mɛŋgimɔ hɛnɛ.
A teɗya ɓomɔ nde, a nɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɗeti. A wanjima ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ nɛ mɛtakɛ mɛ ɓendiɗya yotu kɛ temɔ yan ɓaka.
A soŋma ɓekumande kɛ mɛɗiyɔ man nje ɓendiɗye gbɛla ɓomɔ.
A tonja kimɔ mɛyasi nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe gwe nja ɓaka, nje tikɔ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nɛ mɛyasi ɓaka nɛ gboŋgo ɓɔ.
A kamma kandɔ Isarayɛl, ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ɓenɛ yí takɛ gwena ŋgwɛtɛ nɛ
suŋgwɛ nɛ Abaraham ɓenɛ ɓenday ɓenɛ kpo nɛ kpo. A kelma ɗete nda yi nyɛ lɛpima nyɛ ɓesaŋmbambɔ ɓusu kɛ́.»
Mariya yama ɓenɛ Elisabɛt nda ŋgwɛndɛ yitati. Ɛ nyɛ nje ɗuwɛ kɛ̀ ɗya ɗyenɛ.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Elisabɛt ta ja kɛte kɛ́ ma ɗya̧, ɛ nyɛ ja mɔnɔ mbam.
Kɛ ɓenjɔŋ ɓenɛ nɛ̀ ɓemaŋ ma wokɔ nde, Baba Mbokɔ teɗya nyɛ nyaŋgwɛ ŋgikwa nɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɓɛ nɛ mɛsosa nda Elisabɛt.
Kɛ mɔnɔsikɛ ma kumɔ mɛtu yitan jɔ yitati kɛ́, ɛ ɓomɔ nje kɛ pɛsina nɛ. Ɛ ɓo diy lo nyɛ nde Sakari nɛ ɗinɔ saŋgwɛ wenɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyaŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ lɛpɛ nde: «Ɓɛ, ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ ta ɓɛ nde Jaŋ!»
Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kinɛ mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ kɛ kandɔ ɗyɔ nɛ ɗinɔ te yite na.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo pɛpiɗye ɓɔ diyɛ nɛ saŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ nde: «Wɛ kwáɗyikwɛ lo mɔnɔsikɛ nde ŋge?»
Ɛ Sakari jɔmbɛ yiŋa yasi, na kɛtina kɛte. Ɛ nyɛ kɛtɛ kɛte nde: ‹Ɗinɔ mɔnɔsikɛ nde Jaŋ.› Ɛ ɓo hɛnɛ ŋgbakima ɗinɔ te yite.
Ndana ndana, ɛ numbu nɛ ɓutuna. Ɛ nyɛ kandɛ ndapi nɛ kɔkɔ lukse Njambiyɛ.
Ɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ pɔku mɛnɛti mɛte yite ɓaka gwe wɔ̧. Ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗikima ɗiyɔ kɛ Yuda, kɛ mɛnɛti mɛte yi nɛ mɛkeki kɛte kɛ́ ɗikima yekiɗye ndi mɛyasi mɛte.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe wokuma kasi te ɓaka ɗikima takɛ yo kɛ mɔy temɔ. Ɛ ɓo ɗiki diyɛ nde: «Mɔnɔ te yɔkɔ ta duwɛ ɓɛ nan? Ɗeti Baba Mbokɔ ɓa̧ gbate kɛ yotu nɛ.»
Saŋgwɛ wenɛ Sakari ɓa̧ tondunate nɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ. Ɛ nyɛ punjɛ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpɔ nde:
«Mɛluksa nɛ Baba Mbokɔ, Njambiyɛ te ɛ kandɔ Isarayɛl, kɛto a takima ɓotu ɓenɛ kolɔ ɓo.
A nya wusɛ ɗetina mɔ te ɛ ta joŋgwɛ wusɛ kɔ wulɛ kɛ tu̧ mɔ mɛsay wenɛ Davit.
A kelma nda yi nyɛ lɛpima kɛ numbu pupuna ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ ɓe mɛtu mɛ njimɛ.
Mɔ te ɛ ta joŋgwɛ wusɛ komɛ ɓependɔ ɓusu ɗiyɛ kɛ́, soŋɛ wusɛ kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓenɛ wusɛ ɓaka.
Ɗete, Njambiyɛ gwa̧ ŋgwɛtɛ ɓesaŋmbambɔ ɓusu yí takɛ sendi nɛ nyaŋgwɛ mbon te yi nyɛ kelma kɛ́.
A kél ɗete ɓeŋgwɛ mɛkinja mɛte yi nyɛ kinjama nyɛ saŋmbambɔ wusu Abaraham kɛ́.
A kinjama nde, ŋgɛ nyɛ si soŋɛ wusɛ kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ ɓependɔ ɓusu, wusɛ ta kelɔ mɛsay nyɛ nyɛ kinɛ wɔ̧ na.
Wusɛ ta ɓɛ nɛ ŋgbeŋ, ɓakiɗye sendi mɛyotu musu pupunate kɛ mbɔmbu wenɛ kɛ mɛtu mɛ joŋgwɛ musu hɛnɛ.
Mɔnɔsikɛ, ŋgɛ ɓɛ wɛ, ɓo ta jeɓa wɛ nde Mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ te ɛ kwaŋma mɛyasi hɛnɛ kɛ kwey kɔ, kɛto wɛ ta kandɛ kwa̧ mbɔmbu nɛ Baba Mbokɔ yí kombile mɛnje mɛnɛ.
Wɛ ta teɗye ɓomɔ ɓenɛ, nɛ́ ɓo duwɛ nje joŋgwɛ nɛ nje te nde, Njambiyɛ ta tikɔ mɛɓeyɔ man nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ.
Njambiyɛ wusu nɛ ŋgikwa ɓuɗyate. Yo ɗete yi mɛjasi ta wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ nje pɛ yusu
nje paniyɛ puyɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗiyɛ kɛ mɔy yitil nɛ̀ kɛ ndiliŋ mbɛy te yi sɔŋ ɓaka, nɛ́ yo kɛndi nɛ wusɛ kɛ nje te ɛ nɛ tɛ.»
Mɔnɔsikɛ ɓa̧ kɛ ɗɔkɔ. Sendi, ɗyanɔ ɓa̧ kɛ nje nyɛ ɓuɗyate. A joŋnama kɛ mɔy mɛkoŋgor kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ nja̧ nje punjɛ nɛ yotu nyɛ kandɔ Isarayɛl kɛ̀.
Kɛ mɛtu te yite ɛ *Sesar Ogust nyɛ mboŋga nde, ɓo tɔ̂l ɓomɔ kɛ to mɛnɛti mɛnɛ hɛnɛ.
Yo ɓa̧ bosa tɔlna ɓomɔ. Yo kélnaŋgwɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Kirinus ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Siri kɛ́.
Mumɔ hɛnɛ ka̧ kɛ̀ kɛtɔ ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ kɛ ŋgbak ŋgbak ɗya ɗyenɛ.
Ɛ Yosɛp tɛmɛ sendi kɛ Nasarɛt kɛ Galile kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya nde Betɛlɛhɛm kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Yuda. Betɛlɛhɛm ɓa̧ ɗya kumande Davit. Yosɛp ka̧ mate, kɛto ɓenɛ kumande Davit jaɗyɛ kɛ kiya kandɔ wɛtɛ.
A ka̧ kɛ̀ kɛtɔ ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ ɓenɛ Mariya, kɛto yo ɓa̧ kponate nde, ɓenɛ nyɛ ta kelɔ gwaki. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite Mariya ɓa̧ nɛ mɔy.
Piŋɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ ndi mate kɛ́, ɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Mariya ta ja kɛte kɛ́ ɗya̧.
Ɛ nyɛ ja bosa mɔnɔ wenɛ, mɔnɔ mbam. Ɛ nyɛ ɓɔyɛ nyɛ nɛ mɛlambɔ niŋgwɛ nyɛ kɛ mɔy ɓokɔ, kɛto ɓo tì ɓɛ nɛ mbɛy kɛ tu̧ ɓejɛŋgwɛ na.
Ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya ɓesam ɓa̧ kɛ pɔku mɛnɛti mɛte yite kɛ ɓakiɗye ɓesam ɓan nɛ tu kɛ mɔy lɔ̧.
Ɛ wɛtɛ jaki Baba Mbokɔ ɗya̧ kɛ yan. Ɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛjasi mɛ Baba Mbokɔ panɛ kɛ mbɛy komɛ ɓo ɗiyma kɛ́. Ɛ ɓo gwe wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate.
Ɛ jaki Njambiyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Nɛ tî gwaki wɔ̧ na, kɛto mi kɛ nje lɛpɔ kimɔ tom te yi kandɔ Isarayɛl hɛnɛ ta wokɔ mɛsosa kɛte kɛ́ nyɛ wunɛ.
Mɔ te ɛ ta joŋgwɛ wunɛ kɔ jaɗya muka kɛ ɗya Davit, nyɛ *Krist, nyɛ Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande.
Yasi te yi wunɛ ta duwɛ nɔ kɛ́, yo nde: Wunɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ jɔnja mbɔŋgɔ mɔnɔsikɛ ɓɔynate nɛ mɛlambɔ. Ɓo niŋgwa nyɛ kɛ mɔy ɓokɔ.»
Ɓo sém semɔ, nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ ɗyaŋma dolɔ jaki te yɔru. Ɛ ɓo kanɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpɔ nde:
‹Mɛluksa nɛ Njambiyɛ pɛ kwey! Tɛte ɗîy nɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe Njambiyɛ kwaɗyɛ kɛ mɛnɛti maka ɓaka!›

Ndana, kɛ ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ ma tikɔ ɓo ɗuwɛ kɛ̀ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́, ɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya ɓesam lɛpɛ tandɛ yan nde: «Wusɛ kɛ̂n pɛlɛ Betɛlɛhɛm kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ yasi te yi kwaŋnama mate kɛ́, yasi te yi Baba Mbokɔ lɛpima nyɛ wusɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ nɛdɔ kwa̧. Ɓo dolma Mariya ɓenɛ Yosɛp, dolɔ sendi jɔnja mbɔŋgɔ mɔnɔsikɛ niŋgwate kɛ mɔy ɓokɔ.
Kɛ ɓo ma si ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo yekiɗye mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓo wokuma kɛ kasi mɔnɔ te kɛ́ nyɛ ɓomɔ.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe wokuma mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya ɓesam yekiɗya kɛ́ ŋgbakimama.
Mariya ɓakiɗya nɛ mɛyasi mɛte kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ takɛ gɔsɔ to te.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya ɓesam yɔkwɛ. Ɓo luksa Njambiyɛ ɓesɛ sendi nyɛ, kɛto mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓo wokuma nɛ̀ yi ɓo ɓɛŋma kɛ́ ɓa̧ ndi nda yi jaki Njambiyɛ lɛpima nyɛ ɓo kɛ́.
Ɓo yama mɛtu yitan jɔ yitati kɛ kɔŋ jariki. Ɛ ɓo pɛsɛ mɔnɔsikɛ, ɛ ɓo lo nyɛ nde Yesus, ɗinɔ te yi jaki Njambiyɛ nya, yite nyaŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔsikɛ tì pa ɓu̧ mɔy nɛ na.
Ndana, kɛ mɛtu mɛ nyɛna sadaka yi pupuɗya yan kɛ misi mɛ Njambiyɛ ma yaka ɓeŋgwɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Mɔyisi kɛ́, ɛ Yosɛp ɓenɛ Mariya ɓu̧ mɔnɔsikɛ kɛ̀ nɔ Yerusalɛm kɛ̀ nyɛ Baba Mbokɔ.
Yo ɓa̧ kɛtinate ɗete kɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Baba Mbokɔ nde: ‹Bosa mɔnɔ mbam te ɛ kandɛ jaɗyɛ kɛ mɔy nyaŋgwɛ kɔ ta ɓɛ ɛ Baba Mbokɔ.›
Ɓo ka̧ sendi kɛ̀ nyɛ sadaka nda yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Baba Mbokɔ kɛ́: ‹Ɓebondo yiɓa ho sɔnjɔ ɓepepɔ yiɓa.›

Wɛtɛ mbam ɓa̧ kɛ Yerusalɛm, ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ nde Simeyɔŋ. A ɓa̧ ŋgbeŋ mumɔ. A ɓa̧ kɛ ɓakiɗye mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ, tikɔ temɔ nɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Njambiyɛ ta joŋgwɛ nɛ kandɔ Isarayɛl kɛ́. Kimɔ Sisiŋ ɓa̧ sendi kɛ nyɛ.
Kimɔ Sisiŋ téɗya nyɛ nde, a tí gwe kinɛ pa ɓɛŋɛ *Krist te ɛ Baba Mbokɔ ta njesɛ kɔ na.
Ɗiyɔ kɛ́, ɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ pusɛ nyɛ kɛnjɛ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. Kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te saŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɓoŋma nyɛ yí tonjɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi mɛmboŋga ɗikima diyɛ kɛ́.
Ɛ Simeyɔŋ ɓu̧ mɔnɔsikɛ ɓiye kɛ mɛɓɔ nyɛ Njambiyɛ wosoko lɛpɔ nde:
«Sa Mbokɔ, ndana tikɔ mɔ mɛsay wɔ, na kwa̧ nɛ tɛ nda yi wɛ kpoma kɛ́,
kɛto misi mɛmbɛ ma ɓɛŋɛ nda yi wɛ ta joŋgwɛ nɛ ɓomɔ kɛ́.
Wɛ kombila yo ɗete, nɛ́ mɛkandɔ hɛnɛ ɓɛŋ.
Wɛ paniya mɛjasi, nɛ́ mɛkandɔ duwɛ wɛ yí nyɛ sendi kandɔ ɗyɔ Isarayɛl mɛluksa.»
Saŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ wenɛ ŋgbakimama mɛyasi mɛte yi Simeyɔŋ lɛpima kɛ kasi nɛ kɛ́.

Simeyɔŋ nya ɓo mɛkombila. Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ Mariya, nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus nde: «Dukwɛ nde, Njambiyɛ njesa mɔnɔ kɛ́, nɛ́ ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate yambile kɛ njoka kandɔ Isarayɛl, sendi nɛ́ ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate ju̧ kɛ njoka yan. A ta nje ɓɛ yasi te yi ta teɗye nde, ɓomɔ ta ɓiye mɛso nɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ma nyari, kɛ yɔ, wɛ ta saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ nda yi ɓo ɓu̧ kafa lu̧ nɛ mumɔ kɛ temɔ kɛ́. Yo ta kelna ɗete, nɛ́ mɛtakɛ mɛte yi ɗiyɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ ɓuɗya ɓomɔ kɛ́ pundu puyɛ.»

Yo ɓa̧ sendi nɛ wɛtɛ nyari mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ ɓa̧ nde Ana, mɔnɔ Fanuwɛl kɛ kandɔ Asɛr. A ma jombɛ ɓuɗyate. Mbam te ɛ dolma nyɛ kelɔ gwaki ɓenɛ nyɛ kɔ kelma ndi mɛsew yitan jɔ yiɓa ɓenɛ nyɛ,
ɛ mbam te gwe, ɛ nyɛ tika kusɔ. Ndana a mɛ nɛ mɛsew kamɔtan jɔ kamɔtati jɔ yini. A tì ɓɛ kɛ ɓaka nɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ na. A ɗikima kelɔ mɛsay nyɛ Njambiyɛ tu nɛ yesɔ, kiyɔ mɛɗye ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ.
Kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te yite ɛ Ana ɗya̧. Ɛ nyɛ lukse Baba Mbokɔ, yekiɗye sendi kasi mɔnɔ kɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ laɗye ŋgimɔ te yi Njambiyɛ ta kolɔ nɛ Yerusalɛm kɛ́.
Kɛ ɓo ma si kelɔ mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi mɛmboŋga mɛ Baba Mbokɔ lɛpɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo nje ɗuwɛ kɛ̀ ɗya ɗyan kɛ Nasarɛt kɛ Galile.
Mɔnɔsikɛ ɓa̧ kɛ ɗɔkɔ. A ɓa̧ kɛ ɓu̧ ɗeti, ɓɛ sendi nɛ ɗyanɔ ɓuɗyate. Njambiyɛ nya temɔ kɛ yotu nɛ.
Mɛsew hɛnɛ saŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɗikima kɛ̀ Yerusalɛm kɛ jesɔ *Paska Ɓeyudɛn.
Kɛ Yesus ma kumɔ mɛsew kamɔ jɔ yiɓa kɛ́, ɛ ɓenɛ ɓo kɛ̀ Yerusalɛm kɛ jesɔ Paska ɓeŋgwɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ jesɔ.
Kɛ jesɔ ma siyɔ kɛ́, ɛ saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ tɔkɛ nje yí ɗuwɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ mɔnɔsikɛ tika kɛ Yerusalɛm, ɓesaŋgwɛ kinɛ duwɛ na.
Ɓo takima yan nde, a ɓa̧ kɛ njɔŋ kɛndi. Ɛ ɓo kɛndɛ ndiŋgɛlɛ yesɔ wɛtɛ siɗyɛ. Ndana, ɛ ɓo kandɛ saŋna nɛ kɛ njoka ɓejaɗyɛ ɓan nɛ̀ ɓesɔ ɓan.
Kɛ ɓo ma sa̧ nyɛ kinɛ dolɔ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ kɛ Yerusalɛm kɛ̀ sa̧ nyɛ mate.
Ya mɛtu yitati kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ ɓo kɛ̀ dolɔ nyɛ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. A ɓa̧ kɛ ɗiyɔ kɛ njoka nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe duwa̧ mɛmboŋga lɛŋgwɛ mɛtɔ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ kɛ́, diyɛ sendi ɓo mɛdiyan.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ wokɔ mɛyasi mɛte yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ nɛ̀ yeŋsa mɛdiyan te yi nyɛ ɗikima yeŋsa kɛ́ kambima ɗyanɔ ɗyenɛ.
Kɛ saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ ma ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ŋgbakima ɓuɗyate. Ɛ nyaŋgwɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mɔnmbɛ, ŋge yi wɛ kelma nɛ wusɛ ɗekɛ kɛ́? Sinɛ sɔŋgwɛ gwa̧ kaŋ ɓuɗyate kɛ saŋna yɔ.»
Ɛ nyɛ nje yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ ɓa̧ kɛ sa̧ mi kɛto ŋge? ’Wunɛ tì duwɛ nde, mi yâkaŋgwɛ ɗiyɔ kɛ tu̧ Saŋmbɛ na?»
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì wokɛ to yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpima nyɛ ɓo kɛ́ na.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ siliyɛ ɓenɛ ɓo yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ Nasarɛt. A ɓa̧ kɛ jɛsɔ ɓesaŋgwɛ. Nyaŋgwɛ ɓa̧ kɛ takɛ mɛyasi mɛte hɛnɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ.
Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ ɗɔkɔ, ɗyanɔ ɓa̧ kɛ nje nyɛ sendi. Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓomɔ nya temɔ kɛ yotu nɛ.

Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Jaŋ te mɔnɔ Sakari ɓa̧ kɛ mɔy koŋgor kɛ́, ɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpina nyɛ nyɛ. Yo ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Tibɛr *Sesar kumma mɛsew kamɔ jɔ yitan kɛ ɗiyɔ nyaŋgwɛ kumande kɛ́. Yite Pɔnsi Pilat ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Yuda, Herod ɓa̧ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Galile. Maŋ wenɛ Filip ɓa̧ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Iture nɛ̀ Trakɔnit. Lisaniyas ɓa̧ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Abilɛn. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite Hana ɓenɛ Kayif ɓa̧ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ.

Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Jaŋ te mɔnɔ Sakari ɓa̧ kɛ mɔy koŋgor kɛ́, ɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpina nyɛ nyɛ. Yo ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Tibɛr *Sesar kumma mɛsew kamɔ jɔ yitan kɛ ɗiyɔ nyaŋgwɛ kumande kɛ́. Yite Pɔnsi Pilat ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Yuda, Herod ɓa̧ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Galile. Maŋ wenɛ Filip ɓa̧ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Iture nɛ̀ Trakɔnit. Lisaniyas ɓa̧ kum kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Abilɛn. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite Hana ɓenɛ Kayif ɓa̧ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ndana, ɛ Jaŋ goŋgila nɛ mɛnɛti mɛ goŋ Yurdɛ̧ hɛnɛ, pelɛ nyɛ ɓomɔ nde, ɓo yêŋsaŋgwɛ temɔ jayɛ nde, ɓo tɔ̂pa ɓo kɛ mɔrɔku, nɛ́ Njambiyɛ tiki ɓo nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ kɛ mɛɓeyɔ man.

Yo kelnama ɗete ɓeŋgwɛ yasi te yi ɓa̧ kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛte yi Esayi te mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛtima kɛ́. A kɛtima nde: ‹Wɛtɛ mumɔ kɛ kembiɗya kɛ mɔy koŋgor nde: Wunɛ kômbila nje Baba Mbokɔ. Wunɛ tɛ̂mbiɗya mɛnje mɛnɛ nɛ ŋgbeŋ.
Gboŋgo hɛnɛ ɓɛ̂ki mbasinate. Keki nɛ̀ koru hɛnɛ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ tɛfɛn. Mɛnje mɛte yi nɛ kɔndu kɛ́ ɓɛ̂ki tɛmbiɗyate. Yikɛ yi nɛ mɛɓe kɛ́, ɓo sîki tonjɛ yo.
Sendi, ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ nda yi Njambiyɛ ta joŋgwɛ nɛ ɓomɔ kɛ́.›

Ɗete, ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate kwaɗya nde, Jaŋ tɔ̂pa ɓo kɛ mɔrɔku. Ɛ ɓo nje nɛ ŋgil kɛ yasi nɛ. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ mbo yeri, nda kelɛ nde, wunɛ tâka nde, wunɛ yakama diyɔ lalɛ kɛ ŋgambi Njambiyɛ yi nje kɛ́?

Yo kimɔte nde, wunɛ kêl kimɔ mɛkele nda yi kimɔ jeti wumɛ nɛ kimɔ mɛmbumɔ kɛ́ yí teɗye ɓomɔ nde, wunɛ ma yeŋsa temɔ. Sendi, wunɛ tî lɛpi nde, wunɛ ɓenday ɓe Abaraham na. Mi kɛ kombile lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Njambiyɛ yakama yeŋsa mɛtari mɛte yikɛ, yo má ɓɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓe Abaraham.
Njeŋ mɛ nɛ lɛndɛ kɛ njuku jeti, ɗete jeti hɛnɛ ɛ ɗiyɛ kinɛ wumɔ kimɔ mɛmbumɔ, ɓo ta pɛsɔ yo ɓetɛ kɛ ɗitɛ.»
Ɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe wesiɗyama womɛte ɓaka diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wusɛ kêl ɓa nan?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mɔ te ɛ nɛ mɛlambɔ yiɓa kɔ kâɓi wɛtɛ nyɛ mɔ te ɛ kinɛ yaŋa kɔ. Mɔ te ɛ nɛ mɛɗye kɔ kêl sendi ɗete.»
Ɓotu ɓe ɓoŋna mɔni garama nja̧ sendi kɛ yi Jaŋ nde, a tɔ̂pa ɓo kɛ mɔrɔku. Ɛ ɓo diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele, wusɛ kêl nan?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ tî ɓoŋ mɔni kɛ ɓɔ mumɔ kwa̧ yikɛ yi ɓo pɛsima nde, wunɛ ɓôŋ kɛ́ na.»
Ɓesɔja diyma sendi nyɛ nde: «A wusɛ su, wusɛ kêl nan?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ tî ɓoŋ mɔni kɛ ɓɔ mumɔ nɛ ŋgaŋ ho nɛ nje te yi guɓɔ na, yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ ɗyâki ndi mɔni ŋgwɛndɛ yun.»
Ɓomɔ ɓa̧ kɛ laɗye yasi te yi ta ɗya̧ kɛ́. Ɛ mumɔ hɛnɛ takɛ kɛ temɔ nɛ nde, Jaŋ yâkaŋgwɛ ɓɛ *Krist mɔ te ɛ joŋgwɛ ɓomɔ kɔ.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo hɛnɛ nde: «Mi, mi tɔ́pa mbɛ wunɛ kɛ mɔrɔku. Yasi wɛtɛ, wɛtɛ mumɔ kɛ nje. A nɛ ɗeti kwa̧ mi. Mi ti yaka wunjɛ kɔl mɛnakala mɛnɛ na. A ta tɔpɛ wunɛ kɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ nɛ̀ kɛ ɗitɛ.
A nɛ jeti kɛ ɓɔ yí kutɔ nɛ nyambi, yí ɓakɛ njɔsɔ te nɛ̀ kopu te. A ta soŋɛ njɔsɔ te kɛ̀ ɓakiɗye kɛ mɔy ndam nɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, a ta loɗyɛ mɛkopu mɛte kɛ ɗitɛ te yi ti ɗím kɛ́.»
Jaŋ ɗikima nyɛ sendi yiŋa ɓuɗya mɛŋgitɛ nyɛ ɓomɔ. Ɗete, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nɛ Kimɔ Tom Njambiyɛ nyɛ ɓo.
A ndeyma Herod, kɛto a ɓoŋma Herodiyas te nya maŋ wenɛ nɛ mɛgwaki. Ɛ nyɛ ndeyɛ nyɛ sendi, kɛto ɓeya mɛkele hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ ɗikima kelɔ kɛ́.
Herod ka̧ mbɔmbu kelɔ wɛtɛ ɓeya mɛkele dokiɗye kɛ to te yiri. A ɓoŋma Jaŋ ɗiɓɔ kɛ tu̧ jɔɓɔ.
Kɛ Jaŋ ma si tɔpɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ kɛ mɔrɔku kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ nje tɔpɛ sendi Yesus. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɗyoɓɔ nɛmbiyɛ.
Ɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ piyɛ nɛ yotu nda pepɔ nje kɛ yotu nɛ. Ɛ wɛtɛ mɛn wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ lɛpɔ nde: «Wɛ mɔnmbɛ, sɔŋ temɔ mbɛ, temɔ mbɛ hɛnɛ kɛ yotu yɔ!»
Yesus kandima mɛsay mɛnɛ, yite a mɛ kɛ mɛsew kamɔtati. Ɓomɔ ɓa̧ kɛ takɛ nde, nyɛ mɔnɔ Yosɛp. Yosɛp ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Eli.
Eli ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Matat. Matat ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Levi. Levi ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Mɛlki. Mɛlki ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yanay. Yanay ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yosɛp.
Yosɛp ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Matatiyas. Matatiyas ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Amɔs. Amɔs ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Nahum. Nahum ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Ɛsli. Ɛsli ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Nagay.
Nagay ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Mahat. Mahat ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Matatiyas. Matatiyas ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Semɛy. Semɛy ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yosɛk. Yosɛk ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yuda.
Yuda ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yohanan. Yohanan ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Resa. Resa ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Sorobabɛl. Sorobabɛl ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Salatiyɛl. Salatiyɛl ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Neri.
Neri ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Mɛlki. Mɛlki ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Adi. Adi ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Kosam. Kosam ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Ɛlmadan. Ɛlmadan ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Hɛr.
Hɛr ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yesus. Yesus ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Eliyesɛr. Eliyesɛr ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yorim. Yorim ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Matat. Matat ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Levi.
Levi ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Simeyɔŋ. Simeyɔŋ ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yuda. Yuda ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yosɛp. Yosɛp ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yonam. Yonam ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Eliyakim.
Eliyakim ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Meleya. Meleya ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Mena. Mena ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Matata. Matata ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Natan. Natan ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Davit.
Davit ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Isay. Isay ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yobɛd. Yobɛd ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Bowas. Bowas ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Sala. Sala ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Nasɔn.
Nasɔn ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Aminadap. Aminadap ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Admin. Admin ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Arni. Arni ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Ɛsrom. Ɛsrom ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Farɛs. Farɛs ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yuda.
Yuda ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yakɔp. Yakɔp ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Isak. Isak ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Abaraham. Abaraham ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Tara. Tara ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Nahɔr.
Nahɔr ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Seruk. Seruk ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Rago. Rago ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Falɛk. Falɛk ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Ebɛr. Ebɛr ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Sala.
Sala ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Kaynam. Kaynam ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Arpakisad. Arpakisad ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Sɛm. Sɛm ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Nɔy. Nɔy ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Lamɛk.
Lamɛk ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Matusala. Matusala ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Enɔk. Enɔk ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Yarɛd. Yarɛd ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Malelɛl. Malelɛl ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Kaynam.
Kaynam ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Enɔs. Enɔs ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Sɛt. Sɛt ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Adam. Adam ɓa̧ mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ.
Kimɔ Sisiŋ tonduma kɛ yotu Yesus kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ yɔkwa̧ nɔ kɛ goŋ Yurdɛ̧ kɛ́. Ɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ kɛndɛ nɛ nyɛ kɛ koŋgor.
Yesus ɗiyma mɛtu kamɔni kɛ koŋgor mate. Ɛ *Kum ɓeya mɛkele ɓoɓɛ nyɛ. Kɛ mɛtu te yinɔri hɛnɛ Yesus tì ɗyena na. Kɛ mɛtu mɛte ma si kwa̧ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ wokɛ nja.
Ɛ Kum ɓeya mɛkele lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wɛ Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ, lɛpɔ nyɛ tari te yɔkɔ nde: Yeŋsaŋgwɛ ɓɛ mampa.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹Mumɔ ti yaka joŋna ndi nɛ mampa nyɛpɔ na.› »
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Kum ɓeya mɛkele ɓu̧ nyɛ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ wɛtɛ gere gere mbɛy teɗye nyɛ mɛkandɔ hɛnɛ kɛ to mɛnɛti ndi tu wɛtɛ nda yi mumɔ kiɓiɗya nɔ kɛ́.
Ɛ Kum ɓeya mɛkele nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mi ta nyɛ wɛ ɗeti te yi namɔ mɛkandɔ mɛte yikɛ hɛnɛ, ɓɛ nɛ mɛluksa mɛte, kɛto ɓo nya mi ɗeti te yi namɔ yo. Ndana mi yakama ɓu̧ yo nyɛ mɔ te yi mi kwaɗyɛ kɔ.
Ɗete, ŋgɛ wɛ kusɛ mɛɓɔŋ kɛ mɛnɛti kanɔ mi, mi má nyɛ wɛ yo hɛnɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹Kanɔ Baba Mbokɔ te Njambiyɛ wɔ, kelɔ mɛsay nyɛ ndi nyɛ nyɛpɔ.› »
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Kum ɓeya mɛkele kɔ ɓu̧ nyɛ sendi kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ Yerusalɛm, tɛmbiɗye nyɛ kɛ tosiyɔ̧ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wɛ Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ, ɗokɔ piyɛ kɛ mɛnɛti,
kɛto yo kɛtinate sendi kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹Njambiyɛ ta lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓejaki ɓenɛ nde, ɓo ɓâkiɗya wɛ.
Ɗete, ɓo ta jɛkiɗye ɓɔ ɓiye nɛ wɛ, kambɔ wɛ nje ɗumɔ kol yɔ kɛ tari.› »
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹Wɛ tî ɓoɓa Baba Mbokɔ te Njambiyɛ wɔ na.› »
Kɛ nyɛ ma si ɓoɓɛ Yesus nɛ mɛnje mɛte yinɔri hɛnɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ lɔndɔ kɛ kɛki nɛ yí laɗye yiŋa mɛŋgimɔ.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ kɛ Galile nɛ ɗeti Kimɔ Sisiŋ kɛ yotu. Ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ kasi nɛ kɛ pɔku mɛnɛti mɛte yinɔri hɛnɛ.
A ɓa̧ kɛ teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mɔy mɛmbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn. Ɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɗiki lukse nyɛ.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ Nasarɛt kɛ mbɛy komɛ nyɛ ɗɔkuma kɛ́. Kɛ yesɔ *Saba ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn nda njɛl wenɛ. Ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ, na tɔl mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ɛ ɓo ɓu̧ mɛkana mɛte yi Esayi te mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛtima kɛ́ nyɛ nyɛ. Ɛ nyɛ ɓutɛ mɛkana tɔlɔ kɛ mbɛy te yi ɓa̧ kɛtinate nde:

‹Sisiŋ Baba Mbokɔ kɛ yotu mbɛ. A tɔkuma mi, nɛ́ mi lɛpi Kimɔ Tom nyɛ buka ɓomɔ, tomɔ mi, nɛ́ mi lɛpi nyɛ ɓebala nde, ɗiyɔ bala yan siyma. Sendi, a tomma mi, nɛ́ mi lɛpi nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nɛ ɗiɓina misi ɓaka nde, ɓo ɓɛ̂ŋnaŋgwɛ, tomɔ mi, nɛ́ mi joŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓete yi ɓo teɗye ɓo mɛbɔnɛ ɓaka,
pelɛ nyɛ ɓomɔ sew te yi Baba Mbokɔ ta joŋgwɛ ɓo kɛte kɛ́.›
Kɛ nyɛ ma si tɔlɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɗiɓɛ mɛkana yɔkiɗye nyɛ mɔ te ɛ ɓa̧ kɛ kelɔ mɛsay kɛ mɔy mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya kɔ. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɗiyɔ. Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ mɔy mbanjɔ ɓaka ɗikima ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ nɛ ŋgoŋ.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: ‹Kɛ yesɔ te yɔkɔ muka, mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ wokuma, mi kɛ tɔlɔ kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́ ma kelna gbate.›
Ɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ jayɛ nyɛ. Ɛ ɓo ŋgbakima kimɔ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi ɗikima pundɔ kɛ numbu nɛ kɛ́. Ɛ ɓomɔ diyɛ nde: «’Yɔkɔ yeti mɔnɔ Yosɛp na?»

Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo gbate, wunɛ ta nyɛ mi kanɔ nde: ‹Dɔkita, siɗyikwɛ kɔn yɔ nɛ ŋguru wɔ.› Wunɛ ta lɛpɔ sendi nyɛ mi nde: ‹Wusɛ wokuma mɛyasi mɛte yi wɛ kelma kɛ Kapɛrnawum kɛ́ hɛnɛ. Pa kelɔ sendi kiya mɛyasi mɛte waka kɛ ɗya ɗyɔ.› »
Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓomɔ nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ɓo tí jaya mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ ɗya ɗyenɛ na.

Mi kɛ lɛpɔ gbate nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ɓekusɔ ɓoma ɓa̧ kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Isarayɛl ɓuɗyate kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Eli ɓa̧ nɛ joŋ kɛ́. Sew yitati nɛ̀ ŋgwɛndɛ yitan jɔ wɛtɛ kwaŋma kinɛ mbiyɔ nɛ nɔ na, ɛ nyaŋgwɛ kolɔ ɗya̧ kɛ ndiŋgɛlɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Isarayɛl hɛnɛ.
Ko ɗete, Njambiyɛ tì tomɛ Eli kɛnjɛ kɛ yasi wɛtɛ kusɔ kɛ njoka ɓekusɔ ɓoma ɓe kandɔ Isarayɛl na. A kpalma tomɔ Eli kɛnjɛ kɛ yasi wɛtɛ kusɔ nyari kɛ Sarɛpta kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Sidɔn.

Sendi, kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Elise te mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ ɓa̧ nɛ jɔŋ kɛ́, ɓomɔ ɓe ndoko ɓa̧ ɓuɗyate kɛ Isarayɛl. Ko ɗete, mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ kɛ njoka yan tì nje nde, ɓo sâki kɔn nɛ na, ndi wɛtɛ jɛŋgwɛ nde Naman te mɔ mɛnɛti mɛ Siri nja̧.»
Kɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ mbanjɔ ɓaka ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo wokɛ ŋgambi ɓuɗyate.
Ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ ɗuɗye Yesus kɛ ɗya ɗyan ŋgbɔsɔ nyɛ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ to keki, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ pusu nyɛ ɓetɛ kɛnjɛ gboŋgo. Ɗya ɗyan te ɓa̧ kɛ to keki. Ɓo ka̧ nɛ nyɛ mate, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ pusu nyɛ ɓetɛ kɛnjɛ gboŋgo.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ nɛ ŋgbeŋ ŋgbeŋ kɛ njoka yan kinɛ mumɔ nɛ ɓiye nyɛ na.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus siliyɛ kɛ̀ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya nde Kapɛrnawum kɛ Galile. Kumɔ mate, ɛ nyɛ ɗiki teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ yesɔ *Saba.
Ɓomɔ ŋgbakimama kwalɔ teɗya yasi te yenɛ ɓuɗyate, kɛto a ɗikima lɛpina nɛ ɗeti Njambiyɛ.
Wɛtɛ mbam ɓa̧ kɛ mɔy mbanjɔ nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ *Satan kɛ yotu. Ɛ nyɛ kembiɗya nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde:
«Ŋge ɓa Yesus te mɔ Nasarɛt, sinɛ wunɛ nɛ lɛpi te nda? ’Wɛ njáki nje girise wusɛ? Mi duwa̧ wɛ kimɔte, wɛ pupuna mɔ te yi Njambiyɛ tɔkuma njesɛ.»

Ɛ Yesus ɓama nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ lɛpɔ nde: «Ɗiɓɔ numbu yɔ pundɔ kɛ yotu mbam kɔ.» Ɛ ɓeya sisiŋ jalɛ mbam kɔ ɓetɛ kɛ mɛnɛti kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte ɓaka pundɔ kwa̧ kinɛ kelɔ yiŋa ɓeya yaŋa nɛ nyɛ na.
Ɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ŋgbakima ɓuɗyate numbu hɛ haŋ, ɛ ɓo ɗiki diyna nde: «Kwalɔ lɛpi te yikɛ nan? Mbam te yɔkɔ kɛ ɓama nɛ ɗeti nyɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ, ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ pundɔ kwa̧.»
Ɛ ɗinɔ Yesus wumɛ njanja yaka nɛ pɔku mɛnɛti mɛte yinɔri hɛnɛ.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ pundɛ kɛ mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn kɛ̀ kɛ tu̧ wɛtɛ mbam nde Simɔn. Ki nɛ Simɔn ɛ nyari ɓa̧ kɛ kɔnɔ ɓuɗyate nɛ ɗuku. Ɛ ɓo ŋgwɛta nɛ Yesus nde, a jôŋgwɛ nyɛ.
Ɛ Yesus ɗitima kɛ to nyari ɓama nɛ kɔn, ɛ kɔn siyɛ. Ndana ndana, ɛ nyari kɛ̀ kelɔ mɛsay nyɛ ɓo.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi tu ɓa̧ kɛ yinja kɛ́, ɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓa̧ nɛ ɓenjɔŋ ɓan ɓe ɗikima kɔnɔ nɛ mboya mɛkɔn hɛnɛ ɓaka ɓu̧ ɓo nje nɔ kɛ yi Yesus. Ɛ nyɛ kasɛ mɛɓɔ kɛ yotu mumɔ hɛnɛ siɗyɛ mɛkɔn man.

Ɓeya mɛsisiŋ punduma sendi kɛ yotu ɓuɗya ɓomɔ. Ɓeya mɛsisiŋ mɛte ɗikima kembiɗya nde: «Wɛ Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ!» Ɛ Yesus ɗiki ɓamɛ ɓo ɗiɓɔ mɛnumbu man, kɛto ɓeya mɛsisiŋ duwa̧ nde, Yesus nyɛ *Krist, yɔkɔ yi Njambiyɛ tomma kɔ.
Kɛ misi ma pupɔ kɛ́, ɛ Yesus ɗuwɛ kɛ̀ ɗya kɛ̀ wɛtɛ mbɛy te yi ɓa̧ kinɛ ɓomɔ kɛte kɛ́. Ɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ kandɛ saŋna nɛ. Kɛ ɓo ma dolɔ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo sa̧ nde, a tî kwaŋ se kɛ̀ kɛ wɛtɛ mbɛy tikɔ ɓo na.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi yâkaŋgwɛ kɛ̀ sendi kɛ yiŋa mɛɗya kɛ̀ lɛpɔ Kimɔ Tom kɛ kasi *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ, kɛto a ma tóm mi njesɛ kɛto te yite.»
Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu pelɛ Kimɔ Tom kɛ mɛmbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn kɛ Galile.
Wɛtɛ yesɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ goŋ wɛtɛ nyaŋgwɛ matɔ nde Genesarɛt. Ɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ ɓɛ kɛ suŋna mbɛy kɛ kɛki nɛ, nɛ́ ɓo woku mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ mɛlandi yiɓa kɛ goŋ. Ɓotu ɓe wona ɓenjanjɔ ɓe piya kɛ mɛlandi mɛte ɓaka ɓa̧ kɛ weyɛ mɛbulajama man.
Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɓendɔ wɛtɛ landi te. Yo ɓa̧ landi Simɔn. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ Simɔn nde, a pûsu landi kɛnjɛ nɛ mbɛt pulɔ sombu. Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ kɛ mɔy landi kɛ̀ mbɔmbu teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Kɛ nyɛ ma si lɛpina nyɛ ɓomɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ Simɔn nde: «Ɓoŋgɔ landi kɛ̀ nɔ pulɔ ɗimɔ, nɛ́ wunɛ ɓeta bulajama kɛ ɗuku.»
Ɛ Simɔn lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele, wusɛ ɓɛŋma bɔnɛ kɛ ndiŋgɛlɛ tu kɔ muka kumɔ ɓemɛŋmɛnɛ kinɛ wo yaŋa na. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, mi ta ɓetɛ bulajama ndana kɛ ɗuku, kɛto yo wɛ lɛpɛ nde, mi ɓêta.»
Kɛ ɓo ma ɓetɛ mɛbulajama kɛ ɗuku kɛ́, ɛ ɓo wo ɓenjanjɔ ɓuɗyate. Ɛ mɛbulajama kandɛ nyaliyate.
Ɛ ɓo pɛpiɗye ɓɔ kɛnjɛ ɓenjɔŋ ɓan ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ mɔy landi te yɔru ɓaka nde, ɓo njâki kamɛ ɓo. Ɛ ɓo nje, ɛ ɓo tonjɛ ɓenjanjɔ kɛ mɛlandi mɛnɔri yiɓa, ɛ yo kandɛ ɗyena mɔrɔku.
Kɛ Simɔn Piyɛr ma ɓɛŋɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ nje kusɛ mɛɓɔŋ kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus lɛpɔ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, jisa kɛ kɛki mbɛ, kɛto mi mɔ mɛɓeyɔ.»
Simɔn Piyɛr lɛpinama ɗete, kɛto a gwa̧ wɔ̧. Ɓenjɔŋ ɓenɛ hɛnɛ gwa̧ wɔ̧ sendi ɗete, kɛto ɓuɗya ɓenjanjɔ ɓete yi ɓo woma kɛ́.

Jak ɓenɛ Jaŋ te ɓɔnɔ ɓe Seɓede, ɓekumbɔ ɓe ɓetina bulajama ɓe Simɔn gwa̧ sendi wɔ̧ ɗete. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ Simɔn nde: «Wɛ tî gwaki wɔ̧ na, kandɛ ndana wɛ tí ɓɛ se mɔ wona ɓenjanjɔ na. Wɛ ta nje ɓɛ mɔ ɓoŋna ɓomɔ teɗye ɓo nje Njambiyɛ.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo nje ŋgbɔsɔ mɛlandi man, tikɔ mɛyasi hɛnɛ ɓeŋgwɛ Yesus.

Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya kɛ pɔku mɛnɛti mɛte. Wɛtɛ mbam ɓa̧ mate nɛ yotu hɛnɛ tandɛ ndoko. Kɛ nyɛ ma kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ Yesus kɛ́, ɛ mbam nje kusɛ mɛɓɔŋ kɛ mbɔmbu wenɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ŋgɛ wɛ kwaɗyɛ, kelɔ nde, yotu mbɛ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ kpɛlɛŋ.»
Ɛ Yesus sambile ɓɔ kpokɛ nɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Mi kwaɗya, yotu yɔ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ kpɛlɛŋ.» Ndana ndana, ɛ ndoko siyɛ kɛ yotu mbam.

Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kpɛ, wɛ tî yekiɗya mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋnama kɛ́ nyɛ mumɔ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛn kɛ̀ teɗye yotu yɔ nyɛ mɔ nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ, nɔ̀ kɛ̂n kelɔ sadaka, nɛ́ wɛ ɓɛ pupunate kɛ misi mɛ Njambiyɛ nda yi Mɔyisi pɛsima kɛ́, nɛ́ ɓomɔ duwɛ nde, kɔn yɔ siyma.»
Ko ɓɛkɔ nde, Yesus lɛpima nyɛ mbam nde, a tî yekiɗya na, je nɛ kpalma kɛ̀ kɛndɔ mbɔmbu. Ɓuɗya ɓomɔ ɗikima nje wesiɗya kɛ kɛki nɛ, nɛ́ ɓo woku mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ, na siɗyɛ sendi mɛkɔn man.
Yasi wɛtɛ, Yesus ɗikima kwa̧ nɛ kɛ̀ kɛ mɛmbɛy mɛte yi ɓomɔ yeti kɛte kɛ́ kɛ̀ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ.

Wɛtɛ yesɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ. *Ɓefarisɛ̧ nɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe duwa̧ mɛmboŋga ɓa̧ mɛtiɗyɛ kɛ kɛki nɛ. Ɓo wulma kɛ Yerusalɛm, wulɛ sendi kɛ mɛɗya hɛnɛ kɛ Galile nɛ̀ Yuda. Baba Mbokɔ nya Yesus ɗeti te yi siɗyɛ mɛkɔn mɛ ɓomɔ.
Ndana, ɛ ɓaŋa ɓomɔ soɓɛ wɛtɛ mbam nɛ taŋ ɗya̧ nɔ. Mbam te ɓa̧ mɔ jɛmti, a ti kɛ́ndi na. Ɓo saŋma nje te yi nyiŋɛ nɛ nyɛ kɛ mɔy tu̧ nje tikɔ kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì ɓɛ nɛ nje kwaŋge na kɛto ŋgil. Ɛ ɓo ɓendɛ nɛ nyɛ kɛ tosiyɔ̧ kelɔ njɛmbi kɛte piɗyɛ nyɛ nɛ taŋ nɛ hɛnɛ kɛ njoka ɓomɔ kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus.
Kɛ Yesus ma ɓɛŋɛ kwalɔ tikina temɔ te yi ɓotu ɓaka ɓa̧ nɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ mɔ jɛmti nde: «Mbam, mɛɓeyɔ mɔ, mi kɛ tikɔ yo nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ.»
Ɛ Ɓefarisɛ̧ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi lɛpɛ kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ man nde: «Yɔkɔ ɓa̧ nda ɛ gbutɛ gba nɛ Njambiyɛ kɔ? Nda yakama tikɔ mɛɓeyɔ mɛ mumɔ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ kɔ? Kinɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ na, ndi Njambiyɛ nyɛpɔ.»
Yesus duwa̧ mɛtakɛ man, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yikɛ ɓa kwalɔ mɛtakɛ te nda yi wunɛ ɓɛ nɔ ɗekɛ kɛ temɔ yun kɛ́?
Nɛ̀ lɛpinate nde: ‹Mɛɓeyɔ mɔ, mi kɛ tikɔ yo nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ› nɛ̀ lɛpina te nde: ‹Tɛma, kɛndɔ,› ’kelna ŋge kwa̧ jɛwɔ kɛ njokate?
Ɗete, mi ta teɗye wunɛ nde, *Mɔnɔ mumɔ nɛ ɗeti te yi tikɔ mɛɓeyɔ mɛ ɓomɔ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ kɛ to mɛnɛti.» Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ mɔ jɛmti nde: «Tɛma, ɓoŋgɔ taŋ yɔ, ɗukwɛ kɛ̀ tu̧ ɗyɔ.»
Ndana ndana, ɛ mbam tɛmɛ nɛ ŋgɛt kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ, ɓu̧ taŋ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ mɛtinɛŋgwɛ kɛte kɛ́, ɗuwɛ nɔ kɛ̀ nɔ tu̧ nɛ luksa Njambiyɛ kɛ numbu.
Ɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ŋgbakima lukse Njambiyɛ. Ɓo gwa̧ wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate. Ɛ ɓo ɗiki lɛpɔ nde: «Kwalɔ mɛyekambiyɛ mɛte yikɛ nan yi wusɛ ɓɛŋma muka kɛ́!»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus pundɛ kwa̧. Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ dolɔ wɛtɛ mɔ ɓoŋna mɔni garama nde Levi kɛ ɗiyɔ kɛ mbɛy mɛsay mɛnɛ. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɓeŋgwɛ mi.»
Ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ tikɔ numbu mɛsay mɛnɛ hɛnɛ ɓeŋgwɛ nyɛ.
Ɛ Levi kelɛ ɓuɗya mɛɗye jeɓa nɛ ɓomɔ kɛ tu̧ ɗyenɛ kɛto Yesus. Ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ ɗyena ɓenɛ ɓaŋa ɓuɗya ɓotu ɓe ɓoŋna mɔni garama nɛ̀ ɓaŋa ɓomɔ sendi.

*Ɓefarisɛ̧ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ kiya njɔŋ wɛtɛ ɓaka wokuma ŋgambi lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓe Yesus nde: «Kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ ɗyena nɛ̀ yi wunɛ hɔɓiye mɛnjam kɛ mbɛy wɛtɛ wúnɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓoŋna mɔni garama nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ kɛ́?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yeti ɓotu ɓete ɓe nɛ mɛmbundɔ nɛ tɛ ɓaka sa̧ nje mɔ nyɛti na, yasi wɛtɛ, yo ndi ɓotu ɓete ɓe kɔnɛ ɓaka.
Mi ti njáki nje jeɓa ŋgbeŋ ɓomɔ nde, ɓo yêŋsaŋgwɛ temɔ na. Mi njáki nje jeɓa ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ nde, ɓo yêŋsaŋgwɛ temɔ.»

Ɛ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi lɛpɛ nyɛ Yesus nde: «Ɓejekɛ ɓete ɓe Jaŋ nɛ̀ ɓejekɛ ɓete ɓe *Ɓefarisɛ̧ kɛ ɗiki kiyɔ mɛɗye yaka nɛ mɛŋgimɔ. Ɓo kɛ ɗiki ŋgwɛta sendi nɛ Njambiyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓejekɛ ɓete ɓɔ kɛ ɗyena yan lalɛ, hɔɓiye sendi lalɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ŋgɛ mumɔ jeɓa ɓesɔ ɓenɛ kɛ mɛkeɓi mɛ gwaki, wunɛ má kiɗyɛ ɓo mɛɗye piŋɔ te yi nyɛ ndi kɛte ɓenɛ ɓo kɛ́?
Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgimɔ ta ɗya̧ yi ɓomɔ ta soŋɛ nɛ nyɛ kɛ mɛɓɔ man. Yo kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite yi ɓo ta kiyɔ mɛɗye yɛy.»
Ɛ nyɛ nyɛ sendi ɓo wɛtɛ kanɔ nde: «Mumɔ ti ɓóŋ jɔnja pɛl lambɔ nje datɔ nɛ njombute na. Kɛto ŋgɛ yo kelna ɗete, jɔnja lambɔ ta nje ɓɛ nɛ tɔsu. Sendi, pɛl jɔnja lambɔ tí ɓɛŋna kimɔte kɛ njombute na.
Mumɔ ti sɔ́pita mɛnjam nyɛ kɛ ɓɔru mɛmbe na. Kɛto jɔnja mɛnjam ta wuɗyɛ kelɔ nde, mɛmbe pôsukwɛ, mɛnjam ma dɛndila kɛ mɛnɛti, mɛmbe má si yambile gwe nyiŋɛ siri.
Yasi wɛtɛ, mumɔ sɔ́pita mɛnjam kɛ jɔnja mɛmbe.
Sendi, mumɔ ti jáya njombu mɛnjam, ŋgɛ nyɛ si hɔɓiye jɔnjate na. Ɓo lɛ́pi kpo nɛ kpo nde: ‹Jɔnja mɛnjam kwa̧ nyɔŋɔ nɛ njombute.› »
Wɛtɛ yesɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ kwa̧ kɛ mɔy mɛŋgwaŋ mɛte yi ɓo ɓɛma nyambi te yi ɓo kelɛ nɛ mampa kɛ́. Yo ɓa̧ kɛ yesɔ *Saba. Ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ lekɛ mɛto mɛte patɛ mɛmbumɔ mɛte ɗye.
Ɛ ɓaŋa *Ɓefarisɛ̧ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ kelɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi mɛmboŋga musu kiɗyɛ nde, mumɔ tî kel kɛ yesɔ Saba kɛ́?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «’Wunɛ tì pa tɔlɔ yasi te yi kumande Davit kelma komɛ nyɛ gwa̧ nja ɓenɛ ɓomɔ ɓenɛ kɛ́?
A nyiŋma kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ, ɓu̧ mɛmampa mɛte yi ɗiyɛ kɛte kɛ́ ɗye, ɓu̧ sendi yiŋa nyɛ ɓotu ɓenɛ, ko ɓɛkɔ nde, yo ɓa̧ ndi ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ ɓepɔ yâkaŋgwɛ ɗye yo.»
Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo mi, *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ɗiyɛ sendi nɛ yesɔ Saba.»
Wɛtɛ yesɔ *Saba sendi Yesus nyiŋma kɛ mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ. Wɛtɛ mbam ɓa̧ womɛte, mbam ɓɔ nɛ ma jɛmɛ ɓɛ nɛ fɛŋgɛlɛŋ.
Ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi nɛ̀ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ ɓa̧ kɛ pɛmɔ Yesus yí ɓɛŋɛ, simande a ta siɗyɛ kɔn mumɔ kɛ yesɔ Saba, nɛ́ ɓo kweɗya nje te yi lɛpɔ nde, a kelma yiŋa ɓeya yasi.
Yasi wɛtɛ, Yesus duwa̧ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ takɛ kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ man kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ mɔ te yi ɓɔ nɛ ma jɛmɛ kɔ nde: «Tɛma, ɗiyɔ womɛri kɛ ɓembe ɓomɔ.» Ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ ɗiyɔ kɛ tɛri kwey.

Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi kɛ diyɛ wunɛ nde: Mɛmboŋga mun lɛ́pi nɛ ŋge? Ɓo kâma mumɔ kɛ yesɔ Saba, ho ɓo kêl nyalɔ nɛ nyɛ? Nɛ̀ joŋgwa mumɔ nɛ̀ wona mumɔ, yo yasi te nda yi mumɔ yâkaŋgwɛ kelɔ kɛ yesɔ Saba kɛ́?»
Ɛ nyɛ kaŋɛ misi ŋgɛkila ɓɛŋɛ nɛ ɓo hɛnɛ kɛ kɛki nɛ. Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ mbam te yi ɓɔ nɛ ma jɛmɛ kɔ nde: «Sambila ɓɔ.» Ɛ nyɛ sambile ɓɔ. Ɛ ɓɔ nɛ yi ma jɛmɛ kɛ́ yɔkwɛ nje kɛ mbɛy te.
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓomɔ ɓaka wokuma ɓeya ŋgambi. Ɛ ɓo diyna yí sa̧ yasi te yi ɓo yakama kelɔ nɛ Yesus.
Kɛ mɛtu te yite ɛ Yesus tɛmɛ kɛ̀ kɛ wɛtɛ keki kɛ̀ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ. A kwaŋɗya ndiŋgɛlɛ tu mate yí ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ.
Kɛ misi ma pupɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ jeɓa ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ, sawɛ ɓomɔ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa kɛ njoka yan, nyɛ ɓo ɗinɔ nde Ɓotu ɓe tomun.
Yo ɓa̧ nɛ Simɔn te yi nyɛ loma nde Piyɛr kɔ ɓenɛ ndɛmbi wenɛ Andere ɓu̧ Jak nɛ̀ Jaŋ ɓu̧ Filip ɓenɛ Bartelemi.
Yo ɓa̧ sendi nɛ Matiyo ɓenɛ Tomasi ɓu̧ Jak te mɔnɔ Alfe ɓu̧ Simɔn te yi ɓo ɗikima jeɓa nde Mɔnɔ kandɔ kɔ,
ɓu̧ sendi Yude, mɔnɔ Jak nje ɓu̧ Yudas Iskariyot, yɔkɔ ɛ nja̧ ɗyaŋgwɛ nyɛ kɔ.

Ɛ Yesus piyɛ ɓenɛ ɓo wulɛ keki kɛ̀ kɛ tɛfɛn mɛnɛti komɛ ŋgil ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ ɓa̧ kɛ́. Ɓuɗya ɓotu ɓete ɓe wulma kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Ɓeyudɛn hɛnɛ ɓaka nɛ̀ ɓe wulma kɛ Yerusalɛm, wulɛ sendi kɛ Tir nɛ̀ Sidɔn kɛ goŋ maŋ ɓaka ɓa̧ womɛte.
Ɓo nja̧ nje wokɔ mɛyasi mɛte yi nyɛ ta lɛpɔ kɛ́, nje sendi nɛ mɛkɔn man, na siɗyɛ yo. Ko ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓeya mɛsisiŋ ɗikima njaŋgwɛ ɓo ɓaka, a kelma nde, ɓeya mɛsisiŋ pûndu kɛ yotu yan.
Mumɔ hɛnɛ saŋma nje te yi kpokɛ nyɛ, kɛto yiŋa nyaŋgwɛ ɗeti ɗikima wulɛ kɛ yotu nɛ siɗyɛ mɛkɔn man hɛnɛ.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ lɛpɔ nde:
«Wunɛ ɓe buka ɓomɔ ndana, ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, wunɛ nɛ mɛsosa, kɛto *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ, yo yun.
Ndana wunɛ kɛ gwe nja, ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, wunɛ nɛ mɛsosa, kɛto wunɛ ta ɓɛ nɛ ditɔ.
Wunɛ kɛ lelɔ ndana, ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, wunɛ nɛ mɛsosa, kɛto wunɛ ta nyukuma.
Wunɛ nɛ mɛsosa komɛ ɓomɔ ta ɓenɔ wunɛ ɗuɗye wunɛ kɛ kɛki yan toyɛ wunɛ lɛpina ɓeyate nɛ wunɛ kɛto mbɛ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ.
Wunɛ sôsaŋgwɛ ɗo kɛ yesɔ te yite, kɛto nyaŋgwɛ sol kɛ laɗye wunɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ. Wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, ɓesaŋgwɛ ɓan kelma ndi sendi ɗete nɛ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ma wunɛ ɓotu ɓe kusuku, wunɛ ta saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ, kɛto wunɛ ma si dolɔ bɔtɛ te yun.
Wunɛ ɓotu ɓe nɛ ditɔ ndana ɓaka, wunɛ ta saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ, kɛto wunɛ ta gwe nja.
Wunɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nyukuma ndana ɓaka, wunɛ ta saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ, kɛto wunɛ ta jaɓa lelɔ.
Wunɛ ta saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ, ŋgɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ jayɛ wunɛ, kɛto ɓesaŋgwɛ ɓan ɗikima jayɛ sendi ɓeya ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ ja̧.
«Ma wunɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi mi lɛpɛ kɛ́, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Wunɛ kwâɗyikwɛ ɓependɔ ɓun. Wunɛ kêl kimɔ yasi nɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓenɛ wunɛ ɓaka.
Wunɛ dîya Njambiyɛ nde, a nyɛ̂ki mɛkombila nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe kita nɛ wunɛ ɓaka, ŋgwɛta sendi nɛ nyɛ, kɛto ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗyaŋgwɛ ɗinɔ ɗyun ɓaka.
Ŋgɛ mumɔ nyɛ wɛ ɓanji kɛ pokɔ te ɛ wɛtɛ, nɔ̀ yêŋsaŋgwɛ sendi yɔru nyɛ nyɛ. Ŋgɛ mumɔ sukɛ nyaŋgwɛ lambɔ ɗuku yɔ, nɔ̀ tîki sendi nde, a ɓôŋ lambɔ te yi kɛ yotu yɔ kɛ́.
Ŋgɛ mumɔ jɔmbɛ yiŋa yasi kɛ ɓɔ yɔ, nɔ̀ nyɛ̂ki nyɛ. Ŋgɛ mumɔ nda nɛ yasi yɔ, wɛ tî diya se yo kɛ ɓɔ nɛ na.
Yasi te yi wunɛ kwaɗyɛ nde, ɓomɔ kêl nɛ wunɛ, wunɛ kêl sendi ɗete nɛ ɓo.
Ŋgɛ wunɛ kwaɗyɛ ndi ɓotu ɓete ɓe kwaɗyɛ wunɛ ɓaka, ɓo ta jayɛ wunɛ nɛ nje te yin? Kɛto ko ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ kwáɗyikwɛ ndi sendi ɓotu ɓete ɓe kwaɗyɛ ɓo ɓaka.
Ŋgɛ wunɛ kelɛ ndi kimɔ yasi nɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe kelɛ kimɔ yasi nɛ wunɛ, ɓo ta jayɛ wunɛ nɛ nje te yin? Kɛto ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ kél ndi sendi ɗete.

Ŋgɛ wunɛ nyɛ ndi pilo nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe wunɛ takɛ nde, ɓo yakama yɔkiɗye yo nyɛ wunɛ ɓaka, ɓo ta jayɛ wunɛ nɛ nje te yin? Kɛto ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ nyɛ́ki ndi pilo nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ, nɛ́ ɓo yɔkiɗye nyɛ ɓo yaka nɛ yan.

Kɛ ɓɛ wunɛ, wunɛ kwâɗyikwɛ ɓependɔ ɓun. Wunɛ kêl kimɔ yasi nɛ ɓomɔ, nyɛ ɓo pilo soŋɛ temɔ kɛ kɔŋte. Ŋgɛ wunɛ kelɛ ɗete, ɓo ta jayɛ wunɛ ɓuɗyate. Wunɛ ta ɓɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓe Njambiyɛ te ɛ kwaŋma mɛyasi hɛnɛ kɛ kwey kɔ, kɛto a kél kimɔ yasi nɛ ɓotu ɓe nyalɔ, kelɔ sendi nɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ti dúkwɛ ŋgikwa ɓaka.
Wunɛ gwâki ŋgwɛtɛ ɓɛsɔ nda yi Njambiyɛ saŋgwɛ wun gwe nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ wun kɛ́.

«Wunɛ tî jɔsa mumɔ na, ɗete ɓo tí jɔse sendi wunɛ na. Wunɛ tî pɛsi lɛpi mumɔ na, ɗete ɓo tí pɛsɔ sendi lɛpi yun na. Wunɛ tîki ɓomɔ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ kɛ ɓeya yasi te yi ɓo kelɛ nɛ wunɛ kɛ́, ɗete Njambiyɛ ta tikɔ sendi wunɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ kɛ ɓeya yasi te yi wunɛ kelɛ kɛ́.

Wunɛ kâɓi nɛ ɓomɔ, ɗete Njambiyɛ ta kaɓɔ nɛ wunɛ. A ta yekɔ yasi nyɛ kɛ mapi yun nɛ kimɔ nyaŋgwɛ kɔpu. A ta yekɔ ŋgbɔkise ɗinɔ, kɔpu má tondɔ nɛ lɛtɛtɛ wesiɗye. Ɗete, Njambiyɛ ta nyɛ wunɛ mɛkombila ɓeŋgwɛ ndi kiya ɗɔkɔ mapi te yi wunɛ yekɛ nɛ yasi nyɛ ɓɛsɔ kɛ́.»
Yesus ka̧ mbɔmbu nyɛ ɓo wɛtɛ kanɔ lɛpɔ nde: «’Mɔ ɗiɓina misi yakama teɗye ka wɛtɛ mɔ ɗiɓina misi nje? Ŋgɛ ɓɛ ɗete, ’ɓo hɛnɛ yiɓa kina ɓal kɛ mɔy ɓelɔ na?
Mɔ te ɛ jekɛ mɛsay kɔ tì kwa̧ masa wenɛ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ nyɛ siɗyɛ jekinate hɛnɛ kimɔte, a má nje ɓɛ nda masa wenɛ.
«Ŋge kelɛ yi wɛ ɓɛŋɛ ndi mbulma ɗyan te yi kɛ misi mɛ mɔŋ kinɛ pa wokɔ kɛlɛŋ kɛlɛŋ kɔkɔ jeti te yi kɛ misi mɔ kɛ́?

Wɛ ta kelɔ nan yí lɛpɔ nɔ nyɛ mɔŋ nde: ‹Maŋmbɛ inja, nɛ́ mi wumbiɗye ɗyan soŋɛ kɛ misi mɔ› piŋɔ te yi kɔkɔ jeti ndi kɛ misi mɔ kɛ́? Wɛ, mɔ likisi, kanda soŋɛ kɔkɔ jeti te yi kɛ misi mɔ kɛ́, nɛ́ wɛ nje ɓɛŋ yasi nɛ ŋgɛlɛlɛ, nɛ́ wɛ nje soŋ mbulma ɗyan te yi kɛ misi mɛ mɔŋ kɛ́.
«Kɛto kimɔ jeti ti wúm ɓeya mɛmbumɔ na. Ɗete sendi, jeti te ɛ mɛ kɛ ɓeyɔ kɔ ti wúm kimɔ mɛmbumɔ na.
Wunɛ duwa̧ nde, ɓo dúkwɛ jeti hɛnɛ wulɛ kɛ mɛmbumɔ mɛnɛ. Ɓo ti nɔ́ku fumbi kɛ lɛlɔ na. Sendi, ɓo ti nɔ́ku fiya kɛ ndi̧ na.

Kimɔ mumɔ kél kimɔ mɛkele wulɛ kɛ kimɔ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɗiyɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ kɛ́. Ma ɓeya mumɔ kél ɓeya mɛkele wulɛ kɛ ɓeya mɛyasi mɛte yi ɗiyɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ kɛ́. Yo nde, mɛlɛpi hɛnɛ te yi mumɔ lɛpɛ kɛ́ wúla kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ.»
«Ŋge kelɛ yi wunɛ jeɓa mi nde: ‹Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande,› kinɛ kelɔ yasi te yi mi lɛpɛ kɛ́?
Mi ta pa lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ kwalɔ mɔ te ɛ ɓeŋgwɛ mi, ɛ wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ kelɔ nda yi mi kwaɗyɛ.

Mɔ te ɛ ɓeŋgwɛ mi, ɛ wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ kelɔ nda yi mi kwaɗyɛ kɔ kɛ ɓoŋna nɛ mɔ te ɛ summa tu̧ kɛ to mbatɔ, timɔ mɛkondu ɗimiyɛ. Kɛ mbeŋ ma ɗya̧, ɛ ɗuku ɗe mɛmiyɛ tu̧. Ɛ ŋguŋgul mɛnda nɛ dimbi kɛ tu̧, tu̧ kinɛ ndeŋsa na, kɛto a summa yo jeliyɛ.

Yasi wɛtɛ, mɔ te ɛ wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ kinɛ kelɔ nda yi yo teɗye nyɛ kɛ́ kɛ ɓoŋna nɛ mɔ te ɛ summa tu̧ kɛ gbɛla mɛnɛti kinɛ timɔ mɛkondu ɗimiyɛ na. Kɛ mbeŋ ma ɗya̧, kɛ ɗuku ma ɗe, kɛ ŋguŋgul ma mɛnda nɛ dimbi kɛ tu̧, ɛ tu̧ te gbuŋgula ɓalɔ nɛ hugbak.»
Kɛ Yesus ma si lɛpɔ yasi te yi nyɛ kwaɗya lɛpɔ hɛnɛ kɛ́ nyɛ ɓomɔ, ɛ nyɛ yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ kɛ Kapɛrnawum.
Wɛtɛ nyaŋgwɛ kum ɓesɔja, mɔ Rom ɓa̧ nɛ wɛtɛ mɔ mɛsay wenɛ yi nyɛ ɗikima kwaɗyɛ ɓuɗyate kɔ. Mɔ mɛsay te ɓa̧ kɛ kɔnɔ. A ɓa̧ nɛdɔ nɛ sɔŋ.
Kɛ nyaŋgwɛ kum ɓesɔja kɔ ma wokɔ kasi Yesus kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tomɛ ɓaŋa ɓetomba Ɓeyudɛn kɛnjɛ kɛ yenɛ nde, a njâki joŋgwɛ mɔ mɛsay wenɛ.
Ɓo ka̧ kumɔ dolɔ Yesus, ɛ ɓo ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ ɓuɗyate lɛpɔ nde: «Yakama nde, kama mbam te,
kɛto a kɛ kwaɗyɛ kandɔ ɗyusu. Sendi, yo nyɛ sumɛ mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya musu.»

Ɛ Yesus kwa̧ ɓenɛ ɓo. Kɛ nyɛ ma wuta nɛ tu̧ kɛ́, ɛ kum ɓesɔja tomɛ ɓesɔ ɓenɛ kɛ̀ saŋgwa nɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, wɛ tî njaŋgwɛ yotu yɔ na, kɛto mi yeti mɔ te yi wɛ yakama nyiŋɛ kɛ tu̧ ɗyembɛ na.
Yo ɗete yi mi ɓɛŋma nde, mi ti yaka wuta kɛ kɛki yɔ na. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓeta ndi gbɛla numbu kɛnjɛ, nɛ́ kɔn mɔ mɛsay wombɛ siy.

Kɛto ko mi, ɓaŋa ɓomɔ kɛ ɗiyɔ nɛ mi, ma mi kɛ ɗiyɔ sendi nɛ ɓesɔja. Mi yakama lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛtɛ sɔja nde: ‹Kɛn kaka,› ɔ ɓɛ́ŋa, a ka̧, lɛpɔ nyɛ mbaŋa nde: ‹Inja woŋga,› a má nje. Mi yakama lɛpɔ nyɛ mɔ mɛsay wombɛ nde: ‹Kelɔ yiri,› ɔ ɓɛ́ŋa, a kelma.»

Kɛ Yesus ma wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi nyaŋgwɛ kum ɓesɔja kɔ lɛpima kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ jayɛ nyɛ. Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa lɛpɔ nyɛ ŋgil ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ ɓeŋgwɛ nyɛ ɓaka nde: «Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ko ɓɛkɔ kɛ kandɔ Isarayɛl, mi tì pa ɓɛŋɛ kwalɔ nyaŋgwɛ tikina temɔ te yikɛ na.»
Komɛ ɓotu ɓe tomun yɔkwa̧ kɛ tu̧ kɛ́, ɓo dól nde, yotu mɔ mɛsay mɛ nɛ tɛ.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus nje kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya nde Nayin ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ.

Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ wuta nɛ numɛy ndoko te yi linja ɗya kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ saŋgwa nɛ ɓomɔ kɛ soɓɛ muŋ kɛ̀ pumbɔ. Yo ɓa̧ kikɔ mɔnɔ mbam wɛtɛ kusɔ nyari. Ɓotu ɓe ɗya ɓuɗyate ka̧ njɔŋ wɛtɛ ɓenɛ ɓe kusɔ nya kɔ.
Kɛ Kumande Yesus ma ɓɛŋɛ kusɔ nya kɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ gwe ŋgwɛtɛ wenɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ tî lel na.»
Ɛ nyɛ jisɛ kɛ̀ mate kpokɛ taŋ te yi ɓo soɓɛ muŋ kɛte kɛ́. Ɛ ɓotu ɓe soɓuna muŋ tɛmɛ. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Gwanjɔ, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛ nde: Tɛma.»
Ndana, ɛ muŋ tɛmɛ ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ kandɛ ndapi. Ɛ Yesus ɓu̧ nyɛ yɔkiɗye nyɛ nyaŋgwɛ.
Ɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ gwe wɔ̧ lukse Njambiyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ ɗyaŋma kɛ njoka su.» Sendi: «Njambiyɛ takima ɓomɔ ɓenɛ.»
Ɛ je yasi te yi Yesus kelma kɛ́ saŋgwa mɛnɛti mɛ Yuda nɛ pɔku mɛnɛti mɛte yite hɛnɛ.
Ɓejekɛ ɓe Jaŋ yekiɗya sendi mɛyasi mɛte yinɔri hɛnɛ nyɛ nyɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ jeɓa yiɓa kɛ njoka yan tomɔ ɓo kɛnjɛ kɛ yi Kumande Yesus nde, ɓo dîya nyɛ nde: «Yo ka wɛ mɔ te ɛ ɓa̧ nde, a njâki kɔ, ho wusɛ lâɗya mbaŋa dɛlɛ?»
Kɛ ɓotu ɓe tomun ma kɛ̀ dolɔ Yesus kɛ́, ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Jaŋ te mɔ tɔpuna ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku tomɛ wusɛ njesɛ kɛ yɔ nde: ‹’Yo ka wɛ mɔ te ɛ yâkaŋgwɛ nje kɔ, ho wusɛ lâɗya mbaŋa dɛlɛ?› »
Kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ siɗyɛ mɛkɔn mɛ ɓuɗya ɓomɔ, ɓaka ɓe ɓa̧ nɛ mɛkɔsu nɛ̀ ɓe ɓa̧ nɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ yotu. Ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ nɛ ɗiɓina misi ɓaka, a kelma nde, ɓo ɓɛ̂ŋnaŋgwɛ.

Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe Jaŋ tomma ɓaka nde: «Wunɛ kɛ̂n kɛ̀ yekiɗye mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ ɓɛŋma nɛ̀ yi wunɛ wokuma kɛ́ nyɛ nyɛ. Wunɛ lɛ̂pi nyɛ nyɛ nde: Ɓotu ɓete ɓe nɛ ɗiɓina misi ɓaka mɛ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi. Ɓotu ɓe ndɛmbil mɛ kɛ kɛndɔ nɛ ŋgbeŋ. Ɓaka ɓe nɛ ndoko ɓaka mɛ nɛ yotu nɛ kpɛlɛŋ. Wunɛ lɛ̂pi sendi nyɛ nyɛ nde: Ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ nɛ ɗiɓina mɛtɔ ɓaka mɛ kɛ wokɔ yasi. Ɓemuŋ kɛ womiyɛ. Ɓo kɛ lɛpɔ Kimɔ Tom nyɛ buka ɓomɔ.»
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nde: «Mɔ te ɛ ta ɗiyɔ kinɛ jɔsiɗye kelɔ yiŋa ɓeya yasi kɛto mbɛ kɔ nɛ mɛsosa.»

Kɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe Jaŋ tomma ɓaka ma si kwa̧ kɛ́, ɛ Yesus kandɛ lɛpi kɛ kasi Jaŋ nyɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Kɛ yi wunɛ ka̧ kɛ koŋgor kɛ́, wunɛ kwaɗya kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ yasi te nda? ’Wunɛ kwaɗya kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ njoy te yi pupɔ wumbiɗye kɛ́?
’Wunɛ ka̧ gbate kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ ŋge? ’Wunɛ ka̧ kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ mbaŋa mumɔ nɛ kpasa mɛlambɔ kɛ yotu? Ɓotu ɓete ɓe lɛŋɛ kpasa mɛlambɔ nɛ̀ ɓe joŋna kɛ nyɛm nyɛm joŋgwɛ ɓaka ɗíy kɛ tu̧ ɓekumande.
’Wunɛ ka̧ kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ ŋge? ’Wunɛ ka̧ kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ? I̧, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Nyɛ mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ gbate gbate, ma yasi wɛtɛ, a kwaŋma yite.
Yo nyɛ yi kasi nɛ kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹Ɓɛŋa, mi kɛ kandɛ tomɔ mɔ tomun wombɛ nɛ wɛ, na kɛ̀ kandi kombile nje tikɛ wɛ.›
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Kinɛ mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ ɛ jaɗya wulɛ kɛ mɔy nyari kwaŋma Jaŋ na. Ko ɗete, njena mumɔ kɛ *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ kwa̧ nyɛ.»
Ɓotu ɓe ɓoŋna mɔni garama nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗikima wokɔ yasi te yi Jaŋ ɗikima lɛpɔ kɛ́ téɗya nde, Njambiyɛ nɛ ŋgbeŋ. Ɛ ɓo jayɛ nde, a tɔ̂pa ɓo kɛ mɔrɔku.
Yasi wɛtɛ, *Ɓefarisɛ̧ nɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe duwa̧ mɛmboŋga sɛŋma nde, Jaŋ tî tɔpa ɓo kɛ mɔrɔku na. Ɗete, ɓo téɗya yan nde, yasi te yi Njambiyɛ kombila kɛ yan kɛ́ ɓa̧ gbɛlate.
«Mi ta yekɔ ɓa ɓotu ɓe ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ nɛ ɓe nda? Ɓo nda ɓe nda?
Ɓo nda ɓɔnɔsikɛ te ɓe ɗiyɛ kɛ babal, ɓaka má lɛpɔ kɛnjɛ ɓɛsɔ nde: ‹Wusɛ tɔŋma mbule nyɛ wunɛ, wunɛ kinɛ ɓɔlɔ na. Wusɛ jembima mɛjembi mɛ sɔŋ nyɛ wunɛ, wunɛ kinɛ lelɔ na.›
Ɗete sendi, Jaŋ te mɔ tɔpuna ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku nja̧. Mɛɗye, a ti ɗyáki. Mɛnjam, a ti hɔ́ɓiya. Kɛ kɔŋte, wunɛ nde: ‹A nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ kɛ yotu.›

Ndana *Mɔnɔ mumɔ nja̧. Mɛɗye, a kɛ ɗye. Mɛnjam, a kɛ hɔɓiye. Kɛ kɔŋte, wunɛ nde: ‹Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa ndi nyaŋgwɛ mɔ mɛɗye nɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ mɔ ɗyena mɛnjam te yɔkɔ, sɔ nɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓoŋna mɔni garama nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe ɓeya joŋgwɛ.›
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓeŋgwɛ yasi te yi Njambiyɛ kwaɗyɛ ɓaka kɛ jayɛ nde: Ɗyanɔ ɗyenɛ nɛ ŋgbeŋ.»
Wɛtɛ mɔ *Farisɛ̧ jeɓama Yesus nde, a kɛ̂n ɗyena kɛ tu̧ ɗyenɛ. Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ kɛ tu̧ mɔ Farisɛ̧ te kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ, na ɗyena.
Wɛtɛ nya mɛɓeyɔ ɓa̧ kɛ ɗya te. Ŋgɛ nyɛ ma wokɔ nde, Yesus ka̧ ɗyena kɛ tu̧ mɔ Farisɛ̧ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ wɛtɛ kpasa ndaki nɛ lɔbinda kɛ mɔyte

kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ kɛ kɔŋ Yesus yaka nɛ mɛkol mɛnɛ. Nya kɔ ɓa̧ kɛ lelɔ. Ɛ misiɗyɛ ɗiki ɓalɔ kɛ mɛkol mɛ Yesus, ɛ nya kɔ ɗiki titɔ yo nɛ nyiŋɔ to nɛ. A ɗikima dulɔ sendi mɛkol mɛ Yesus lɔmbɛ lɔbinda yinɔri kɛte.

Kɛ mɔ Farisɛ̧ te ɛ jeɓama Yesus kɔ ma ɓɛŋɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ nde: ‹Mbam kɔ má ɓɛki gbate mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, ma nyɛ kɛ duwɛ nya te ɛ kɛ kpokɛ nyɛ kɔ, ma nyɛ kɛ duwɛ joŋgwɛ nya te, duwɛ nde, nyɛ mɔ mɛɓeyɔ.›
Ndana, ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Simɔn, mi kɛ kwaɗyɛ lɛpɔ yiŋa yasi nyɛ wɛ.» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Yekele, lɛpɔ.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde: «Wɛtɛ mumɔ nya ɓomɔ yiɓa pilo. Wɛtɛ ɓoŋma mil gɔmay yitan. Ɛ wɛtɛ ɓu̧ nɛ mil kamɔtan.
Nda ɓo hɛnɛ yiɓa tì ɓɛ nɛ ɗeti te yi gbo mɔni te nyɛ sa te na, ɛ nyɛ tikɛ ɓo hɛnɛ yiɓa nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ nde, ɓo tî gboku se na. Kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓaka yiɓa, yo yɛn ɛ yâkaŋgwɛ kwaɗyɛ mbam kɔ kwa̧ to te kɔ?»
Ɛ Simɔn yeŋsa nde: «Mi táka nde, yo yɔkɔ ɛ ɓa̧ nɛ nyaŋgwɛ pilo kɔ.» Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ pɛsima kimɔte.»

Ɛ Yesus nje yeŋsa ɓɛŋɛ pulɔ nyari lɛpɔ nyɛ Simɔn nde: «’Wɛ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ nya kɔ? Mi nyiŋma tu̧ ɗyɔ, wɛ tì nyɛ mi mɔrɔku nde, mi wêya nɛ mɛkol mɛmbɛ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ndi nyɛ ma ɓɔsɛ mɛkol mɛmbɛ nɛ misiɗyɛ mɛnɛ titɔ yo nɛ nyiŋɔ to nɛ.
Wɛ tì dulɛ numbu mbɛ na, ndi nyɛ, kandɛ yi mi ma nyíŋa nɛ tu̧ ɗyɔ muka, a yeti kɛ wɛɗya dulna mɛkol mɛmbɛ na.
Wɛ tì lɔmbɛ lɔbinda kɛ to mbɛ na, ndi nyɛ lɔmbuma kimɔ lɔbinda kɛ mɛkol mɛmbɛ.
Ɗete, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛ nde: Ɓuɗya mɛɓeyɔ mɛte yi nyɛ kelma kɛ́ ma ɗuwɛ kɛ to nɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ, kɛto a kwaɗya mi ɓuɗyate. Mɔ te yi ɓo tikɛ nyɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ nɛ mbɛt, a téɗya sendi mɛkwaɗya nɛ mbɛt.»
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nya kɔ nde: «Mɛɓeyɔ mɔ ma ɗuwɛ kɛ to yɔ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ.»
Ɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ ɗyena ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus ɓaka lɛpɛ kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ man nde: ‹Yɔkɔ nda ɛ soŋɛ mɛɓeyɔ kɛ to mumɔ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ kɔ?›
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyari nde: «Tikina temɔ te yi wɛ tikɛ kɛ yembɛ kɛ́ joŋgwa wɛ, kwaŋgɔ nɛ tɛ.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus kɛ̀ mɛɗya mɛɗya, kɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ mɛɗya nɛ̀ kɛ mɔnɔ mɛɗya yí pelɛ Kimɔ Tom teɗye ɓomɔ mɛyasi kɛ kasi *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ. A ɓa̧ ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa.

Ɓaŋa ɓoma ɓe nyɛ soŋma ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ yotu yan siɗyɛ mɛkɔn man ɓaka ɓa̧ sendi ɓenɛ ɓo. Yo ɓa̧ Mariya te yi ɓo ɗikima jeɓa sendi nde Madalɛna kɔ. Yo nyɛ yi Yesus soŋma ɓeya mɛsisiŋ yitan jɔ yiɓa kɛ yotu nɛ kɔ.

Yo ɓa̧ sendi nɛ Yuwana te nya Kusa, mɔ te ɛ ɗikima ɓakiɗye tu̧ kumande Herod kɔ, ɓu̧ Sosana nje ɓu̧ sendi ɓaŋa ɓoma ɓuɗyate. Ɓo hɛnɛ ɗikima ɓu̧ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓo ɓa̧ nɔ kɛ́ nje kamɛ nɛ Yesus ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ.
Ɓomɔ wulma kɛ mɛɗya hɛnɛ nje kɛ yi Yesus. Kɛ ɓo ma si wesiɗya ɗete kɛ kɛki nɛ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ yekiɗye wɛtɛ kanɔ nyɛ ɓo lɛpɔ nde:
«Wɛtɛ mɔ ɓɛna mbɛki kwaŋma kɛ̀ ŋgwaŋ yí kɛ̀ nyanje kwalɔ. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ nyanje kwalɔ kɛ́, ɛ yiŋa ɓalɛ kɛ nje. Ɛ ɓomɔ kwa̧ natɛ yo. Ɛ ɓenɔn si ɗye yo.
Yiŋa kwalɔ ɓalma kɛ to mbatɔ. Kɛ yo ma diy lo kɛ́, ɛ yo si sɔsɔ, kɛto mɔrɔku tì ɓɛ kɛ nji̧ na.
Yiŋa ɓalma kɛ mbɛy te yi ɓa̧ nɛ mɛŋgombiya kɛte kɛ́. Ɛ kwalɔ te ju̧ saŋgwɛ nɛ mɛŋgombiya. Ɛ mɛŋgombiya si ŋgaŋgile yo.

Yiŋa kwalɔ ɓalma kɛ kimɔ mɛnɛti. Ɛ yite ju̧ ɗɔkɔ wumɔ mɛmbumɔ, kwalɔ te wɛtɛ nya mɛmbumɔ gɔmay.» Kɛ Yesus ma si lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «Mɔ te ɛ nɛ mɛtɔ yí wokɔ pɛ̧, a wôku.»
Ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ diyɛ nyɛ to kanɔ te.

Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Njambiyɛ nya wunɛ ɗeti te yi duwɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓa̧ sɔɗyate yi ɓɛŋɛ *Kandɔ ɗyenɛ kɛ́. Kɛ yi ɓaŋa, ɓo lɛ́pi yo nyɛ ɓo nɛ mɛkanɔ, nɛ́ ɓo ɓɛŋ yasi seŋgile kinɛ duwɛ yasi te yi ɓo ɓɛŋɛ kɛ́ na, nɛ́ ɓo lɛŋgwɛ mɛtɔ kɛ yasi kinɛ ɓiye to te na.
«Ma to kanɔ te ɗekɛ: Kwalɔ te yi ɓo lɛpɛ nɔ kɛ́, yo mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Kwalɔ te yi ɓalma kɛ nje kɛ́ téɗya ɓotu ɓete ɓe wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ. Kɛ kɔŋte, *Kum ɓeya mɛkele má nje soŋɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ man, ma ɓo mɛ nje tikɔ temɔ kɛ yi Njambiyɛ, ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ.

Kwalɔ te yi ɓalma kɛ mbatɔ kɛ́ téɗya ɓotu ɓete ɓe wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ jayɛ yo nɛ mɛsosa. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì pa lo mɛgata na, ɗeti sumna kol kikwɛ yeti na. Ŋgɛ mɛɓoɓilan ɗya̧ ɓo kɛ́, ɓo tumma kɔŋ yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ.

Kwalɔ te yi ɓalma kɛ mbɛy te yi nɛ mɛŋgombiya kɛ́ téɗya ɓotu ɓete ɓe wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ jayɛ yo. Yí kɛ̀ mbɔmbu, kɛsa temɔ kɛ mɛyasi nɛ̀ kasi kusuku nɛ̀ kasi nyɛm nyɛm joŋgwɛ má si ŋgaŋgile ɓo. Ɔ ɓɛ́ŋa, mɛkele mɛte yi ɓo kelɛ kɛ́ ti tóndu na.
Kwalɔ te yi ɓalma kɛ kimɔ mɛnɛti kɛ́ téɗya ɓotu ɓete ɓe nɛ pupuna temɔ nɛ̀ kimɔ temɔ ɓe wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ ɓakiɗye yo, ɓɛ nɛ tiŋ yí kelɔ kimɔ mɛkele.
«Mumɔ ti kwénja lambo nje ɓu̧ mbe ɓusɛ nɔ, ho ɓu̧ tikɔ kɛ nji̧ taŋ na. A ɓóŋ tikɔ kɛ to teɓel, nɛ́ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nyiŋɛ tu̧ ɓaka ɓɛŋ mɛjasi mɛte.
Ɗete, kinɛ yaŋa yi ɗiyɛ sɔɗyate ta ɗiyɔ kinɛ pundɔ puyɛ na. Sendi, kinɛ yaŋa yi ɗiyɛ sɔɗyate ta ɗiyɔ kinɛ pundɔ puyɛ, ɓomɔ má duwɛ yo na.
Ɗete, wunɛ ɗîy nɛ sɔsɔ ɓuɗyate kɛ wokuna yasi te yi wunɛ wokɛ kɛ́, kɛto ɓo ta dokiɗye yiŋa yasi nyɛ mɔ te ɛ nɔ kɔ. Yɔkɔ ɛ kinɛ yaŋa kɔ, ɓo ta soŋɛ mɔnɔ yasi te yi nyɛ takɛ nde, a nɔ kɛ́.»
Nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus nɛ̀ ɓemaŋ nja̧, nɛ́ ɓo ɓɛŋ nyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì ɓɛ nɛ nje te yi kumɔ kɛ kɛki nɛ na kɛto ŋgil ɓomɔ.
Ɛ ɓomɔ kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyɔŋgwɛ ɓenɛ ɓemɔŋ kɛ sɛ̧, ɓo kɛ kwaɗyɛ ɓɛŋɛ wɛ.»
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Nyaŋmbɛ nɛ̀ ɓemaŋ ɓembɛ, yo ɓaka ɓe wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kelɔ nda yi yo teɗye ɓo kɛ́.»
Wɛtɛ yesɔ ɛ Yesus ɓendɛ landi ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wusɛ sâɓikwɛ nyaŋgwɛ matɔ kɛ̀ ŋginjɛ te yɔru.» Ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ kwa̧.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ saɓiyɛ nyaŋgwɛ matɔ kɛ́, ɛ Yesus kwa̧ nɛ jakɔ. Ndana, ɛ wɛtɛ mbuku yifila kɛ to nyaŋgwɛ matɔ, ɛ landi kandɛ ɗyena mɔrɔku. Ɓo mɛ kɛ ɓeya ɗiyɔ.
Ɛ ɓejekɛ kɛ̀ kɛ kɛki nɛ jemɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Yekele, yekele, wusɛ ta girɔ ndana!» Ɛ nyɛ jemiyɛ ɓama nɛ mbuku nɛ̀ mɛkumbɔ. Ɛ yo hɛnɛ si wɛyɛ, ɛ yasi nje ɓɛ nɛ tɛ.
Ɛ Yesus nje diyɛ ɓo nde: «Tikina temɔ te yi wunɛ nɔ kɛ́ ɓa we?» Ɛ ɓo gwe wɔ̧ ŋgbakima diyna tandɛ yan nde: «Yɔkɔ ɓa̧ kwalɔ mɔ te nda yi gba pupɔ nɛ̀ mɔrɔku wokuna nɛ nyɛ kɔ?»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo ŋgbɔsɛ landi kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ ɓotu ɓe Gerasa yaka nɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Galile.

Kɛ Yesus ma ɓendɔ ŋgindi kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ mbam wulɛ ɗya nje saŋgwa nɛ nyɛ. Mbam te ɓa̧ nɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ yotu. A ɗikima ɗiyɔ sɔkɛrɛ njombu yaŋa. Sendi, a tì ɓɛ kɛ ya kɛ tu̧ na. A ɗikima joŋna kɛ mɛŋguku komɛ ɓo ɗikima pumbɔ ɓemuŋ kɛ́.

Kɛ nyɛ ma ɓɛŋɛ Yesus kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kembiɗya ɗetinate ɓalɔ kɛ nji̧ mɛkol mɛnɛ lɛpɔ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «Yesus, Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ te ɛ kwaŋma mɛyasi hɛnɛ kɛ kwey, sinɛ wɛ nɛ lɛpi te nda? Mi kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ wɛ nde, wɛ tî pɔnsa mi na.»

A lɛ́pi ɗete, kɛto Yesus lɛpima nyɛ ɓeya sisiŋ nde, a pûndu ɗuwɛ kɛ yotu nɛ. Ɓeya sisiŋ te ɓa̧ kɛ njaŋgwɛ nyɛ njombu yaŋa. Ɓo ɗikima ɓakiɗye nyɛ wotunate nɛ mɛkɔl mɛ sumba, nyɛ mɛpoka kɛ mɛkol mɛnɛ. Ko ɗete, a ɗikima pamɔ mɛyasi mɛnɔri hɛnɛ, ɓeya sisiŋ má yembile nyɛ kɛnjɛ kɛ mɛkoŋgor.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɗinɔ ɗyɔ nde nda?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Ɗinɔ ɗyembɛ nde Nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil.» A lɛ́pi ɗete, kɛto ɓeya mɛsisiŋ ɓuɗyate nyiŋma kɛ yotu nɛ.
Ɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ ŋgwɛta nɛ Yesus nde, a tî kɛnjikwɛ ɓo kɛ gboŋgo mɛndoŋ na.
Ɓeaɓem ɓa̧ womɛte nɛ nyaŋgwɛ kuru te kɛ ɗyena kɛ keki. Ɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ nde, a tîki, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ nyiŋ kɛ yotu ɓeaɓem. Ɛ Yesus jayɛ.
Ɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ pundɛ kɛ yotu mbam kɔ kɛ̀ nyiŋɛ kɛ yotu ɓeaɓem. Ɛ kuru ɓeaɓem siliyɛ kombɔ nɛ ɓeya sokɔ nɛ bibibi kɛ̀ gwaɗya kɛ nyaŋgwɛ matɔ ɓeɓiye mɔrɔku si gwe.
Kɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗikima ɓakiɗye ɓeaɓem ɓaka ma ɓɛŋɛ yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́, ɛ ɓo sɛɗyɛ kambɔ kwa̧ kɛ̀ yekiɗye kasi te kɛ ɗya nɛ̀ kɛ mɛlunde.
Ɛ ɓomɔ kɛ̀ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́. Ɓo ka̧ kumɔ kɛ kɛki Yesus dolɔ mbam te yi ɓeya mɛsisiŋ punduma kɛ yotu nɛ kɔ kɛ ɗiyɔ nɛ tɛ nɛ mɛlambɔ kɛ yotu kɛ kɛki Yesus. Ɛ ɓo gwe wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate.
Ɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗiyma kɛ mbɛy te ɓaka yekiɗye nyɛ ɓari nda yi nyɛ soŋma nɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ yotu mbam te kɛ́.

Kɛ ɓo ma si yekiɗye ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti mɛ Gerasa nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe pɔku mɛnɛti mɛte yite hɛnɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ Yesus nde, a kwâŋ lɔndɔ kɛ mɛnɛti man, kɛto ɓo gwa̧ wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate. Ɛ Yesus nje ɓendɔ landi, na ɗuwɛ.
Ɛ mbam te yi ɓeya mɛsisiŋ ɗuwa̧ kɛ yotu nɛ kɔ ŋgwɛta nɛ Yesus nde, a tîki, nɛ́ ɓenɛ nyɛ kwa̧. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde:
«Ɗukwɛ kɛ tu̧ ɗyɔ kɛ̀ yekiɗye mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi Njambiyɛ kelma nɛ wɛ kɛ́.» Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ pelɛ mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi Yesus kelma nɛ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ kɛ mɔy ɗya.
Kɛ Yesus ma yɔkwɛ kɛ́, ɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ nje sosa nyɛ, kɛto ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓa̧ kɛ laɗye nyɛ.
Ɛ wɛtɛ mbam nde Yayrus ɗya̧. A ɓa̧ kum mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn. Ɛ nyɛ nje kusɛ mɛɓɔŋ kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ nde, a kɛ̂n kɛ tu̧ ɗyenɛ,
kɛto mɔnɔ wenɛ ɛ nyari ɓa̧ kɛ sɛkɛ. Mɔnɔ te ɓa̧ kikɔ, a mɛ kɛ mɛsew kamɔ jɔ yiɓa. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ kɛ̀ kɛ́, ɓomɔ ɓa̧ nɛ suk suk linje nyɛ.

Ase nde, kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓenɔri, wɛtɛ nyari ɓa̧ kɛ kɔnɔ. Mɛkiyɔ ɓa̧ kɛ lekwɛ nyɛ mɛ kɛ mɛsew kamɔ jɔ yiɓa. Mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi ɓa̧ nde, a jôŋnaŋgwɛ nɔ kɛ́ siyma kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ ɓotu ɓe nyɛti. Ko mɔ nyɛti wɛtɛ wɛtɛ tì siɗyɛ kɔn nɛ na.
Ɛ nyari nje kwa̧ pulɔ kɔŋ Yesus kpokɛ numbu lambɔ nɛ. Ɛ kɔn mɛkiyɔ pɛsiyɛ ndi kɛ kiya mbɛy.
Ɛ Yesus diyɛ nde: «Yo nda kpokɛ mi?» Nda ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓa̧ kɛ sɛŋɛ kɛ́, ɛ Piyɛr ɓenɛ ɓenjɔŋ ɓenɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Yekele, ɓomɔ nɛ suk suk linje wɛ, kɛ kɔŋte, wɛ kɛ nje lɛpɔ nde: ‹Yo nda kpokɛ mi?› »
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Wɛtɛ mumɔ kpokuma mi, kɛto mi wokuma nda yi yiŋa ɗeti mbɛ ɗuwa̧ nɔ kɛ yotu mbɛ kɛ́.»

Kɛ nyari ma ɓɛŋɛ nde, a ti yaka sɔma se kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ nje nɛ mɛŋgwaŋgwa nje kusɛ mɛɓɔŋ kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus lɛpɔ to te yi nyɛ kpokuma nɛ nyɛ kɛ́ kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ. A yekiɗya nda yi kɔn siyma nɔ kɛ yotu nɛ ndi kɛ kiya mbɛy kɛ́.
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mɔnmbɛ, tikina temɔ te yi wɛ nɔ kɛ́ joŋgwa wɛ, kwaŋgɔ nɛ tɛ.»
A ɓa̧ ndi kɛ lɛpɔ ɗete, yaka nɛ mumɔ kɛ wulɛ kɛ tu̧ Yayrus te kum mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ tî njaŋgwɛ se yekele na, mɔnɔ wɔ ma gwe.»
Kɛ Yesus ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ Yayrus nde: «Wɛ tî gwaki kaŋ yaŋa na, tikɔ ndi yɔ temɔ nɛ mi, ɗete mɔnɔ wɔ ta ju̧.»
Kɛ Yesus ma ɗya̧ kɛ tu̧ kɛ́, a tì jayɛ nde, ɓenɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ nyîŋa na, ndi Piyɛr nɛ̀ Jaŋ nɛ̀ Jak ɓu̧ saŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓa̧ kɛ lelɔ jaɓa kɛto mɔnɔsikɛ. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde: «Wunɛ tî lel na, kɛto a tì gwe na, a kɛ jakɔ.»
Ɛ ɓo nyɛtɛ nyɛ, kɛto ɓo duwa̧ gbate nde, mɔnɔsikɛ ma gwe.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Yesus ɓiye mɔnɔsikɛ kɛ ɓɔ lɛpɔ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «Mɔnɔ ŋgɔndu, tɛma.»
Ɛ sisiŋ nɛ yɔkwɛ, ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ nɛ ŋgɛt. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde: «Wunɛ nyɛ̂ki nyɛ mɛɗye.»
Saŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ ŋgbakimama ɓuɗyate. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ tî yekiɗya mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋnama kɛ́ nyɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ na.»
Wɛtɛ yesɔ ɛ Yesus wesiɗye ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa, nyɛ ɓo ɗeti te yi soŋɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ hɛnɛ kɛ yotu ɓomɔ nɛ̀ ɗeti te yi siɗyɛ mɛkɔn.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ tomɛ ɓo kɛ̀ pelɛ kasi *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ, siɗyɛ sendi mɛkɔn mɛ ɓomɔ.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ tî ɓiya yaŋa kɛ ɓɔ kɛndɔ nɔ na, ko toŋgolo ko koɓiyɛ ko mampa ko mɔni. Sendi, mumɔ tî ɓoŋ lambɔ yiɓa na.
Tu̧ te yi wunɛ ta nyiŋɛ ya te, wunɛ ɗîy ndi womɛte kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wunɛ ta kwa̧ kɛ́.
Ŋgɛ ɓomɔ ti ɓu̧ wunɛ kimɔte na, nɛ̀ wunɛ pûndu ɗuwɛ kɛ ɗya te, nɛ̀ wunɛ kûtu ŋgbutu kɛ mɛkol mun yí teɗye ɓo nde, ɓo kelma ɓeyate.»
Ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ mɛɗya mɛɗya lɛpɔ Kimɔ Tom, siɗyɛ mɛkɔn mɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɛmbɛy hɛnɛ komɛ ɓo ka̧ kɛ́.
Kumande Herod wokuma mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi ɓa̧ kɛ kelna kɛ́. Temɔ nɛ ɓa̧ kɛ ɗukuma, kɛto ɓaŋa ɓomɔ ɗikima lɛpɔ nde: «Jaŋ te ɛ ɗikima tɔpɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku kɔ womiya.»
Ɓaŋa nde: «Yo Eli yɔkwɛ sendi nje kɛ mɛnɛti.» Ɓaŋa nde: «Yo wɛtɛ njombu mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ womiyɛ.»
Ɛ kumande Herod lɛpɛ nde: «Mi ma pɛsɔ ŋgiŋ Jaŋ, yɔkɔ ɓa nda yi mi wokɛ kasi nɛ ɗekɛ kɔ?» Ɛ nyɛ sa̧ nje te yi ɓɛŋɛ Yesus.
Kɛ ɓotu ɓe tomun ma yɔkwɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo yekiɗye mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi ɓo kelma kɛ́ nyɛ Yesus. Ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ ɓo ɓepɔ jisɛ nɔ kɛ̀ kɛ pulɔ wɛtɛ ɗya nde Betsayda.
Ko ɗete, ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate duwa̧ yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɓeŋgwɛ nyɛ. Ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ ɓo nɛ mɛsosa. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ kasi *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ nyɛ ɓo. A siɗya sendi mɛkɔn mɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nja̧ ɓaka.

Nda yesɔ ɓa̧ kɛ ɗuwɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓejekɛ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa kɛ̀ kɛ kɛki nyɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Tikɔ ɓomɔ, nɛ́ ɓo kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ mɛɗya nɛ̀ kɛ mɛlunde mɛte yi kɛ pɔku te yi waka nɛdɔ kɛ́ kɛ̀ sa̧ mbɛy jakɔ nɛ̀ mɛɗye, kɛto wusɛ waka kɛ koŋgor.»

Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ nɛ ŋguru wun, wunɛ nyɛ̂ki ɓo mɛɗye.» Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nde: «Wusɛ ndi nɛ mampa yitan nɛ̀ ɓenjanjɔ yiɓa. Wusɛ yakama nyɛ ɓo mɛɗye, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wusɛ nɛ ŋguru te yi ɓɔmɔ mɛɗye yi yaka ŋgil te yikɛ hɛnɛ.»
Ɓembam nɛ ɓembam kumma nda tomay yitan. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde: «Wunɛ lɛ̂pi nyɛ ɓo nde, ɓo ɗîy nɛ mɛnjɔŋ, njɔŋ wɛtɛ ɓomɔ kamɔtan.»
Ɛ ɓejekɛ kelɛ ɗete si ɗiɗyɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus ɓu̧ mampa yinɔri yitan nɛ̀ ɓenjanjɔ yiɓa kaŋɛ misi kɛnjɛ kwey nyɛ Njambiyɛ wosoko. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ nje lekɛ yo nyɛ ɓejekɛ, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ kaɓi nyɛ ɓomɔ.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɗyenama ditɔ. Ɛ ɓo nje wesiɗye mɛɓukwɛ mɛte tonjɛ mɛmakɔ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa.
Wɛtɛ yesɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ wɛtɛ mbɛy. Ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ ɓa̧ womɛte. Ɛ nyɛ diyɛ ɓo nde: «Ɓomɔ lɛ́pi nde, mi nda?»
Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nde: «Ɓaŋa lɛ́pi nde, wɛ Jaŋ te mɔ tɔpuna ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku. Ɓaŋa nde, wɛ Eli. Ɓaŋa sendi nde, wɛ wɛtɛ njombu mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ ɛ gwa̧ nje womiyɛ kɔ.»
Ɛ Yesus diyɛ ɓo nde: «Kɛ yun nɛ ŋguru wun, wunɛ lɛ́pi nde, mi nda?» Ɛ Piyɛr yeŋsa nde: «Wɛ *Krist, mɔ te ɛ joŋgwɛ ɓomɔ ɛ Njambiyɛ njesa kɔ.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde, kpɛ, ɓo tî lɛpi ɗete nyɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ na.

Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Yo gba nde, *Mɔnɔ mumɔ yâkaŋgwɛ saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ ɓuɗyate. Ɓetomba ɓe ɗya nɛ̀ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi ta sɛŋɛ nyɛ kutuɗya. Ɓo ta wo nyɛ, a má nje womiyɛ kɛ mɛtu yitati.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo hɛnɛ nde: «Ŋgɛ mumɔ kwaɗyɛ ɓeŋgwɛ mi, a tî ɓoŋ yotu nɛ nde, yo yaŋa na. A sôɓa kroa nɛ mɛtu hɛnɛ ɓeŋgwɛ mi.
Kɛto mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ ta kwaɗyɛ kambiɗya nɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ kɔ ta ɗimbiɗye yo. Yasi wɛtɛ, yɔkɔ ɛ ɗimbiɗye joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ kɛto mbɛ kɔ ta ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo.
Ma ŋgɛ mumɔ si namɔ mɛnɛti maka hɛnɛ, nje ɗimbiɗye joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ ho ɓekiɗye yo, yo má nje kamɛ nyɛ ŋge?
Kɛto ŋgɛ mumɔ gwe njɔn jayna mbɛ nɛ̀ jayna mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ, *Mɔnɔ Mumɔ ta gwe sendi njɔn wenɛ komɛ nyɛ ta nje nɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛluksa mɛnɛ nɛ̀ yi Saŋgwɛ nɛ̀ yi pupuna ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ.
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ gbate nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ɓaŋa kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗiyɛ ndana waka ɓaka tí gwe kinɛ pa ɓɛŋɛ njena *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ na.»
Kɛ Yesus ma si lɛpɔ ɗete, ya nda mɛtu yitan jɔ yitati kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ Piyɛr nɛ̀ Jaŋ nɛ̀ Jak ɓendɔ ɓenɛ ɓo kɛ̀ kɛ to keki, na kɛ̀ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́, ɛ mbɔmbu nɛ sɛnjɛ. Ɛ lambɔ nɛ yeŋsa ɓɛ wumnate nɛ mboŋ mboŋ.
Ɓo sém semɔ, Yesus mɛ kɛ nyɛ mɛsimɔ ɓenɛ ɓembam yiɓa, yo ɓa̧ Mɔyisi ɓenɛ Eli.
Ɓo punduma kɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛjasi. Mɔyisi ɓenɛ Eli ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ nda yi Yesus ta kɛ̀ nɔ Yerusalɛm kɛ̀ saŋgwa nɛ sɔŋ mate kɛ́.
Piyɛr ɓenɛ ɓenjɔŋ ɓenɛ ɓa̧ kɛ nyaŋgwɛ jakɔ. Kɛ jakɔ ma pɛsiyɛ kɛ misi man kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɓɛŋɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛjasi, ɓɛŋɛ Yesus nɛ̀ ɓembam yiɓa ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ kɛki nɛ ɓaka.

Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓembam ɓaka kandima kwaŋge jisɛ kɛ kɛki Yesus kɛ́, ɛ Piyɛr lɛpɛ nyɛ Yesus nde: «Yekele, yo kimɔte nde, wusɛ ɗîy waka. Wusɛ sûm mɛbala yitati, wɔ wɛtɛ, ɛ Mɔyisi wɛtɛ, ɛ Eli wɛtɛ.» Piyɛr tì ɓɛ kɛ duwɛ yasi te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ kɛ́ na.
Piŋɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ ndi kɛ lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ kulutu nje ɗiɓiɗye ɓo. Ɓejekɛ gwa̧ wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓɛŋma nde, kulutu kɛ mɛmiyɛ ɓo kɛ́.
Ɛ wɛtɛ mɛn wulɛ kɛ mɔy kulutu lɛpɔ nde: «Yɔkɔ mɔnmbɛ yi mi tɔkuma. Wunɛ wôkunaŋgwɛ nɛ nyɛ.»
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo wokuma nɛ mɛn kɛ́, yite Yesus tikama ndi nyɛpɔ. Ɓejekɛ ɗiyma numbu kɔɓɔ kɛ pɔku mɛtu mɛte yite kinɛ yekiɗye yasi te yi ɓo ɓɛŋma kɛ́ nyɛ mumɔ na.
Misi pupɛ ɛ ɓo piyɛ wulɛ kɛ to keki, ɛ nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil nje saŋgwa nɛ Yesus.
Ɗiyɔ kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ mbam lɛpɛ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey kɛ mɔy ŋgil nde: «Yekele, mi kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ wɛ: Kaŋa misi ɓɛŋɛ nɛ gwanjɔ wombɛ, nyɛ kikɔ.
Yiŋa sisiŋ kɛ ɗiki yembile nyɛ. Ndana ndana kɛ́, a mɛ kɛ kembiɗya, sisiŋ te má nambɛ nyɛ, ɔ ɓɛ́ŋa, mɛwuru mɛ kɛ pundɔ kɛ numbu nɛ pum pum. Yo ti síy nɛdɔ na. Kɛ kɔŋte, yotu nɛ mɛ hɛnɛ katinate.
Mi ŋgwɛtama nɛ ɓejekɛ ɓɔ nde, ɓo ɗûɗya ɓeya sisiŋ te soŋɛ kɛ yotu nɛ, yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ ɓo suɗyɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa lɛpɔ nde: «Wunɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ti jáya yasi ɓaka, wunɛ sendi ɓeya ɓomɔ, mi ta ɗiyɔ sinɛ wunɛ kumɔ ndenɛn? Mi ta gbisɔ wunɛ kumɔ ndenɛn? Ɓoŋgɔ mɔnɔ wɔ nje nɔ waka.»
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mɔnɔsikɛ ɓa̧ kɛ wuta nɛ Yesus kɛ́, ɛ ɓeya sisiŋ jalɛ nyɛ ɓetɛ kɛ mɛnɛti nambɛ nyɛ ɓeyate. Ɛ Yesus ɓama nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ siɗyɛ kɔn mɔnɔ ɛnɔru kaŋɛ nyɛ nyɛ saŋgwɛ.
Ɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ŋgbakima nyaŋgwɛ ɗeti Njambiyɛ. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓa̧ ndi kɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu yí ŋgbakima mɛyasi mɛte yi Yesus ɗikima kelɔ hɛnɛ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde:
«Wunɛ lɛ̂ŋgwɛ mɛtɔ kimɔte kɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi mi ta lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ ndana kɛ́. Ɓo ta ɓu̧ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ nyɛ ɓomɔ.»
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓejekɛ tì wokɛ to lɛpi te na. Yo ɓa̧ sɔɗyate nɛ ɓo, ma ɓo nje ɓiye to te. Ɓo gwa̧ wɔ̧ diyna nɛ lɛpi te.
Yinɔri yiŋa mɛtandɔ ɗyaŋma kɛ njoka yan yí duwɛ mɔ te ɛ kwaŋma ɓɛsɔ kɔ.
Yesus duwa̧ yasi te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ takɛ kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ man kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ wɛtɛ gbɛla mɔnɔsikɛ tɛmbiɗye kɛ kɛki nɛ

lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ ɓu̧ mɔnɔsikɛ nda yɔkɔ kimɔte kɛto mbɛ, a ɓóŋ mi kimɔte. Mɔ te ɛ ɓu̧ mi kimɔte, a ɓóŋ Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ. Ɗete, kɛ njoka yun hɛnɛ, yɔkɔ ɛ ɓu̧ yotu nɛ nda njena mumɔ, yo nyɛ kwa̧ ɓɛsɔ.»
Ɛ Jaŋ lɛpɛ nde: «Yekele, wusɛ ɓɛŋma wɛtɛ mbam kɛ soŋɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ yotu ɓomɔ nɛ ɗinɔ ɗyɔ, ɛ wusɛ gayɛ nyɛ, kɛto a yeti kɛ njɔŋ su na.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wunɛ tî gay nyɛ na, kɛto ŋgɛ mumɔ ti lu̧ ɗyambi suŋgwɛ nɛ wunɛ, a kɛ kɔŋ yun.»
Kɛ mɛtu mɛte yi Yesus ta yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ nɔ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́ ma si wuta, ɛ nyɛ pɛsɛ kɛ temɔ nɛ nde, a kɛ kɛ̀ Yerusalɛm.
Ɛ nyɛ tomɛ ɓomɔ kɛnjɛ mbɔmbu. Ɛ ɓo kwa̧ kumɔ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya ɓotu ɓe Samari diy kombile mbɛy tikɛ nyɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓomɔ ɓe ɗya te tì ɓu̧ nyɛ nɛ mɛsosa na, kɛto ɓo ɓɛŋma nde, a kɛ́n kɛ Yerusalɛm.
Kɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ Jak ɓenɛ Jaŋ ma ɓɛŋɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, wɛ kwáɗyikwɛ nde, wusɛ lɛ̂pi nde, ɗitɛ pîkwɛ kɛ kwey nje girise ɓo?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa ɓɛŋɛ ɓo ɓamɛ ɓo lɛpɔ nde: «Wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ kwalɔ sisiŋ te yi ɗya̧ kɛ yotu yun kɛ́ na.
Kɛto *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ti ma njáki nde, nɛ́ ɓomɔ yambile na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a njáki nje joŋgwɛ ɓomɔ.» Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ ɓo kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ nje kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ lɛpɛ nde: «Mi kɛ kwaɗyɛ ɓeŋgwɛ wɛ kɛ mbɛy hɛnɛ komɛ wɛ ta kɛ̀ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɓetoŋgɔ nɛ mɛnjɛmbi man, ɓenɔn sendi nɛ mɛtu̧ man. Yasi wɛtɛ, *Mɔnɔ mumɔ kinɛ mbɛy te yi nyɛ yakama ɓokwɛ to nɛ kɛte na.»
Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ nde: «Ɓeŋgwɛ mi.» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, tikɔ, nɛ́ mi pa kɛ̀ pumbu saŋmbɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Tikɔ, nɛ́ ɓemuŋ pumbu ɓemuŋ ɓan. Kwaŋgɔ yɔ kɛ̀ pelɛ kasi *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ.»
Ɛ wɛtɛ nje lɛpɔ nɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, mi kɛ kwaɗyɛ ɓeŋgwɛ wɛ, yasi wɛtɛ, tikɔ, nɛ́ mi pa kɛ̀ jana nɛ ɓotu ɓembɛ.»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ŋgɛ mumɔ nyɛ ɓɔ kɛ putika ŋgwaŋ nje ɓɛŋɛ njimɛ, mɔ te ti yaka kelɔ yaŋa kɛ Kandɔ Njambiyɛ na.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Kumande Yesus tɔkɛ ɓaŋa ɓejekɛ kamɔtan jɔ kaɓa tomɔ ɓo mbɔmbu yiɓa yiɓa kɛnjɛ kɛ mɛɗya hɛnɛ nɛ̀ mɛmbɛy hɛnɛ komɛ nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ kwaɗya kɛ̀ kɛ́.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ɓuɗya nyambi ma ɗetɔ kɛ ŋgwaŋ, yasi wɛtɛ, ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ti ɓuyɔ na. Ɗete, wunɛ ŋgwɛ̂taŋgwɛ nɛ sa ŋgwaŋ nde, a kɛ̂njikwɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛsay, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ wesiɗye nyambi nɛ.
Wunɛ kwâŋ, wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, mi kɛ tomɔ wunɛ kɛnjɛ nda ɓɔnɔ ɓesam kɛ njoka ɓeŋgwɛy.
Wunɛ tî ɓoŋ ko koɓiyɛ mɔni na ko gbɛla koɓiyɛ na ko mɛnakala na. Wunɛ tî tɛma kɛ nje yí pa nyɛnɔ mumɔ na.
Tu̧ hɛnɛ te yi wunɛ ta nyiŋɛ kɛte, wunɛ kânda lɛpɔ nde: ‹Tɛte ɓɛ̂ki nɛ ɓotu ɓe tu̧.›
Ŋgɛ wɛtɛ tɛ mumɔ ɓɛ kɛ tu̧ te, tɛte yi wunɛ lɛpima nɔ kɛ́ ta ɗiyɔ pɛlɛ nyɛ. Ŋgɛ yo ti ɓɛ ɗete na, yo má yɔkwɛ nje ndi kɛ yun.
Wunɛ ɗîy ndi kɛ tu̧ te. Wunɛ ɗyâki, nɛ̀ wunɛ hɔ̂ɓiya yasi te yi ɓo ta nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́, kɛto mɔ mɛsay yâkaŋgwɛ ɗye nduku mɛsay mɛnɛ. Wunɛ tî kɛn mɛtu̧ nɛ mɛtu̧ na.
Ŋgɛ wunɛ ɗya̧ kɛ yiŋa ɗya, ŋgɛ ɓomɔ ɓu̧ wunɛ kimɔte, nɛ̀ wunɛ ɗyâki yasi te yi ɓo ta nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́.
Wunɛ sîɗyikwɛ mɛkɔn mɛ ɓotu ɓe ɗya te, nɛ̀ wunɛ lɛ̂pi nyɛ ɓo nde: ‹*Kandɔ Njambiyɛ ma wuta.›
Ɗya hɛnɛ te yi wunɛ ta kumɔ kɛte, ŋgɛ ɓomɔ ti ɓu̧ wunɛ kimɔte na, nɛ̀ wunɛ kɛ̂ndi kɛ mɛmbɛy hɛnɛ kɛ mɔy ɗya lɛpɔ nde:
‹Wusɛ kɛ kutɔ ŋgbutu ɗya ɗyun yi ka̧ kɛ mɛkol musu kɛ́ kɛnjɛ kɛ to yun yí teɗye wunɛ nde, wunɛ kelma ɓeyate. Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, Kandɔ Njambiyɛ ma wuta.›
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Komɛ yesɔ pɛsina jɔsi ta ɗya̧ kɛ́, pɛsina jɔsi ɗya te ta laŋ ɗetɔ kwa̧ yi *Sɔdɔm.

«Wunɛ ɓotu ɓe Korasin, mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to yun! Wunɛ ɓotu ɓe Betsayda, mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to yun! Kɛto má ɓɛki nde, nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele mɛte yi kelnama kɛ mɛɗya mun kɛ́ ma kélnaŋgwɛ kɛ Tir nɛ̀ Sidɔn, ma ɓotu ɓete yeŋsama temɔ njombu yaŋa, lɛŋɛ mɛsanduku kutuɗye mɛsu mɛ ɗitɛ kɛ yotu.
Ɗete, kɛ yesɔ pɛsina jɔsi, pɛsina jɔsi te yun ta laŋ ɗetɔ kwa̧ yi Tir nɛ̀ Sidɔn.
Ma wunɛ ɓotu ɓe Kapɛrnawum, ’wunɛ táka ka nde, ɓo ta ɓendiɗye wunɛ kumɔ kɛ kwey? Ɓo ta kpalɔ piɗyɛ wunɛ kumɔ kɛ ɗya ɓemuŋ!»
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde: «Mɔ wokɛ mɛn yun, a wóku mɛn mbɛ. Sendi, yɔkɔ ɛ sɛŋɛ wunɛ, a sɛ́ŋa mi. Mɔ te ɛ sɛŋɛ mi, a sɛ́ŋa Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ.»
Ɓejekɛ ɓaka kamɔtan jɔ kaɓa yɔkwa̧ nɛ mɛsosa nje lɛpɔ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ko ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ wokuna nɛ wusɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wusɛ kɛ lɛpina nyɛ ɓo nɛ ɗinɔ ɗyɔ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi ɓɛŋma *Satan kɛ wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ ɓalɔ kɛ mɛnɛti nda yɛsi mbiyɔ.
Wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, mi ma nyɛ wunɛ ɗeti te yi natɛ ɓenyɔŋɛ nɛ̀ ɓelel ɓu̧ ɗeti te yi laŋsa ɗeti *Mɔ pendɔ wun. Sendi, kinɛ yaŋa yakama kelɔ wunɛ na.
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, wunɛ tî sosaŋgwɛ kɛto ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ wokuna nɛ wunɛ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ sôsaŋgwɛ, kɛto mɛɗinɔ mun mɛ kɛtinate kɛ ɗyoɓɔ.»

Kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te ɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ kelɛ nde, Yesus sôsaŋgwɛ ɓuɗyate. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Mi kɛ lukse wɛ Da, Kumande ɗyoɓɔ nɛ̀ mɛnɛti, kɛto wɛ sɔɗya mɛyasi mɛte nɛ ɓotu ɓe ɗyanɔ, sɔɗyɛ sendi nɛ ɓotu ɓe duwa̧ yasi, kpalɔ nje punjɛ yo nyɛ gbɛla ɓɔnɔsikɛ. I̧ Da, mi kɛ lukse wɛ, kɛto wɛ kwaɗya nde, mɛyasi kwâŋnaŋgwɛ ɗete.
Saŋmbɛ nya mi mɛyasi hɛnɛ. Mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ *Mɔnɔ na, soŋɛ ndi Da. Sendi, mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ Da na, soŋɛ ndi Mɔnɔ nɛ̀ mɔ te yi Mɔnɔ kwaɗyɛ punjɛ yo nyɛ nyɛ kɔ.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa ɓɛŋɛ ɓejekɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo ɓepɔ nde: «Wunɛ nɛ mɛsosa, kɛto ndana misi mun kɛ ɓɛŋɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ ɓɛŋɛ kɛ́.

Mi kɛ lɛpɔ gbate nyɛ wunɛ nde, ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓekumande kwaɗya ɓɛŋɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ ɓɛŋɛ kɛ́, ma ɓo tì ɓɛŋɛ yo na. Ɓo kwaɗya wokɔ nyaŋgwɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ wokɛ kɛ́, ma ɓo tì wokɛ yo na.»
Ndana, ɛ wɛtɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɔ duwa̧ mɛmboŋga tɛmɛ diyɛ Yesus diyan yí ɓoɓɛ nɛ nyɛ. A diyma nyɛ nde: «Yekele, mi kêl nan, nɛ́ mi ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo kɛtinate nɛ ŋge kɛ mɛkana mɛ mɛmboŋga te yi Mɔyisi kɛtima kɛ́? Wɛ tɔ́l nɛ ŋge kɛ mɔyte?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: « ‹Kwaɗyikwɛ Baba Mbokɔ te Njambiyɛ wɔ nɛ temɔ yɔ hɛnɛ nɛ̀ sisiŋ yɔ hɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗeti yɔ hɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɗyanɔ ɗyɔ hɛnɛ, kwaɗyɛ sendi mɔŋ nda yi wɛ kwaɗyɛ nɛ yotu yɔ kɛ́.› »
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ yeŋsama kimɔte, kelɔ ɗete, nɛ́ wɛ ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo.»
Yí teɗye nde, diyan nɛ nɛ ŋgbeŋ, ɛ nyɛ nje diyɛ Yesus nde: «Maŋmbɛ ɓa nda?»
Ɛ Yesus kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Wɛtɛ mumɔ wulma Yerusalɛm yí kɛ̀ kɛ Yeriko. Kumɔ kɛ nje, ɛ nyɛ saŋgwa nɛ ɓotu ɓe guɓɔ. Ɛ ɓo si sukɔ mɛyasi mɛnɛ mɛndɛ nyɛ ɓeyate tikɔ nyɛ kɛ nje sɔŋ si kwa̧.
Kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te yite wɛtɛ mɔ nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ nje sendi kɛ kiya nje te. Kɛ nyɛ ma semɔ mbam ɛnɔru kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ konjɛ nyɛ kwa̧ nɛ naŋ.
Wɛtɛ mɔ kandɔ *Levi kelma sendi ɗete. Kɛ nyɛ ma kɛndɔ kumɔ womɛte semɔ mbam ɛnɔru kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ konjɛ nyɛ kwa̧ nɛ naŋ.
Wɛtɛ jɛŋgwɛ, mɔ Samari ɓa̧ kɛ kɛ̀ kɛndi nɛ. A kɛndima ɗya̧ kɛ kɛki mbam ɛnɔru. Kɛ nyɛ ma semɔ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ ŋgwɛtɛ nɛ ɓiye nyɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ jisɛ kɛ̀ kɛ kɛki nɛ ɓiye nyɛ kumbɛ mutɔ nɛ̀ mɛnjam kɛ mɛpeŋ mɛnɛ si wotɔ yo. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ nyɛ ɓendiɗye kɛ to tofu wenɛ kwa̧ nɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ tu̧ ɓejɛŋgwɛ ɓakiɗye nyɛ.

Misi pupɛ ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ sule yiɓa nyɛ mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ nɛ tu̧ ɓejɛŋgwɛ kɔ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Ɓakiɗya mbam kɔ kimɔte. Mɔni hɛnɛ te yi wɛ ta kwaŋɗye kɛ to te yikɛ, mi ta yɔkiɗye yo nyɛ wɛ komɛ mi ta yɔkwɛ kɛ́.› »
Ɛ Yesus nje diyɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɔ duwa̧ mɛmboŋga kɔ nde: «Kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓaka ɓetati, yo nda kelma nda nyɛ maŋ nɛ mbam te yi ɓotu ɓe guɓɔ mɛndima kɔ?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Yo yɔkɔ ɛ kelma ŋgikwa nɛ nyɛ kɔ.» Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kwaŋgɔ, nɛ̀ wɛ kêl sendi ɗete.»
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ ɓa̧ kɛ kɛndi kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kumɛ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya. Ɛ wɛtɛ nyari nde Marta ɓu̧ nyɛ nɛ mɛsosa kɛ tu̧ ɗyenɛ.
Marta ɓa̧ nɛ wɛtɛ maŋ wenɛ nde Mariya. Mariya nja̧ ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ kɛ kɛki mɛkol mɛ Kumande Yesus yí wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, Marta ɓa̧ nɛ temɔ kɛ kelna ɓuɗya mɛsay. Ɛ nyɛ nje kɛ kɛki Yesus lɛpɔ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ’wɛ ɓɛ́ŋa kimɔte nde, maŋmbɛ tîki mi nyɛpɔ kɛ kelna mɛsay? Lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde, a kâma mi.»
Ɛ Kumande Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Marta, Marta, wɛ kɛ gwe kaŋ njaŋgwɛ yotu kɛto ɓuɗya mɛkele!
Yo ndi nɛ yasi wɛtɛ yi ɓomɔ yâkaŋgwɛ kelɔ! Mariya tɔkuma kimɔ ŋgaɓiyɛ te yi mumɔ ti yaka soŋɛ kɛ ɓɔ nɛ na!»

Wɛtɛ yesɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ wɛtɛ mbɛy. Kɛ nyɛ ma si ŋgwɛta kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ jekɛ wenɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, teɗya wusɛ nda yi wusɛ yakama ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ, nda Jaŋ te mɔ tɔpuna ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku teɗya sendi ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ŋgɛ wunɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ, wunɛ lɛ̂pi ɗekɛ:
‹Saŋsu, kelɔ nde, ɓomɔ ɓôŋ ɗinɔ ɗyɔ kiyɔ.
Inja namɔ mbokɔ.
Nyɛkɔ wusɛ mɛɗye mɛte yi ta yaka nɛ wusɛ kɛ yesɔ te ɛ muka.
Tikɔ wusɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ kɛ ɓeya yasi te yi wusɛ kelɛ kɛ́, kɛto wusɛ sendi kɛ tikɔ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe kelɛ ɓeya yasi nɛ wusɛ.
Wɛ tî jaya nde, wusɛ sâŋgwaŋgwɛ nɛ mɛɓoɓilan na.› »
Yesus ka̧ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Hɛ pâŋ ɓoɓɛ lɛpɔ nde: Wɛtɛ mumɔ kɛ njoka yun kɛ̂n nɛ ɓembe tu kɛ yi sɔ wenɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Maŋmbɛ, nyɛkɔ mi pilo mampa yitati,
kɛto wɛtɛ sɔ mbɛ ɗyaŋma kɛ yembɛ wulɛ kɛndi. Yasi te yi mi ta nyɛ nyɛ ɗye yeti.›
Sɔ má nje ɗiyɔ kɛ mɔy tu̧ yeŋsa nde: ‹Wɛ tî njaŋgwɛ mi na, mi ma ndaɗyɛ numɛy, sinɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓembɛ mɛ kɛ mɛtinɛŋgwɛ, mi ti yaka tɛmɛ kɛ̀ nyɛ wɛ mampa na.› »
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nde: «Mi kɛ lɛpɔ gbate nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ko a tì tɛmɛ ɓu̧ yo nyɛ nyɛ, kɛto nyɛ sɔ wenɛ na, a ta tɛmɛ kɛ̀ nyɛ nyɛ yasi hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́, kɛto a jɔmbuma nɛ tiŋ.
Ɗete, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Wunɛ jɔ̂mbu yasi, ɗete ɓo ta nyɛ wunɛ. Wunɛ sâŋ, ɗete wunɛ ta dolɔ. Wunɛ ɗûŋgwɛ numɛy, ɗete ɓo ta ɓutɛ nyɛ wunɛ.
Kɛto ɓo nyɛ́ki yasi nyɛ mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ jɔmbɛ kɔ. Yɔkɔ ɛ sa̧, a kɛ dolɔ. Yɔkɔ ɛ ɗuŋgwɛ numɛy, ɓo kɛ ɓutɛ nyɛ nyɛ.
Wɛ saŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ, ŋgɛ mɔnɔ wɔ jɔmbɛ mampa, ’wɛ má nje nyɛ nyɛ kil kusu? Ŋgɛ nyɛ jɔmbɛ njanjɔ, ’wɛ má nje nyɛ nyɛ nyɔŋɛ?
Ho nde, ŋgɛ nyɛ jɔmbɛ ki̧ kuɓɛ, ’wɛ má nje nyɛ nyɛ lel?
Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, ko ɓotu ɓe nyalɔ nda wunɛ kɛ duwɛ nyɛna ɓɔnɔ ɓun kimɔ mɛyasi, ’suŋgwa nɛ Saŋgwɛ wun te ɛ ɗiyɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɔ? ’A ta ɗiyɔ ka kinɛ nyɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe diyɛ nyɛ ɓaka?»

Wɛtɛ yesɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ soŋɛ wɛtɛ ɓeya sisiŋ kɛ yotu wɛtɛ mumɔ. Ɓeya sisiŋ te ɗikima kelɔ nde, mumɔ tî tapitaŋgwɛ na. Kɛ ɓeya sisiŋ ma si pundɔ ɗuwɛ kɛ yotu nɛ kɛ́, ɛ mbam kɔ kandɛ ndapi. Ɛ ŋgil ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte ɓaka ŋgbakima.
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓaŋa ɓomɔ kɛ njoka te nja̧ lɛpɔ nde: «A sóŋa ɓeya mɛsisiŋ nɛ ɗeti te yi *Kum ɓeya mɛsisiŋ te yi ɓo jeɓa nde *Belsebul kɔ.»
Yí ɓoɓɛ nɛ Yesus, ɛ ɓaŋa ɓomɔ kɛ njokate diyɛ nyɛ nde, a têɗya ɓo wɛtɛ mɛyekambiyɛ te yi wulɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́, nɛ́ ɓo ɓɛŋ.

Yasi wɛtɛ, Yesus duwa̧ mɛtakɛ man. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ŋgɛ kiya kandɔ wɛtɛ ɓaka kɛ ɓembe lu̧ ɗyambi tandɛ yan, ɓo ta yaŋgile kandɔ te, yo má girɔ. Sendi, ŋgɛ ɓomɔ ɓe kiya tu̧ wɛtɛ ɓaka kɛ ɓembe lu̧ ɗyambi tandɛ yan, ɓo má wanja.
Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, *Satan kɛ lu̧ ɗyambi suŋgwɛ nɛ yotu nɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ, ’kandɔ ɗyenɛ má nje kɛ̀ mbɔmbu nan? Kɛto wunɛ kɛ lɛpɔ nde, mi sóŋa ɓeya mɛsisiŋ nɛ ɗeti Belsebul.
Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, mi sóŋa mbɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ nɛ ɗeti Belsebul, ɓomɔ ɓun sóŋa yan ɓo nɛ ɗeti te yi nda? Ɗete, yo ɓo nɛ ŋguru wan ta jɔse wunɛ nɛmɛnɔ.
Ma ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, mi sóŋa ɓeya mɛsisiŋ nɛ ɗeti Njambiyɛ, yite téɗya nde, *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ mɛ kɛ njoka yun.
Ŋgɛ wɛtɛ ŋgaɓolo mbam ɓɛ nɛ mɛkɔ̧ mɛ ɗyambi kɛ ɓɔ ɓakiɗye nɛ tu̧ ɗyenɛ, kusuku nɛ kinɛ kaŋ na.

Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ wɛtɛ mɔ te ɛ nɛ ɗeti kwa̧ nyɛ kɔ ɗya̧ namɔ nyɛ, mɔ te má si soŋɛ mɛjɔlɛ mɛ ɗyambi mɛte yi sa tu̧ ɓa̧ tikɔ temɔ kɛte kɛ́ hɛnɛ kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛnɛ. Mɔ te má nje kaɓɔ kusuku sa tu̧ yi nyɛ ma namɔ kɛ́.
Ŋgɛ mumɔ ti ɓɛ kɛ kɔŋ mbɛ na, mɔ te kɛ lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ mi. Sendi, ŋgɛ mumɔ ti kwaɗyɛ wesiɗye yasi sinɛ nyɛ na, mɔ te kɛ wanjɔ.
«Ŋgɛ ɓeya sisiŋ pundɛ ɗuwɛ kɛ yotu mumɔ, a kwáŋ wowɔ nɛ mɛkoŋgor yí sa̧ mbɛy mɛwɛɗya. Ŋgɛ nyɛ ti dolɛ kɛ́, a má lɛpɔ nde: ‹Mi ta yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ kɛ tu̧ ɗyembɛ komɛ mi wulma kɛ́.›
A yɔ́kwɛ nje dolɔ nde, ɓo ma wɔmbile tu̧ nɛ ŋgɛsɛsɛ si kombile yo.

Ŋgɛ nyɛ semɛ ɗete kɛ́, a kwa̧ kɛ̀ ɓu̧ sendi ɓaŋa hakambe ɓeya mɛsisiŋ yitan jɔ yiɓa ɓe nɛ ɗeti kwa̧ nyɛ ɓaka. Ɔ ɓɛ́ŋa, ɓenɛ ɓo hɛnɛ ma ɗya̧ nyiŋɛ tu̧ ɓiye ɗya womɛte. Ɗete, tɛri mɔ te má nje ɓɛ ndana ɓeyate kwa̧ yi mbɔmbu.»
Yesus ɓa̧ ndi kɛ lɛpina ɗete kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ nyari ɗiyɛ kɛ mɔy ŋgil lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «Nya te ɛ soɓuma wɛ kɛ mɔy nɛ, nyɛ sendi wɛ ɓɛri kɔ nɛ mɛsosa.»
