Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Ɓomɔ ɓe wokɛ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, ɓakiɗye sendi yo ɓaka nɛ mɛsosa ɓuɗyate.»

Ɓomɔ ɓa̧ kɛ wesiɗya nɛ ŋgil kɛ kɛki Yesus. Ɛ nyɛ ɓutɛ numbu lɛpɔ nde: «Ɓeya ɓotu ɓe ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ kɛ diyɛ yiŋa mɛyekambiyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tí teɗye ɓo yiŋa mɛyekambiyɛ na, ndi yikɛ yi ma ɗyáŋ Yonas kɛ́.
Nda yasi te yi kelma Yonas ɓa̧ mɛyekambiyɛ kɛ yi ɓotu ɓe Ninive, ɗete sendi, yasi te yi ta kelɔ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ kɛ́ ta ɓɛ mɛyekambiyɛ kɛ yi ɓotu ɓe ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ.

Ɗyoɓɔ Njambiyɛ ta pɛsɔ jɔsi kɛ́, nya te ɛ ɓa̧ kumande kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ njɛmbɔ kɔ ta tɛmɛ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓotu ɓe ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ pɛsɔ lɛpi yan, teɗye ɓo nde, ɓo ɓalma lɛpi, kɛto a tɛmma lɔndunate kɛ njena mɛnɛti nje wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Salomɔŋ te yi ɓa̧ tondunate nɛ ɗyanɔ kɛ́. Ndana waka, mɔ te ɛ kwaŋma Salomɔŋ kɔ kɛte.

Ɗyoɓɔ Njambiyɛ ta pɛsɔ jɔsi kɛ́, ɓotu ɓe Ninive ta tɛmɛ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓotu ɓe ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ pɛsɔ lɛpi yan teɗye ɓo nde, ɓo ɓalma lɛpi, kɛto ɓo, ɓotu ɓe Ninive yeŋsama yan temɔ komɛ Yonas pelma yasi te yi Njambiyɛ lɛpima nyɛ ɓo kɛ́. Ndana waka, mɔ te ɛ kwaŋma Yonas kɔ kɛte.»
Ɛ Yesus kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Mumɔ ti kwénja lambo kɛ̀ sɔɗyɛ ho kɛ̀ tikɔ kɛ mɔy mbe na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo ɓóŋ kasɛ kɛ to teɓel, nɛ́ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe nyiŋɛ tu̧ ɓaka ɓɛŋ mɛjasi mɛte.
Misi mɔ, yo nda lambo kɛ yotu yɔ. Piŋɔ te yi misi mɔ ɓɛŋna kimɔte, yotu yɔ hɛnɛ kɛ mɔy mɛjasi. Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi misi mɔ ti ɓɛ́ŋna kimɔte, yotu yɔ kɛ mɔy yitil.
Nɛmba kimɔte, simande mɛyasi mɛte yi wɛ kelɛ kɛ́, yo yitil.
Ɗete, ŋgɛ yotu yɔ hɛnɛ ɓɛ kɛ mɔy mɛjasi kinɛ yiŋa mbɛy kɛ yitil na, yite mɛjasi saŋgwa yotu yɔ hɛnɛ nda yi lambo panɛ nɔ tikɔ nɛ wɛ kɛ mɛjasi kɛ́.»
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus ɓa̧ ndi kɛ lɛpina kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ mɔ *Farisɛ̧ jeɓa nyɛ nde, a kɛ̂n kɛ̀ ɗyena kɛ tu̧ ɗyenɛ. Ɛ Yesus nyiŋɛ tu̧ kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ, na ɗyena.
Mɔ Farisɛ̧ ŋgbakimama yí ɓɛŋɛ nde, Yesus kɛ kwaɗyɛ ɗyena kinɛ pa weyɛ ɓɔ na.
Ɛ Kumande Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wunɛ Ɓefarisɛ̧, wunɛ wéya ndi kɔŋ pelɔ nɛ̀ kɔŋ pan, yasi wɛtɛ, temɔ yun tondunate nɛ yɛsiɗyɛ guɓɔ nɛ̀ ɓeya mɛkele.
Wunɛ ɓelem, kiya mɔ te ɛ wɔmma kɔŋ te kɔ, ’yeti ndi nyɛ wɔmɛ mɔy te na?
Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ yâkaŋgwɛ kaɓɔ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɗiyɛ kɛ mɔyte kɛ́ nyɛ buka ɓomɔ. Komɛte, mɛyasi mun hɛnɛ ta ɓɛ pupunate kɛ mbɔmbu Njambiyɛ.

«Wunɛ *Ɓefarisɛ̧, mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to yun! Kɛto kɛ gbɛla mɛmbunjɔ mɛ likɔ nde *maŋt nɛ̀ *ru nɛ̀ kwalɔ yiŋa mɛnyiŋɔ hɛnɛ, wunɛ kɛ ɓu̧ yasi hɛnɛ kɛ njokate ɓakɛ kɛ mɛŋgaɓiyɛ kamɔ kamɔ, ɓu̧ kwalɔ ŋgaɓiyɛ te wɛtɛ wɛtɛ nyɛ Njambiyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ pɛsina jɔsi nɛ ŋgbeŋ nɛ̀ kɛ kwaɗya Njambiyɛ, wunɛ kɛ tikɔ yite. Ma yo yite yi wunɛ yâkaŋgwɛ kelɔ kinɛ tikɔ kelna ɓukwɛ mɛyasi mɛte yiri na.

«Wunɛ *Ɓefarisɛ̧, mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to yun! Kɛto wunɛ kwáɗyikwɛ ɗiyɔ ndi kɛ bosa mɛtaŋ kɛ mɛmbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn. Wunɛ kwáɗyikwɛ sendi nde, ɓomɔ kɛ̂ nyɛnɔ wunɛ kɛ mɛmbɛy komɛ ɓomɔ ɗiki wesiɗya kɛ́.
Mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to yun! Kɛto wunɛ nda mɛɓoŋsɔŋ mɛte yi ɓɛ sɔɗyate, ɓomɔ kɛ kwa̧ kɛ to te kinɛ duwɛ na.»
Ɛ wɛtɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɔ duwa̧ mɛmboŋga ɛ ɓa̧ kɛ njoka ɓɛsɔ kɔ lɛpɛ nyɛ Yesus nde: «Yekele, yi wɛ lɛpɛ ɗete kɛ́, wɛ kɛ toyɛ sendi wusɛ.»

Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Wunɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe duwa̧ mɛmboŋga, mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to yun! Kɛto wunɛ kɛ soɓiɗye ɓomɔ nyaŋgwɛ ɗitina mɛmapi, yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ nɛ ŋguru wun yeti kɛ sambile nyɛy ɓɔ yun wɛtɛ kpokɛ nɛ yo na.
Mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛto yun! Kɛto wunɛ kɛ kombile wɔmɔ mɛɓoŋsɔŋ mɛ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, yo ɓesaŋgwɛ ɓun wo ɓo.
Ɗete, wunɛ kɛ teɗye nde, ɓesaŋgwɛ ɓun nɛ kalɛ. Sendi, wunɛ kɛ jayɛ mɛkele man. Kɛto ɓo, ɓo woma ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, ma yo wunɛ kɛ nje kombile wɔmɔ mɛɓoŋsɔŋ man.
Ɗete, Njambiyɛ te yɔkɔ ɛ duwɛ mɛyasi kɔ lɛpima nde: ‹Mi ta tomɔ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe tomun. Ɓo ta wo ɓaŋa kɛ njokate, teɗye ɓaŋa mɛbɔnɛ.›
Ɗete, mi ta diyɛ mɛkiyɔ mɛ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ hɛnɛ yi nyanjama kɛ́ kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ ɓotu ɓe ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ. Mi ta diyɛ mɛkiyɔ mɛte kandɛ kɛ yesɔ te yi mbokɔ kusunama nɔ,

kandɛ kɛ mɛkiyɔ mɛ Abɛl kumɔ kɛ mɛkiyɔ mɛ Sakari te yi ɓo woma kɛ njoka mbɛy nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kɔ. Gbate, mi kɛ kombile lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Njambiyɛ ta diyɛ mɛkiyɔ man kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ ɓotu ɓe ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ.

«Wunɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe duwa̧ mɛmboŋga, mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to yun! Kɛto wunɛ petima nje nde, ɓomɔ tî dukwɛ mɛyasi na. Wunɛ nɛ ŋguru wun tì kɛndɛ kɛ nje te na, wunɛ kpalma petɔ ɓotu ɓete ɓe kwaɗya kɛndɔ kɛ nje te ɓaka.»
Kɛ Yesus ma pundɔ kɛ tu̧ mɔ *Farisɛ̧ te kɛ́, ɛ Ɓefarisɛ̧ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi kandɛ jeliya nɛ ɓeyate diyɛ nyɛ ɓuɗya mɛdiyan
yí lɛɓiye nɛ nyɛ, simande yiŋa ɓeya lɛpi ta pundɔ kɛ numbu nɛ.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite ɓomɔ wesiɗyama ɓetomay ɓetomay nda ɓo ta natina. Ɛ Yesus pa kandɛ lɛpina nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ, a lɛpima nde: «Wunɛ ɗîy nɛ sɔsɔ nɛ ŋga̧ *Ɓefarisɛ̧. Ŋga̧ te, yo likisi te yi ɓo nɔ kɛ́.
Yasi hɛnɛ te yi ɗiyɛ kɛ sɔ kɛ́ ta pundɔ puyɛ. Sendi, yasi hɛnɛ te yi ɗiyɛ sɔɗyate, ɓomɔ ta duwɛ yo.
Yasi hɛnɛ te yi wunɛ ta lɛpɔ kɛ mɔy yitil nɛ tu, ɓo ta wokɔ yo kɛ puyɛ nɛ yesɔ. Sendi, yasi te yi wunɛ ta lakiɗya lakiɗyaŋgwɛ kɛ mɛtɔ kɛ mɛtoŋgari, yo ta pelna kɛ mɛtosiyɔ̧ nɛ gbololo.
Wunɛ ɓesɔ ɓembɛ, mi lɛ́pi nyɛ wunɛ nde: Wunɛ tî kambi ɓotu ɓete ɓe yakama wo mɛmbundɔ kinɛ ɓɛ nɛ ɗeti te yi nje kelɔ yiŋa yaŋa kɛ kɔŋte na.
Mi ta lɛpɔ mɔ te yi wunɛ yâkaŋgwɛ kambɔ kɔ. Wunɛ kâmbi mɔ te ɛ nɛ ɗeti te yi kɛnjɛ mɔ te yi nyɛ si wo kɔ kɛ ɗitɛ te yi ti ɗím kɛ́. Mi kɛ kombile lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Wunɛ kâmbi mɔ te mbɛte.
Ɓenɔn nda ɓeŋgiri, ’ɓo ti ɗyáŋgwɛ ka ɓo yitan sisi yiɓa na? Ko ɗete, Njambiyɛ kɛ duwɛ ɓo hɛnɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ ɓɛ wunɛ, ko nyiŋɔ to yun, Njambiyɛ kɛ duwɛ ɓuyɔte. Wunɛ tî kambi yaŋa na, wunɛ sulnate kɛ misi mɛ Njambiyɛ kwa̧ ɓuɗya ɓeŋgiri.
«Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Mumɔ hɛnɛ tɛ ɛ jayɛ mi kɛ mbɔmbu ɓomɔ, mi *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta jayɛ sendi nyɛ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ sɛŋɛ mi kɛ mbɔmbu ɓomɔ, mi Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta sɛŋɛ sendi nyɛ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ.
«Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ lɛpɛ yiŋa ɓeya yasi suŋgwɛ nɛ Mɔnɔ mumɔ, Njambiyɛ ta tikɔ nyɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ lɛpɛ lɛpi gbutu suŋgwɛ nɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ, ko Njambiyɛ tí tikɔ nyɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ na.

«Komɛ ɓo ta ɓu̧ wunɛ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ mɛmbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn, kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓotu ɓe pɛsina jɔsi, ho kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu ɓekum, wunɛ tî gwaki kaŋ kɛ yasi te yi wunɛ ta yeŋsa, ho gwe kaŋ kɛ yasi te yi wunɛ ta lɛpɔ kɛ́ na.
Kɛto Kimɔ Sisiŋ ta teɗye wunɛ yasi te yi wunɛ ta lɛpɔ kɛ́ kɛ kiya mbɛy.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ ɗiyɛ kɛ mɔy ŋgil lɛpɔ nyɛ Yesus nde: «Yekele, lɛpɔ nyɛ maŋmbɛ nde, sinɛ nyɛ kâɓiɗyaŋgwɛ kusuku te yi saŋsu tikima nɛ wusɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mbam, nda tikɛ mi mɔ pɛsina jɔsi yun ho mɔ kaɓina kusuku yun nyɛ wunɛ?»
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ ɗîy nɛ sɔsɔ. Wunɛ tî ɓɛki nɛ njaŋ sumba na, kɛto ɓuɗya kusuku te yi mumɔ yakama ɓɛ nɔ kɛ́ ti yaka nyɛ nyɛ joŋgwɛ na.»
Ɛ nyɛ nje yekiɗye wɛtɛ kanɔ nyɛ ɓo lɛpɔ nde: «Wɛtɛ mɔ kusuku woma ɓuɗya nyambi kɛ mɛŋgwaŋ mɛnɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ takina kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ lɛpɔ nde: ‹Mi ta kelɔ nan, kɛto mi yeti se nɛ mbɛy te yi ɓakiɗye nyambi mbɛ kɛte na.›
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: ‹Ndana mi duwa̧ nda yi mi ta kelɔ kɛ́. Mi ta si yaŋgile mɛndam mɛmbɛ nje sumɔ mɛnyaŋgwɛ mɛte kwa̧ yi mbɔmbu. Mi ta wesiɗye nyambi mbɛ nɛ̀ kusuku mbɛ hɛnɛ nyɛ kɛ mɔyte,
má nje lɛpɔ kɛ kɔŋte nyɛ temɔ mbɛ nde: Temɔ mbɛ, wɛ nɛ ɓuɗya kusuku kɛ kom yi yaka ɓuɗya mɛsew! Wɛɗyaŋgwɛ, ɗyenaŋgwɛ, ɗyakɔ mɛnjam, nɛ̀ wɛ kêɓi joŋgwɛ ɗyɔ!›
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Wɛ lem, kɛ tu kɔ muka mi ta ɓu̧ sisiŋ yɔ! Ma mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi wɛ wesiɗya kɛ́ ta wokuna nɛ nda?›
Yo ɗete sendi kɛ yi mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ wesiɗye kusuku ndi yenɛ nyɛpɔ, yasi wɛtɛ, nyɛ gbɛlate kɛ misi mɛ Njambiyɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ kɛ kɔŋte nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde: «Ɗete, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Wunɛ tî gwaki kaŋ kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyun kɛ kasi mɛɗye, ho gwe kaŋ yotu yun kɛ kasi mɛlɛŋgwe na,
kɛto joŋgwɛ kwa̧ mɛɗye, yotu kwa̧ mɛlambɔ.

Wunɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa ɓenɔn. Ɓo ti ɓɛ́ki mbɛki na, ɓo yeti kɛ soŋɛ yiŋa nyambi kɛ ŋgwaŋ na, ɓo kinɛ talɔ ho ndam na. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, Njambiyɛ kɛ nyɛ ɓo mɛɗye. Wúnɛ ɓenɔn yeti wɛtɛ na, wunɛ kwa̧ ɓo mɛtu gɔmay kɛ misi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Mɔ te nda kɛ njoka yun yakama sɛwɗye mɛtu mɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ nɛ mbɛt kɛto gwena kaŋ te yi nyɛ nɔ kɛ́?
Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wunɛ yeti nɛ ɗeti te yi kelɔ mɔnɔ yaŋa ɗete na, ’ma nɛ njáki gwe kaŋ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yiri kɛto ŋge?

Wunɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa nda yi mɛmbunjɔ ju̧ nɔ kɛ́. Mɛmbunjɔ yeti kɛ kelɔ yiŋa mɛsay ho sa mɛlambɔ na. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ko kumande Salomɔŋ nɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɗiyɔ mɛluksa mɛnɛ tì lɛŋɛ yiŋa kpasa kimɔ lambɔ nda njam mɛmbunjɔ maka wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ na.

Ma wunɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe tikɛ temɔ nɛ mbɛt kɛ yi Njambiyɛ ɓaka, ŋgɛ Njambiyɛ nyɛ kimɔ njam nyɛ mɛmbunjɔ mɛte yi likɔ yi ɗiyɛ ndi muka, nɛmɛnɔ ɓo ɓoŋma ɓetɛ kɛ ɗitɛ kɛ́, ’suŋgwa nɛ wunɛ? ’A ta ɗiyɔ ka kinɛ lɛnje wunɛ lambɔ na?
Wunɛ tî tiki ndi temɔ kɛ saŋna yasi te yi wunɛ ta ɗye ho yasi te yi wunɛ ta hɔɓiye na.
Kɛto yo mɛkandɔ mɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe yeti kɛ duwɛ Njambiyɛ ɓaka sa̧ mɛyasi mɛte yinɔri hɛnɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, Saŋgwɛ wun duwa̧ nde, wunɛ yâkaŋgwɛ ɓɛ nɛ mɛyasi mɛte kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyun.
Wunɛ kânda gɔsɔ *Kandɔ te yi Njambiyɛ, ɗete a má nje dokiɗye mɛyasi mɛte yiri kɛ to te nyɛ wunɛ.
Wunɛ mɔnɔ kuru ɓesam, wunɛ tî gwaki wɔ̧ na, kɛto Saŋgwɛ wun ɓɛŋma kimɔte yí kaŋɛ Kandɔ ɗyenɛ nyɛ wunɛ.

Wunɛ ɗyâŋgwɛ mɛkusuku mun ɓu̧ mɔni te nyɛ buka ɓomɔ. Wunɛ fûl mɛkoɓiyɛ mɛ ɓakiɗya mɔni yi ti ɓutɔ kɛ́, nɛ̀ wunɛ kôm mɛkusuku mun kɛ kwey komɛ Njambiyɛ ɗiyɛ kɛ́. Kusuku te tí yambile na. Mate mɔ guɓɔ tí wuta kɛ kɛkite na. Ɓenya tí ɗye yo na,
kɛto kɛ mbɛy te yi kusuku yun ɗiyɛ kɛte, temɔ yun ta ɓɛ sendi womɛte.»
Ɛ Yesus kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Wunɛ kômsaŋgwɛ susule mɔy jeliyɛ. Mɛlambo mun ɗîy kwenjate.
Wunɛ ɓɛ̂ki nda ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ɓete ɓe laɗye masa wan komɛ nyɛ ta yɔkwɛ kɛ jesɔ gwaki kɛ́. Ɗete, ɓo ta ɓutɛ numɛy nɛdɔ nyɛ nyɛ komɛ nyɛ ta ɗya̧ ɗuŋgwɛ numɛy kɛ́.

Ɓotu ɓe mɛsay te ɓɛte nɛ mɛsosa komɛ masa wan ta yɔkwɛ dolɔ ɓo kɛ mɛjemsiɗyɛ kɛ́. Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: A ta komsa susule mɔy jeliyɛ, a má jeɓa ɓo, nɛ́ ɓo nje ɗiy mɛtiɗyɛ ɗyena. Nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ ta ɓu̧ mɛɗye nɛ̀ mɛyasi hɛnɛ nje tikɔ kɛ nji̧ mɛkol man.
Kɛ nyɛ ɗya̧ kɛ ɓembe tu ho kɛ numbu ŋgimɔ dolɔ ɓo kɛ mɛjemsiɗyɛ, ɓotu ɓe mɛsay te ɓɛte nɛ mɛsosa.
Wunɛ dûkwɛ gba nde: Sa tu̧ má dukwɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mɔ guɓɔ nje nɔ kɛ́, ma nyɛ kɛ pɛmɔ yasi, kambɔ mɔ guɓɔ mɛ nje lekɛ tu̧ nyiŋɛ guɓɔ mɛyasi.
Ɗete, wunɛ sendi, wunɛ kômsaŋgwɛ, kɛto *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta nje kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wunɛ tì ɓɛ kɛ takɛ nde, a ta nje kɛte kɛ́ na.»
Ɛ Piyɛr lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ’wɛ nyɛ́ki kanɔ te yikɛ nyɛ wusɛ, ho wɛ nyɛ́ki kɛto ɓomɔ hɛnɛ?»
Ɛ Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande yeŋsa nde: «Yo nda kimɔ mɔ ɓakiɗya mɛyasi? Yo yɔkɔ ɛ nɛ sɔsɔ yi masa wenɛ ta tɛmbiɗye nyɛ nde, a ɗîy nɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ɓenɛ yí nyɛ ɓo mɛɗye yaka nɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ pɛsima kɛ́.
Mɔ mɛsay kɔ nɛ mɛsosa komɛ masa wenɛ ta ɗya̧ dolɔ nyɛ kɛ kelɔ ɗete.
Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: A ta nje tɛmbiɗye nyɛ, na ɗiy nɛ mɛyasi mɛnɛ hɛnɛ.

Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ mɔ mɛsay kɔ lɛpɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ nde: ‹Masa wombɛ tí yɔkwɛ ndana nɛdɔ na,› ŋgɛ nyɛ nje nyɛ ɓɔ kɛ mɛndina ɓotu ɓe mɛsay, ɓembam nɛ̀ ɓomari, ɗiyɔ ndi mɛɗye, ndi hɔɓiya mɛnjam nɛ̀ gwena mɛnjam,

yite wɛtɛ yesɔ masa wenɛ ta duwɛ ɗya̧ kɛ yesɔ te yi nyɛ tì ɓɛ kɛ takɛ nde, a ta ɗya̧ kɛte na, kɛ hawa te yi nyɛ tí duwɛ na. A ta teɗye nyɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛbɔnɛ tikɔ kɛ nje sɔŋ, kelɔ nɛ nyɛ nda yi ɓo kelɛ nɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ti tíki temɔ kɛ yi Njambiyɛ ɓaka.
«Mɔ mɛsay te yɔkɔ ɛ ma duwɛ yasi te yi masa wenɛ kwaɗyɛ nje ɗiyɔ kinɛ kombile mɛyasi, kinɛ kelɔ sendi nda yi masa wenɛ kwaɗyɛ, ɓo ta njurɔ nyɛ ɓuɗyate.

Yasi wɛtɛ, yɔkɔ ɛ kelma yasi kinɛ duwɛ kwaɗya te yi masa wenɛ, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, a kelma yasi te yi ɓo yâkaŋgwɛ njurɔ nyɛ kɛte, ɓo ta njurɔ nyɛ nɛ mbɛt. Ɓo ta diyɛ ɓuɗya mɛyasi kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ mɔ te yi ɓo nya nyɛ ɓuɗya mɛyasi kɔ. Ɓo ta diyɛ kwa̧ to te kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ mɔ te yi ɓo nya nyɛ ɓuɗya mɛyasi nde, a ɓâkiɗya kɔ.
«Mi nja̧ ɓetɛ ɗitɛ kɛ mɛnɛti. Mi kɛ gɔrɔ nɛ temɔ mbɛ hɛnɛ nde, ɗitɛ ɓîya.
Yo nɛ wɛtɛ mɛtɔpuna te yi mi yâkaŋgwɛ saŋgwa nɔ, temɔ mbɛ ndi kɛ gwe kaŋ, disɔ wɛɗya, yo má kelna.
’Wunɛ táka ka nde, mi njáki nje nyɛ tɛte kɛ mɛnɛti maka? Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ko na. Mi njáki ɓakɛ njoka ɓomɔ.
Kandɛ ndana, kɛ njoka ɓomɔ yitan ɓe joŋna kɛ kiya tu̧ wɛtɛ, ɓo ta ɓaka, ɓomɔ yitati ta lu̧ ɗyambi suŋgwɛ nɛ ɓari yiɓa. Ɓaka yiɓa má lu̧ sendi ɗyambi suŋgwɛ nɛ ɓari ɓetati.

Saŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ ta lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ mɔnɔ ɛ mbam. Mɔnɔ ɛ mbam má lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ saŋgwɛ. Nyaŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ ta lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ mɔnɔ wenɛ ɛ nyari. Mɔnɔ nyari má lu̧ sendi ɗyambi nɛ nyaŋgwɛ. Mbambɔ ɛ nyari ta lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ njari nɛ. Njari má lu̧ sendi ɗyambi nɛ mbambɔ ɛ nyari.»
Yesus ka̧ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nyɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ nde: «Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wunɛ ɓɛŋɛ yindi mbiyɔ kɛ mɛta mɛ ɗyoɓɔ, ndana ndana wunɛ kɛ lɛpɔ nde: ‹Mbiyɔ ta nɔ,› ɔ ɓɛ́ŋa kɛ́, yo kelnama ndi ɗete.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wunɛ tɛmɛ ɓemɛŋmɛnɛ ɓɛŋɛ ɗyoɓɔ nɛ waŋgo, wunɛ lɛ́pi nde: ‹Joŋ ta kelɔ muka ɓuɗyate,› ɔ ɓɛ́ŋa kɛ́, yo kelnama ndi ɗete.
Wunɛ ɓotu ɓe likisi, wunɛ kɛ duwɛ nɛmbɛ tɛri ɗyoɓɔ nɛ̀ mɛnɛti. Ma nan yi wunɛ ti nɛ́mba mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋna kɛ mɛŋgimɔ te yikɛ kɛ́?
«Kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ nɛ ŋguru wun ti nɛ́mba sendi mɛyasi yi duwɛ nɛ ŋgbeŋ mɛkele kɛ́?

Ŋgɛ wúnɛ mumɔ ɓɛ nɛ lɛpi, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wunɛ kɛ kɛ̀ kɛ jɔsi, saŋgɔ nje te yí si kombile lɛpi te wúnɛ nyɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wúnɛ nyɛ ndi kɛ nje kɛ́. Kelɔ ɗete, kambɔ a mɛ nje ɓu̧ wɛ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ mbɔmbu mɔ pɛsina jɔsi. Ma mɔ pɛsina jɔsi mɛ nje ɓu̧ wɛ kaŋɛ nyɛ mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ nɛ tu̧ jɔɓɔ kɔ, kambɔ mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ nɛ tu̧ jɔɓɔ kɔ mɛ nje ɓu̧ wɛ nyɛ kɛ jɔɓɔ.
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛ nde: Wɛ disɔ pundɔ womɛri, yite wɛ sima gbo lɛpi hɛnɛ nɛ satak kinɛ ɓukwɛ ko mɔnɔ mbulma sisi wɛtɛ na.»

Ndi kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte ɓaka nja̧ yekiɗye kasi ɓotu ɓe Galile nyɛ Yesus. Ɓo lɛpima nda yi Pilat woma ɓotu ɓete, ɛ mɛkiyɔ man saŋgwa nɛ mɛkiyɔ mɛ ɓenyamɔ ɓete yi ɓo woma kelɔ nɛ sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́.
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «’Wunɛ táka ka nde, ɓo sáŋgwaŋgwɛ nɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛbɔnɛ mɛnɔri, kɛto ɓo ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ kwa̧ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Galile?
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Yeti ɗete na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ wunɛ ti yeŋsa temɔ na, wunɛ hɛnɛ ta yambile sendi ɗete.
Sendi, ɓomɔ kamɔ jɔ yitan jɔ yitati yi doŋgbe doŋgbe tu̧ Silɔy ɓalma si wo kɛ́, ’wunɛ táka ka nde, ɓo ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ kwa̧ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ kɛ Yerusalɛm?
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Yeti ɗete na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ wunɛ ti yeŋsa temɔ na, wunɛ hɛnɛ ta yambile sendi ɗete.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus nyɛ wɛtɛ kanɔ nde: «Wɛtɛ mbam ɓɛma wɛtɛ jeti nde *figiye kɛ ŋgwaŋ nɛ. Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ, simande yo wumma, na nɔku. A ka̧ kinɛ dolɔ yaŋa na.

Ndana, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ mɔ ɓakiɗya ŋgwaŋ nde: ‹Ɓɛŋa, kandɛ mɛsew yitati muka, ŋgɛ mi nje ɓɛŋɛ, simande figiye kɔ wumma, nɛ́ mi nɔku tena mɛmbumɔ mɛte, mi ti dól yaŋa na. Ɗete, pɛsɔ nyɛ, a kɛ ɗye mbɛy gbɛlate.›
Ɛ mɔ ɓakiɗya ŋgwaŋ yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Masa, pa tikɔ sendi nyɛ kɛ sew kɔ. Kandɛ ndana mi ta timɔ mɛnɛti linje njuku te ɓu̧ kimɔ mɛnɛti gwaɗye kɛte,
simande kɛ sew te ɛ nje kɔ, a yakama wumɔ. Ŋgɛ ti ɓɛ ɗete na, wɛ ta pɛsɔ nyɛ.› »
Wɛtɛ yesɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ wɛtɛ mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn kɛ yesɔ *Saba.
Wɛtɛ nyari ɓa̧ womɛte nɛ kɔsu yi wɛtɛ ɓeya sisiŋ nya nyɛ kɛ́. Kɔsu te mɛ kɛ mɛsew kamɔ jɔ yitan jɔ yitati. Nya te ɓa̧ nɛ ŋgundɛŋ. A tì ɓɛ nɛ ɗeti te yi tɛmbiɗye yotu na.
Kɛ Yesus ma ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ jeɓa nyɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyari, kɔn yɔ siyma.»
Ɛ Yesus kasɛ mɛɓɔ kɛ yotu nɛ, ɛ nyari tɛmbiɗye yotu ndana ndana kɛ kiya mbɛy kandɛ luksa Njambiyɛ.

Kɛ mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ nɛ mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn kɔ ma ɓɛŋɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ wokɛ ŋgambi ɓuɗyate, kɛto Yesus siɗya kɔn kɛ yotu mumɔ kɛ yesɔ Saba. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ nde: ‹Ɓomɔ yâkaŋgwɛ kelɔ mɛsay kɛ mɛtu yitan jɔ wɛtɛ. Kɛ mɛtu te yite, wunɛ yâkaŋgwɛ nje, nɛ́ ɓo siɗyɛ mɛkɔn mun, yeti kɛ yesɔ Saba na.›
Ɛ Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wunɛ ɓotu ɓe likisi, kɛ njoka yun hɛnɛ, ’nda ti wúnja nday ho tofu wenɛ, punjɛ kɛ̀ nyɛ nyɛ mɔrɔku kɛ yesɔ Saba kɔ?
Ma nya kɔ, nyɛ nday Abaraham. *Satan ma nyɛ nyɛ kɔn kɛ yotu mɛ muka mɛsew kamɔ jɔ yitan jɔ yitati. ’Ti yaka nde, mi sîɗyikwɛ kɔn nɛ kɛ yesɔ Saba na?»
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ njɔn ɓiye ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ nyɛ mɛso nɛ nyɛ ɓaka. Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgil ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓa̧ nɛ mɛsosa kɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele hɛnɛ te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ kelɔ kɛ́.
Yesus ka̧ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «*Kandɔ Njambiyɛ nda ŋge? Mi ta yekɔ yo nɛ ŋge?
Yo nda kwalɔ wɛtɛ mɔnɔ mbumɔ nde mutar yi wɛtɛ mumɔ ɓoŋma kɛ̀ ɓɛ kɛ ŋgwaŋ nɛ kɛ́. Yo loma ɗɔkɔ ɓɛ nyaŋgwɛ jeti. Ɛ ɓenɔn nje sumɔ mɛtu̧ man kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛte joŋna kɛte.»
Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Mi ta yekɔ sendi *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ nɛ ŋge?
Yo nda mɔnɔ ŋga̧ kelna mampa yi nyari ɓu̧ saŋgwɛ nɛ su farin yaka loŋga yitati. Mɔnɔ ŋga̧ te ta kelɔ nde, mbɔrɔ farin yinɔri hɛnɛ sîki wuɗyɛ.»
Yesus ka̧ mɛɗya mɛɗya, kɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛɗya nɛ̀ kɛ mɔnɔ mɛɗya. A ɗikima teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kwa̧ nɔ kɛ̀ nɔ Yerusalɛm.
Ɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ’yite nde, ɓotu ɓete ɓe ta ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo ɓaka ti ɓuyɔ na?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde:
«Wunɛ nyɛ̂ki sosu yun hɛnɛ yí sa̧ nje te yi nyiŋɛ nɛ ɓolkoko numɛy. Mi kɛ kombile lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate ta sa̧ nje te yi nyiŋɛ. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓo tí nyiŋɛ na.

Komɛ sa tu̧ ta tɛmɛ ɗiɓɔ numɛy kɛ́, wunɛ ta tika kɛ sɛ̧. Wunɛ má kandɛ ɗuŋgwa numɛy lɛpɔ nde: ‹Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ɓuta numɛy nyɛ wusɛ.› Yasi wɛtɛ, a ta yeŋsa nyɛ wunɛ nde: ‹Mi yeti kɛ duwɛ mbɛy komɛ wunɛ wulɛ nje nɔ kɛ́ na.›
Komɛte, wunɛ má nje kandɛ lɛpinate nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Wɛ ɗyenama hɔɓiye mɛnjam sinɛ wunɛ. Ɛ wɛ teɗye sendi ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mɛsɛ̧ musu.›
A má nje yeŋsa nyɛ wunɛ nde: ‹Mi lɛ́pi nyɛ wunɛ nde: Mi yeti kɛ duwɛ mbɛy komɛ wunɛ wulɛ nje nɔ kɛ́ na. Wunɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe kelɛ yasi kɔtute ɓaka, wunɛ lɔ̂ndu kɛ kɛki mbɛ.›
Komɛ ɓo ta ɓu̧ wunɛ ɓetɛ kɛ sɛ̧ kɛ́, wunɛ ta ɗiyɔ mate ɓɛŋɛ Abaraham nɛ̀ Isak nɛ̀ Yakɔp nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ hɛnɛ kɛ *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ. Komɛte, wunɛ ta lelɔ pukile mɛsu̧.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓomɔ ta wulɛ pulɔ komɛ yesɔ pundɛ nɛ̀ pulɔ komɛ yesɔ ɓalɛ. Ɓo ta wulɛ ŋgari, wulɛ njɛmbɔ nje ɗiyɔ ɗyena kɛ *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ.
Ɗete, ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓe njimɛ ta nje ɓɛ bosa ɓomɔ. Sendi, ɓaŋa bosa ɓomɔ má nje ɓɛ ɓotu ɓe njimɛ.»
Kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te ɛ ɓaŋa *Ɓefarisɛ̧ nje kɛ kɛki Yesus lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Jisa waka, kwaŋgɔ lɔndɔ, kɛto kumande Herod kɛ kwaɗyɛ wo wɛ.»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ kɛ̂n lɛpɔ nyɛ kwɛ̧ ɛnɔru nde: ‹Mi kɛ soŋɛ ɓeya mɛsisiŋ kɛ yotu ɓomɔ, siɗyɛ mɛkɔn kandɛ muka kumɔ nɛmɛnɔ. Kɛ mɛtu yitati má nje siɗyɛ mɛsay mɛmbɛ.›
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, mi yâkaŋgwɛ kɛ̀ nɛ kɛndi mbɛ mbɔmbu kandɛ muka kumɔ nɛmɛnɔ nje ɓu̧ kɛ kɔŋ nɛmɛnɔ, kɛto ɓo ti yaka wo mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ wɛtɛ mbɛy na, ndi kɛ Yerusalɛm.»

Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Yerusalɛm, Yerusalɛm, wɛ ɛ ɗiki wo ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, lu̧ ɓotu ɓete ɓe Njambiyɛ tomɛ njesɛ kɛ yɔ ɓaka nɛ mɛtari wo! Mi kwaɗya wesiɗye ɓɔnɔ ɓɔ nda yi gway kuɓɛ gukule nɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓenɛ kɛ nji̧ mɛpapɔ mɛnɛ kɛ́. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, wunɛ tì kwaɗyɛ na.
Ndana wunɛ ta tika nɛ tu̧ ɗyun gboŋgote. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Wunɛ tí ɓɛŋɛ se mi na kumɔ komɛ wunɛ ta duwɛ lɛpɔ nde: ‹Mɛkombila nɛ yɔkɔ ɛ nje nɛ ɗinɔ Baba Mbokɔ kɔ!› »
Wɛtɛ yesɔ *Saba ɛ Yesus nyiŋɛ kɛ tu̧ wɛtɛ kum *Ɓefarisɛ̧ yí kɛ̀ ɗyena. Ɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte ɓaka ɗiki pɛmɔ nyɛ.
Yaka nɔ, wɛtɛ mbam te ɛ ɓa̧ kɛ kɔnɔ nɛ ŋgbelele kɔ ɓa̧ womɛte kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus.
Ɛ Yesus diyɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe duwa̧ mɛmboŋga nɛ̀ Ɓefarisɛ̧ nde: «’Yo ka kimɔte nde, mumɔ sîɗyikwɛ kɔn mumɔ kɛ yesɔ Saba?»
Ɛ ɓo ɗiyɛ nɛ sɛm kinɛ yeŋsa yaŋa na. Ndana, ɛ Yesus sambile ɓɔ kpokɛ nɛ mbam kɔ siɗyɛ kɔn nɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde, a kwâŋ.
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Kɛ njoka yun ɓe ɗiyɛ waka ɓaka, nda yakama ɓɛŋɛ nɛ misi nde, mɔnɔ wenɛ ho taɓɔ wenɛ ɓalma kɛ mɔy guka kɛ yesɔ Saba, a má ɗiyɔ kinɛ ɓiye nyɛ saɓɛ ɓekɛ ɓekɛ kɔ?»
Ɓo tì yeŋsa sendi yaŋa nyɛ nyɛ kɛ diyan te yite na.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus ɓɛŋɛ nde, ɓotu ɓete yi ɓo jeɓama nde, ɓo njâki ɗyena ɓaka kɛ sawɛ bosa mɛmbɛy. Ɛ nyɛ nyɛ ɓo kanɔ nde:
«Ŋgɛ mumɔ kelɛ jesɔ gwaki jeɓa wɛ nde: Inja ɗiyɔ kɛte, wɛ tî ɗiy kɛ bosa mbɛy na, simande ɓo jeɓama wɛtɛ mɔ te ɛ kwaŋma wɛ kɔ.
Wɛ tî ɗiy kɛ bosa mbɛy na, kambɔ ma mɔ te ɛ jeɓama wunɛ hɛnɛ yiɓa kɔ mɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛ nde: ‹Tɛma, nyɛ mbam te yɔkɔ mbɛy,› yite njɔn ta ɓiye wɛ komɛ wɛ ta tɛmɛ kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ kɛ mbɛy te yi njimɛ kɛ́.

Yo nde, ŋgɛ mumɔ jeɓa wɛ kɛ jesɔ, kwaŋgɔ yɔ kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ kɛ mbɛy te yi njimɛ, simande komɛ mɔ te ɛ jeɓama wɛ kɔ ta nje kɛ́, a ta lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛ nde: ‹Sɔ mbɛ, kɛn ɗiyɔ mbɔmbu,› yite ta nyɛ wɛ mɛluksa kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe wúnɛ ɓo ta ɗyena ɓaka.
Yo nde: Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ ɓendiɗye yotu kɛnjɛ kwey, ɓo ta piɗyɛ nyɛ kɛnjɛ nji̧. Yasi wɛtɛ, yɔkɔ ɛ piɗyɛ yotu nɛ kɛnjɛ nji̧, ɓo ta ɓendiɗye nyɛ kɛnjɛ kwey.»

Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ mɔ te ɛ jeɓama nyɛ kɔ nde: «Ŋgɛ wɛ kelɛ mɛɗye yí jeɓa nɛ ɓomɔ kɛ ɓembe yesɔ ho ɓekoko, wɛ tî jeɓaŋgwɛ ɓesɔ ɓɔ ho ɓemɔŋ ho ɓejaɗyɛ ɓɔ ho ɓotu ɓe kusuku ɓe ɗiyɛ kɛ kɛki yɔ ɓaka na, kambɔ ɓo mɛ nje jeɓa sendi wɛ wɛtɛ yesɔ yí yɔkiɗye kiya yasi te yi wɛ kelma nyɛ ɓo kɛ́ nyɛ wɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ wɛ kelɛ jesɔ yí jeɓa nɛ ɓomɔ nɛ mɛɗye, jeɓaŋgwɛ buka ɓomɔ, jeɓa ɓotu ɓe kɔsu nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe ndɛmbil nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe ɗiɓina misi.
Ŋgɛ wɛ kelɛ ɗete, wɛ ta ɓɛ nɛ mɛsosa, kɛto ɓo tí ɓɛ nɛ yasi te yi ɓo ta yɔkiɗye nɔ nyɛ wɛ na. Yo ndi nde, Njambiyɛ ta yɔkiɗye yo nyɛ wɛ kɛ yesɔ te yi ŋgbeŋ ɓomɔ ta womiyɛ nɔ kɛ́.»
Kɛ wɛtɛ mɔ te yi ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ ɗyena kɔ ma wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi Yesus lɛpima kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mɔ te ɛ ta ɗyena kɛ *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ kɔ nɛ mɛsosa.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛtɛ mbam komsama ɓuɗya mɛɗye yí jeɓa nɛ ɓuɗya ɓomɔ.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ mɛɗye ma ɗya̧ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tomɛ mɔ mɛsay wenɛ kɛ̀ jeɓa nɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nyɛ jeɓama ɓaka yí lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: ‹Wunɛ njâki, kɛto mɛyasi hɛnɛ mɛgweya̧ kombilate.›

Yasi wɛtɛ, mumɔ hɛnɛ kɛ njoka yan lɛpima ndi nda jakɔsɔ nde, ɓo ɓɛ̂ŋa nyɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ, kɛto a ti yaka kɛ̀ na. Bosa mumɔ lɛpima nyɛ mɔ mɛsay nde: ‹Mi ɓɔmma yiŋa pɛl mɛnɛti, yo kɛ diyɛ nde, mi kɛ̂n kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ yo, ɗete ɓɛŋa mi nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ.›
Ɛ wɛtɛ lɛpɛ nɛ nde: ‹Mi ɓɔmma ɓenday kamɔ yi mɛsay, mi kɛ kɛ̀ ɓoɓɛ ɗeti yan, ɗete ɓɛŋa mi nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ.›
Mbaŋa nja̧ lɛpɔ nɛ nde: ‹Mi ɓóŋ nyari ndi kwey kwey, ɗete mi ti yaka kɛ̀ na.›

Ɛ mɔ mɛsay kɔ yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ yekiɗye mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋnama kɛ́ nyɛ masa wenɛ. Ndana, ɛ masa wokɛ ŋgambi ɓuɗyate. Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ mɔ mɛsay wenɛ nde: ‹Kɛn nɛdɔ kɛ nyaŋgwɛ sɛ̧ nɛ̀ kɛ ɓoku mɛnje kɛ mɔy ɗya, nɛ̀ wɛ ɓôŋ buka ɓomɔ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɔsu nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nɛ ɗiɓina misi ɓaka nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe ndɛmbil nje nɔ.›
Mɔ mɛsay ka̧ yɔkwɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ masa wenɛ nde: ‹Mi ma kelɔ nda yi wɛ lɛpima nyɛ mi kɛ́, yasi wɛtɛ, mɛmbɛy ndi kɛte.›
Ndana, ɛ masa lɛpɛ nyɛ mɔ mɛsay te nde: ‹Kɛn kɛ ɓoku mɛnje, nɔ̀ gôŋgilaŋgwɛ nɛ mɛndoko, nɔ̀ kêl nde, ɓomɔ njâki, nɛ́ tu̧ ɗyembɛ tondu.›
Yasi wɛtɛ, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Kɛ ɓɛ bosa ɓotu ɓete ɓe mi jeɓama ɓaka, wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tí kpokɛ mɛɗye mɛmbɛ na.»
Nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ ɓa̧ kɛ kɛndɔ ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus. Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa ɓɛŋɛ ɓo lɛpɔ nde:

«Ŋgɛ mumɔ nje kɛ yembɛ, na ɓɛ jekɛ wombɛ, a sôŋa temɔ kɛ yotu saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ, soŋɛ temɔ kɛ yotu nyari ɓenɛ ɓɔnɔ nɛ̀ kɛ yotu ɓemaŋ ɓe ɓembam nɛ̀ ɓeɗyɔmbu, soŋɛ sendi temɔ kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ.
Sendi, ŋgɛ mumɔ ti soɓɛ kroa nɛ ɓeŋgwɛ mi na, mɔ te ti yaka ɓɛ jekɛ wombɛ na, kɛto
nda kɛ njoka yun, ŋgɛ nyɛ kwaɗyɛ sumɔ doŋgbe doŋgbe tu̧, a má ɗiyɔ kinɛ pa nɛmbɛ yí duwɛ yasi te yi nyɛ yakama kwaŋɗye, yí ɓɛŋɛ, simande a nɛ ɓuyɔ sumba yí siɗyɛ nɛ mɛsay mɛte kɔ?
A ta pa kelɔ ɗete, ma nje ɓɛ nde, a kânda mɛsay kinɛ nje ɓɛ se nɛ ɗeti te yi siɗyɛ na. Ŋgɛ nyɛ kelɛ ɗete, ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ta ɓɛŋɛ ɓaka ta nyɛtɔ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde:
‹Mbam te yɔkɔ kandima njumɔ nje suɗyɛ.›
Ɗete sendi, yo kumande te nda, ŋgɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ kɛ lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ wɛtɛ kumande, a má ɗiyɔ kinɛ pa nɛmbɛ yí ɓɛŋɛ, simande a yakama ɓu̧ ɓesɔja tomay kamɔ kɛ̀ lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ yɔkɔ ɛ nɛ ɓesɔja tomay kaɓa kɔ?
Ŋgɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ nde, yo ti yaka na, a má tomɔ ɓomɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi yɔru ndi lɔndunate kɛ́ kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde, ɓo kêl mbon, nɛ́ ɓo ɗiy nɛ tɛ.
Ɗete sendi, ŋgɛ mumɔ hɛnɛ kɛ njoka yun ti soŋɛ temɔ kɛ mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ nɔ kɛ́, mɔ te ti yaka ɓɛ jekɛ wombɛ na.
«Yo gbate nde, kwa kimɔ yasi. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ŋgɛ kwa si lenjɔ, ɓo ta kelɔ nan nje yɔkiɗye nɛ somte?
Yo tí kelɔ se nde, mɛnɛti ho kundu jôŋgwɛ mbɛki na. Ɓo ɓóŋ yo li̧ kɛ sɛ̧. Mɔ te ɛ nɛ mɛtɔ te yí wokɔ nɛ pɛ̧, a wôku!»
Ɓotu ɓe ɓoŋna mɔni garama hɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ ɗikima nje kɛ kɛki Yesus yí nje wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ.
*Ɓefarisɛ̧ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi nyiŋgilama lɛpɔ nde: «Mbam kɔ kɛ ɓu̧ ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ nɛ mɛsosa, kwa̧ ɗyena sendi ɓenɛ ɓo.»
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Yesus nyɛ ɓo kanɔ nde:

«Kɛ njoka yun, ŋgɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ ɓɛ nɛ ɓesam gɔmay, ŋgɛ wɛtɛ ɗimbiyɛ, a kél nan? ’A ti páŋ tikɔ ɓesam kamɔtan jɔ kamɔni jɔ yitan jɔ yini te ɓari kɛ mbɛy mɛɗye kwa̧ kɛ̀ sa̧ yɔkɔ ɛ ɗimbiya kɔ kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ dolɛ nyɛ kɛ́ na?
Komɛ nyɛ si dolɔ nyɛ kɛ́, ’a ti sóɓa nyɛ nyɛ kɛ ɓɛkɔ nɛ nɛ mɛsosa na?
Kɛ nyɛ yɔkwɛ kumɔ tu̧, a má jeɓa ɓesɔ ɓenɛ nɛ̀ ɓembam ɓete ɓe ɗiyɛ kɛ kɛki nɛ ɓaka lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: ‹Wusɛ sôsaŋgwɛ, kɛto mi dolma sam wombɛ ɛ ɗimbiya kɔ.›

Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ɗete sendi, mɛsosa ɓɛ́ki ɓuɗyate kɛ ɗyoɓɔ, kɛto mɔ mɛɓeyɔ wɛtɛ ɛ yeŋsa temɔ kɔ. Mɛsosa mɛte kwa̧ yikɛ yi ɓɛŋna kɛto ɓomɔ kamɔtan jɔ kamɔni jɔ yitan jɔ yini ɓe nɛ ŋgbeŋ ɓe yeti kɛ diyɛ nde, ɓo yêŋsaŋgwɛ temɔ ɓaka.»
«Ho nde, ŋgɛ wɛtɛ nyari ɓɛ nɛ sule kamɔ, ŋgɛ wɛtɛ ɗimbiyɛ, a kél nan? A kwénja lambo wɔmbile tu̧ sa̧ kimɔte kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ dolɛ yo kɛ́.
Komɛ nyɛ si dolɔ kɛ́, a má jeɓa ɓesɔ ɓenɛ nɛ̀ ɓoma ɓete ɓe ɗiyɛ kɛ kɛki nɛ ɓaka lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: ‹Wusɛ sôsaŋgwɛ, kɛto mi dolma sule wombɛ ɛ ɗimbiya kɔ.›
Ɗete sendi, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ wóku mɛsosa ɓuɗyate, ndi kɛto mɔ mɛɓeyɔ wɛtɛ ɛ yeŋsa temɔ kɔ.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ sendi nde: «Wɛtɛ mbam ɓa̧ nɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓembam yiɓa.
Ɛ ndɛmbi te lɛpɛ nyɛ saŋgwɛ nde: ‹Saŋmbɛ, nyɛkɔ mi ŋgaɓiyɛ mɛyasi mɛte yembɛ.› Ɛ saŋgwɛ wan kaɓɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi nyɛ ɓa̧ nɔ kɛ́ nyɛ ɓo.
Mɔnɔ mɛtu kwaŋma kɛ kɔŋte nɛ mbɛt, ɛ ndɛmbi te dokɛ mɛyasi mɛnɛ hɛnɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ lɔndunate kɛ wɛtɛ mɛnɛti. Kumɔ mate, ɛ nyɛ si kwaŋɗye kusuku nɛ kɛ nyɛm nyɛm joŋgwɛ.
Kɛ nyɛ ma si kwaŋɗye yo ɗete kɛ́, yaka nɔ, nyaŋgwɛ kolɔ kɛ ɗya̧ kɛ mɛnɛti mɛte, ɛ yasi hɛnɛ kandɛ ɓanna nɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ diyɛ mɛsay kɛ ɓɔ wɛtɛ mbam mate. Ɛ mbam te kɛnjɛ nyɛ kɛ ɓakiɗya ɓeaɓem ɓenɛ kɛ mɔy lɔ̧.
Mɔnɔ mbam kɔ gɔruma ɗye mɛmbumɔ mɛte yi ɓeaɓem ɗikima ɗye kɛ́. Ko ɗete, mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì nyɛ nyɛ yaŋa na.
Ndana, ɛ nyɛ kandɛ takina yasi lɛpɔ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ nde: ‹Ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ɓe saŋmbɛ hɛnɛ nɛ ɓuɗya mɛɗye kwa̧ to te, mi mbɛ waka kɛ gwe nja.
Mi ta tɛmɛ yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ pɛ yi saŋmbɛ. Mi ta lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: Saŋmbɛ, mi ma kelɔ ɓeyate ɓuɗyate kɛ mbɔmbu Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ kɛ mbɔmbu wɔ.
Wɛ ti yaka jeɓa se mi nde mɔnɔ wɔ na. Kelɔ nɛ mi nda yi wɛ kelɛ nɛ wɛtɛ mɔ mɛsay wɔ kɛ.›
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ yí yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ pɛ yi saŋgwɛ.
«A ɓa̧ ndi lɔndunate, ɛ saŋgwɛ ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ gwe ŋgwɛtɛ wenɛ sɛɗyɛ kɛ̀ wuse nyɛ kwa̧ dulɔ numbu nɛ.
Ɛ mɔnɔ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Saŋmbɛ, mi ma kelɔ ɓeyate ɓuɗyate kɛ mbɔmbu Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ kɛ mbɔmbu wɔ. Wɛ ti yaka jeɓa se mi nde mɔnɔ wɔ na.›
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, saŋgwɛ lɛpima nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ɓenɛ nde: ‹Wunɛ njâki nɛdɔ nɛ lambɔ te ɛ laŋma nyɔŋɔ kwa̧ ɓɛsɔ kɔ nje lɛnje nyɛ. Wunɛ nyɛ̂ki bolo kɛ ɓɔ nɛ, lɛnje sendi nyɛ mɛnakala kɛ mɛkol.
Wunɛ kɛ̂n ɓu̧ mɔnɔ nday te ɛ nɛ mutɔ kɔ nje wo. Wusɛ ɗyênaŋgwɛ, nɛ̀ wusɛ sôsaŋgwɛ,
kɛto mɔnmbɛ kɔ gwa̧, ndana a womiya. A ɗimbiya, ndana hɛ dolma nyɛ.› Ɛ ɓo kandɛ jesɔ.
«Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite tomba te ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgwaŋ. Kɛ nyɛ ma yɔkwɛ wuta nɛ tu̧ kɛ́ a wóku ɓomɔ kɛ mɛndɛ mɛndumɔ ɓɔlɔ jesɔ.
Ɛ nyɛ jeɓa wɛtɛ mɔ mɛsay diyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Ŋge yi kwaŋna woŋga kɛ́?›
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Mɔŋ yɔkwa̧, ɗete sɔŋgwɛ woma mɔnɔ nday te ɛ nɛ mutɔ kɔ, kɛto mɔnɔ ɗyaŋma nɛ tɛ.›
Tomba mɔy wokuma ŋgambi kinɛ kwaɗyɛ nyiŋɛ tu̧ na. Ɛ saŋgwɛ pundɛ kɛ̀ ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ nde, a nyîŋa tu̧.

Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ saŋgwɛ nde: ‹Pa ɓɛŋɛ, mi kɛ kelɔ mɛsay nyɛ wɛ waka ɓuɗya mɛsew. Mi tì yɛliyɛ yiŋa lɛpi kɛ numbu yɔ wɛtɛ yesɔ na. Ko gbɛla mɔnɔ taɓɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ, wɛ tì nyɛ mi nde, mi wôku ɗye sosa nɔ sinɛ ɓesɔ ɓembɛ na.
Ɓɛŋa nde, mɔnɔ wɔ ɛ ma sambɔ mɛyasi mɔ ɓenɛ ɓoma ɗyaŋma kɛ́, wɛ kɛ nje wo mɔnɔ nday te ɛ nɛ mutɔ kɔ nyɛ nyɛ ɗye.›
Ɛ saŋgwɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Mɔnmbɛ, sinɛ wɛ waka mɛtu hɛnɛ. Mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi mi nɔ, yo yɔ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, yakama nde, wusɛ sôsaŋgwɛ kelɔ jesɔ, kɛto mɔŋ kɔ gwa̧, ndana a womiya. A ɗimbiya, ndana hɛ dolma nyɛ.› »
Yesus ka̧ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde: «Wɛtɛ mumɔ ɓa̧ nɛ kusuku ɓuɗyate. A ɓa̧ nɛ mɔ ɓakiɗya kusuku nɛ. Ɛ ɓomɔ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde, mɔ ɓakiɗya kusuku nɛ kɛ sambɔ yo.
Ɛ nyɛ jeɓa nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: ‹Yo kwalɔ yasi te nda yi mi wokɛ ɓomɔ lɛpɛ nɛ ɗinɔ ɗyɔ kɛ́? Lɛpɔ kasi mɛsay mɛ ɓakiɗya kusuku mbɛ yi wɛ kelma kɛ́, kɛto wɛ tí kɛ̀ se mbɔmbu yí kelɔ mɛsay mɛte na.›

Ɛ mɔ ɓakiɗya kusuku kɔ lɛpɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ nde: ‹Mi ta kelɔ nan, kɛto masa wombɛ kɛ soŋɛ mi kɛ mɛsay mɛ ɓakiɗya kusuku nɛ. Mi yeti nɛ ɗeti te yi putike mɛnɛti na. Njɔn jɔmbuna yasi kɛ ɓɔ ɓomɔ kɛ kelɔ mi.›
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: ‹Mi duwa̧ nda yi mi ta kelɔ, nɛ́ ɓomɔ ɓu̧ nɛ mi kimɔte kɛ mɛtu̧ man komɛ ɓo ta soŋɛ mi kɛ mɛsay kɛ́.›
Ndana, ɛ nyɛ jeɓa mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ ɓa̧ nɛ yaŋa ɓenɛ masa wenɛ kɔ. Ɛ nyɛ diyɛ bosa mumɔ nde: ‹Wúnɛ masa wombɛ nɛ niŋgɔ?›
Ɛ mbɛte yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Nyaŋgwɛ mɛmbe mɛmutɔ gɔmay.› Ɛ mɔ ɓakiɗya kusuku lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Ɓoŋgɔ mɛkana mɔ ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ nɛdɔ kɛtɔ nde, yo kamɔtan.›
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ diyɛ wɛtɛ sendi nde: ‹Yɔ ɓa niŋgɔ?› Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: ‹Makɔ yombo gɔmay.› Ɛ mɔ ɓakiɗya kusuku lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Ɓoŋgɔ mɛkana mɔ kɛtɔ nde, yo kamɔtan jɔ kamɔtati.›
Ɛ masa ɓeya mɔ ɓakiɗya kusuku kɔ jayɛ nyɛ kɛto jɛŋ te yi nyɛ kelma kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti ɓaka nɛ jɛŋ kelna mɛkele suŋgwɛ nɛ ɓenjɔŋ ɓan kwa̧ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓeŋgwɛ mɛyasi mɛ Njambiyɛ ɓaka.
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Wunɛ ɓôŋ gbɛla mɛyasi mɛ mɛnɛti maka ɓiye nɛ sɔ wúnɛ ɓomɔ, yaka nɔ, komɛ mɛyasi mɛte ta ɓanɔ wunɛ kɛ́, Njambiyɛ ta ɓu̧ wunɛ tikɔ kɛ mbɛy te yi wunɛ ta ɗiyɔ kɛte kpo nɛ kpo.
Kɛto mɔ te ɛ duwɛ ɓakiɗye mɔnɔ yasi, a yakama duwɛ ɓakiɗye sendi nyaŋgwɛ yasi. Yɔkɔ ɛ seɓile mumɔ kɛ mɔnɔ yasi, a ta seɓile sendi mumɔ kɛ nyaŋgwɛ yasi.
Ɗete, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wunɛ tì duwɛ ɓakiɗya gbɛla mɛyasi mɛ mɛnɛti maka na, nda má nje kaŋɛ sulna mɛyasi nyɛ wunɛ nde, wunɛ ɓâkiɗya?
Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wunɛ tì duwɛ ɓakiɗya yasi mumɔ na, nda má nje nyɛ wunɛ yasi te yun kɔ?
Kiya mɔ mɛsay wɛtɛ ti yaka ɓɛ nɛ ɓemasa yiɓa na. Ho a ta ɓenɔ wɛtɛ, kwaɗyɛ mbaŋa, ho a ta wokuna nɛ wɛtɛ, yɛliyɛ mbaŋa. Wunɛ ti yaka kelɔ mɛsay mɛ Njambiyɛ, ɓeŋgwɛ sendi kasi kusuku na.»
*Ɓefarisɛ̧ ɓa̧ kɛ wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛnɔri hɛnɛ. Ɛ ɓo yisɛ Yesus, kɛto ɓo ɓa̧ nɛ kwaɗya mɔni ɓuɗyate.

Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ nɛ ŋguru wun kɛ ɓu̧ yotu yun kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ nde, wunɛ nɛ ŋgbeŋ. Yasi wɛtɛ, Njambiyɛ duwa̧ yasi te yi kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ mun kɛ́. Wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, yasi te yi ɓomɔ lukse kɛ́, Njambiyɛ ɓɛ́ŋa yo nda ɓi̧ kɛ misi mɛnɛ.

Mɛmboŋga mɛte yi Mɔyisi kɛtima kɛ́ nɛ̀ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpima kɛ́ ɗiyma kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Jaŋ te mɔ tɔpuna ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku. Kɛ kɔŋte, kandɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite, ɓo kɛ lɛpɔ Kimɔ Tom kɛ kasi *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ. Ndana mumɔ hɛnɛ kɛ suŋna, na nyiŋ kɛte nɛ ɗeti hɛnɛ.
Wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, ɗyoɓɔ nɛ̀ mɛnɛti yakama yambile nɛdɔ. Yasi wɛtɛ, kinɛ mɔnɔ yaŋa nɛ mbɛt yakama ɗuwɛ kɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ na.
«Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ soŋɛ ɓɔ nɛ nyari ɓu̧ mbaŋa, yite nyɛ mɔ kelna wanja. Sendi, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ ɓu̧ nya te yi njom soŋma ɓɔ nɛ nyɛ, mɔ te mɔ kelna wanja.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus yekiɗye wɛtɛ kanɔ nde: «Wɛtɛ mbam ɓa̧ nɛ ɓuɗya kusuku. A ɗikima lɛŋɛ kpasa mɛlambɔ mɛte yi ɗye ɓuɗya mɔni. A ɗikima joŋna mɛtu hɛnɛ kɛ nyɛŋgwɛ, komsa ɓuɗya mɛɗye jeɓa nɛ ɓomɔ.
Yo ɓa̧ sendi nɛ wɛtɛ buka mumɔ nde Lasar. A ɓa̧ mɛtinɛŋgwɛ kɛ numɛy mɔ kusuku kɔ. Yotu Lasar ɓa̧ tandɛ mɛpeŋ nɛ fata fata.
A kwaɗya ɗye mɛmbulma mɛɗye mɛte yi ɗikima ɓalɔ wulɛ kɛ teɓel mɔ kusuku kɔ kɛ́. Ko ɓembiye ɗikima nje ɗatɔ mɛpeŋ mɛnɛ.
Ɗiyɔ kɛ́, buka mɔ kɔ nja̧ gwe, ɛ ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ soɓɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ tikɔ kɛ kɛki Abaraham. Mɔ kusuku kɔ nja̧ gwe sendi, ɛ ɓo pumbɛ nyɛ.
A ɓa̧ kɛ saŋgwa nɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛbɔnɛ mate kɛ ɗya ɓemuŋ. Kɛ nyɛ ma kaŋɛ misi kɛ́, a ɓɛ́ŋa kɛnjɛ lɔndunate Lasar kɛ kɛki Abaraham.
Ɛ nyɛ kembiɗya lɛpɔ nde: ‹Saŋsu Abaraham, gwakɔ ŋgwɛtɛ wombɛ. Tomɔ Lasar, a tɔ̂pa toŋ nyɛy nɛ kɛ mɔrɔku nje wɛɗye nɛ ɗyem ɗyembɛ, kɛto mi kɛ saŋgwa nɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛbɔnɛ kɛ lam ɗitɛ te yikɛ.›
Ɛ Abaraham yeŋsa nde: ‹Mɔnmbɛ, taka kimɔte. Wɛ ɓa̧ nɛ kusuku ɓuɗyate kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyɔ, ɛ Lasar saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite. Ndana Lasar mɛ kɛ kimɔ ɗiyɔ woŋga, ma wɛ mɛ yɔ kɛ mɛbɔnɛ.
Yiŋa yasi sendi nde: Nyaŋgwɛ gboŋgo ndoŋ kɛ njoka su sinɛ wunɛ. Ɗete, ŋgɛ ɓomɔ kwaɗyɛ tɛmɛ woŋga yí kɛ̀ wɛri, ɓo ti yaka kwa̧ na. Sendi, ŋgɛ ɓomɔ kwaɗyɛ tɛmɛ wɛri nje woŋga, ɓo ti yaka saɓiyɛ na.›
Ɛ mɔ kusuku kɔ lɛpɛ nde: ‹Saŋsu, nda yo ɗete kɛ́, mi kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ wɛ nde: Tomɔ Lasar kɛnjɛ kɛ yi saŋmbɛ,
kɛto mi nɛ ɓemaŋ ɓembɛ yitan, na kɛ̀ lɛpi yasi te yi nyɛ ɓɛŋma nɛ misi mɛnɛ kɛ́ kimɔte nyɛ ɓo, ma ɓo nje nje sendi kɛ mbɛy nyaŋgwɛ mɛbɔnɛ mɛte yikɛ.›
Ɛ Abaraham yeŋsa nde: ‹Mɛmboŋga mɛte yi Mɔyisi kɛtima kɛ́ nɛ̀ mɛkana mɛ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ mate, ɓo ɓêŋgwɛ yo.›
Ɛ mɔ kusuku lɛpɛ nde: ‹Ko na, Abaraham, saŋsu! Yo nde, ŋgɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ tɛmɛ kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓete ɓe ma gwe ɓaka kɛ̀ pɛ yan, ɓo ta yeŋsa temɔ.›
Ɛ Abaraham nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Ŋgɛ ɓo ti wokɛ mɛn Mɔyisi nɛ̀ mɛn ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ na, ɓo ti yaka jayɛ yiŋa yaŋa na, ko ɓɛkɔ nde, mumɔ wômkwɛ kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo.›
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde: «Yo gba nɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi kelɛ nde, mumɔ jâti kɛ ɓeya nje. Yasi wɛtɛ, mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to mɔ te ɛ kelɛ nde, mɛyasi mɛte ɗyâŋ kɔ.
Yo kimɔte kɛ yi mɔ te nde, ɓo ɓôŋ tari kɔkuna yasi tiŋɔ kɛ ŋgiŋ nɛ kwa̧ ɓetɛ nyɛ kɛ maŋ, laŋsa nde, a kêl yiŋa yasi te yi yakama jatiɗye ko mumɔ wɛtɛ kɛ njoka ɓɔnɔ ɓaka kɛ ɓeya nje.
Wunɛ pɛ̂m mɛkele mun nɛ ŋguru wun. Ŋgɛ mɔŋ kelɛ yiŋa ɓeya yasi suŋgwɛ nɛ wɛ, nɔ̀ ndêya nyɛ. Ŋgɛ nyɛ yeŋsa temɔ kɛ ɓeya yasi te yi nyɛ kelma kɛ́, nɔ̀ tîki nyɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ.

Kɛ ndiŋgɛlɛ yesɔ wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ nyɛ kelɛ ɓeya yasi suŋgwɛ nɛ wɛ mɛŋga yitan jɔ yiɓa, ŋgɛ nyɛ nje sendi mɛŋga yitan jɔ yiɓa lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛ nde: ‹Mi yeŋsama temɔ kɛ ɓeya yasi te yi mi kelma kɛ́,› nɔ̀ tîki nyɛ nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ.»
Ɛ ɓotu ɓe tomun ɓe Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kelɔ nde, wusɛ tîki temɔ nɛ wɛ kwa̧ yikɛ.»

Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Má ɓɛki nde, tikina temɔ te yi wunɛ tikɛ kɛ yembɛ kɛ́ nyaŋgwɛte nda ɗɔkɔ mbumɔ ŋgwal lalɛ, ma wunɛ yakama lɛpɔ nyɛ jeti te yɔkɔ nde: ‹Sûtukwɛ kɛ̀ suma kɛ maŋ,› a má wokɔ mɛn yun.
«Wusɛ pâŋ pa lɛpɔ nde: Wɛtɛ mumɔ kɛ njoka yun nɛ mɔ mɛsay wenɛ ɛ putike ŋgwaŋ nɛ ho ɛ ɓakiɗye ɓetitɛr. Ŋgɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ mɔ mɛsay wenɛ kɛ yɔkwɛ ŋgwaŋ, ’a má lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Inja ɗiyɔ nɛdɔ ɗyena›?
A ta lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Jambinaŋgwɛ nyɛ mi, sɛnjɔ lambɔ, ɓoŋgɔ mɛɗye nje nɔ, nɛ́ mi pa ɗyena hɔɓiye mɛnjam, kɛ kɔŋte, wɛ má nje ɗyena nje hɔɓiye yɔ yɛy.›
’Wunɛ táka ka nde, a ta nyɛ mɔ mɛsay kɔ wosoko, kɛto a kelma yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpima nyɛ nyɛ kɛ́?
Wunɛ sendi, ŋgɛ wunɛ si kelɔ yasi te yi ɓo lɛpima nde, wunɛ kêl kɛ́, nɛ̀ wunɛ njâki lɛpɔ kɛ kɔŋte nde: ‹Wusɛ gbɛla ɓotu ɓe mɛsay, hɛ kelma yasi te yi ɓa̧ nde, wusɛ kêl kɛ́.› »
Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ kɛ̀ kɛ Yerusalɛm. Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ njoka mɛnɛti mɛ Samari nɛ̀ Galile.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ nyiŋɛ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya kɛ́, ɛ ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓe ndoko kamɔ nje saŋgwa nɛ nyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tɛmma nɛ naŋ kembiɗya
lɛpɔ nde: «Yesus yekele, gwakɔ ŋgwɛtɛ wusu.»
Ɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ ɓo lɛpɔ nde: «Wunɛ kɛ̂n kɛ̀ teɗye yotu yun nyɛ ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ.» Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ kɛ̀ kɛ́, ɛ kɔn yan siyɛ.
Kɛ wɛtɛ kɛ njoka yan ma ɓɛŋɛ nde, kɔn nɛ siyma kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ nɛ luksa Njambiyɛ kɛ numbu nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey.
Ɛ nyɛ nje kusɛ mɛɓɔŋ kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus nyɛ nyɛ wosoko. Mɔ te ɓa̧ mɔ Samari.
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nde: «’Ɓo tì ɓɛ ɓomɔ kamɔ yi kɔn yan siyma kɛ́ na? Ɓomɔ yitan jɔ yini te ɓari ɓa we?
Ŋge kelɛ nde, jɛŋgwɛ te yɔkɔ nyɛpɔ yɔ̂kwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ nje lukse Njambiyɛ?»
Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ mɔ Samari kɔ nde: «Tɛma, kwaŋgɔ, tikina temɔ te yi wɛ nɔ kɛ́ joŋgwa wɛ.»
Ɛ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ diyɛ Yesus nde: «*Kandɔ Njambiyɛ ta ɗya̧ ndenɛn?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Kandɔ Njambiyɛ tí ɗya̧ nɛ nje te nde, ɓomɔ ɓɛ̂ŋa na.
Ɓo tí lɛpɔ nde: ‹Kandɔ Njambiyɛ waka ho wari› na. Wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, Kandɔ Njambiyɛ mɛ kɛ njoka yun.»
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓejekɛ nde: «Yo ta ɓɛ nɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wunɛ ta kwaɗyɛ ɗiyɔ ko nɛ mbɛt kɛ yesɔ te yi *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta nje kɛ́. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, wunɛ tí ɓɛŋɛ yesɔ te na.
Ɓomɔ ta lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: ‹Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa, nyɛ waka, nyɛ wari!› Wunɛ tî kɛn na. Wunɛ tî sɛɗyikwɛ ɓeŋgwɛ ɓo na.
Yo nde, njena Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta ɓɛ nda yi yɛsi mbiyɔ yesɛ nɔ nɛ vɛrum, panɔ kandɛ komɛ yesɔ pundɛ kumɔ komɛ yesɔ ɓalɛ kɛ́.
Yasi wɛtɛ, a yâkaŋgwɛ saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ ɓuɗyate. Ɓotu ɓe ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ ta sɛŋɛ nyɛ.
Yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ ŋgimɔ Nɔy kɛ́ ta kwaŋna sendi ɗete kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta nje kɛte kɛ́.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite ɓomɔ ɗikima ɗyena, ɗye mɛnjam, kelɔ mɛgwaki, kɛnjɛ ɓeŋgɔndu ɓan kɛ mɛgwaki kumɔ kɛ yesɔ te yi Nɔy nyiŋma nɔ kɛ mɔy nyaŋgwɛ kuka, ɛ nyaŋgwɛ mbeŋ ɗya̧ girise ɓo hɛnɛ.
Yo ta kwaŋna sendi nda yi yo kwaŋnama nɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ Lɔt kɛ́. Ɓomɔ ɗikima ɗyena, ɗye mɛnjam, ɓɔmɔ mɛyasi, ɗyaŋgwɛ mɛyasi. Ɓo ɗikima ɓɛ mɛnyambi, sumɔ mɛtu̧.
Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ yesɔ te yi Lɔt ɗuwa̧ nɔ kɛ̀ *Sɔdɔm kɛ́, ɛ ɗitɛ nɛ̀ yiŋa lolna mɛtari wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ girise ɓo hɛnɛ.
Yo ta kwaŋna sendi ɗete kɛ yesɔ te yi Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta punjɛ yotu nyɛ ɓomɔ kɛ́.
Yesɔ te mɔ te ɛ ta ɓɛ kɛ tosiyɔ̧ kɔ tî pikwɛ nde, a mɛ kɛ̀ ɓu̧ mɛyasi mɛnɛ kɛ mɔy tu̧ na. Sendi, mɔ te ɛ ta ɓɛ kɛ ŋgwaŋ kɔ tî yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ ɗya na.
Wunɛ tâka yasi te yi kelnama nɛ nya Lɔt kɛ́.
Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ ta sa̧ nje te yi kambiɗya nɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ kɔ ta ɗimbiɗye yo. Yasi wɛtɛ, yɔkɔ ɛ ta ɗimbiɗye joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ kɔ ta kpalɔ ju̧.
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Kɛ ŋgimɔ te, kɛ njoka ɓomɔ yiɓa ɓe ta ya nɛ tu kɛ kiya taŋ wɛtɛ, a ta ɓu̧ wɛtɛ, tikɔ wɛtɛ.
Kɛ njoka ɓoma yiɓa ɓe ta ŋgbɔ kɔkɔ yasi kɛ tari, a ta ɓu̧ wɛtɛ, tikɔ wɛtɛ.
Kɛ njoka ɓembam yiɓa ɓe ta ɓɛ kɛ kelɔ mɛsay kɛ ŋgwaŋ, a ta ɓu̧ wɛtɛ, tikɔ wɛtɛ.»
Ɛ ɓejekɛ diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo ta kwaŋna we, Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande?» Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Kɛ mbɛy komɛ muŋ yasi ɗiyɛ kɛ́, ɓedaɓo wésiɗyaŋgwɛ womɛte.»
Yesus yekiɗya wɛtɛ kanɔ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ yí teɗye ɓo nde, ɓo yâkaŋgwɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ mɛtu hɛnɛ kinɛ katɔ na.
A yekiɗya nde: «Wɛtɛ mɔ pɛsina jɔsi ɓa̧ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya. A tì ɓɛ kɛ kambɔ Njambiyɛ na. Sendi, yeti kasi nɛ nɛ mumɔ na.
Wɛtɛ kusɔ nyari ɓa̧ kɛ ɗya te. A ɗikima nje mɛŋgimɔ hɛnɛ kɛ yi mɔ pɛsina jɔsi kɔ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Pɛsɔ jɔsi kɛ njoka mbɛ sinɛ mɔ mɛlɛpi wombɛ.›
Mɛŋgimɔ kwaŋma ɓuɗyate, mɔ pɛsina jɔsi tì kwaɗyɛ na. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ nde: ‹Mi kɛ duwɛ gbate nde, mi yeti kɛ kambɔ Njambiyɛ na. Sendi, mi yeti nɛ kasi nɛ mumɔ na.
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, mi ta pɛsɔ lɛpi kusɔ nya kɔ, kɛto a kɛ njaŋgwɛ mi. Mi ta pɛsɔ lɛpi nɛ, kɛto a ta potɔ to mbɛ nɛ njenate mɛtu hɛnɛ.› »
Ɛ Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Wunɛ wôku ndi yasi te yi ɓeya mɔ pɛsina jɔsi kɔ lɛpima kɛ́.

’Wunɛ táka gbate nde, Njambiyɛ ta ɗiyɔ ka kinɛ pɛsɔ lɛpi kɛto ɓotu ɓete ɓe nyɛ ma tɔkɛ ɓaka yí kamɛ nɛ ɓo? ’A ta ɗiyɔ ka kinɛ pɛsɔ lɛpi kɛto ɓotu ɓete ɓe ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ tu nɛ yesɔ ɓaka? ’A ta linja kinɛ pɛsɔ ka lɛpi nɛdɔ kɛto yan yí kamɛ nɛ ɓo?
Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: A ta pɛsɔ lɛpi nɛdɔ kɛto yan yí kamɛ nɛ ɓo.» Yesus siɗya lɛpɔ nde: Komɛ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta nje kɛ́, ’a ta kweɗya ka ɓomɔ kɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ Njambiyɛ?»
A ka̧ mbɔmbu yekiɗye sendi wɛtɛ kanɔ, kɛto ɓotu ɓete ɓe lɛpɛ gba nde, ɓo nɛ ŋgbeŋ nje kpalɔ yɛliyɛ ɓɛsɔ ɓaka.
A yekiɗya nde: «Ɓembam yiɓa tɛmma kɛ̀ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ yí kɛ̀ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ. Wɛtɛ ɓa̧ mɔ *Farisɛ̧, wɛtɛ ɓa̧ mɔ ɓoŋna mɔni garama.

Mɔ Farisɛ̧ tɛmma tɛma lɛpɔ nyɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ nde: ‹Njambiyɛ wombɛ, mi kɛ nyɛ wɛ wosoko, kɛto mi yeti nda ɓaŋa ɓomɔ na. Ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓe ŋgaŋ, ɓaŋa kɔtu ɓomɔ, ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓe kelna wanja. Wosoko, kɛto mi yeti nda mɔ ɓoŋna mɔni garama te yɔkɔ na.
Kɛ mɔy sɔndi wɛtɛ mi kíy mɛɗye mɛŋga yiɓa. Kɛ mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi mi sɔmbɛ, mi ɓáka yo kɛ mɛŋgaɓiyɛ kamɔ kamɔ, ɓu̧ ŋgaɓiyɛ kwalɔ mɛyasi mɛte wɛtɛ wɛtɛ nyɛ wɛ Njambiyɛ.›

Yasi wɛtɛ, mɔ ɓoŋna mɔni garama kwaŋma nɛ kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ nɛ naŋ. A tì ɓoɓɛ kaŋɛ misi nɛ mbɛt kɛnjɛ kwey na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a kpoma ɓɔ kɛ ɓeti lɛpɔ nde: ‹Njambiyɛ wombɛ, soŋa ŋgambi yɔ kɛ to mbɛ, mi mɔ mɛɓeyɔ.› »

Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nde: «Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Mbam kɔ ɗuwa̧ kɛ̀ tu̧ ɗyenɛ nɛ temɔ nɛ tɛ, kɛto Njambiyɛ pɛsima nde, a mɛ nɛ ŋgbeŋ kɛ mbɔmbu wenɛ, soŋɛ mɔ Farisɛ̧. Kɛto mɔ te ɛ ɓendiɗye yotu kɛnjɛ kwey, Njambiyɛ ta piɗyɛ nyɛ kɛnjɛ nji̧. Ma yɔkɔ ɛ piɗyɛ yotu kɛnjɛ nji̧, Njambiyɛ ta ɓendiɗye nyɛ kɛnjɛ kwey.»
Ɓomɔ ɓoŋma sɛkɛ sɛkɛ ɓɔnɔsikɛ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ yi Yesus, na kpoki ɓo, yí nyɛ ɓo mɛkombila. Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ ɓejekɛ ma ɓɛŋɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɓama nɛ ɓotu ɓete.
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde, ɓo ɓôŋ ɓɔnɔsikɛ kɛ̀ nɔ. Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nde: «Nɛ tîki, nɛ́ ɓɔnɔsikɛ nje kɛ yembɛ. Nɛ tî peti ɓo na, kɛto *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ wókunaŋgwɛ nɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nda ɓɔnɔsikɛ ɓaka.
Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ŋgɛ mumɔ ti jayɛ Kandɔ Njambiyɛ nda mɔnɔsikɛ na, a tí nyiŋɛ kɛte na.»
Wɛtɛ yesɔ wɛtɛ kum Ɓeyudɛn diyma Yesus nde: «Kimɔ yekele, mi kêl nan, nɛ́ mi ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kɛto ŋge yi wɛ jeɓa mi nde kimɔ mumɔ kɛ́? Kɛto kinɛ kimɔ mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ na, ndi Njambiyɛ nyɛpɔ.
Wɛ ma duwɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ, yo nde: ‹Kpɛ, wɛ tî kel wanja na. Wɛ tî woku mumɔ na. Wɛ tî guɓu na. Wɛ tî pɛsi lɛpi nyɛ kɛ numbu mumɔ na. Jɛsɔ sɔŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyɔŋgwɛ.› »
Ɛ mbam yeŋsa nde: «Mi kɛ ɓakiɗye mɛyasi mɛnɔri hɛnɛ kandɛ nɛ mɔnɔsikɛ.»

Kɛ Yesus ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɓukwa̧ yasi wɛtɛ yi wɛ tì pa kelɔ kɛ́, yo nde: Kɛn ɗyaŋgwɛ mɛyasi mɔ hɛnɛ, nɔ̀ ɓôŋ mɔni te kaɓɔ nyɛ buka ɓomɔ. Ɗete, wɛ ta ɓɛ nɛ kusuku kɛ ɗyoɓɔ. Kɛ kɔŋte, nɔ̀ ɓêŋgwɛ mi.»
Kɛ mbam kɔ ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ wokɛ ŋgambi ɓuɗyate, kɛto a ɓa̧ nɛ ɓuɗya kusuku.
Kɛ Yesus ma ɓɛŋɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Yo gba sulnate kɛ yi ɓotu ɓe kusuku nde, ɓo nyîŋa kɛ *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ.
Yo jɛwnate nde, nyaŋgwɛ nyamɔ nda *samo yakama kwa̧ lalɛ nɛdɔ kɛ njɛmbi alula nɛ̀ nde, mɔ kusuku nyîŋa kɛ Kandɔ Njambiyɛ.»
Ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ wokɔ yasi te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ kɛ́ nja̧ diyɛ nde: «Ma ŋgɛ ɓɛ ɗete, nda yakama ju̧ kɔ?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Yasi te yi ɓomɔ yeti nɛ ɗeti te yi kelɔ, Njambiyɛ nɛ ɗeti te yi kelɔ yo.»
Ɛ Piyɛr lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɓɛŋa, wusɛ ma tikɔ su mɛyasi musu hɛnɛ ɓeŋgwɛ wɛ.»
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ŋgɛ mumɔ tikɛ tu̧ ɗyenɛ, tikɔ nyari ho ɓemaŋ ho saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ, tikɔ ɓɔnɔ kɛto *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ,
mɔ te ta ɓɛ nɛ mɛyasi mɛte yinɔri kɛ ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ kwa̧ yi mbɔmbu. A ta ɓɛ sendi nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo kɛ mɛtu mɛte yi ta nje kɛ́.»

Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ jeɓa ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa, wusɛ ɓe ɓendɛ kɛ̀ pɛ Yerusalɛm ɓaka: Mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛtima kɛ kasi *Mɔnɔ mumɔ kɛ́ ta kelna gbate.
Ɓo ta ɓu̧ nyɛ kaŋɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe yeti kɛ duwɛ Njambiyɛ ɓaka. Ɓo ta nyɛtɔ nyɛ, tɔyɛ nyɛ, sa mɛsɛri kɛ yotu nɛ,
njurɔ nyɛ nɛ njambala. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɓo má wo nyɛ, a má nje womiyɛ kɛ mɛtu yitati.»
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓejekɛ tì wokɛ yaŋa kɛ yasi te yi Yesus lɛpima kɛ́ na. To te ɓa̧ sɔɗyate nɛ ɓo, ɓo tì ɓiye to lɛpi te na.
Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ wuta nɛ Yeriko. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite wɛtɛ mɔ ɗiɓina misi ɓa̧ kɛ ɗiyɔ kɛ kɛki nje. A ɗikima jɔmbɔ mɛyasi kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ ɓomɔ.
Kɛ nyɛ ma wokɔ ŋgil ɓomɔ kɛ kwa̧ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ diyɛ to te.
Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo Yesus te, mɔ ɗya Nasarɛt kwa̧.»
Kɛ nyɛ ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kembɛ nde: «Yesus, mɔnɔ Davit, gwakɔ ŋgwɛtɛ wombɛ.»
Ɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ mbɔmbu ɓaka ɓamɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde, a ɗîɓi numbu. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, a nja̧ kembɔ kwa̧ to te nde: «Mɔnɔ Davit, gwakɔ ŋgwɛtɛ wombɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus tɛmɛ lɛpɔ nde, ɓo ɓôŋ nyɛ kɛ̀ nɔ. Kɛ mɔ ɗiɓina misi ma wuta nɛ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ diyɛ nyɛ nde:
«Wɛ kwáɗyikwɛ nde, mi kêl ŋge nyɛ wɛ?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, kelɔ nde, mi ɓɛ̂ŋnaŋgwɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɓɛŋnaŋgwɛ, tikina temɔ te yi wɛ nɔ kɛ́ joŋgwa wɛ.»
Ndana ndana, ɛ nyɛ kandɛ ɓɛŋna yasi ɓeŋgwɛ Yesus nɛ luksa Njambiyɛ kɛ numbu. Kɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte ɓaka ma ɓɛŋɛ yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́, ɛ ɓo lukse Njambiyɛ.
Yesus kɛndima ɗya̧ kɛ Yeriko. A ɓa̧ kɛ kwa̧ nje nɛ nje.
Wɛtɛ mbam nde Sase ɓa̧ kɛ ɗya te. A ɓa̧ kum ɓotu ɓe ɓoŋna mɔni garama. A ɓa̧ sendi mɔ kusuku.
A saŋma nje te yi ɓɛŋɛ mɔ te yi ɓo jeɓa nde Yesus kɔ. Yasi wɛtɛ, a tì ɓɛ nɛ ɗeti te yi ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ na kɛto ŋgil ɓomɔ, kɛto Sase ɓa̧ mɔ ɓotu.
Ɛ nyɛ nje sɛɗyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu kɛ̀ ɓendɔ wɛtɛ jeti nde sikɔmɔr, na ɓɛŋ Yesus, kɛto Yesus yâkaŋgwɛ kwa̧ womɛte.
Kɛ Yesus ma kumɔ womɛte kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ Sase lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Pikwɛ nɛdɔ, kɛto muka mi yâkaŋgwɛ ya kɛ tu̧ ɗyɔ.»
Ɛ Sase piyɛ ɓekɛ ɓekɛ ɓu̧ Yesus nɛ mɛsosa.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɓɛŋma mɛyasi mɛte ɓaka nyiŋgilama lɛpɔ nde: «A ka̧ ya kɛ yasi mɔ mɛɓeyɔ.»

Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Sase tɛmɛ kɛ mbɔmbu Kumande Yesus lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, wokɔ. Mi ta ɓakɛ kusuku mbɛ kɛ ɓembe, ɓu̧ ŋgaɓiyɛ te wɛtɛ nyɛ buka ɓomɔ. Sendi, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, mi seɓila mumɔ, ɓu̧ nɛ yaŋa kɛ ɓɔ nɛ, mi ta yɔkiɗye yo mɛŋga yini nyɛ nyɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus nje yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɓotu ɓe tu̧ ɗyɔ mɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ muka, kɛto wɛ sendi nday Abaraham,
kɛto *Mɔnɔ mumɔ njáki nje sa̧ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ma ɗimbiyɛ ɓaka joŋgwɛ ɓo.»
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓomɔ ɓa̧ kɛ wokɔ yasi te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu yekiɗye wɛtɛ kanɔ nyɛ ɓo. Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ wuta nɛ Yerusalɛm. Ɛ ɓomɔ takɛ nde, *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ ta ɗya̧ ndana ndana.
A yekiɗya kanɔ te nde: «Wɛtɛ mbam jaɗya kɛ yiŋa kandɔ ɓekumande. Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ lɔndunate kɛ wɛtɛ mɛnɛti kɛ ɓoŋna ɗiyɔ kumande. Kɛ nyɛ si ɓu̧ ɗiyɔ kumande, a má nje yɔkwɛ.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ kwaŋge ɛ nyɛ jeɓa ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ɓenɛ kamɔ, nyɛ ɓo sule lɔr kamɔ lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: ‹Wunɛ ɗɔ̂kwɛ yo kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mi ta yɔkwɛ kɛ́.›
Ɓotu ɓe ɗya ɗyenɛ ɗikima ɓenɔ nyɛ. Ɛ ɓo tomɛ ɓomɔ kɛnjɛ kɛ kɔŋ nɛ kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyaŋgwɛ kumande ɗya te nde: ‹Wusɛ yeti kɛ kwaɗyɛ nde, mbam kɔ ɗîy nɛ wusɛ na.›
«Ndana, kɛ nyɛ ma yɔkwɛ kɛ ɓoŋna ɗiyɔ Kumande kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde, ɓo jêɓaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ɓete ɓe nyɛ nya ɓo mɔni ɓaka. A kwaɗya duwɛ nda yi mumɔ hɛnɛ ɗɔkwa nɛ yenɛ kɛ́.
Ɛ bosa mumɔ ɗya̧ lɛpɔ nde: ‹Kumande, sule lɔr wɔ punja sule lɔr kamɔ.›
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Kimɔ yaŋa, wɛ mɔ mɛsay te yi ɓo yakama ɓɛ nɛ ɓiɓina temɔ nɛ nyɛ. Nda yi wɛ duwa̧ ɓakiɗye yasi te yi nɛ mbɛt, mi kɛ nyɛ wɛ mɛɗya kamɔ nde, ɗiyɔ nɔ.›
Ɛ mumɔ yiɓate nje lɛpɔ nde: ‹Kumande, sule lɔr wɔ punja sule lɔr yitan.›
Ɛ Kumande lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Wɛ sendi, ɗiyɔ nɛ mɛɗya yitan.›
Ɛ mumɔ yitatite nje lɛpɔ nde: ‹Kumande, sule lɔr wɔ kɔ. Mi ɓɔyma yo nɛ kum lambɔ sɔɗyɛ.
Mi gwa̧ wɔ̧ yɔ, kɛto wɛ nɛ nyanɔ ɓuɗyate. Wɛ ɓóŋ yasi kinɛ yaŋa te yi wɛ paŋma komɔ na. Wɛ ndɛ́m mɛɗye kinɛ mbɛki te yi wɛ paŋma ɓɛ na.›

Ɛ Kumande lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Wɛ ɓeya mɔ mɛsay. Mi ta pɛsɔ lɛpi yɔ ɓeŋgwɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi punduma kɛ numbu yɔ kɛ́. Wɛ duwa̧ nde, mi nɛ nyanɔ ɓuɗyate. Mi ɓóŋ yasi kinɛ yaŋa te yi mi paŋma komɔ na. Mi ndɛ́m mɛɗye kinɛ mbɛki te yi mi paŋma ɓɛ na.
Ŋge kelɛ yi wɛ tì ɓu̧ mɔni mbɛ kɛ̀ tikɔ kɛ mbɛy ɗɔkwa te kɛ́? Ŋge yi wɛ ti kelɛ ɗete, simande kɛ yɔkwe mbɛ, mi ta sɔmbɔ liɓa kɛ to te kɛ́?›
Ɛ Kumande lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte ɓaka nde: ‹Wunɛ sûku sule lɔr te yi kɛ ɓɔ nɛ kɛ́ kaŋɛ nyɛ mɔ te ɛ nɛ sule lɔr kamɔ kɔ.›
Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Kumande, mbɛte nɛ sule lɔr kamɔ.›
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: ‹Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ɓo ta dokiɗye yasi nyɛ mɔ te ɛ mɛ nɔ kɔ. Yasi wɛtɛ, pɛ yɔkɔ ɛ kinɛ yaŋa kɔ, ɓo ta sukɔ ko mɔnɔ yasi te yi nyɛ nɔ kɛ́.
Kɛ ɓɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓenɛ mi ɓaka, wunɛ ɓôŋ ɓo nje nɔ, kɛto ɓo tì kwaɗyɛ nde, mi ɗîy nɛ ɓo na. Wunɛ njâki nɛ ɓo waka nje pɛsɔ mɛŋgiŋ man kɛ mbɔmbu wombɛ.› »
Kɛ Yesus ma si lɛpina ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ to njɔŋ kɛndi yí kɛ̀ nɔ Yerusalɛm.
Kɛ nyɛ ma wuta nɛ Betfage nɛ̀ Betani kɛ kɛki *Keki mɛoliviye kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tomɛ ɓaŋa ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ yiɓa

lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ kɛ̂n kɛ ɗya te ɛ kɛ mbɔmbu wun kɔ. Komɛ wunɛ ta nyiŋɛ kɛ mɔy ɗya kɛ́, wunɛ ta dolɔ mɔnɔ tofu tiŋnate. Mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì pa ɗiɗyɛ mɛta mɛnɛ wɛtɛ yesɔ kɛ to nɛ na. Nɛ̀ wunɛ wûnja nyɛ nje nɔ.
Ŋgɛ mumɔ diyɛ wunɛ nde: ‹Wunɛ wúnja nyɛ kɛto ŋge?› nɛ̀ wunɛ yêŋsaŋgwɛ nde: ‹Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande kɛ kwaɗyɛ kelɔ yiŋa yasi nɛ nyɛ.› »
Ɓejekɛ ɓete ɓe nyɛ tomma ɓaka ka̧ kweɗya mɛyasi nda yi nyɛ lɛpima nyɛ ɓo kɛ́.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ wunjɛ mɔnɔ tofu kɛ́, ɛ ɓesa ɓete diyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ wúnja nyɛ kɛto ŋge?»
Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande kɛ kwaɗyɛ kelɔ yiŋa yasi nɛ nyɛ.»
Ɛ ɓo ɓu̧ mɔnɔ tofu kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ yi Yesus, ɓu̧ mɛlambɔ man jonɔ kɛ to nɛ, nje ɓendiɗye nyɛ kɛ to te.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ kwa̧ kɛ́, ɛ ɓomɔ ɓɛ kɛ jonɔ mɛlambɔ man kɛ nje, na kɛndi kɛ to te.
Kɛ nyɛ ma wuta nɛ Yerusalɛm kɛ piya *Keki mɛoliviye kɛ́, ɛ mɛsosa kwa̧ ŋgil ɓejekɛ hɛnɛ. Ɛ ɓo lukse Njambiyɛ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey kɛto nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele hɛnɛ te yi ɓo ɗikima ɓɛŋɛ kɛ́.
Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nde: ‹Mɛkombila nɛ Kumande te ɛ nje nɛ ɗinɔ Baba Mbokɔ kɔ! Tɛte ɓɛ̂ŋnaŋgwɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ nɛ̀ mɛluksa ɓɛ̂ŋnaŋgwɛ kɛ kwey!›
Ɛ ɓaŋa *Ɓefarisɛ̧ ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ mɔy ŋgil yinɔri ɓaka lɛpɛ nyɛ Yesus nde: «Yekele, gayɔ ɓejekɛ ɓɔ.»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ŋgɛ ɓo ɗiɓɛ numbu, mɛtari ta kpalɔ lɛpina nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey.»
Kɛ Yesus ma kumɔ kɛ kɛki Yerusalɛm kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ nɛ ɗya kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kandɛ ɗukwe
lɛpɔ nde: «Yerusalɛm, wɛ má dukwɛ yɔ mɛyasi mɛte yi nyɛ wɛ tɛte kɛ yesɔ te yɔkɔ muka, ma yo gba kimɔte. Yasi wɛtɛ, yo sɔɗyate ndana kɛ misi mɔ.
Kɛto ŋgimɔ ta ɗya̧, ɓependɔ ɓɔ ta sumɔ ndoko litɔ wɛ. Ɓo ta sɛŋgɔ wɛ mɛmbɛy hɛnɛ.
Ɓo ta yaŋgile wɛ wúnɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓɔ ɓetɛ kɛ mɛnɛti. Ɓo tí tikɔ tari wɛtɛ dokiɗyate kɛ to jakɔsɔ na. Yo ta kelna ɗete, kɛto wɛ tì duwɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Njambiyɛ nja̧ ɓɛŋɛ wɛ kɛ́ na.»
Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ nyiŋɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kandɛ ɗuɗya ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ ɗyaŋgwɛ mɛyasi womɛte ɓaka
lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹Tu̧ ɗyembɛ ta ɓɛ tu̧ mɛŋgwɛta.› Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ ma yeŋsa yo nɛ gbaŋ ɓotu ɓe guɓɔ.»
A ɗikima teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ mɛtu hɛnɛ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. Ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi nɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe kandɔ Isarayɛl saŋma nje te yi wo nyɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì duwɛ nda yi ɓo yakama kelɔ kɛ́ na, kɛto ɓomɔ hɛnɛ nya temɔ yan kɛ wokuna mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ.
Wɛtɛ yesɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ teɗye mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpɔ Kimɔ Tom nyɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. Semɔ semɔ, ɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi nɛ̀ ɓetomba ɓe ɗya ɗya̧
diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɗeti te yi wɛ kelɛ nɛ mɛyasi mɛte yikɛ kɛ́ wúla we? Lɛpɔ nyɛ wusɛ. Nda nyɛ wɛ ɗeti nde, kelɔ mɛyasi mɛte?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi sendi, mi ndi nɛ lɛpi wɛtɛ yi mi ta diyɛ wunɛ:
Nda tomɛ Jaŋ nde, a njâki tɔpɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku? Yo Njambiyɛ ho yo ɓomɔ? Wunɛ yêŋsaŋgwɛ nyɛ mi.»
Ɛ ɓo kandɛ mɛdiyna tandɛ yan lɛpɔ nde: «Ŋgɛ wusɛ lɛpɛ nde: Yo Njambiyɛ tomɛ nyɛ, a ta diyɛ wusɛ nde: ‹Ma kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ tì tikɛ temɔ kɛ yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpima kɛ́?›
Ma ŋgɛ wusɛ nje yeŋsa nde: Yo ɓomɔ tomɛ nyɛ, yite ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ta lu̧ wusɛ nɛ mɛtari wo, kɛto ɓo kɛ kombile duwɛ nde, Jaŋ ɓa̧ mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.»
Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nde: «Wusɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ Mɔ te ɛ tomma nyɛ nde, a njâki tɔpa ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku kɔ na.»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi sendi, mi yeti kɛ lɛpɔ yaŋa nyɛ wunɛ kɛ kasi ɗeti te yi mi kelɛ nɛ mɛyasi mɛte kɛ́ na.»

Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ nyɛ wɛtɛ kanɔ nyɛ ɓomɔ nde: «Wɛtɛ mbam sama ŋgwaŋ *vinyɛ. Ɛ nyɛ kaŋɛ yo nyɛ ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓe mɛsay nde, ɓo ɓâkiɗya. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ nje kwa̧ kɛ̀ lɔndunate kɛ yiŋa mɛnɛti kɛ̀ ya ɓuɗya mɛtu.
Kɛ mɛmbumɔ ma si ɗetɔ kɛ ŋgwaŋ, ɛ nyɛ tomɛ wɛtɛ mɔ mɛsay kɛnjɛ kɛ yi ɓari, nɛ́ ɓo njesɛ nyɛ ŋgaɓiyɛ mɛmbumɔ mɛte yenɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ ɓotu ɓete mɛndɛ mɔ tomun yɔkiɗye nyɛ nɛ gboŋgo ɓɔ.
Ɛ nyɛ ɓasiɗye tomɔ wɛtɛ mɔ mɛsay. Ɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya ŋgwaŋ mɛndɛ nyɛ toyɛ nyɛ wuŋgwɛ, yɔkiɗye nyɛ nɛ gboŋgo ɓɔ.
Kɛ mɛŋga yitatite, ɛ nyɛ tomɛ sendi wɛtɛ mɔ mɛsay. Ɛ ɓo ɗuɗye nyɛ yɔkiɗye nɛ mɛpeŋ kɛ yotu.
Ndana, ɛ sa ŋgwaŋ lɛpɛ nde: ‹Mi ta kelɔ nan? Mi ta tomɔ mɔnmbɛ, sɔŋ temɔ mbɛ, ta ɓɛ, ɓo ta kambɔ nyɛ.›
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, kɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya ŋgwaŋ ma ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo saŋgwɛ ŋgiŋ lɛpɔ nde: ‹Yo nyɛ ta tika nɛ mɛlikɔ mɛ saŋgwɛ. Wusɛ wôku nyɛ, nɛ́ wusɛ tika nɔ.›
Ɛ ɓo ɓu̧ nyɛ kɛ̀ ɓetɛ kɛ kɔŋ ŋgwaŋ wo.»
Ndana, ɛ Yesus diyɛ nde: «Sa ŋgwaŋ ta kelɔ nan nɛ ɓo?
A ta nje girise ɓo hɛnɛ kaŋɛ ŋgwaŋ nyɛ ɓaŋa.» Kɛ ɓomɔ ma wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛnɔri kɛ́, ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nde: «Yaŋa tî kelnaŋgwɛ ɗete na.»
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Yesus kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ nɛ ɓo lɛpɔ nde: «Yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹Tari*f1* te yi ɓotu ɓe sumna njumɔ sɛŋma kɔ kpalma nje ɓɛ saŋgwɛ kondu,› ma to lɛpi te nde ŋge?
Ŋgɛ mumɔ nje ɗumɔ mbɔmbu nɛ kɛte, a ta ɓalɔ nyaŋsaŋgwɛ lekwɛ nɛ mutu mutu. Sendi, ŋgɛ kondu te ɓalɛ kɛ to mumɔ, yo ta pɔsɔ nyɛ nɛ mbɔl.»
Ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi saŋma nje te yi ɓiye nyɛ ndi kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te yite. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo kambima ɓomɔ. Ɓo duwa̧ nde, Yesus nyɛ́ki kanɔ te suŋgwɛ nɛ ɓo.

Ndana, ɛ ɓo kandɛ saŋna mɛnje tomɔ ɓomɔ yi pɛmna nɛ. Ɓotu ɓete ɗikima kelɔ mɛmbɔlɛ nda kimɔ ɓomɔ, simande ɓo ta wokɔ yiŋa kɔtu lɛpi kɛ numbu nɛ, nɛ́ ɓo ɓiy nyɛ, nyɛ ɓotu ɓe pɛsina jɔsi, nɛ́ ɓo nje kwaŋɗye nyɛ kɛnjɛ nyaŋgwɛ kum te ɛ ɗiyɛ nɛ mɛnɛti man kɔ.
Ɛ ɓotu ɓete lɛpɛ nyɛ Yesus nde: «Yekele, wusɛ duwa̧ nde, wɛ kɛ lɛpina teɗye sendi yasi nɛ ŋgbeŋ kinɛ nɛmbɛ njoka ɓomɔ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, wɛ téɗya yɔ nje Njambiyɛ gbate gbate.
’Hɛ gbôku ka garama nyɛ *Sesar, ho hɛ tî gboku na?»
Yesus duwa̧ likisi yan. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde:
«Wunɛ têɗya mi sule wɛtɛ. Yekambiyɛ nɛ̀ mɛkɛti mɛte yi kɛte kɛ́ téɗya nda?» Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nde: «Yo yi Sesar.»
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ɗete, wunɛ nyɛ̂ki Sesar mɛyasi mɛte yenɛ, nyɛ Njambiyɛ mɛyasi mɛte yenɛ.»
Ma ɓo ti yaka ɓiye nyɛ nde, a lɛpima yiŋa kɔtu lɛpi kɛ mbɔmbu ɓomɔ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo ŋgbakimama nda yi Yesus yeŋsama nɔ nyɛ ɓo kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɗiɓɛ numbu.
Ɓaŋa ɓomɔ kɛ njoka *Ɓesadusɛ̧ ka̧ kɛ̀ yi Yesus. Ɓesadusɛ̧ lɛ́pi nde, mumɔ tí womiyɛ na. Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ Yesus nde:
«Yekele, Mɔyisi kɛtima kɛ mɛmboŋga nde: ‹Ŋgɛ mumɔ ɓɛ nɛ maŋ, ŋgɛ maŋ wenɛ te gwe tikɔ nyari kinɛ ja ɓenɛ na, na ɓôŋ kusɔ te, na ja kwaŋɗye nɛ ɗinɔ maŋ ɛ gwa̧ kɔ.›
Ma yo ɓa̧ nɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓembam yitan jɔ yiɓa kɛ mɔy yan. Tomba mɔy ɓoŋma nyari. Ɛ nyɛ gwe tikɔ nya te kinɛ ja ɓenɛ nyɛ na.
Ɛ ɛ kɔŋte nje ɓu̧ kusɔ. Ɛ nyɛ gwe sendi tikɔ nyɛ kinɛ ja ɓenɛ nyɛ na.
Ɛ mɔ yitatite nje ɓu̧ sendi nya te. Yo kelnama ɗete nɛ ɓo yitan jɔ yiɓa hɛnɛ. Ɓo gwa̧ kinɛ tikɔ mɔnɔsikɛ wɛtɛ na.
Ɗiyɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyari nje gwe sendi.
Ma komɛ ɓemuŋ ta womiyɛ kɛ́, nya kɔ ta nje ɓɛ nya nda kɛ njoka yan, kɛto ɓo hɛnɛ yitan jɔ yiɓa ɓoŋma nyɛ nɛ mɛgwaki?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ɓembam nɛ̀ ɓoma ɓete ɓe ndi ndana kɛ mɛnɛti ɓaka kɛ kelɔ mɛgwaki.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓotu ɓete ɓe Njambiyɛ ɓɛŋma kimɔte nde, ɓo ta womiyɛ kɛ njoka ɓemuŋ ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ kɛ mbokɔ te yi ta nje kɛ́ tí kelɔ mɛgwaki se na.
Ɓo tí gwe se na, kɛto ɓo ta ɓɛ nda ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ. Ɓo ta ɓɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓe Njambiyɛ, kɛto ɓo ma womiyɛ kɛ njoka ɓemuŋ.
Mɔyisi téɗya nde, ɓomɔ ta womiyɛ kɛ mbɛy te yi nyɛ lɛpima kasi mɔnɔ jeti te ɛ ɓa̧ kɛ ɓiye ɗitɛ kɔ komɛ nyɛ jeɓa Baba Mbokɔ nde: ‹Njambiyɛ te ɛ Abaraham, Njambiyɛ te ɛ Isak, Njambiyɛ te ɛ Yakɔp.›
Njambiyɛ yeti Njambiyɛ ɓemuŋ na, nyɛ Njambiyɛ te ɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe nɛ joŋ ɓaka. Kɛ yenɛ, ɓotu ɓete ɓe ma gwe ɓaka hɛnɛ nɛ joŋ.»
Ɛ ɓaŋa kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi jayɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Yekele, wɛ lɛpima kimɔte.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɓo kinɛ ɓoɓɛ diyɛ se nyɛ yiŋa diyan na.
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ɓomɔ lɛ́pi nde, *Krist mɔnɔ Davit nan?
Kɛto Davit nɛ ŋguru wenɛ kɛ lɛpɔ kɛ mɔy mɛkana mɛ Ɓesom nde: ‹Baba Mbokɔ lɛpima nyɛ Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande wombɛ nde: Ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ kɛ mbam ɓɔ mbɛ
kumɔ nde, mi sîki kawule ɓependɔ ɓɔ tikɔ kɛ nji̧ mɛkol mɔ.›
Davit jeɓama Krist nde Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ma Krist ta kpalɔ nje ɓɛ mɔnɔ wenɛ nan?»
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓa̧ kɛ wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde:

«Wunɛ ɗîy nɛ sɔsɔ nɛ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi. Ɓo kwáɗyikwɛ jaŋa nɛ nyaŋgwɛ ndulɛŋ ndulɛŋ mɛgambo kɛ mbɔmbu ɓomɔ, kwaɗyɛ sendi nde, ɓomɔ kɛ̂ nyɛnɔ ɓo kɛ mɛmbɛy komɛ ɓomɔ ɗiki wesiɗya kɛ́. Ɓo kwáɗyikwɛ ɗiyɔ kɛ bosa mɛmbɛy kɛ mɛmbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn, sa̧ sendi kpasa mɛmbɛy kɛ mɛtu̧ mɛdina.
Ɓo wɛ́njila mɛyasi hɛnɛ nɛ mbul kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ ɓekusɔ ɓoma, ɗiki nje kelɔ sɛwna mɛŋgwɛta, nɛ́ ɓomɔ ɓɛŋ nde, ɓo kimɔ ɓomɔ. Njambiyɛ ta jɔse ɓo teɗye ɓo nyaŋgwɛ mɛbɔnɛ kwa̧ to te.»
Yesus kaŋma misi ɓɛŋɛ nda yi ɓotu ɓe kusuku ɓa̧ kɛ nyɛ mɛyasi nɛ sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mɔy kpoŋgi nyɛna sadaka kɛ́.
Ɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ wɛtɛ buka kusɔ nyari kɛ̀ ɓetɛ limbi sisi yiɓa kɛte.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Buka kusɔ nya kɔ nya kwa̧ ɓari hɛnɛ,
kɛto ɓari hɛnɛ nya ɓuyɔ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓo ɓɛ nɔ kwa̧ to te kɛ́. Yasi wɛtɛ, buka kusɔ nya kɔ nya yasi hɛnɛ te yi ɓa̧ nde, a jôŋnaŋgwɛ nɔ kɛ ɗiyɔ mɛbukɔ mɛnɛ kɛ́.»
Ɗiyɔ kɛ́, ɛ ɓaŋa ɓomɔ lɛpɛ kasi mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. Ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ lɛpɔ nda yo ɓa̧ kimɔte nɛ kimɔ mɛtari nɛ̀ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓomɔ nya Njambiyɛ nɛ sadaka kɛ́. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde:
«Kɛ mɛtu mɛte yi nje kɛ́ mɛyasi mɛnɔri hɛnɛ yi wunɛ ɓɛŋɛ kɛ́ kinɛ tari wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ ta ɗiyɔ waka kɛ to jakɔsɔ kinɛ nde, ɓo gbûŋgula ɓetɛ kɛ mɛnɛti na.»
Ɛ ɓo diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele, mɛyasi mɛte ta kelna ndenɛn? Yo ŋge ta teɗye nde, mɛyasi mɛte ta ɓɛ kɛ kelna kɛ́?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Wunɛ ɗîy nɛ sɔsɔ, ma ɓo nje seɓile wunɛ, kɛto ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate ta nje nɛ ɗinɔ ɗyembɛ lɛpɔ nde: ‹Mi *Krist, mi kɔ! Ŋgimɔ yakama.› Wunɛ tî ɓeŋgwɛ ɓo na.

Komɛ wunɛ ta wokɔ kasi mɛɗyambi, wokɔ sendi nde, ɓomɔ kɛ ɗesɛ to suŋgwɛ nɛ ɓekum ɓe ɗya, wunɛ tî gwaki kaŋ yaŋa na, kɛto mɛyasi mɛte kânda si kelna. Yasi wɛtɛ, yite tì teɗya nde, siyna mbokɔ ta ɗya̧ ndana ndana na.»
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Kandɔ wɛtɛ ta tɛmɛ lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ wɛtɛ kandɔ. Kumande wɛtɛ má tɛmɛ lu̧ ɗyambi nɛ jakɔsɔ.
Mɛnɛti ta ŋgwaŋgwa ɓuɗyate. Ɓeya mɛkɔn nɛ̀ mɛkolɔ ta ɗya̧ sendi kɛ ɓuɗya mɛmbɛy. Nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele mɛte yi nyɛ wɔ̧ nɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ mɛyekambiyɛ ta kelna wulɛ kwey.

Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mɛyasi mɛnɔri tì pa kelna kɛ́, ɓo ta ɓiye wunɛ teɗye wunɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛbɔnɛ. Ɓo ta kaŋɛ wunɛ tɛmbiɗye kɛ jɔsi kɛ mɛmbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn, nyɛ wunɛ kɛ jɔɓɔ. Ɓo ta kɛ̀ nɛ wunɛ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓekumande nɛ̀ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓekum kɛto ɗinɔ ɗyembɛ.
Mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ ta saŋgwa nɔ kɛ́ ta kelɔ nde, wunɛ lɛ̂pi mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ ɓɛŋma nɛ̀ yi wunɛ duwa̧ kɛ kasi mbɛ kɛ́.
Ɗete, wunɛ ɓâkiɗya kimɔte kɛ ɗyanɔ ɗyun nde, wunɛ tî kanda kuɗyɛ temɔ kɛ yasi te yi wunɛ ta yeŋsa kɛ́ na.
Kɛto mi ta teɗye wunɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi wunɛ ta lɛpɔ kɛ́, nyɛ sendi wunɛ ɗyanɔ te yi ta kelɔ nde, ɓependɔ ɓun tí sumɔ kol, ho yeŋsa yaŋa na.
Ko ɓesaŋgwɛ ɓun nɛ̀ ɓenyaŋgwɛ ɓun, ko ɓemaŋ ɓun ko ɓejaɗyɛ ɓun nɛ̀ ɓesɔ ɓun ta ɗyaŋgwɛ wunɛ. Ɓo ta wo ɓaŋa ɓuɗyate kɛ njoka yun.
Ɓo hɛnɛ ta ɓenɔ wunɛ kɛto ɗinɔ ɗyembɛ.
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, nyiŋɔ to yun wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tí ɗimbiyɛ na.
Wunɛ ta joŋgwɛ mɛsisiŋ mun, ŋgɛ wunɛ disima.
«Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wunɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ nde, mɛnjɔŋ ɓesɔja ma litɔ Yerusalɛm saŋgwɛ kɛ́, wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, Yerusalɛm ta ɓɛ kɛ yaŋgila.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite ɓotu ɓete ɓe ta ɓɛ kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Yuda ɓaka sɛ̂ɗyikwɛ kambɔ kɛ̀ kɛ to mɛkeki. Ɓaka ɓe ta ɓɛ kɛ Yerusalɛm ɓaka pûndu si kwa̧. Ɓotu ɓete ɓe ta ɓɛ kɛ mɛlunde ɓaka tî nyiŋa mɔy ɗya na.
Kɛto yo ta ɓɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Njambiyɛ ta ndeyɛ ɓomɔ ɓenɛ teɗye ɓo mɛbɔnɛ. A ta kelɔ ɗete, nɛ́ mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi ɓa̧ kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́ si tôndu.
Ɓoma ɓete ɓe ta ɓɛ nɛ mɔy nɛ̀ ɓaka ɓe ta nyɛ ɓɔnɔsikɛ ɓɛri kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite ɓaka ta saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ, kɛto nyaŋgwɛ mɛbɔnɛ ta ɗya̧ kɛ ɗya. Njambiyɛ ta punjɛ ŋgambi nɛ suŋgwɛ nɛ ndiŋgɛlɛ kandɔ kɛ hɛnɛ.
Ɓo ta wo ɓo nɛ kafa, ɓiye ɓo nɛ bala kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ mɛkandɔ hɛnɛ. Ɓotu ɓete ɓe yeti kɛ duwɛ Njambiyɛ ɓaka ta sɔpite Yerusalɛm nɛ mɛkol kumɔ komɛ ŋgimɔ te yan ta siyɔ kɛ́.

«Yiŋa mɛyasi mɛte yi teɗye nde, yaŋa ta ɗya̧ kɛ́ ta ɓɛŋna kɛ yesɔ, ɓɛŋna kɛ ŋgwɛndɛ nɛ̀ ɓesisɔ̧. Mɛkandɔ hɛnɛ kɛ to mɛnɛti ta gwe wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate. Ɓo ta ɗiyɔ temɔ kɛ ŋgiŋ kɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛɗuŋ mɛ maŋ nɛ̀ mɛɗuŋ mɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛkumbɔ.
Ɓomɔ ta gwe wɔ̧ ŋgwaŋgwa ɓalɔ kɛ takina yasi te yi ta ɗya̧ kɛ mɛnɛti kɛ́. Kɛto mɛyasi mɛte yi nɛ ŋguŋguɗyɛ yi ɗiyɛ kɛ kwey kɛ́ ta ŋgbɔkisa ɓuɗyate.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɓo ta ɓɛŋɛ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ kɛ nje nɛ kulutu nɛ nyaŋgwɛ ŋguŋguɗyɛ nɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ mɛluksa.
Komɛ mɛyasi mɛnɔri ta kandɛ ɗyaŋnate kɛ́, nɛ̀ wunɛ tɛ̂mbiɗya yotu kaŋɛ to, kɛto Njambiyɛ ta ɓɛ kɛ joŋgwɛ wunɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus yekiɗye wɛtɛ kanɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa *figiye ko mɛjeti hɛnɛ.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi jɔnja mɛmbɔru mɛ kɛ pundɔ kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛte, wunɛ nɛ ŋguru wun kɛ duwɛ nde, ŋgimɔ mbiyɔ ma wuta.
Ɗete sendi, komɛ wunɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ nde, mɛyasi mɛte mɛ kɛ ɗya̧, wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ ma wuta.
Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ko ɓotu ɓete ɓe nɛ joŋ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ ɓaka tí gwe hɛnɛ kinɛ nde, mɛyasi mɛnɔri ɗyâŋ na.
Ɗyoɓɔ nɛ̀ mɛnɛti ta si kwa̧ yambile, ma ndi mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ tí yambile wɛtɛ yesɔ na.

«Wunɛ ɗîy nɛ sɔsɔ nɛ mɛkele mun, ma temɔ yun mɛ nje tɛkɔ kɛto ɗyena mɛɗye nɛ̀ gwena mɛnjam kwa̧ to te. Wunɛ ɗîy sendi nɛ sɔsɔ, ma temɔ yun mɛ nje tɛkɔ kɛto mɛtakɛ kɛ kasi mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ ta joŋna nɔ kɛ́. Wunɛ ɗîy nɛ sɔsɔ, kambɔ yesɔ te mɛ nje ŋgbakɛ wunɛ ŋgbaka.
Kɛto yesɔ te ta ɗya̧ ŋgbakɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe ɗiyɛ kɛ to mɛnɛti, nda yi ɓo ɓetɛ nɛ bulajama kɛ ɗuku, ɓenjanjɔ má nje ŋgbakima, yo má kawule ɓo.
Ɗete, wunɛ tî yaki na. Wunɛ ŋgwɛ̂taŋgwɛ nɛ Njambiyɛ mɛŋgimɔ hɛnɛ, nɛ́ wunɛ ɓɛ nɛ ɗeti te yi diyɔ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ta ɗya̧ kɛ́, nɛ́ wunɛ nje tɛm kɛ mbɔmbu *Mɔnɔ mumɔ.»
Yesus ɗikima teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ yesɔ kɛ mɔy mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, nɛ tu a ɗikima kwa̧ kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ kɛ *Keki mɛoliviye.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɗikima kɛ̀ ɓemɛŋmɛnɛ nɛ sut kɛ̀ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ̀ wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ.
Ŋgimɔ jesɔ ɗyena mɛmampa mɛte yi kinɛ ŋga̧ kɛte kɛ́ ɓa̧ kɛ wuta. Ɓo jéɓaŋgwɛ jesɔ te nde *Paska Ɓeyudɛn.
Ndana, ɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi sa̧ nje nda yi ɓo yakama wo nɛ Yesus kɛ́, kɛto ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ kambɔ ɓomɔ.
Ndana, ɛ *Satan nyiŋɛ temɔ Yuda te yi ɓo ɗikima jeɓa sendi nde Iskariyot kɔ. A ɓa̧ kɛ njoka ɓejekɛ ɓe Yesus kamɔ jɔ yiɓa.
Yudas kwaŋma kɛ̀ kombile ŋgiŋ ɓenɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ yí ɓɛŋɛ nda yi nyɛ yakama ɗyaŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus nyɛ ɓo kɛ́.
Ɓomɔ ɓaka wokuma mɛsosa ɓuɗyate. Ɛ ɓo pɛsɛ nde, ɓo ta nyɛ nyɛ mɔni.
Ɛ Yudas jayɛ. Ɛ nyɛ kandɛ saŋna kimɔ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ta ɗyaŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus kinɛ nde, ɓomɔ dûkwɛ na.
Yesɔ ɗyena mɛmampa mɛte yi kinɛ ŋga̧ kɛte kɛ́ ɗyaŋma. Yo ɓa̧ ŋgimɔ wona ɓɔnɔ ɓesam nɛ sadaka yi mɛɗye mɛ jesɔ *Paska Ɓeyudɛn.
Ɛ Yesus tomɛ Piyɛr ɓenɛ Jaŋ lɛpɔ nde: «Wunɛ kɛ̂n kombile mɛɗye mɛ Paska te yusu, nɛ́ wusɛ ɗye.»
Ɛ ɓo diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ kwáɗyikwɛ nde, wusɛ kɛ̂n kombile ɓa yo we?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Komɛ wunɛ ta kumɔ kɛ mɔy ɗya kɛ́, wunɛ ta saŋgwa nɛ wɛtɛ mbam nɛ mapi mɔrɔku. Wunɛ ɓêŋgwɛ nyɛ kumɔ kɛ tu̧ te yi nyɛ ta nyiŋɛ kɛte kɛ́.
Nɛ̀ wunɛ lɛ̂pi nyɛ sa tu̧ nde: ‹Yekele kɛ diyɛ wɛ nde: Mbɛy te yi sinɛ ɓejekɛ ɓembɛ ta ɗye Paska kɛte kɛ́ ɓa we?›
A ta teɗye wɛtɛ nyaŋgwɛ toŋgari nyɛ wunɛ kɛ tu̧ kwey kɛ pay to te nɛ mɛyasi hɛnɛ gweya̧ kombilate kɛ mɔyte. Yo womɛte yi wunɛ ta kombile mɛɗye mɛ Paska.»
Ɓo ka̧, ɛ ɓo dolɛ mɛyasi hɛnɛ nda yi Yesus lɛpima nyɛ ɓo kɛ́. Ɛ ɓo kombile mɛɗye mɛ Paska.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ ɗyena mɛɗye mɛ Paska ma ɗya̧ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ ɗiyɔ ɓenɛ ɓotu ɓe tomun ɓenɛ yí ɗyena.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi kwaɗya ɗye Paska te yɔkɔ nɛ temɔ mbɛ hɛnɛ sinɛ wunɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mi tì pa saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ kɛ́.
Kɛto mi kɛ kombile lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Mi tí ɗye se yo na kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Njambiyɛ ta si teɗye to ɗyena mɛɗye mɛte kɛ *Kandɔ ɗyenɛ.»
Ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ pelɔ nɛ tena mɛnjam kɛ mɔyte, nyɛ Njambiyɛ wosoko lɛpɔ nde: «Wunɛ ɓôŋ yo kaɓiɗya,
kɛto mi kɛ kombile lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Ko mi tí hɔɓiye se tena mɛnjam maka na kumɔ nde, *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ ɗyâŋ.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ mampa. Kɛ nyɛ ma si nyɛ Njambiyɛ wosoko kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lekɛ yo nyɛ ɓo lɛpɔ nde: «Yikɛ mɛmbundɔ mɛmbɛ. Yo kɛ nyɛna kɛto yun. Wunɛ kɛ̂ kelɔ ɗekɛ ɗye takɛ nɛ mi.»

Kɛ mɛɗye ma siyɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ sendi pelɔ tena mɛnjam nyɛ ɓo nda yi nyɛ kelma nɛ mampa kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Pelɔ tena mɛnjam te yikɛ, yo jɔnja mbon te yi kɛ kelna nɛ mɛkiyɔ mɛmbɛ yi kɛ nyanja kɛto yun kɛ́.
Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ dûkwɛ nde: Mɔ te ɛ ta ɗyaŋgwɛ mi kɔ waka kɛ mɛɗye sinɛ nyɛ.
*Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta kwa̧ gbate nda yi Njambiyɛ pɛsima kɛ́. Yasi wɛtɛ, mɛbɔnɛ ta ɓalɔ kɛ to mɔ te ɛ ta ɗyaŋgwɛ nyɛ kɔ.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo kandɛ mɛdiyna tandɛ yan kɛ kasi mɔ te ɛ yakama kelɔ kwalɔ mɛkele mɛte yite kɛ njoka yan kɔ.
Ɛ mɛtandɔ ɗya̧ sendi kɛ njoka ɓejekɛ, kɛto ɓo kwaɗya duwɛ mɔ te ɛ kwaŋma ɓɛsɔ kɛ njoka yan kɔ.
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ɓekumande ɓe mɛnɛti kɛ ɗiyɔ nɛ ɓomɔ. Sendi, ɓotu ɓete ɓe namɛ ɓɛsɔ ɓaka, ɓo jéɓaŋgwɛ ɓo nde kimɔ ɓomɔ.
Yasi wɛtɛ kɛ yun, kinɛ yaŋa ɗete na. Tomba kɛ njoka yun yâkaŋgwɛ ɓɛ nda jɔkiɗya. Mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ nɛ ɓɛsɔ kɔ yâkaŋgwɛ ɓɛ nda mɔnɔ mɛsay.

Nda kwa̧ jakɔsɔ? ’Yo mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ kɛ mbɛy mɛɗye laɗye kɔ, ho yɔkɔ ɛ ɓu̧ mɛɗye nje nyɛ jakɔsɔ kɔ? ’Yeti yɔkɔ ɛ ɗiyɛ kɛ mbɛy mɛɗye laɗye kɔ kwa̧ jakɔsɔ na? Yasi wɛtɛ, mi mbɛ nda mɔnɔ mɛsay kɛ njoka yun.
Wunɛ ɗiyma kpo nɛ kpo kɛ kɔŋ mbɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mi saŋgwama nɛ mɛbɔnɛ kɛ́.
Ɗete, nda Saŋmbɛ nya mi ɗeti nde, mi nâm *Kandɔ ɗyenɛ kɛ́, mi sendi kɛ nyɛ wunɛ ɗeti te yi namɔ yo.
Ɗete, nɛ́ wunɛ ɗiy ɗyena, hɔɓiye kɛ mbɛy komɛ mi ɗyena kɛ Kandɔ ɗyembɛ kɛ́, nɛ́ wunɛ ɗiy kɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛmbɛy pɛsɔ jɔsi mɛkandɔ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa ɓe kandɔ Isarayɛl.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ Simɔn nde: «Simɔn, Simɔn, wokɔ kimɔte. *Satan diyma, na pɛpi wunɛ nda yi ɓo pɛpɛ nɛ lɛsi yí ɓakɛ nɛ njɔsɔ te nɛ̀ kopu te kɛ́.
Yasi wɛtɛ, mi ŋgwɛtama nɛ Njambiyɛ kɛto yɔ, ma wɛ mɛ nje ɗiyɔ kinɛ tikɔ se temɔ nɛ mi na. Yasi wɛtɛ, komɛ wɛ ta nje yeŋsa nɛ kɔkɔ jayɛ mi kɛ́, nɔ̀ nyɛ̂ki ɓemɔŋ ɗeti.»
Ɛ Piyɛr lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ko kɛna jɔɓɔ ko sɔŋ, mi gba nɛdɔ te yi kɛ̀ sinɛ wɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde: «Piyɛr, mi kɛ kombile lɛpɔ nyɛ wɛ nde: Wɛ ta tonɔ muka kumɔ mɛŋga yitati nde, wɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ mi na, mbam kuɓɛ má nje kɔkɔ.»
Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mi tomma nɛ wunɛ kinɛ kom mɔni kinɛ koɓiyɛ kinɛ mɛnakala kɛ́, ’ɛ yaŋa ɓanɛ wunɛ?» Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nde: «Ko yaŋa tì ɓanɛ wusɛ na.»
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ndana yɛy, mɔ te ɛ nɛ kom mɔni, a ɓôŋ. Mɔ te ɛ nɛ koɓiyɛ, a ɓôŋ. Ma yɔkɔ ɛ kinɛ kafa kɔ ɗyâŋgwɛ lambɔ nɛ ɓɔmɔ nɔ.

Kɛto mi kɛ kombile lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Mɛlɛpi mɛte yi ɓa̧ kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ kasi mbɛ kɛ́ ta kelna gbate. Yo ɓa̧ kɛtinate nde: ‹Ɓo ɓoŋma nyɛ nda mɔ mɛɓeyɔ.› Yasi te yi yo kɛtinate kɛ kasi mbɛ kɛ́ ta ɓɛ kɛ si kelna.»
Ɛ ɓejekɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, mɛkafa yiɓa kɛ́.» Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yakama ɗete.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus pundɛ kɛ̀ kɛ *Keki mɛoliviye nda njɛl wenɛ. Ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ ɓeŋgwɛ nyɛ.
Kɛ nyɛ ma kumɔ mate kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde: «Wunɛ ŋgwɛ̂taŋgwɛ nɛ Njambiyɛ, ma wunɛ mɛ nje ɓalɔ komɛ *Satan ta ɓoɓɛ wunɛ kɛ́.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ jisɛ kɛ kɛki yan kɛ̀ nɛ naŋ nɛ mbɛt yaka lɔndɔ ɓetina kusu. Ɛ nyɛ kusɛ mɛɓɔŋ kɛ mɛnɛti ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpɔ nde:
«Da, ŋgɛ wɛ kwaɗyɛ, kelɔ nde, nyaŋgwɛ mapi mɛbɔnɛ mɛte yikɛ ɗûkwɛ kɛ to mbɛ. Ma, yo tî kelnaŋgwɛ nda yi mi kwaɗyɛ kɛ́ na, yo kêlnaŋgwɛ nda yi wɛ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́.»
Ndana, ɛ wɛtɛ jaki Njambiyɛ wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ nje nyɛ nyɛ ɗeti.
Dodo sɔŋ ɓiyma Yesus. Ɛ nyɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ tiŋ, ɓiriki punduma kɛ yotu nɛ ɓalɔ kɛ mɛnɛti nda yi mɛkiyɔ ɗɔɗya nɔ kɛ́.
Kɛ nyɛ ma si ŋgwɛta kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ kɛ̀ komɛ ɓejekɛ ɗiyma kɛ́. A dolma ɓo kɛ jakɔ, kɛto mɛtakɛ kwaŋma ɓo.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ yáki kɛto ŋge? Wunɛ tɛ̂ma ŋgwɛta nɛ Njambiyɛ, ma mɛɓoɓilan nje laŋsa wunɛ.»
Yesus ɓa̧ ndi kɛ lɛpina ɗete kɛ́, yaka nɔ, ŋgil kɛ ɗya̧. Yudas te ɛ ɓa̧ kɛ njoka ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa kɔ ɓɛ to njɔŋ te. Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ kɛ kɛki Yesus, na dul numbu nɛ.
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yudas, ’wɛ kɛ ɗyaŋgwɛ ka *Mɔnɔ mumɔ nɛ nje dulna numbu nɛ?»
Kɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ njɔŋ Yesus ɓaka ma ɓɛŋɛ yasi te yi kɛ kwaɗyɛ kelna kɛ́, ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ’wusɛ kɔ̂tu ɓo nɛ mɛkafa?»
Ɛ wɛtɛ kɛ njoka yan kɔtɛ mɔ mɛsay mɛ nyaŋgwɛ kum ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ pɛsɔ tɔ nɛ ɛ mbam ɓɔ ɓetɛ kɛ mɛnɛti.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ tîki, yo ɗîy ɗete.» Ɛ nyɛ kpokɛ tɔ mbam te joŋgwɛ nyɛ.

Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓetomba ɓe ɗya ɓe nja̧ kɛ ɓiyna nɛ ɓaka nde: «Wunɛ nja̧ nɛ mɛkafa nɛ̀ mɛtegbe yí nje ɓiye nɛ mi nda yi ɓo ɓeŋgwɛ nɛ mɔ guɓɔ kɛ́.
Mi ɗikima ɗiyɔ mɛtu hɛnɛ sinɛ wunɛ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ, wunɛ tì ɓiye mi na. Yo ndi nde, ŋgimɔ yun ɗyaŋma, ɓu̧ sendi ŋgimɔ te yi *Satan.»
Kɛ ɓo ma si ɓiye Yesus kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɓu̧ nyɛ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ tu̧ nyaŋgwɛ kum ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ. Piyɛr ɗikima ɓeŋgwɛ ɓo nɛ naŋ.
Ɓo joŋgwa ɗitɛ kɛ ɓembe sɛ̧ ɗiyɔ kɛ kɛkite. Ɛ Piyɛr nje ɗiyɔ sendi kɛ njoka yan.
Wɛtɛ nya te ɛ ɗikima kelɔ mɛsay kɛ tu̧ kɔ ɓɛŋma nyɛ kɛ ɗiyɔ kɛ kɛki ɗitɛ. Ɛ nyɛ seŋgile nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Mbam kɔ ɓa̧ sendi ɓenɛ nyɛ!»
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Piyɛr tonɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Nyari, mi yeti kɛ duwɛ nyɛ na!»
Ɗiyɔ nɛ mbɛt kɛ kɔŋte kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ mbam ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Wɛ sendi kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓete.» Ɛ Piyɛr lɛpɛ nde: «Mbam, mi yeti kɛ mɔyte na!»
Ɗiyɔ nda hawa wɛtɛ kɛ kɔŋte kɛ́, ɛ wɛtɛ mbam nje ɓasiɗye lɛpɔ sendi nde: «Gbate, mbam kɔ ɓa̧ sendi ɓenɛ nyɛ, kɛto nyɛ sendi mɔ Galile!»
Ɛ Piyɛr yeŋsa nde: «Mbam, mi yeti kɛ duwɛ yasi te yi wɛ kwaɗyɛ lɛpɔ kɛ́ na!» Piyɛr ɓa̧ ndi kɛ lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ mbam kuɓɛ kɔkɛ.
Ɛ Kumande Yesus yeŋsa ɓɛŋɛ Piyɛr nɛ ŋgoŋ. Ɛ Piyɛr nje takɛ lɛpi te yi Kumande Yesus ma lɛ́pi nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Wɛ ta tonɔ muka kumɔ mɛŋga yitati nde, wɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ mi na, mbam kuɓɛ má nje kɔkɔ.›
Ɛ Piyɛr pundɛ kɛ̀ lelɔ ɓuɗyate.
Ɓembam ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ ɓakiɗye Yesus ɓaka ɗikima nyɛtɔ nyɛ, mɛndɛ sendi nyɛ.
Ɓo wotuma misi mɛnɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Tuɓɔ mɔ te ɛ mɛndima wɛ kɔ.»
Ɓo ka̧ sendi mbɔmbu yí lɛpɔ sendi yiŋa ɓuɗya mɛlɛpi mɛ gbutu suŋgwɛ nɛ nyɛ ɓuɗyate.
Kɛ misi ma pupɔ kɛ́, ɛ njɔŋ ɓetomba ɓe ɗya wesiɗya ɓenɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe teɗya mɛmboŋga. Ɛ ɓo tomɛ ɓomɔ kɛ̀ ɓu̧ nɛ nyɛ nje nɔ kɛ mbɛy nyaŋgwɛ jɔsi yan.
Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nde: «Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wɛ *Krist, lɛpɔ nyɛ wusɛ.» Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ŋgɛ mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ, wunɛ tí jayɛ na.
Sendi, ŋgɛ mi diyɛ wunɛ mɛdiyan, wunɛ tí yeŋsa nyɛ mi na.
Kandɛ ndana *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta ɗiyɔ kɛ mbam ɓɔ Njambiyɛ te ɛ nɛ ŋguŋguɗyɛ hɛnɛ kɔ.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo hɛnɛ lɛpɛ nde: «’Yite nde, wɛ Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo nda yi wunɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́, mi Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ.»
Ɛ ɓo nje lɛpɔ nde: «Ŋge yi ɓo ta lɛpɔ sendi nyɛ wusɛ kɛ́? Wusɛ ma wokɔ nda yi nyɛ lɛpima nɛ numbu nɛ kɛ́.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɓomɔ ɓaka hɛnɛ tɛmɛ nɛ gam ɓu̧ Yesus kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ yi Pilat.

Ɛ ɓo kandɛ lɛpɔ mɛyasi suŋgwɛ nɛ nyɛ nde: «Wusɛ dolma mbam kɔ kɛ teɗye ɗetina to nyɛ ɓotu ɓe kandɔ ɗyusu. A kɛ kiɗyɛ ɓomɔ nde, ɓo tî gboku garama nyɛ *Sesar na. A kɛ lɛpɔ sendi nde, nyɛ *Krist, nyɛ kumande.»
Ɛ Pilat diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ kumande Ɓeyudɛn?» Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo nda yi wɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Pilat nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ŋgil ɓomɔ nde: «Mi yeti kɛ ɓɛŋɛ mbɛ yiŋa mɛjɔsɔ kɛ yotu mbam kɔ na.»
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓo ka̧ ndi mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nɛ ɗeti kwa̧ to te nde: «A kɛ ɗesɛ to ɓomɔ nɛ teɗya yasi nɛ kandɛ kɛ Galile nɛ̀ Yuda hɛnɛ nje kumɔ nɔ ndana waka.»
Kɛ Pilat ma wokɔ kasi Galile kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ diyɛ nde: «Mbam kɔ mɔ Galile?»
Kɛ nyɛ ma wokɔ nde, Yesus wókunaŋgwɛ nɛ Herod kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kwaŋɗye nyɛ kɛnjɛ nyɛ, kɛto Herod ɓa̧ sendi kɛ Yerusalɛm kɛ pɔku mɛtu mɛte yite.

Kɛ kumande Herod ma ɓɛŋɛ Yesus kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ sosa ɓuɗyate, kɛto a ɓa̧ nɛ yɛsiɗyɛ ɓɛŋna nɛ njombu yaŋa, kɛto mɛyasi mɛte yi nyɛ ɗikima wokɔ kɛ kasi nɛ kɛ́. Herod ɓa̧ kɛ takɛ sendi nde, Yesus ta kelɔ yiŋa mɛyekambiyɛ kɛ misi mɛnɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ diyɛ Yesus ɓuɗya mɛdiyan. Ko ɗete, a tì yeŋsa yaŋa nyɛ nyɛ na.
Ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi ɓa̧ sendi te, ɗiki pɛsɔ ɓeya mɛlɛpi nyɛ kɛ numbu nɛ nɛ ŋgaŋ.
Herod ɓenɛ ɓesɔja ɓenɛ yɛliya nyɛ wuŋgwɛ nyɛ. Ɓo lɛnja nyɛ kpasa lambɔ. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Herod yɔkiɗye nyɛ kɛnjɛ Pilat.
Kɛ kiya yesɔ te ɛ Pilat ɓenɛ Herod ɓiye mɛsɔ. Nɛ mbɔmbu, ɓo ɓa̧ nɛ pendɔ.
Ndana, ɛ Pilat wesiɗye ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓomɔ ɓe kandɔ Ɓeyudɛn nɛ̀ ɓekum ɓan hɛnɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde:
«Wunɛ ɓoŋma mbam kɔ nje nɔ kɛ yembɛ nde, a kɛ ɗesɛ to ɓomɔ. Ndana ndana mi diyma nyɛ mɛdiyan kɛ misi mun. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi tì ɓɛŋɛ mɛjɔsɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ kɛ yotu nɛ nda yi wunɛ lɛpima kɛ́ na.
Herod sendi tì ɓɛŋɛ mɛjɔsɔ kɛ yotu nɛ na, yori yi nyɛ yɔkiɗya sendi nyɛ njesɛ wusɛ kɛ́. Ɗete, mbam kɔ tì kelɛ yiŋa yaŋa yi yakama nde, a sɔ̂mbu sɔŋ kɛto te na.»
Ɛ Pilat lɛpɛ nde: «Yi ɓa̧ ɗete kɛ́, mi ta lɛpɔ nde, ɓo njûru nyɛ, má nje soŋɛ ɓɔ nɛ nyɛ.»
Yo ɓa̧ tumbu kɛ yan nde, kɛ ŋgimɔ jesɔ *Paska yan hɛnɛ Pilat sôŋa ɓɔ nɛ mɔ jɔɓɔ wɛtɛ.
Ɛ ɓo hɛnɛ ŋgbɔ kembɔ ndi tu wɛtɛ nde: «Mbam kɔ gwâki, nɔ̀ sôŋa ɓɔ nɛ Barabas yɔkiɗye nyɛ wusɛ.»
Ɓo nyɛ́ki Barabas kɛ jɔɓɔ, kɛto a ɗesa to ɓomɔ suŋgwɛ nɛ ɓekum ɓe ɗya nɛ̀ kɛto wona mumɔ.
Ɛ Pilat ɓasiɗye lɛpina nyɛ ɓomɔ, kɛto a kwaɗya soŋɛ ɓɔ nɛ Yesus.
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓo ka̧ mbɔmbu kembɔ nde: «Ŋgbakɔ nyɛ kɛ kroa. Ŋgbakɔ nyɛ kɛ kroa.»

Ɛ Pilat lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo kɛ mɛŋga yitatite nde: «Ma yo kwalɔ ɓeya yasi te nda yi nyɛ kelma kɛ́? Mi tì ɓɛŋɛ yiŋa mɛjɔsɔ kɛ yotu nɛ yi yakama nde, a sɔ̂mbu sɔŋ kɛto te na. Mi ta lɛpɔ nde, ɓo njûru nyɛ, má nje soŋɛ ɓɔ nɛ nyɛ.»
Ko ɗete, ɓo ka̧ ndi mbɔmbu nɛ ɓeya mɛkembi lɛpɔ nde, ɓo ŋgbâki Yesus kɛ kroa. Ɛ mɛkembi man laŋsa.
Ɛ Pilat lɛpɛ nde, yasi te yi ɓo diyma kɛ́ ta kelna.

Ɛ nyɛ nje soŋɛ ɓɔ nɛ yɔkɔ yi ɓo nya nyɛ kɛ jɔɓɔ kɛto ɗesa to ɓomɔ suŋgwɛ nɛ ɓekum ɓe ɗya nɛ̀ kɛto wona mumɔ kɔ. Yo nyɛ yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ kwaɗyɛ. Ɛ nyɛ nje kaŋɛ Yesus nyɛ ɓo, nɛ́ ɓo kel nɛ nyɛ nda yi ɓo kwaɗya kɛ́.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ ɓu̧ Yesus kwa̧ nɔ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo saŋgwa nɛ wɛtɛ mbam nde Simɔn, mɔ Sirɛn kɛ yɔkwɛ ŋgwaŋ. Ɛ ɓo ɓiye nyɛ soɓiɗye nyɛ kroa nde, a kɛ̂ndi nɔ kɛ kɔŋ Yesus.
Nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil ɓotu ɓe ɗya nɛ̀ ɓaŋa ɓomari ɓa̧ kɛ ɓeŋgwɛ Yesus. Ɓoma ɓete ɓa̧ kɛ jaɓa wo yotu kɛto nɛ.
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa ɓɛŋɛ ɓomari lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ ɓoma ɓe Yerusalɛm, wunɛ tî lel kɛto mbɛ na, yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ lêl kɛto yun nɛ̀ kɛto ɓɔnɔ ɓun.
Kɛto wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, mɛtu ta ɗya̧ yi ɓomɔ ta lɛpɔ nde: ‹Ɓekundu nɛ̀ ɓomari ɓete ɓe tì ja yí nyɛ nɛ ɓɔnɔsikɛ ɓɛri wɛtɛ yesɔ ɓaka nɛ mɛsosa.›
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite ɓomɔ ta lɛpɔ nyɛ mɛkeki nde: ‹Wunɛ ɓâl kɛ to su.› Ɓo ta lɛpɔ sendi nyɛ mɛkoru nde: ‹Wunɛ mbâsi wusɛ.›
Ma ŋgɛ ɓo kelɛ ɗete nɛ ɓɔsuna jeti, yo má nje ɓɛ nan nɛ sɔsuna jeti?»
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓoŋma Yesus kwa̧ nɔ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɓu̧ sendi ɓotu ɓe kelna nyaŋgwɛ ɓeya mɛkele yiɓa, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ wo ɓo nda Yesus.

Kɛ ɓo ma kumɔ kɛ mbɛy te yi ɓo jeɓa nde Gboŋgo to kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ŋgba Yesus womɛte kɛ kroa, ŋgba sendi ɓotu ɓe nyaŋgwɛ ɓeya mɛkele ɓaka yiɓa, wɛtɛ kɛ kroa te wenɛ pulɔ mbam ɓɔ Yesus, wɛtɛ kɛ wenɛ pulɔ gare nɛ.
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde: «Da, tikɔ ɓo nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ, kɛto ɓo yeti kɛ duwɛ yasi te yi ɓo kelɛ kɛ́ na.» Ɓo ɓoŋma mɛlambɔ mɛnɛ lu̧ kɛ mbari yí kaɓiɗya nɛ yo.
Ɓomɔ ɓa̧ womɛte ɗiki ɓɛŋɛ. Ɓekum ɗikima nyɛtɔ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «A ɗikima joŋgwɛ ɓaŋa ɓomɔ. Ma ndana, a jôŋgwɛ yotu nɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, nyɛ *Krist te yi Njambiyɛ tɔkuma kɔ.»
Ɓesɔja ɗikima nyɛtɔ nyɛ sendi. Ɓo ka̧ kɛ kɛki nɛ jɛkiɗye ɗyanjina mɛnjam nyɛ nyɛ
lɛpɔ nde: «Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, wɛ kumande Ɓeyudɛn, joŋgwɛ yotu yɔ nɛ ŋguru wɔ.»
Ɓo kɛtima yiŋa yasi ŋgba kɛ to kroa nɛ nde: ‹Yɔkɔ kumande Ɓeyudɛn.›
Kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓe kelna nyaŋgwɛ ɓeya mɛkele yi ɓo ŋgbama kɛ kroa ɓaka, wɛtɛ toyma Yesus lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Wɛ yeti *Krist na? Joŋgwɛ yotu yɔ nɛ ŋguru wɔ, nɛ̀ wɛ joŋgwɛ sendi wusɛ.»
Ɛ yɔru ndeyɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Yo ŋge, wɛ ti kámbi Njambiyɛ na? Mbam kɔ kɛ saŋgwa nɛ kiya mɛndeya nɛ̀ mɛbɔnɛ nda wusɛ.
Nɛ̀ wɛ nɛ̀ mi, yusu yakama nɛ wusɛ ɓeŋgwɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɓeya mɛkele musu. Kɛ ɓɛ mbam te yɔkɔ, a tì kelɛ nɛ ɓeya yaŋa na.»
Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nde: «Yesus, nɔ̀ tâka mi komɛ wɛ ta nje namɔ mbokɔ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wɛ kɛ́: Muka sinɛ wɛ ta ɗiyɔ kɛ *Paradis!»
Yo ɓa̧ kɛ pɔku ɓembe yesɔ, ɛ yitil kelɛ kɛ to mɛnɛti hɛnɛ kumɔ kɛ hawa yitati te yi ɓekoko.
Ɛ misi mɛ yesɔ ɗiɓiɗya. Ɛ nyaŋgwɛ lambɔ te yi ɓa̧ kɛsate kɛ mbɛy te yi nɛ kiyɔ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ́ nyaliyɛ kɛ ɓembe.
Ɛ Yesus kembɛ lɛpɔ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «Da, mi kɛ yɔkiɗye Sisiŋ mbɛ nyɛ kɛ mɛɓɔ mɔ!» Kɛ nyɛ ma si lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ jɛyɛ gwe.
Kɛ kum ɓesɔja te ɛ ɓa̧ womɛte kɔ ma ɓɛŋɛ yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lukse Njambiyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Mbam kɔ ɓa̧ gbate ŋgbeŋ mumɔ!»
Ɓomɔ nja̧ nɛ ŋgil yí nje ɓɛŋɛ yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́. Kɛ ɓo ma si ɓɛŋɛ mɛkele mɛnɔri kɛ́, ɛ ɓo hɛnɛ kpo ɓɔ kɛ ɓeti jaɓa ɗuwɛ nɔ.
Ɓenjɔŋ ɓe Yesus hɛnɛ nɛ̀ ɓoma ɓete ɓe ɓeŋgwa nyɛ kandɛ Galile ɓaka ɗiyma nɛ naŋ ɓɛŋɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓa̧ kɛ kwaŋna kɛ́.
Wɛtɛ mbam nde Yosɛp ɓa̧ kɛ njɔŋ nyaŋgwɛ jɔsi Ɓeyudɛn. A ɓa̧ kimɔ mumɔ, ɓɛ sendi nɛ ŋgbeŋ.
A ɓa̧ mɔ Arimate kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Ɓeyudɛn. Sendi, a ɓa̧ kɛ laɗye *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ. A tì nyɛ numbu nɛ kɛ mɛlɛpi nɛ̀ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓenjɔŋ ɓenɛ pɛsima kɛ kasi Yesus kɛ́ na.
Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ kɛ yi Pilat kɛ̀ diyɛ muŋ Yesus.
Ɛ Pilat jayɛ. Ɛ Yosɛp piɗyɛ muŋ Yesus kɛ kroa ɓɔyɛ nɛ ndɔmbɔ ɓu̧ kɛ̀ niŋgwɛ kɛ mɔy ɓoŋsɔŋ te yi ɓo timma kɛ nyaŋgwɛ tari kɛ́. Ɓo tì pumbɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ kɛte nɛ mbɔmbu na.
Yo ɓa̧ yesɔ te yi ɓo ɗiki komsa kɛte kɛ́, sendi ɓukwa̧ ndi mɔnɔ ŋgimɔ nɛ mbɛt, nɛ́ *Saba kandi.
Ɓoma ɓete ɓe ɓeŋgwa Yesus wulɛ Galile ɓaka ka̧ tikiɗye Yosɛp kɛ mbɛy ɓoŋsɔŋ. Ɓo ɓɛŋma ɓoŋsɔŋ ɓɛŋɛ sendi nda yi ɓo niŋgwa nɛ muŋ Yesus kɛte kɛ́.
Ɓo yɔkwa̧ mate kɛ̀ kombile yiŋa mɛmutɔ mɛte yi ɓa̧ nɛ kimɔ mɛtul nɛ̀ mɛlɔbinda. Kɛ yesɔ Saba ma ɗya̧, ɛ ɓo wɛɗya ɓeŋgwɛ mɛmboŋga man.
Misi pupɛ kɛ bosa yesɔ te ɛ kandɛ jɔnja sɔndi, ɛ ɓoma ɓaka tɛmɛ ɓemɛŋmɛnɛ nɛ sut, ɓu̧ mɛmutɔ mɛte yi ɓo kombila kɛ́ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ.
Ɓo ka̧ dolɔ nde, ɓo ma njeŋɛ tari te yi ɓo ɗiɓima nɛ numbu ɓoŋsɔŋ kɛ́ soŋɛ.
Ɛ ɓo nyiŋɛ kɛ mɔyte kinɛ ɓɛŋɛ muŋ Kumande Yesus na.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ ndi kɛ ŋgbakima yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́, ɓo sém semɔ, ɓembam yiɓa kɛ kɛki yan nɛ wumna mɛlambɔ nɛ mboŋ mboŋ.
Ɛ ɓoma gwe wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate sɔkwɛ mɛmbɔmbu ɓɛŋɛ mɛnɛti. Ɛ ɓembam ɓenɔri lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ŋge kelɛ yi wunɛ sa̧ mɔ te ɛ nɛ joŋ kɛ mbɛy ɓemuŋ kɛ́?
Yesus yeti se waka na, a womiya. Wunɛ tâka yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpima nyɛ wunɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ nɔ kɛ Galile kɛ́.
A lɛpima nde: ‹Yo kponate nde, ɓo ta ɗyaŋgwɛ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛɓeyɔ. Ɓo ta ŋgba nyɛ kɛ kroa, a má nje womiyɛ kɛ mɛtu yitati.› »
Ndana, ɛ ɓoma nje takɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi Yesus lɛpima kɛ́.
Ɛ ɓo yɔkwɛ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ kɛ̀ yekiɗye mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋnama hɛnɛ kɛ́ nyɛ ɓejekɛ kamɔ jɔ wɛtɛ nɛ̀ ɓari hɛnɛ.
Ɓoma ɓete ɓe yekiɗya mɛyasi mɛte nyɛ ɓotu ɓe tomun ɓe Yesus ɓaka ɓa̧ Mariya, ŋgɔndu Magdala nɛ̀ Yuwana nɛ̀ Mariya te nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Jak nje ɓu̧ ɓoma ɓete ɓe ɓenɛ ɓo ka̧ ɓaka.
Ɓotu ɓe tomun ɓe Yesus tì jayɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓoma yekiɗya nyɛ ɓo kɛ́ na. Ɓo ɓoŋma yo nda kanɔ.
Ko ɗete, ɛ Piyɛr sɛɗyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ. A ɓutumama, ɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ ndi mɛndɔmbɔ kɛ mɛnɛti. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ ŋgbakima yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́ ɓuɗyate kwa̧ nɔ kɛ̀ tu̧ ɗyenɛ.
Kɛ kiya yesɔ te ɓejekɛ ɓe Yesus yiɓa tɛmma yí kɛ̀ kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya nde Emayus, lɔndɔ te kilomɛta kamɔ jɔ wɛtɛ nɛ Yerusalɛm.
Ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ nyɛ mɛsimɔ kɛ kasi mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋnama hɛnɛ kɛ́.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ nyɛ mɛsimɔ ɓiye nɛ mɛso ɗete kɛ́, ɛ Yesus nje dolɔ ɓo tɔkɛ kɛndi ɓenɛ ɓo.
Ko ɗete, yiŋa yaŋa ɗiɓima misi man, ma ɓo mɛ nje duwɛ nyɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ diyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo mɛsimɔ mɛ ŋge yi wunɛ nyɛ kɛndɔ nɔ kɛ́?» Ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ nɛ tiŋna mɛŋgembi.
Kɛ njoka yan yiɓa, ɛ wɛtɛ nde Kleyopas yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Gba siya mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ kɛ Yerusalɛm kinɛ duwɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋnama kɛ mɛtu mɛte yikɛ kɛ́ ndi gba wɛ nyɛpɔ?»

Ɛ Yesus diyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo ŋge yi kwaŋnama kɛ́?» Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo kasi Yesus te mɔ Nasarɛt. A ɓa̧ ɗetina mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mɛkele nɛ̀ kɛ mɛlɛpi kɛ mbɔmbu Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓomɔ hɛnɛ.
Ɓekum ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓekum ɓusu ɓoŋma nyɛ nyɛ ɓekum ɓe Rom ɓe ɗiyɛ nɛ ɗya ɓaka, nɛ́ ɓo wo nyɛ. Ɛ ɓo ŋgba nyɛ kɛ kroa.
Wusɛ ɓa̧ nɛ ɓiɓina temɔ nde, yo nyɛ ta soŋɛ kandɔ Isarayɛl kɛ ɓeya ɗiyɔ. Yasi wɛtɛ, nɛ takinate yinɔri hɛnɛ, yo mɛ kɛ̀ muka mɛtu yitati yi mɛyasi mɛte kwaŋnama nɔ kɛ́.
Kɛ kimɔ lɛpinate ɓaŋa ɓoma kɛ njoka su nja̧ lekɛ temɔ su. Ɓo tɛmma muka ɓemɛŋmɛnɛ nɛ sut kɛ̀ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì dolɛ muŋ nɛ na. Ɓo yɔkwa̧ nje yekiɗye nyɛ wusɛ nde, ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ punja yotu nyɛ ɓo. Ɛ ɓejaki lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde, a nɛ joŋ.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɓaŋa ɓenjɔŋ ɓusu nja̧ kɛ̀ sendi kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ. Ɛ ɓo ɓɛŋɛ mɛyasi ndi nda yi ɓomari yekiɗya kɛ̀. Ndi nyɛ, ɓo tì ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ na.»
Ndana, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe kinɛ ɗyanɔ ɓaka, wunɛ yeti kɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpima kɛ́ nɛdɔ na.
’Yo tì ɓɛ nde, *Krist sâŋgwaŋgwɛ nɛ mɛbɔnɛ ɗete, na nje ɓɛ nɛ mɛluksa mɛnɛ na?»
Ɛ nyɛ nje nɛmbɛ kasi joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ kɛ mɔy mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ hɛnɛ kandɛ kɛ mɛkana mɛte yi Mɔyisi kɛtima kɛ́ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ mɛkana mɛ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ hɛnɛ.
Kɛ ɓo ma wuta nɛ ɗya te yi ɓejekɛ ɓa̧ kɛ kɛ̀ kɛte kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kelɛ nda a kɛ kwa̧ li̧ ɓo.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ ɓejekɛ jeliyɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Yakɔ sinɛ wunɛ, kɛto ɓekoko ma ɗya̧, yesɔ ma ɓalɔ.» Ɛ nyɛ nyiŋɛ tu̧, na kɛ̀ ya ɓenɛ ɓo.
Kɛ nyɛ ma kwa̧ ɗiyɔ ɓenɛ ɓo kɛ mbɛy mɛɗye kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ mampa nyɛ Njambiyɛ wosoko lekɛ nje ɓu̧ nyɛ ɓo.
Ndana, ɛ misi man ɓutuna, ɛ ɓo nje duwɛ nyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ ɗimbiyɛ kɛ misi man.
Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ tandɛ yan nde: «’Lɛpi te yi nyɛ ɗikima lɛpɔ nyɛ wusɛ kɛ nje nɛ̀ nɛmbina mɛlɛpi mɛte yi yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ te yi nyɛ ɗikima nɛmbɛ kɛ́ tì lu̧ wusɛ kɛ temɔ na?»
Ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ ndi kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ Yerusalɛm dolɔ ɓejekɛ kamɔ jɔ wɛtɛ nɛ̀ ɓenjɔŋ ɓan kɛ mbɛy wɛtɛ
kɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Kumande Yesus womiya gbate. A punja yotu nyɛ Simɔn.»
Ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓaka yiɓa nje yekiɗye sendi yasi te yi kwaŋnama nɛ ɓo kɛ nje kɛ́. Ɓo yekiɗya nda yi ɓo nja̧ duwɛ nɛ nyɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ lekima nɛ mampa kɛ́.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi ɓo ɓa̧ ndi kɛ yekiɗye ɗete kɛ́, ɓo sém semɔ, Yesus ɗyaŋma kɛ njoka yan lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ ɗîy nɛ tɛ!»
Ɛ ɓo gwe wɔ̧ ŋgwaŋgwa takɛ nde, ɓo ɓɛ́ŋa ablasa.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ gwe wɔ̧ kɛ́? Kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ ɓɛ sendi nɛ njɛl mɛtakɛ te yite kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ mun kɛ́?
