Wunɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa mɛɓɔ mɛmbɛ nɛ̀ mɛkol mɛmbɛ. Yo mi gbate gbate. Wunɛ ɓôɓila yotu mbɛ, nɛ́ wunɛ ɓɛŋa kimɔte, kɛto ablasa yeti nɛ mɛmbundɔ nɛ̀ mɛyesɔ nda yi mi tɛmɛ nɔ kɛ mbɔmbu wun kɛ́ na.»
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ ɗete teɗye nɛ ɓo mɛɓɔ nɛ̀ mɛkol mɛnɛ.
Ɓo tì jayɛ nɛdɔ na, kɛto mɛsosa kwaŋma ɓo. Nda ɓo ka̧ ndi mbɔmbu yi ŋgbakima kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ diyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ nɛ yiŋa yasi waka yi mumɔ yakama ɗye?»
Ɛ ɓo ɓu̧ ɓumbuna njanjɔ nɛ̀ papi jo wɛtɛ nyɛ nyɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ yo ɗye kɛ misi man.

Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mi ɓa̧ nɔ sinɛ wunɛ kɛ́, mi ɗikima lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi ɓa̧ kɛtinate kɛ kasi mbɛ kɛ mɔy mɛkana mɛ mɛmboŋga te yi Mɔyisi kɛtima nɛ̀ kɛ mɔy mɛkana mɛ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ kɛ mɔy mɛkana mɛ Ɓesom kɛ́ ta kelna gbate.»
Ndana, ɛ nyɛ ɓutɛ ɗyanɔ ɗyan, nɛ́ ɓo woku nɛ to mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo kɛtinate nde, *Krist ta saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ gwe nje womiyɛ kɛ njoka ɓemuŋ kɛ mɛtu yitati.
Ɓo ta pelɛ nyɛ mɛkandɔ hɛnɛ nɛ ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ nde, ɓo yêŋsaŋgwɛ mɛtemɔ jayɛ mɛɓeyɔ man, nɛ́ Njambiyɛ tiki ɓo nɛ ŋgwɛtɛ. Ɓo ta pelɛ kandɛ kɛ Yerusalɛm.
Wunɛ ta yekiɗye mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ ɓɛŋma kɛ́.
Wunɛ dûkwɛ nde, mi ta njesɛ wunɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ te yi Saŋmbɛ kpoma kɛ́ nɛ ŋguru wombɛ. Wunɛ ɗîy kɛ mɔy ɗya kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wunɛ ta ɓu̧ nɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɗeti te kɛ́. Yo ta wulɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ nje kɛ yotu yun.»
Ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ ɓo kɛ̀ nɔ pulɔ Betani. Ɛ nyɛ kaŋɛ mɛɓɔ kɛnjɛ kwey nyɛ ɓo mɛkombila.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ ndi kɛ nyɛ ɓo mɛkombila ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓaka nɛ ɓo. Ɛ Njambiyɛ yɔkiɗye nyɛ kɛnjɛ ɗyoɓɔ.
Kɛ ɓo ma si kanɔ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ Yerusalɛm nɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛsosa.
Ɓo ɗiyma mɛtu hɛnɛ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ yí lukse Njambiyɛ.
John: Piŋɔ te yi Njambiyɛ tì pa kusɔ mbokɔ na, yɔkɔ yi ɓo jeɓa nde Lɛpi*f1* kɔ ɓa̧ kɛte. A ɓa̧ ɓenɛ Njambiyɛ. Lɛpi te ndi Njambiyɛ.
Yɔkɔ yi ɓo jeɓa nde Lɛpi kɔ ɓa̧ ɓenɛ Njambiyɛ piŋɔ te yi Njambiyɛ tì pa kusɔ mbokɔ na.
Yɔkɔ yi ɓo jeɓa nde Lɛpi kɔ kusɛ mɛyasi hɛnɛ. Kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɗiyɛ kɛ́, kinɛ nyɛ na, ko ma yaŋa wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì kusuna na.
A ɓa̧ njuku joŋgwɛ, ɛ joŋgwɛ te ɓɛ mɛjasi mɛte yi ɓomɔ.
Ma mɛjasi mɛte kɛ panɔ kɛ mɔy yitil. Yasi wɛtɛ, yitil tì jayɛ mɛjasi na.
Njambiyɛ tomma wɛtɛ mbam njesɛ. Ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ ɓa̧ nde Jaŋ.
A nja̧, na nje pel yasi te yi nyɛ ɓɛŋma nɛ̀ yi nyɛ duwa̧ kɛ kasi mɛjasi maka, nɛ́ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ kwa̧ nɛ nje yasi te yi nyɛ pelɛ kɛ́ yí tikɔ nɛ temɔ kɛ mɛjasi mɛte.
Ndi nde, gba nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ tì ɓɛ mɛjasi mɛte na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a njáki, na nje lɛpi yasi te yi nyɛ ɓɛŋma nɛ̀ yi nyɛ duwa̧ kɛ kasi mɛjasi mɛte.
Mɛjasi mɛte ɓa̧ gbate kpasa mɛjasi mɛte yi nje kɛ to mɛnɛti paniyɛ puyɛ nyɛ mumɔ hɛnɛ.
Yɔkɔ yi ɓo jeɓa nde Lɛpi kɔ ɓa̧ kɛ to mɛnɛti. Sendi, Njambiyɛ kwaŋma nɛ nyɛ yí kusɔ nɛ mɛnɛti. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka tì duwɛ nyɛ na.
A ka̧ kɛ ɗya ɗyenɛ. Ko ɗete, ɓemaŋ tì jayɛ nyɛ na.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe jayma nyɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ nyɛ, a kelma nde, ɓo njâki nje ɓɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓe Njambiyɛ.
Ɓotu ɓete tî njaki nje ɓɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓe Njambiyɛ nɛ nje te yi mɛmbundɔ nda yi nyari ja nɛ mɔnɔsikɛ ho nda yi mbam kwaɗyɛ ɓɛ nɛ ɓɔnɔsikɛ kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, yo nde, yo Njambiyɛ nyɛ ɓo jɔnja joŋgwɛ.

Yɔkɔ yi ɓo jeɓa nde Lɛpi kɔ nja̧ yeŋsa ɓɛ gba mumɔ nɛ mɛmbundɔ. Ɛ nyɛ ɗiyɛ kɛ njoka su. A ɓa̧ tondunate nɛ ŋgikwa nɛ̀ gbakasi. Ɛ wusɛ ɓɛŋɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele mɛnɛ, nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele mɛte yi Da nya Kikɔ Mɔnɔ wenɛ ɗeti te yi kelɔ.

Jaŋ lɛpima yasi te yi nyɛ duwa̧ kɛ kasi nɛ, ɛ nyɛ kembiɗya lɛpɔ nde: «Yo nyɛ yi mi ɗikima lɛpɔ nde: ‹Yɔkɔ ɛ ta nje kɛ kɔŋ mbɛ kɔ kwa̧ mi, kɛto nyɛ kɛte kpo nɛ kpo. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi njáki nje mbɛ njimɛ.› »
Wusɛ hɛnɛ ɓoŋma kwalɔ kimɔ mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi yo tondunate kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ kɛ́.
Njambiyɛ kwaŋma nɛ Mɔyisi yí nyɛ nɛ wusɛ mɛmboŋga mɛnɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, yí teɗye ŋgikwa nɛ̀ gbakasi nyɛ ɓomɔ, a nja̧ kwa̧ nɛ Yesus Krist.
Ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì ɓɛŋɛ Njambiyɛ wɛtɛ yesɔ, soŋɛ ndi Kikɔ Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ, nyɛ ɛ ɗiyɛ ɓenɛ Saŋgwɛ nda kɔl ɓenɛ jon kɔ, yo ndi nyɛ kelma nde, ɓomɔ dûkwɛ nyɛ.
Wɛtɛ yesɔ ɓaŋa ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn ɓe Yerusalɛm tomma ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓe kandɔ *Levi kɛ̀ diyɛ Jaŋ nde: «Wɛ, wɛ nda?» Ɛ Jaŋ lɛpɛ yasi te yi nyɛ duwa̧ kɛ́.
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nɛ saŋsaŋ kinɛ sɔɗyɛ yaŋa na lɛpɔ nde: «Mi yeti mbɛ *Krist na.»

Ɛ ɓo nje diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ ɓa nda, wɛ Eli?» Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Ko na, mi yeti Eli na.» Ɛ ɓo kɛ̀ mbɔmbu diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ te yi ɓo ɗikima lɛpɔ nde, a ta nje kɔ?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Ɓɛ.»
Ɛ ɓo nje diyɛ nyɛ ndana nde: «Wɛ ɓa nda? Lɛpɔ nyɛ wusɛ, kɛto wusɛ yâkaŋgwɛ kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe tomma wusɛ ɓaka. Ndana, wɛ nɛ ŋguru wɔ lɛ́pi nde, wɛ nda?»
Ɛ Jaŋ lɛpɛ nde: «Mi mbɛ mɔ te yɔkɔ yi Esayi te mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpima nde: ‹Wɛtɛ mumɔ kɛ kembiɗya kɛ mɔy koŋgor nde: Wunɛ tɛ̂mbiɗya nje Baba Mbokɔ nɛ ŋgbeŋ.› »
Ɓotu ɓete yi ɓo tomma ɓaka ɓa̧ kɛ njɔŋ *Ɓefarisɛ̧.
Ɛ ɓo diyɛ Jaŋ nde: «Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, we yeti *Krist ho Eli ho mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, ma kɛto ŋge yi wɛ nje tɔpɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku kɛ́?»
Ɛ Jaŋ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi tɔ́pa mbɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku. Yasi wɛtɛ, yo nɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ kɛ njoka yun yi wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ na.
Mɔ te ta nje kɛ kɔŋ mbɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi ti yaka wunjɛ kɔl mɛnakala kɛ kol nɛ na.»
Mɛyasi mɛte kwáŋnaŋgwɛ kɛ wɛtɛ mbɛy nde Betani kɛ ŋginjɛ Yurdɛ̧, kɛ mbɛy te yi Jaŋ ɗikima tɔpɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku kɛ́.
Misi pupɛ Jaŋ ɓɛ́ŋa Yesus kɛ nje kɛ yenɛ. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa *Mɔnɔ Sam Njambiyɛ ɛ soŋɛ mɛɓeyɔ mɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka kɔ!
Yo nyɛ yi mi ɗikima lɛpɔ mbɛ kasi nɛ nde: ‹Kɛ kɔŋ mbɛ, wɛtɛ mumɔ ta nje, nyɛ kwa̧ mi, kɛto nyɛ kɛte kpo nɛ kpo. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi njáki nje mbɛ njimɛ.›
Kɛ yembɛ, mi tì ɓɛ kɛ duwɛ tɛri nɛ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi nja̧ kɛ mɛsay mɛ tɔpuna ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku, nɛ́ ɓotu ɓe kandɔ Isarayɛl duwɛ nɛ nyɛ.»
Ɛ Jaŋ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nɛ saŋsaŋ nde: «Mi ɓɛŋma Kimɔ Sisiŋ nɛ misi mɛmbɛ kɛ piyɛ wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ nda pepɔ nje ɗiyɔ kɛ yotu nɛ.

Kɛ yembɛ, mi tì ɓɛ mbɛ kɛ duwɛ tɛri nɛ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, yɔkɔ ɛ tomma mi nde, mi njâki tɔpɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku kɔ lɛpima nyɛ mi nde: ‹Mɔ te yi wɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ kɛ piyɛ nje ɗiyɔ kɛ yotu nɛ kɔ, yo nyɛ ta tɔpɛ ɓomɔ kɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ.›
Mi ɓɛŋma mbɛ nyɛ nɛ gba misi mɛmbɛ, ɛ mi lɛpɛ nde: Yɔkɔ Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ!»
Ya tu wɛtɛ kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Jaŋ ɓɛ ndi kɛ kiya mbɛy te yi nyɛ ɗikima kɛ̀ kɛte kɛ́ ɓenɛ ɓaŋa ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ yiɓa.
Ndana, kɛ nyɛ ma kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ Yesus kɛ kwa̧ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa, *Mɔnɔ Sam Njambiyɛ kɔ!»
Ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ ɓenɔri yiɓa wokuma yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpima kɛ́, ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ ɓeŋgwɛ Yesus.
Kɛ Yesus ma yeŋsa kɛ́, a ɓɛ́ŋa, ɓo kɛ ɓeŋgwɛ nyɛ. Ɛ nyɛ diyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ sáŋ ŋge?» Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Rabi,» yite nde yekele, «wɛ ɗíy ɗiyɔ we?»
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ njâki ɓɛŋɛ.» Ɗete, ɛ ɓo kɛ̀ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ mbɛy nɛ. Ɛ ɓo kwaŋɗye ɓukwɛ yesɔ te ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus. Yo ɓa̧ kɛ pɔku ŋgimɔ yini te yi ɓekoko.
Kɛ njoka ɓejekɛ ɓaka yiɓa ɓe wokuma yasi te yi Jaŋ lɛpima, ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ ɓeŋgwɛ Yesus ɓaka, Andere te maŋ nɛ Simɔn Piyɛr ɓa̧ kɛ njokate.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Andere kwa̧ nɛdɔ kɛ dolɔ maŋ wenɛ Simɔn lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wusɛ ɓɛŋma Mɛsi,» yite nde *Krist.
Ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ Simɔn kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ yi Yesus. Ɛ Yesus kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ Simɔn lɛpɔ nde: «Ɗinɔ ɗyɔ nde Simɔn, ɗinɔ sɔŋgwɛ nde Jaŋ. Ɓo ta jeɓa wɛ nde Sefas, yo Piyɛr, yite nde tari.»
Misi pupɛ ɛ Yesus pɛsɛ nde, a kɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ Galile. Ɛ nyɛ saŋgwa nɛ wɛtɛ mbam nde Filip. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɓeŋgwɛ mi.»
Filip ɓa̧ mɔ ɗya Betsayda, ɗya ɓe Andere ɓenɛ Piyɛr.

Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Filip kwa̧ saŋgwa ɓenɛ Nataniyɛl. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wusɛ ɓɛŋma mɔ te yi Mɔyisi kɛtima yasi kɛ kasi nɛ kɛ mɛkana mɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ te yi nyɛ kɛtima kɛ́. Ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpima sendi kasi nɛ. Mɔ te, yo Yesus te mɔnɔ Yosɛp, ɗya ɗyenɛ kɛ Nasarɛt.»
Ɛ Nataniyɛl yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kimɔ yasi te nda yakama wulɛ kɛ Nasarɛt kɔ?» Ɛ Filip nje yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Inja nje ɓɛŋɛ.»
Yesus ɓɛŋma Nataniyɛl kɛ kɛ̀ kɛ yenɛ. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ kɛ kasi nɛ nde: «Yɔkɔ gba mɔnɔ kandɔ Isarayɛl nɛ yotu. Ko mɔnɔ yekambiyɛ te yi seɓila mumɔ yeti kɛ yotu nɛ na.»
Ɛ Nataniyɛl diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ dúkwɛ mi we?» Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Piŋɔ te yi Filip tì pa jeɓa wɛ na, kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi wɛ ɓa̧ kɛ nji̧ *figiye kɛ́, mi ɓɛŋma wɛ.»
Ɛ Nataniyɛl yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele, wɛ Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ, wɛ Kumande Isarayɛl.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Yo kɛto mi lɛpima nyɛ wɛ nde, mi ɓɛŋma wɛ kɛ nji̧ *figiye, yori yi wɛ tikɛ nɛ temɔ ndana nɛ mi kɛ́? Ma wɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ yiŋa nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele kwa̧ yikɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Wunɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ ɗyoɓɔ nyasɛ, ɓɛŋɛ ɓejaki ɓe Njambiyɛ kɛ kɛ̀ kwey piyɛ yaka nɛ to *Mɔnɔ mumɔ.»
Ya mɛtu yiɓa kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ yo ɓɛ nɛ yiŋa jesɔ gwaki kɛ Kana kɛ Galile. Nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛte.
Ɓo jeɓama sendi Yesus ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kɛ jesɔ gwaki te.
Ɗiyɔ kɛ́, ɛ mɛnjam siyɛ kɛ mbɛy jesɔ. Ɛ nyaŋgwɛ nɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mɛnjam siyma.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyari, sinɛ wɛ nɛ lɛpi te nda? Ŋgimɔ te yembɛ tì pa ɗya̧ na.»
Ɛ nyaŋgwɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛsay nde: «Yasi hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ ta lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ, nɛ̀ wunɛ kêl yo.»

Yinɔri nyaŋgwɛ mɛmbe yitan jɔ wɛtɛ yi ɓo kelma nɛ tari kɛ́ ɓa̧ womɛte. Mɛmbe mɛte ɗikima ɓɛ nɛ mɔrɔku te yi Ɓeyudɛn ɗikima kitɔ nɛ yotu nda yi mɛmboŋga mɛ misɔn yan ɗikima teɗye kɛ. Mbe te wɛtɛ yakama ɓu̧ mɛndaki nda gɔmay wɛtɛ nɛ numbu te.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛsay nde: «Wunɛ tâya mɔrɔku tonjɛ mɛmbe mɛnɔri.» Ɛ ɓo tayɛ mɔrɔku tonjɛ mɛmbe nɛ lɛtɛtɛ.
Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ tâya yo ndana nɛ mbɛt kɛ̀ nyɛ mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ nɛ kaɓina mɛɗye kɔ.» Ɛ ɓo tayɛ kɛ̀ nyɛ nyɛ.

Ɛ nyɛ ɓoɓɛ mɔrɔku mɛnɔri yi ma liŋgwɛ mɛnjam kɛ́, ma a tì duwɛ nɛ mbɛy te yi mɛnjam mɛte wulma nje nɔ kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓotu ɓe mɛsay, ɓo ɓotu ɓete ɓe tayma mɔrɔku ɓaka duwa̧ to te kimɔte. Ndana, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ jeɓa mbam te ɛ kelma gwaki kɔ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde:

«Kɛ kaɓina mɛnjam hɛnɛ, ɓo kánda kaɓɔ kimɔ mɛnjam nyɛ ɓomɔ. Kɛ kɔŋte, ɓo má nje nyɛ ɓo yikɛ yi ti kumɔ nyɔŋɔ kɛ́ njimɛ, kɛ misi man mɛ kɛ linja. Ma yasi wɛtɛ, wɛ ɓakiɗya yɔ kimɔ mɛnjam yí laɗye nɛ ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ.»
Kɛ njoka mɛyekambiyɛ hɛnɛ te yi Yesus kelma kɛ́, a kánda nɛ yɔkɔ yi nyɛ kelma ndana kɛ Kana kɛ Galile kɔ. Ɗete, a teɗya nyaŋgwɛ ɗeti nɛ, ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ tikɛ temɔ kɛ yenɛ.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus sɛliyɛ kɛ̀ kɛ Kapɛrnawum ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ nɛ̀ ɓemaŋ nɛ̀ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ. Ɓo kwaŋɗya ndi mɔnɔ mɛtu nɛ mbɛt mate.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite jesɔ *Paska Ɓeyudɛn ɓa̧ kɛ wuta. Ɛ Yesus kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ Yerusalɛm.
Kɛ nyɛ ma ɗya̧ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ́, a dól ɓomɔ kɛ ɗyaŋgwɛ mɛyasi, ɓe ɗyaŋgwɛ ɓenday, ɓe ɗyaŋgwɛ ɓesam nɛ̀ ɓe ɗyaŋgwɛ ɓepepɔ. A dolma sendi ɓotu ɓe sɛnjina mɔni kɛ ɗiyɔ.
Ndana, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ mɛkɔl ɓɔyɛ kelɔ nɛ njambala ɗuɗye ɓo hɛnɛ punjɛ womɛte ɓenɛ ɓesam ɓan nɛ̀ ɓenday ɓan. Ɛ nyɛ si wanjɔ mɔni mɛ ɓotu ɓe sɛnjina mɔni tindɔ mɛteɓel ɓetɛ kɛ mɛnɛti.
Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓe ɗyaŋgwa ɓepepɔ nde: «Wunɛ lɔ̂ndu nɛ mɛyasi mɛte yikɛ waka. Wunɛ tî yeŋsaŋgwɛ tu̧ Saŋmbɛ nɛ tu̧ mɛjɛŋ na.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nje takɛ lɛpi te yi yo kɛtinate kɛ mɔy mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́. Yo kɛtinate nde: ‹Mi kwaɗya tu̧ ɗyɔ nɛ temɔ mbɛ hɛnɛ. Yo ta kelɔ nde, mi sɔ̂mbu sɔŋ kɛto te.›
Kɛ ɓaŋa ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn ma ɓɛŋɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo kwalɔ mɛyekambiyɛ te nda yi wɛ ta kelɔ yí teɗye nɛ wusɛ nde, ɓo nya wɛ ɗeti te yi kelɔ mɛyasi mɛte yi wɛ kelɛ kɛ́?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ yâŋgila mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ te yikɛ, ndi kɛ mɛtu yitati mi ta si sumɔ yo nɛ kɔkɔ.»
Ɛ ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn nje lɛpɔ nde: «Sumna mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ te yikɛ ɓoŋma wusɛ pɔkɛ mɛsew kamɔni jɔ yitan jɔ wɛtɛ. ’Wɛ lɛ́pi gba nde, wɛ ta nje sumɔ yo ndi kɛ mɛtu yitati nde?»
Yasi wɛtɛ, Yesus ti lɛ́pi kasi mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ na, a lɛ́pi nɛ yotu nɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ.

Ndana, kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus ma nje womiyɛ kɛ njoka ɓemuŋ kɛ́, ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ takɛ lɛpi kɛ yi nyɛ ɗikima lɛpɔ kɛ́. Ɛ ɓo tikɛ temɔ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́, tikɔ temɔ sendi kɛ lɛpi te yikɛ yi Yesus lɛpima kɛ́.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yinɔri yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ Yerusalɛm kɛ jesɔ *Paska Ɓeyudɛn kɛ́, ɛ ɓuɗya ɓomɔ tikɛ temɔ nɛ nyɛ, kɛto ɓo ɓɛŋma mɛyekambiyɛ mɛte yi nyɛ ɗikima kelɔ kɛ́.
Yasi wɛtɛ, Yesus tì tikɛ temɔ kɛ yan na, kɛto a ɓa̧ kɛ duwɛ ɓo hɛnɛ kandɛ nyiŋɔ to kumɔ nyɛy kol.
Kɛ yenɛ, yo tì ɓɛ nde, wɛtɛ mumɔ pâŋ pa lɛpɔ yiŋa yaŋa te yi mɔ te duwa̧ kɛ kasi wɛtɛ mumɔ nyɛ nyɛ na. Kɛto nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ duwa̧ yasi te yi ɗiyɛ kɛ mɔy temɔ mumɔ kɛ́.
Wɛtɛ mbam ɓa̧ kɛ njɔŋ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ nde Nikɔdɛm. A ɓa̧ sendi wɛtɛ kum kɛ njoka Ɓeyudɛn.

Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ wɛtɛ yesɔ nɛ tu kɛ yi Yesus lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele, wusɛ duwa̧ nde, wɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɔ teɗya mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ. Njambiyɛ tomma wɛ njesɛ, kɛto mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ ti yaka kelɔ kwalɔ mɛyekambiyɛ mɛte yi wɛ kelɛ kɛ́, ŋgɛ Njambiyɛ ti ɓɛ kɛ yenɛ na.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wɛ kɛ́: Ŋgɛ mumɔ ti jaɗyɛ nɛ kɔkɔ na, a ti yaka ɓɛŋɛ *Kandɔ Njambiyɛ na.»
Ɛ Nikɔdɛm nje diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ŋgɛ mumɔ si jombɛ, a yakama kelɔ nan yí jaɗyɛ nɔ nɛ kɔkɔ? ’A yakama yɔkwɛ sendi nyiŋɛ mɔy nyaŋgwɛ nje jaɗyɛ nɛ kɔkɔ?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wɛ kɛ́: Ŋgɛ mumɔ ti jaɗyɛ nɛ kɔkɔ nɛ nje te yi mɔrɔku, jaɗyɛ sendi nɛ nje te yi Kimɔ Sisiŋ na, a ti yaka nyiŋɛ kɛ Kandɔ Njambiyɛ na.
Yasi te yi wulɛ kɛ yi mumɔ nɛ nje te yi mɛmbundɔ ɓɛ́ŋnaŋgwɛ ɓɔnɛ ndi nde, yo wúla kɛ yi mɔ mɛmbundɔ. Yasi wɛtɛ, yasi te yi wulɛ kɛ yi Kimɔ Sisiŋ ɓɛ́ŋnaŋgwɛ ɓɔnɛ, ndi nde, yo wúla kɛ yi Kimɔ Sisiŋ.
Wɛ tî ŋgbakimaŋgwɛ lɛpi te yi mi lɛpima nyɛ wɛ nde: ‹Wunɛ yâkaŋgwɛ jaɗyɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ́› na.

Pupɔ kwáŋ kɛ mbɛy hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ kwaɗyɛ kwa̧ kɛte kɛ́. Wɛ kɛ wokɔ nda yi yo muŋgula nɔ kɛ̀. Ma yasi wɛtɛ, wɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ mbɛy te yi yo wulma kɛte nɛ̀ mbɛy te yi yo kɛ̀ kɛte kɛ́ na. Yo kwáŋnaŋgwɛ ndi sendi ɗete kɛ yi mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ jaɗyɛ nɛ nje te yi Kimɔ Sisiŋ kɔ.»
Ɛ Nikɔdɛm nje ɗiyɔ diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo yakama kwaŋna nan?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Gba wɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɔ teɗya mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ kandɔ Isarayɛl, ’wɛ kɛ ndekima mɛyasi mɛnɔri?
Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wɛ kɛ́: Wusɛ lɛ́pi yasi te yi wusɛ duwa̧, yekiɗye yasi te yi wusɛ ɓɛŋma. Ko ɗete, ko wunɛ yeti kɛ jayɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi wusɛ nje lɛpɔ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte kɛ́ na.

Mi lɛpinama kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi kwaŋna kɛ to mɛnɛti waka kɛ nyɛ wunɛ, ma wunɛ tì jayɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛte na. Ndana, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, mi lɛ̂pinaŋgwɛ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓɛŋɛ kasi ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́ nyɛ wunɛ, ŋge ta nje kelɔ nde, wunɛ jâya tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte?
Kinɛ mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ ɛ ɓendima kɛ ɗyoɓɔ na, soŋɛ ndi yɔkɔ ɛ piya wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɔ. [Mɔ te, yo *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ɛ ɗiyɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɔ.]
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Mɔyisi ɓa̧ nɔ kɛ koŋgor kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ yekambiyɛ nyɔŋɛ nyɛ kɛ jeti tɛmbiɗye kɛ kwey. Yo ndi ɗete sendi yi ɓo yâkaŋgwɛ kelɔ nɛ Mɔnɔ mumɔ tɛmbiɗye kɛ kwey.
Yo yâkaŋgwɛ kelna ɗete, nɛ́ mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ nyɛ kɔ ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo.
Yo nde, Njambiyɛ jekima kwaɗyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka, ɛ nyɛ nyɛ nɛ Kikɔ Mɔnɔ wenɛ. Ɗete, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ ta tikɔ temɔ nɛ nyɛ, a tí gwe yambile na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a ta ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo.
Kɛto, Njambiyɛ ti ma njésikwɛ Mɔnɔ wenɛ kɛ mɛnɛti maka, na nje jɔse ɓomɔ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a tomma nyɛ njesɛ nde, na kwa̧ nɛ nje nɛ joŋgwɛ nɛ ɓo.
Mɔ te ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ nyɛ, Njambiyɛ yeti kɛ jɔse nyɛ na. Ma yasi wɛtɛ, yɔkɔ ɛ ɗiyɛ kinɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ nyɛ, Njambiyɛ ma jɔse nyɛ, kɛto a tì tikɛ temɔ kɛ yi Kikɔ Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ na.
To jɔsi te yo nde, mɛjasi nja̧ kɛ to mɛnɛti. Ɛ ɓomɔ yɔkwɛ kwaɗyɛ yitil sɛŋɛ mɛjasi, kɛto ɓo kwáɗyikwɛ kelɔ ndi ɓeya mɛkele.
Yo nde, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ kelɛ ndi ɓeya mɛkele kɛ ɓenɔ mɛjasi. A ti njáki kɛ puyɛ na, kambɔ mɛkele mɛnɛ nje pundɔ puyɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ wokuna nɛ Njambiyɛ kelɔ mɛyasi nɛ ŋgbeŋ, mɔ te njáki kɛ puyɛ, nɛ́ ɓomɔ ɓɛŋ gbate nde, a kél mɛyasi nda yi Njambiyɛ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́.»
Ndana, kɛ kɔŋ mɛyasi mɛnɔri, ɛ Yesus tɛmɛ kwa̧ ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kɛ̀ kɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Yuda. Ɛ nyɛ kwaŋɗye ɓuɗya mɛtu mate ɓenɛ ɓo ɗiki tɔpɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite Jaŋ ɓa̧ sendi kɛ ɗiki tɔpɛ ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku kɛ wɛtɛ mbɛy nde Enɔŋ kɛ kɛki Salim. Jaŋ ɗikima kɛ̀ mate, kɛto mɔrɔku ɓa̧ ɓuɗyate mate. Ɗete, ɓomɔ ɗikima kɛ̀, ɛ nyɛ ɗiki tɔpɛ ɓo kɛ mɔrɔku.
Yo kwaŋnama ɗete, kɛto kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite ɓo tì pa nyɛ Jaŋ kɛ jɔɓɔ na.
Ndana, ɛ wɛtɛ mɔ Ɓeyudɛn ɓɛ nɛ mɛtandɔ ɓenɛ ɓaŋa ɓejekɛ ɓe Jaŋ kɛ kasi mɛweya mɛsɛmbɔ te yi mɛmboŋga man teɗye kɛ́.

Ɛ ɓo tɛmɛ kɛ̀ dolɔ Jaŋ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele ɓɛŋa, mɔ te yi wúnɛ nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ ŋginjɛ Yurdɛ̧ yi wɛ ɗikima lɛpɔ kasi nɛ nyɛ ɓomɔ kɔ mɛ nɛ kɛ tɔpɛ ɓomɔ ndana kɛ mɔrɔku. Ma ɓomɔ hɛnɛ kɛ si lekwɛ kɛ̀ pɛ yenɛ.»
Ɛ Jaŋ yeŋsa nde: «Ŋgɛ Njambiyɛ ti nyɛ mumɔ ɗeti na, a ti yaka kelɔ yaŋa na.
Wunɛ nɛ ŋguru wun yakama lɛpɔ yasi te yi mi lɛpima kɛ́. Wunɛ wokuma nda yi mi lɛpima nde: Mi yeti mbɛ *Krist na. Yasi wɛtɛ, Njambiyɛ kandima tomɔ mi nde, mi kwâŋ mbɔmbu nɛ nyɛ.»

Ɛ Jaŋ kɛ̀ sendi mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Nya gwaki wókunaŋgwɛ nɛ mbam gwaki. Ma sɔ nɛ mbam gwaki ɗíy nɛ ɗiyɔ kɛ kɛki sɔ wenɛ yí lɛŋgwɛ mɛtɔ kɛ yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́. A nɛ mɛsosa ɓuɗyate komɛ nyɛ wokɛ mɛn mbam gwaki kɛ́. Njena nyaŋgwɛ mɛsosa yi mi nɔ ndana kɛ́, yo kwalɔ mɛsosa te yite.»
Ɛ Jaŋ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Mɛkele mɛnɛ ɗɔ̂ku ɗɔkɔ kɛ̀ nɔ mbɔmbu, nɛ̀ yembɛ yɔ̂kwɛ sinɛ sina.»
«Yɔkɔ ɛ wulɛ kwey nje nɔ kɔ kwa̧ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ. Mɔ mɛnɛti maka ndi mɔ mɛnɛti, a lɛ́pi ndi sendi yasi te yi ɓɛŋɛ mɛnɛti. Yɔkɔ ɛ wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ nje nɔ kɔ kwa̧ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ.
Mɛyasi mɛte yi nyɛ ɓɛŋma nɛ̀ yi nyɛ wokuma, yo yite yi nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓomɔ. Ma ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ yeti kɛ jayɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi nyɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́ na.
Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ ma jayɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi nyɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́ ma pɛsɔ gbate nde, Njambiyɛ nyɛ yɔkɔ ɛ lɛpɛ gbakasi.
Yo nde, yɔkɔ yi Njambiyɛ tomma kɔ lɛ́pi ndi mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, kɛto Njambiyɛ tonja Sisiŋ nɛ kɛ yotu nɛ ndi tu wɛtɛ.
Saŋgwɛ kɛ kwaɗyɛ Mɔnɔ, ɛ nyɛ nyɛ nyɛ ɗeti te yi namɔ mɛyasi hɛnɛ.
Mɔ te ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ Mɔnɔ, mɔ te nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo. Ma yɔkɔ ɛ kelɛ mbandɔ kinɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ Mɔnɔ, mɔ te tí ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgambi Njambiyɛ ta ɗiyɔ ndi kɛ to nɛ, ɓɔnɛ kɛte.»
Yesus duwa̧ nde, *Ɓefarisɛ̧ wokuma nde, a ma ɓu̧ ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate kɛnjɛ kɛ kɔŋ nɛ kwa̧ Jaŋ, wokɔ sendi nde, a kɛ tɔpɛ ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate kɛ mɔrɔku kwa̧ nyɛ.
Kɛ yinɔri hɛnɛ, ko Yesus tì tɔpɛ mumɔ nɛ ɓɔ nɛ kɛ mɔrɔku na, yo ɓa̧ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ.
Ndana, kɛ Yesus ma duwɛ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɗuwɛ kɛ Yuda yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ Galile.
Yi yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ nɔ Galile, ɛ nyɛ pɛsɛ nde, a yâkaŋgwɛ kwa̧ nɛ Samari.
Ndana, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kumɔ kɛ kɛki wɛtɛ ɗya nde Sikar kɛ Samari. Ɗya te ɓa̧ kɛ kɛki pɛl mɛnɛti mɛte yi Yakɔp ma nyɛ́ki mɔnɔ wenɛ Yosɛp nɛ likɔ kɛ mɛtu mɛ mbɔmbu kɛ́.
Ŋgɛ̧ Yakɔp ɓa̧ womɛte. Nda yotu Yesus ɓa̧ katinate nɛ kɛndi kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ kɛ kɛki ŋgɛ̧. Yo ɓa̧ kɛ pɔku ɓembe yesɔ.
Yaka nɔ, wɛtɛ nya Samari kɛ nje tayɛ mɔrɔku. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyɛkɔ mi mɔrɔku, nɛ́ mi hɔɓiye.»
Yinɔri ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ ma kɛ̀ kɛ mɔy ɗya kɛ̀ ɓɔmɔ mɛɗye.
Ɛ nya Samari kɔ nje ɗiyɔ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Gba wɛ mɔ Ɓeyudɛn njáki diyɛ mi ŋgɔndu Samari mɔrɔku nɛ nje te yin?» Nya kɔ lɛ́pi ɗete, kɛto Ɓeyudɛn ɓenɛ ɓotu ɓe Samari ɓa̧ nda nja mbo ɓenɛ ɗitɛ.

Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ má dukwɛ yasi te yi Njambiyɛ nyɛ kɛ́, duwɛ sendi mɔ te ɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ wɛ nde: ‹Nyɛkɔ mi mɔrɔku, nɛ́ mi hɔɓiye kɔ,› ma yo gba wɛ jɔmbɛ mɔrɔku kɛ ɓɔ nɛ. Ma nyɛ nya wɛ mɔrɔku mɛte yi kelɛ nde, mumɔ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ joŋgwɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ nyari lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, mapi te yi wɛ ta tayɛ nɛ mɔrɔku yeti. Sendi, mbɛy tayna mɔrɔku nɛ heɓeɓe. Ma wɛ ta nje ɓu̧ ɓa mɔrɔku mɛte yi kelɛ nde, ɓomɔ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ joŋgwɛ kɛ́ we?
Saŋmbambɔ wusu Yakɔp tikima wusɛ nɛ ŋgɛ̧ kɛ. Nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ nɛ̀ ɓɔnɔ ɓenɛ nɛ̀ ɓetitɛr ɓenɛ hɔɓiya ndi mɔrɔku mɛ ŋgɛ̧ kɔ. Ma ndana, ’wɛ táka gba nde, wɛ kwa̧ nyɛ?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ hɔɓiye mɔrɔku mɛte yikɛ ta kɛ̀ mbɔmbu gwe yɛsiɗyɛ.

Yasi wɛtɛ, mɔ te ɛ ta hɔɓiye mɔrɔku mɛte yi mi ta nyɛ nyɛ kɛ́ tí gwe se yɛsiɗyɛ wɛtɛ yesɔ na. Yo nde, mɔrɔku mɛte yi mi ta nyɛ nyɛ kɛ́ ta nje ɓɛ kɛ yotu nɛ nda ŋgɛ̧ te yi sokula kɛ́, kelɔ nde, a ɓɛ̂ki nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo.»
Ɛ nyari yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, nyɛkɔ mi mɔrɔku mɛte yite, ma mi nje kɛ̀ mbɔmbu gwe yesiɗyɛ yí kala nje sendi waka nje tayɛ mɔrɔku.»
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kɛn jeɓa njoŋɔ, nɔ̀ yɔ̂kwɛ nje sendi waka.»
Ɛ nyari yeŋsa nde: «Mi yeti nɛ mbam na.»

Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yi wɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́, gbakasi. Wɛ yeti nɛ mbam gbate na, kɛto kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyɔ, wɛ ma ɓɛ nɛ ɓembam kumɔ yitan. Mbam te yi wúnɛ nyɛ joŋna ndana kɔ, yeti njoŋɔ na. Yasi te yi wɛ lɛpima kɛ́, yo gbakasi.»
Ndana, ɛ nyari yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, mi kɛ ɓɛŋɛ nde, wɛ wɛtɛ mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ɓesaŋmbambɔ ɓusu ɗikima kanɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ gba keki te yɔkɔ. Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ Ɓeyudɛn kpál lɛpɔ yun nde, mumɔ hɛnɛ yâkaŋgwɛ kanɔ Njambiyɛ ndi kɛ Yerusalɛm.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyari, jaya yasi te yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wɛ kɛ́ kimɔte. Ŋgimɔ kɛ nje yi wunɛ tí kanɔ se Saŋgwɛ Njambiyɛ ko kɛ keki te yɔkɔ ko kɛ Yerusalɛm na.
Wunɛ ɓotu ɓe Samari yeti kɛ duwɛ yasi te yi wunɛ kanɛ kɛ́ na. Ma wusɛ kán su yasi te yi wusɛ kɛ duwɛ. Kɛto nje joŋgwɛ wúla kɛ yi Ɓeyudɛn nje nɔ.

Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgimɔ kɛ nje, yo ma si ɗya̧, ŋgimɔ te yi gba kpasa ɓotu ɓete ɓe kanɛ Saŋgwɛ Njambiyɛ ta kanɔ nyɛ nɛ nje te yi sisiŋ nɛ̀ gbakasi. Kɛto saŋgwɛ Njambiyɛ sáŋ kwalɔ ɓotu ɓete ɓe kanɛ nyɛ nɛ nje te yite.
Njambiyɛ, nyɛ Sisiŋ. Ɗete, ɓomɔ ɓe kanɛ nyɛ, ɓo yâkaŋgwɛ kanɔ nyɛ nɛ nje te yi sisiŋ nɛ̀ gbakasi.»
Ɛ nyari yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mi duwa̧ nde, Mɛsi, yite nde *Krist ta nje. Komɛ nyɛ ta nje kɛ́, a ta nɛmbɛ to mɛyasi hɛnɛ nyɛ wusɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Gba mi kɔ, mɔ te yi wɛ lɛpɛ kasi nɛ kɔ, gba mi ɛ lɛpina nyɛ wɛ kɔ!»

Yaka nɔ, ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kɛ yɔkwɛ. Ɛ ɓo ŋgbakima yi ɓɛŋɛ nde, Yesus kɛ lɛpina ɓenɛ nyari. Ko ɗete, mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì ɓutɛ numbu lɛpɔ nde: ‹Wɛ díya ɓa nyɛ ŋge?› ho nde: ‹Yo lɛpi te nda yi wúnɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́?›
Ndana, ɛ nyari tikɛ mapi tayna mɔrɔku womɛte kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ mɔy ɗya lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓomɔ nde:
«Wunɛ njâki ɓɛŋɛ ndi wɛtɛ mbam. A lɛpima mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi mi kelma kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyembɛ kɛ́ nyɛ mi. ’Mbam te yeti *Krist na?»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo pundɛ ɗuwɛ kɛ mɔy ɗya kɛ̀ komɛ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ́.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite ɓejekɛ ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ Yesus lɛpɔ nde: «Yekele, pa ɗyena wa.»
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi nɛ mɛɗye te yi ɗye, ma wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ mɛɗye mɛte na.»
Ɛ ɓejekɛ lɛpɛ tandɛ yan nde: «’Yite nde, wɛtɛ mumɔ ma njesɛ nyɛ yiŋa mɛɗye?»
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mɛɗye mɛmbɛ, yo nde, mi kêl yasi te yi Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ kwaɗyɛ, tonjɛ sendi mɛsay mɛnɛ.

’Wunɛ ti lɛ́pi lɛpɔ nde: ‹Ɓukwa̧ ndi ŋgwɛndɛ yini, nɛ́ ɓo kandi soŋna nyambi kɛ ŋgwaŋ na?› Nɛ lɛ̂ŋgwɛ mɛtɔ, mi kɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ nde: Wunɛ kâŋa misi ɓɛŋɛ nɛ mɛŋgwaŋ. Nyambi ma ɗetɔ, ŋgimɔ soŋnate ma yaka.
Mɔ te ɛ soŋɛ nyambi kɔ kɛ dolɔ nduku mɛsay mɛnɛ kɛ ɓɔ masa mɛsay. A sóŋa nyambi te yi ma ɗetɔ kɛ́, nɛ́ yo ɗiy kpo nɛ kpo. Ɗete, nɛ́ mɔ te ɛ ɓɛ ɓɛkɔ kɔ ɓɛ nɛ kiya mɛsosa ɓenɛ yɔkɔ ɛ soŋɛ soŋa kɔ.
Lɛpi te yi ɓo lɛpɛ nda kanɔ nde: ‹Mɔ te ɛ ɓɛ ɓɛkɔ kɔ dɛlɛ, ma yɔkɔ ɛ soŋɛ soŋa kɔ dɛlɛ› kɛ́, lɛpi te gbakasi.
Kɛ ɓɛ mi, mi tomma wunɛ kɛ̀ soŋɛ nyambi kinɛ pa ɓɛŋɛ bɔnɛ nɛ̀ mɛsay nɛ mbɔmbu na. Ɓaŋa ɓɛŋma bɔnɛ nɛ mɛsay, ɛ wunɛ nje kɛ̀ yun mbɔmbu nɛ mɛsay man.»
Kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓe Samari, ɓuɗyate tikima temɔ kɛ yi Yesus, kɛto lɛpi te yi nyari lɛpima kɛ́. A lɛpima nyɛ ɓo nde: ‹Mbam te lɛpima mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi mi kelma kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyembɛ kɛ́ nyɛ mi.›
Kɛ ɓotu ɓe Samari ma kɛ̀ dolɔ Yesus kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ nde, a kwâŋɗya mɔnɔ mɛtu ɓenɛ ɓo kɛ ɗya ɗyan. Ɛ nyɛ kwaŋɗye mɛtu yiɓa ɓenɛ ɓo.
Ɛ ɓaŋa ɓuɗya ɓotu ɓe Samari nje tikɔ sendi temɔ kɛ yenɛ, kɛto lɛpi te yi nyɛ lɛpima kɛ́.

Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyari nde: «Wusɛ ti tíki temɔ ndana kɛ yenɛ, kɛto yasi te yi wɛ yekiɗya nyɛ wusɛ kɛ́ na, yo kɛto wusɛ wokuma yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpima kɛ́ nɛ mɛtɔ musu, duwɛ sendi nde, yo gba nyɛ Mɔ te ɛ joŋgwɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka.»
Kɛ kɔŋ mɛtu mɛnɔri yiɓa, ɛ Yesus tɛmɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ Galile.
A kwáŋ kɛ̀ mate, kɛto nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ ɗikima lɛpɔ nde, ɓo ti jáya mɔ punja mɛlɛpi kɛ ŋgbak ŋgbak ɗya ɗyenɛ na.
Ndana, kɛ nyɛ ma ɗya̧ kɛ Galile kɛ́, ɛ ɓotu ɓe Galile ɓu̧ nyɛ kimɔte, kɛto ɓo ɓɛŋma mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ kelma kɛ Yerusalɛm kɛ ŋgimɔ jesɔ *Paska Ɓeyudɛn kɛ́, kɛto ɓo sendi ka̧ kɛ jesɔ.
Ɛ Yesus tɛmɛ yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ Kana kɛ Galile kɛ mbɛy te yi nyɛ ma yéŋsaŋgwɛ mɔrɔku nɛ mɛnjam kɛ́. Wɛtɛ nyaŋgwɛ sɔja kumande ɗya ɓa̧ kɛ Kapɛrnawum. Mɔnɔ wenɛ, mɔnɔ mbam ɓa̧ kɛ kɔnɔ.
Kɛ nyaŋgwɛ sɔja kɔ ma wokɔ nde, Yesus wulma Yuda ɗya̧ kɛ Galile kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ nde, a kɛ̂n kɛ̀ joŋgwɛ mɔnɔ wenɛ, kɛto a ɓa̧ nɛdɔ nɛ sɔŋ.
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kɛ yun, kɛ wunɛ tì pa ɓɛŋɛ mɛyekambiyɛ nɛ̀ nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele na, wunɛ tí tikɔ temɔ nɛ mi na.»
Ɛ nyaŋgwɛ sɔja kɔ yeŋsa nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, pa kumɔ nɛdɔ kɛ tu̧ mbɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mɔnmbɛ ndi kɛ sosɔ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kwaŋgɔ, mɔnɔ wɔ ma ju̧.» Mbam kɔ tikima temɔ kɛ lɛpi te yi Yesus lɛpima nyɛ nyɛ kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ tɔkɛ nje kwa̧.
Ndana, kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ nje kɛ ɗuwɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛsay ɓenɛ nje saŋgwa nɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde, mɔnɔ wenɛ ma ju̧.
Ɛ nyɛ nje diyɛ ɓo hawa te yi mɔnɔsikɛ kandima wokuna jɛwna yotu kɛte kɛ́. Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Lolna yotu síy kwey nɛ yesɔ kɛ hawa wɛtɛ.»
Ɛ saŋgwɛ nɛ mɔnɔ duwɛ nde, yo kɛ kiya ŋgimɔ te yite yi Yesus lɛpima nyɛ nyɛ nde: ‹Mɔnɔ wɔ ma ju̧› kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ tikɛ temɔ kɛ yi Yesus, nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe tu̧ ɗyenɛ hɛnɛ.
Mɛyekambiyɛ yiɓate yi Yesus kelma kɛ Galile kɛ́, yo yɔkɔ yi nyɛ kelma ndana kɛ yɔkwa̧ Yuda kɛ́.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ yo ɓɛ nɛ wɛtɛ jesɔ Ɓeyudɛn. Ɛ Yesus kwa̧ kɛ̀ Yerusalɛm.

Yiŋa mbɛy mɔrɔku nda nyaŋgwɛ matɔ ɓa̧ kɛ Yerusalɛm kɛ kɛki numɛy te yi ɓesam ɗikima kwa̧ kɛte nyiŋɛ nɔ kɛ mɔy ɗya kɛ́. Ɓo ɗikima jeɓa nyaŋgwɛ matɔ te kɛ numbu Hebere nde Betɛsda. Yo ɓa̧ nɛ mɛmbɛy womɛte yitan yi ɓomɔ ɗikima kɛndɔ ho wɛɗya kɛte kɛ́.

Ɓuɗya ɓotu ɓekɔn ɓa̧ mɛtinɛŋgwɛ kɛ mɛmbɛy mɛnɔri. Yo ɓa̧ nɛ ɓotu ɓe ɗiɓina misi nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓe ndɛmbil nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓete ɓe mɛɓɔ ho ɓe mɛkol man ma jɛmɛ ɓɛ nɛ fɛŋgɛlɛŋ ɓaka. [Ɓo ɗikima ɗiyɔ womɛte yí laɗye ŋgimɔ te yi mɔrɔku kandɛ nɛ watinate kɛ́.

Kɛto wɛtɛ jaki Njambiyɛ ɗikima piyɛ yaka nɛ mɛŋgimɔ kɛ nyaŋgwɛ matɔ yinɔri nje wasɛ mɔrɔku. Ɗete, bosa mumɔ te ɛ piyɛ ɗuku kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi yo nduŋgwɛ watinate kɛ́, kɔn mɔ te siyma, ko yo ɓɛ̂ki kwalɔ kɔn te nda.]
Wɛtɛ mɔ jɛmti ɓa̧ kɛ njokate womɛte mɛ kɛ mɛsew kamɔtati jɔ yitan jɔ yitati yi nyɛ ɓalma nɛ kɔn te kɛ́.
Yesus ɓɛŋma nyɛ kɛ mɛtinɛŋgwɛ, duwɛ sendi nde, mbam kɔ ma kwaŋɗye ɓuɗya mɛsew kɛ tɛri te yinɔri. Ɛ nyɛ nje diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ kɛ kwaɗyɛ nde, kɔn yɔ sîy?»
Ɛ mɔ jɛmti yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, mi kinɛ mɔ te ɛ ta ɓu̧ mi piɗyɛ kɛ nyaŋgwɛ matɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mɔrɔku watɛ kɛ́ na. Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mi ndi kɛ kɛ̀ kɛ́, wɛtɛ mumɔ ma kandɛ piyɛ nɛ mi.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Tɛma, ɓoŋgɔ taŋ yɔ, kɛndɔ.»
Ndana ndana, ɛ kɔn siyɛ, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ taŋ nɛ kandɛ kɛndi. Yo ɓa̧ yesɔ *Saba.
Ɛ Ɓeyudɛn lɛpɛ nyɛ mbam te yi Yesus siɗya kɔn nɛ kɔ nde: «Muka, yo yesɔ Saba. Mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ yeti kɛ nyɛ wɛ ɗeti te yi ɓu̧ taŋ yɔ kwa̧ nɔ na.»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mɔ te ɛ siɗya kɔn mbɛ kɔ lɛpima nyɛ mi nde: ‹Ɓoŋgɔ taŋ yɔ, kɛndɔ.› »
Ɛ ɓo nje diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo mɔ te nda lɛpɛ nyɛ wɛ nde: ‹Ɓoŋgɔ taŋ yɔ, kɛndɔ›?»
Yasi wɛtɛ, mbam kɔ tì duwɛ mɔ te ɛ siɗya kɔn nɛ kɔ na, yo nde, Yesus kwaŋma jisɛ womɛte, kɛto ŋgil ɓa̧ womɛte.

Ɗiyɔ kɛ́, ɛ ɓenɛ Yesus kɛ̀ saŋgwa kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɓɛŋa, kɔn yɔ siyma. Ma wɛ tî ɓasiɗya kelɔ se ɓeya yasi na, wɛ mɛ nje saŋgwa nɛ mɛbɔnɛ kwa̧ yikɛ yi wɛ saŋgwama nɔ kɛ́.»
Ndana, ɛ mbam kwa̧ kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn nde, yo Yesus siɗyɛ kɔn nɛ.
Ɗete, ɛ ɓo kandɛ saŋna Yesus nɛ mɛlɛpi, kɛto a kelma mɛkele mɛte kɛ yesɔ *Saba.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Saŋmbɛ ndi kɛ kelɔ mɛsay kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yɔkɔ ndana. Mi sendi kɛ kelɔ mɛsay.»

Kɛ ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo kɛ mbɔmbu yí sa̧ mɛnje hɛnɛ te yi wo nyɛ wokɔ. Ɓo saŋma mɛnje mɛte ndana kwa̧ yi mbɔmbu, yeti ndi kɛto a tì jɛsɛ yesɔ Saba na, yo kɛto a lɛpima sendi nde, Njambiyɛ gba saŋgwɛ wenɛ, ɓenɛ nyɛ ndi wɛtɛ.

Ɛ Yesus kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ŋgɛ *Mɔnɔ tì pa ɓɛŋɛ yasi nɛ Da na, a ti yaka kelɔ yasi nda yi nyɛ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́ na. Kɛto yasi te yi Da kelɛ, yo ndi yite sendi yi Mɔnɔ kelɛ.
Kɛto Da kɛ kwaɗyɛ Mɔnɔ. A kɛ teɗye Mɔnɔ mɛyasi hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ kelɛ kɛ́. A ta kɛ̀ mbɔmbu teɗye nyɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele kwa̧ yikɛ, nɛ́ gba wunɛ ŋgbakima.
Nda Da kɛ womiyɛ ɓemuŋ kelɔ nde, ɓo ɓɛ̂ki nɛ joŋ, ɗete Mɔnɔ kɛ kelɔ sendi nde, mumɔ hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ kwaɗyɛ nyɛ nyɛ joŋgwɛ, a kɛ nyɛ nyɛ yo.
Yo sendi nde, Da yeti nɛ say pɛsina jɔsi mumɔ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a ɓoŋma mɛsay mɛte hɛnɛ nyɛ Mɔnɔ.
Da kelma ɗete, nɛ́ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ lukse Mɔnɔ nda yi ɓo lukse nɛ nyɛ kɛ́. Mɔ te ɛ ti lukse Mɔnɔ na, mɔ te yeti kɛ lukse sendi Da, mɔ te ɛ tomma nyɛ kɔ na.

Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Mɔ te ɛ wokɛ yasi te yi mi lɛpɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ yi Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ, mɔ te nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo, a tí saŋgwa nɛ jɔsi na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a ɗuwa̧ kɛ sɔŋ kɛ̀ kɛ joŋgwɛ.
«Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ŋgimɔ mɛ kɛ wuta, yo ma si ɗya̧, ŋgimɔ te yi ɓemuŋ ta wokɔ nɛ mɛn Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ. Ɓotu ɓete ɓe ta wokɔ mɛn nɛ ɓaka ta ju̧.
Kɛto nda Da njuku joŋgwɛ kɛ́, ɗete a kelma sendi nde, Mɔnɔ ɓɛ̂ki njuku joŋgwɛ.
A nya sendi nyɛ ɗeti te yi jɔse ɓomɔ, kɛto nyɛ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ.
Lɛpi te yi mi lɛpɛ kɛ́ tî kel nde, wunɛ ŋgbâkimaŋgwɛ na, kɛto ŋgimɔ mɛ kɛ wuta yi ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe kɛ mɔy mɛɓoŋsɔŋ ndana ɓaka ta wokɔ mɛn Mɔnɔ mumɔ.
Ɓaka ɓe kelma kimɔ mɛkele kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyan ɓaka ta womiyɛ yí ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo. Ma ɓaka ɓe kelma ɓeya mɛkele kɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyan ɓaka ta womiyɛ saŋgwa nɛ jɔsi.

Mi ti yaka kelɔ mbɛ yaŋa nda yi mi kwaɗyɛ kɛ́ na. Mi jɔ́sa lɛpi ɓeŋgwɛ yasi te yi mi wokɛ kɛ numbu Da kɛ́. Sendi, mi pɛ́si lɛpi nɛ ŋgbeŋ, kɛto mi ti sáŋ, nɛ́ mi kel yasi te yi mi kwaɗyɛ kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi sáŋ, nɛ́ mi kel yasi te yi Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Kɛ gba mi nɛ ŋguru wombɛ lɛpɛ yasi te yi mi duwa̧ kɛ kasi mbɛ, yite mumɔ ti yaka jayɛ nde, mi lɛ́pi gbakasi na.
Yo wɛtɛ mumɔ dɛlɛ kɛ lɛpɔ yasi te yi nyɛ duwa̧ kɛ kasi mbɛ. Mi duwa̧ nde, yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpɛ kɛ kasi mbɛ kɛ́, gbakasi.
Gba wunɛ tomma ɓomɔ kɛnjɛ kɛ yi Jaŋ, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ gbakasi.
Yasi wɛtɛ kɛ yembɛ, yo yeti kɛ diyɛ nde, wɛtɛ mumɔ pâŋ lɛpɔ yiŋa yaŋa te yi nyɛ duwa̧ kɛ kasi mbɛ na. Ndi nde, yasi te yi mi lɛpima kɛ́, mi lɛ́pi, nɛ́ wunɛ ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ.
Jaŋ ɗiyma nda lambo te yi ju̧ nyɛ mɛjasi kɛ́. Ɛ gba wunɛ ɓɛ nɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛsosa yaka mɔnɔ ŋgimɔ kɛ mɔy mɛjasi mɛnɛ.

«Yasi wɛtɛ, mi mbɛ nɛ yasi te yi kɛ teɗye mi nyɛ ɓomɔ kwa̧ yi Jaŋ teɗya kɛ́. Yasi te yi teɗye yo kɛ́, yo mɛkele mɛte yi Da nya mi nde, mi tônjukwɛ kɛ́. Gba mɛkele mɛte yi mi kelɛ kɛ́ kɛ teɗye gbate nde, yo Da tomɛ mi.
«Da, Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ lɛpima gbakasi kɛ kasi mbɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ. Ko wunɛ tì wokɛ mɛn nɛ wɛtɛ yesɔ ho ɓɛŋɛ mbɔmbu nɛ na.
Ma wunɛ yeti kɛ ɓakiɗye mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ mun na. Kɛto wunɛ yeti kɛ tikɔ yun temɔ nɛ mɔ te yi nyɛ tomma kɔ na.
«Wunɛ nɛ́mba mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ, kɛto wunɛ kɛ tikɔ temɔ nde, wunɛ ta dolɔ nje joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo kɛ mɔyte. Yo gbate nde, mɛkana mɛte kɛ lɛpɔ gbakasi kɛ kasi mbɛ.
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, wunɛ yeti kɛ kwaɗyɛ ɓeŋgwɛ mi, nɛ́ wunɛ ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ na.
Mi yeti kɛ sa̧ nde, ɓomɔ lûksa mi na.
Ndi nde, mi duwa̧ wunɛ kandɛ nyiŋɔ to kumɔ nyɛy kol. Wunɛ yeti kɛ kwaɗyɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ mun na.
Mi nja̧ mbɛ nɛ ɗinɔ Saŋmbɛ nde, yo nyɛ tomɛ mi, ko wunɛ yeti kɛ jayɛ mi na. Ma ŋgɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ nje nɛ gba ɗinɔ te wenɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ nje lɛpɔ mɛyasi nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́, wunɛ ta jayɛ nyɛ.
Nda yi wunɛ kwaɗyɛ ndi nde, yɔkɔ lûksa jakɔsɔ kinɛ sa̧ nde, Njambiyɛ nyɛpɔ lûksa wunɛ kɛ́, ’wunɛ ta tikɔ temɔ nɛ mi nan?
Wunɛ tî taka nde, mi ta pɛsɔ lɛpi nyɛ kɛ numbu yun kɛ mbɔmbu Da na. Mɔ te ɛ ta kelɔ ɗete kɔ, yo ndi Mɔyisi nyɛpɔ, nyɛ yi wunɛ ɓɛ nɛ ɓiɓina temɔ nɛ nyɛ kɔ.
Kɛto wunɛ má tiki temɔ gbate nɛ Mɔyisi, ma wunɛ ta tikɔ sendi temɔ nɛ mi, kɛto a kɛtima mɛyasi kɛ kasi mbɛ.
Ma ŋgɛ wunɛ ti tikɛ temɔ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi Mɔyisi kɛtima kɛ́, wunɛ ma nje tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi mi lɛpɛ kɛ́ nɛ nje te yin?»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ Yesus kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ ŋginjɛ nyaŋgwɛ matɔ te yi ɓo jeɓa nde Matɔ te yi Galile ho nde Matɔ te yi Tiberiyad kɔ.
Ɛ nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ ɓeŋgwɛ nyɛ, kɛto ɓo ɗikima ɓɛŋɛ mɛyekambiyɛ mɛte yi nyɛ ɗikima kelɔ kɛ yotu ɓotu ɓe kɔn kɛ́.
Ɛ Yesus ɓendɛ keki kwa̧ ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ.
Jesɔ *Paska Ɓeyudɛn ɓa̧ kɛ wuta.
Kɛ Yesus ma kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ nde, nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil kɛ nje kɛ yenɛ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ Filip nde: «Hɛ ta ɓɔmɔ ɓa mɛɗye we, nɛ́ ɓomɔ te ɓaka ɗye?»
Yesus lɛ́pi yinɔri, na pa woku nɛ yasi te yi Filip ta yeŋsa kɛ́. Kɛto nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ ma duwɛ yasi te yi nyɛ ta kelɔ kɛ́.
Ɛ Filip yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ko mɔni te yi yakama gbo mɔ mɛsay kɛ mɛyesɔ gɔmay yiɓa ti yaka ɓɔmɔ mɛɗye yi yaka nde, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ mɔnɔ mbulma yasi te yi ɗye na.»
Ɛ wɛtɛ jekɛ Yesus nde Andere te maŋ nɛ Simɔn Piyɛr lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde:
«Wɛtɛ mɔnɔ mbam waka nɛ mɛmampa yitan ɓu̧ ɓenjanjɔ yiɓa. Ma yite yakama kelɔ ŋge kɛ nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil te yikɛ?»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde: «Wunɛ lɛ̂pi nyɛ ɓomɔ nde, ɓo ɗîy mɛtiɗyɛ.» Pɔku te yi womɛte ɓa̧ tandɛ mɛmbunjɔ. Ɛ ɓomɔ ɗiyɛ mɛtiɗyɛ. Ɓembam nɛ ɓembam kumma nda ɓomɔ tomay yitan.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus ɓu̧ mɛmampa. Kɛ nyɛ ma si nyɛ Njambiyɛ wosoko kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ yo kaɓɔ nyɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte ɓaka, ɛ nyɛ kelɛ sendi ɗete nɛ ɓenjanjɔ. Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɓoŋma nda yi nyɛ kwaɗya kɛ́.
Kɛ ɓomɔ ma si ɗyena ditɔ kɛ́, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde: «Wunɛ sîki wesiɗye mɛɓukwɛ mɛte, ma yaŋa nje sambiyɛ nɛ gbɛlate.»
Kɛ mɛmampa mɛnɔri yitan yi ɓomɔ ɗya kɛ́, ɓo nja̧ wesiɗye mɛɓukwɛ mɛte tonjɛ mɛmakɔ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa.
Kɛ ɓomɔ ma ɓɛŋɛ mɛyekambiyɛ mɛte yite yi Yesus kelma kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɗiki lɛpɔ nde: «Mbam kɔ gbate mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ ɛ ɓa̧ nde, a ta nje kɛ to mɛnɛti kɔ.»
Kɛ Yesus ma duwɛ nde, ɓomɔ kɛ kwaɗyɛ nje ɓu̧ nyɛ kɛ̀ tɛmbiɗye kumande nɛ ɗeti kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ kɛ to keki ndi nyɛ nyɛpɔ.
Kɛ ɓekoko ma ɗya̧ kɛ́, ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓe Yesus sɛliyɛ kɛ̀ kɛ goŋ nyaŋgwɛ matɔ.
Ɛ ɓo ɓendɛ wɛtɛ landi yí saɓiyɛ nɔ kɛ̀ nɔ pulɔ Kapɛrnawum. Yinɔri tu ma kelɔ. Sendi, Yesus tì pa yɔkwɛ nje dolɔ ɓo na.
Nyaŋgwɛ pupɔ ɓa̧ kɛ kwa̧, ɛ mɛkumbɔ kelɛ kɛ ɗuku ɓuɗyate.
Ɓo ɗukuma landi kɛndɔ kumɔ nda kilomɛta yitan nɛ yitan jɔ wɛtɛ. Ɓo ɓɛ́ŋa Yesus kɛ kɛndɔ kɛ to ɗuku kɛ̀ nɔ pulɔ landi. Ɛ ɓo gwe wɔ̧ ɓuɗyate.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo mi, wunɛ tî gwaki wɔ̧ na.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo ɓɛ nɛ mɛsosa yí nyinje nyɛ kɛ landi, yaka nɛ landi kɛ tɛmɛ kɛ mbɛy te yi ɓo kwaɗya kɛ̀ kɛte kɛ́.

Misi pupɛ ŋgil ɓotu ɓete ɓe tikama kɛ ŋginjɛ ɗuku ɓaka nja̧ takɛ duwɛ nde, landi ɓa̧ ndi wɛtɛ kwey mate. Ɓo duwa̧ sendi nde, Yesus tì nyiŋɛ landi ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ na. Yo nde, ɓejekɛ kwaŋma ndi ɓo ɓepɔ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ndana yiŋa mɛlandi nja̧ ɗya̧ wulɛ kɛ Tiberiyad kɛ kɛki mbɛy te yi ɓo ma ɗyáki mampa, yite Kumande Yesus paŋma pa nyɛ Njambiyɛ wosoko kɛ́.
Kɛ ŋgil ma ɓɛŋɛ nde, ko Yesus ko ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ tì ɓɛ womɛte kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɓendɛ mɛlandi mɛnɔri kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ Kapɛrnawum kɛ̀ sa̧ nyɛ mate.
Kɛ ɓo ma dolɔ nyɛ mate kɛ ŋginjɛ ɗuku kɛ́, ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele, ɔ njáki ɓa woŋga ndenɛn?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo gba gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Wunɛ ti sáŋ mi, kɛto mɛyekambiyɛ mɛte yi wunɛ ɓɛŋma kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ sáŋ mi, kɛto wunɛ ɗya mampa ditɔ.

Wunɛ tî kel mɛsay kɛto mɛɗye mɛte yi ta ɓeyɔ gwe nɛ ŋgbɔt kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ kêl mɛsay kɛto mɛɗye mɛte yi ta ɗiyɔ kelɔ nde, wunɛ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo. Mɛɗye mɛte, yo *Mɔnɔ mumɔ ta nyɛ wunɛ yo, kɛto yo ndi gba nyɛ yi Njambiyɛ tɔkuma.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo nje diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo yasi te nda yi wusɛ yâkaŋgwɛ kelɔ, nɛ́ wusɛ kel mɛkele mɛte yi Njambiyɛ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yasi te yi Njambiyɛ kwaɗyɛ nde, wunɛ kêl kɛ́, yo nde, wunɛ tîki temɔ kɛ yi mɔ te yi nyɛ tomma kɔ.»
Ɛ ɓo nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kwalɔ mɛyekambiyɛ te nda yi wɛ kelɛ yi wusɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ tikɔ nɛ temɔ kɛ yɔ kɛ́? Yo mɛsay te nda wɛ kelɛ kɛ́?
Ɓesaŋmbambɔ ɓusu ɗya *man kɛ koŋgor nda yi yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹A nya ɓo mɛɗye mɛte yi wulɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́ nde, ɓo ɗyâki.› »
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Mɔyisi tì nyɛ wunɛ mɛɗye mɛte yi wulɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, yo Saŋmbɛ kɛ nyɛ wunɛ gba mɛɗye mɛte yi wulɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́.
Kɛto mɛɗye mɛte yi Njambiyɛ nyɛ kɛ́, yo yɔkɔ ɛ piyɛ wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ nje nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo kɔ.»
Ɛ ɓo nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, nyɛkɔ wusɛ mɛɗye mɛte yite mɛtu hɛnɛ.»
«Mi mbɛ mɛɗye mɛte yi nyɛ mumɔ joŋgwɛ. Mɔ te ɛ nje kɛ yembɛ, mɔ te tí gwe nja wɛtɛ yesɔ na. Sendi, yɔkɔ ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ mi, mɔ te tí gwe yɛsiɗyɛ wɛtɛ yesɔ na.
Yasi wɛtɛ, mi ma lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ, ma ko ɓɛkɔ nde, wunɛ ɓɛŋma mi, wunɛ yeti kɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ mi na.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe Da nyɛ mi, ɓo ta nje kɛ yembɛ. Ko mi tí sɛŋɛ mɔ te ɛ nje kɛ yembɛ kɔ na,
kɛto mi ti píkwɛ wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ, nɛ́ mi nje kel yasi te yi mi kwaɗyɛ kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi njáki nje kelɔ yasi te yi Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́.
Yo nde, Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi njesɛ kɔ kwáɗyikwɛ nde, kɛ njoka ɓomɔ hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ nya mi ɓaka, mi tî ɗimbiɗya mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi wômkwɛ ɓo hɛnɛ kɛ njena yesɔ siyna mbokɔ.
Kɛto yasi te yi Saŋmbɛ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́, yo nde, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ nɛ mi Mɔnɔ tikɔ temɔ nɛ mi, mɔ te ɓɛ̂ki nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo. Ma mi ta womiyɛ mbɛ nyɛ kɛ njena yesɔ siyna mbokɔ.»
Ɗete, ɛ Ɓeyudɛn nyiŋgila nɛ nyɛ, kɛto a lɛpima nde: ‹Mi mbɛ mɛɗye mɛte yi piya wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ.›
Ɛ ɓo ɗiki lɛpɔ nde: «’Yɔkɔ yeti gba Yesus te mɔnɔ Yosɛp na? ’Wusɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ na? Ma ŋge ɓa yi nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nde, a píkwɛ wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ nje nɔ kɛ́?»
Ɛ Yesus nje yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ tîki mɛnyiŋgila.
Mumɔ ti yaka nje kɛ yembɛ kinɛ nde, Da, Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ ɗûla nyɛ na. Ma mi ta womiyɛ mbɛ mɔ te kɛ njena yesɔ siyna mbokɔ.
Yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ nde: ‹Njambiyɛ ta teɗye ɓo hɛnɛ mɛyasi.› Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ lɛŋgwa mɛtɔ kɛ yasi te yi Da lɛpima ɓakiɗye yo, mɔ te kɛ nje kɛ yembɛ.
Yeti nde, wɛtɛ mumɔ ɓɛŋma Da wɛtɛ yesɔ na, soŋɛ ndi yɔkɔ ɛ wulma pɛ yi Njambiyɛ nje nɔ kɔ. Yo ndi nyɛ ɓɛŋma Da.
Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Mɔ te ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ mi, mɔ te nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo.
Mi mbɛ mɛɗye mɛte yi nyɛ mumɔ joŋgwɛ.
Ɓesaŋmbambɔ ɓun ɗya *man kɛ koŋgor. Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓo gwa̧.
Mɛɗye mɛte yi piya wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́ kél nde, mɔ te ɛ ɗye yo, a tí gwe na.

Mi mbɛ mɛɗye mɛte yi kelɛ nde, mumɔ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ joŋgwɛ yi piya wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́. Ŋgɛ mumɔ ɗye mɛɗye mɛte, a ta ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ kpo nɛ kpo. Yo nde, mɛɗye mɛte yi mi ta nyɛ nyɛ kɛ́, yo mɛmbundɔ mɛmbɛ. Mi ta nyɛ yo, nɛ́ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ.»
Ɗete, ɛ Ɓeyudɛn kandɛ nyɛna mɛso tandɛ yan lɛpɔ nde: «Mbam kɔ yakama nyɛ wusɛ mɛmbundɔ mɛnɛ nde, wusɛ ɗyâki nɛ nje te yin?»
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ŋgɛ wunɛ ti ɗye mɛmbundɔ mɛ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ, hɔɓiye sendi mɛkiyɔ mɛnɛ na, wunɛ yeti nɛ joŋgwɛ kɛ yotu yun na.
Mɔ te ɛ ɗye mɛmbundɔ mɛmbɛ, hɔɓiye sendi mɛkiyɔ mɛmbɛ, mɔ te nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo. Mi ta womiyɛ nyɛ kɛ njena yesɔ siyna mbokɔ.
Yo nde, mɛmbundɔ mɛmbɛ gbate kpasa mɛɗye. Mɛkiyɔ mɛmbɛ sendi gbate kpasa yasi te yi siɗyɛ yɛsiɗyɛ.
Mɔ te ɛ ɗye mɛmbundɔ mɛmbɛ, hɔɓiye sendi mɛkiyɔ mɛmbɛ, mɔ te kɛ temɔ mbɛ, mi sendi kɛ temɔ nɛ.
Da te ɛ kelɛ nde, mumɔ ɓɛ̂ki nɛ joŋgwɛ kɔ tomma mi. Mi jóŋnaŋgwɛ jakimɛ nyɛ. Ɗete sendi, mɔ te ɛ ɗye mi, mɔ te ta joŋna sendi jakimɛ mi.
Mɛɗye mɛte yi piya wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́, yori. Yo yeti nda *man te yi ɓesaŋmbambɔ ɓun ɗya, ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɛ ɓo ɗe ndi gwe kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, mɔ te ɛ ta ɗye mɛɗye te yikɛ kɔ ta ɗiyɔ kpo nɛ kpo.»
Yesus lɛ́pi mɛlɛpi maka kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya mɛ Ɓeyudɛn kɛ Kapɛrnawum kɛ́.
Kɛ ɓo ma si wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi nyɛ lɛpima kɛ́, ɛ ɓaŋa ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ ɓuɗyate lɛpɛ kɛ kɔŋte nde: «Lɛpi te yikɛ nɛ ɗitɔ ɓuɗyate. Nda yakama ɓiye to te kɔ?»
Yesus duwa̧ kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ nde, ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ kɛ nyiŋgila kɛto lɛpi te yi nyɛ lɛpima kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «’Lɛpi kɛ kɛ njaŋgwɛ wunɛ?
Ma yo ta nje ɓɛ ɓa nan, ŋgɛ wunɛ ɓɛŋɛ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ kɛ ɓendɔ yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ kɛ mbɛy te yi nyɛ paŋma ɗiyɔ kɛte kɛ́?
Yo Kimɔ Sisiŋ nyɛ mumɔ joŋgwɛ. Mɛmbundɔ yeti nɛ ɗeti te yi kelɔ yiŋa kimɔ yasi na. Mɛlɛpi mɛte yi mi lɛpima mbɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́, yo mɛlɛpi mɛte yi nyɛ mumɔ Sisiŋ Njambiyɛ, nyɛ sendi nyɛ joŋgwɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓaŋa waka kɛ njoka yun yeti kɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ mi na.» Yesus lɛ́pi ɗete, kɛto a ma duwɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe tì tikɛ temɔ nɛ nyɛ ɓaka njombu yaŋa, duwɛ sendi mɔ te ɛ ta ɗyaŋgwɛ nyɛ kɔ.
Ɛ nyɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Yori yi mi lɛpima nyɛ wunɛ nde, mumɔ ti yaka nje kɛ yembɛ, ŋgɛ Da ti nyɛ nyɛ ɗeti na.»
Kandɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite ɛ ɓaŋa ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ ɓuɗyate ɗuwɛ kɛ njɔŋ nɛ kinɛ kɛndɔ se ɓenɛ ɓo na.
Ɛ Yesus nje ɗiyɔ lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓejekɛ te ɓari kamɔ jɔ yiɓa nde: «’Wunɛ sendi, wunɛ kɛ kwaɗyɛ kwa̧?»
Ɛ Simɔn Piyɛr yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, hɛ ta nje kwa̧ kɛ̀ pɛ yi nda? Yo wɛ ɓɛ nɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi nyɛ mumɔ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo.
Ma wusɛ kɛ tikɔ su temɔ kɛ yɔ, duwɛ sendi nde, wɛ pupuna mɔ te yi Njambiyɛ tɔkuma njesɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «’Wunɛ ɓaka kamɔ jɔ yiɓa, yeti gba mi tɔkɛ wunɛ na? Ma wɛtɛ mumɔ kɛ njoka yun nɛ *Satan.»
Yasi yinɔri, a lɛ́pi nɛ Yudas te mɔnɔ Simɔn Iskariyot, kɛto yo gba nyɛ mɔ te ɛ ta ɗyaŋgwɛ nyɛ kɔ. A ɓa̧ kɛ njoka ɓejekɛ kamɔ jɔ yiɓa.
Kɛ kɔŋ mɛyasi mɛnɔri ɛ Yesus kwa̧ kɛ̀ mɛɗya nɛ mɛɗya kɛ Galile. A tì kwaɗyɛ kɛ̀ kɛ mɛɗya mɛte yi Yuda na, kɛto ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn ɗikima sa̧ nje te yi wo nyɛ.
Yinɔri jesɔ Ɓeyudɛn yi ɓo ɗikima sumɔ mɛbala ya kɛte kɛ́ ɓa̧ kɛ wuta.
Ɛ ɓemaŋ nɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ tî ɗiy se waka na, kwaŋgɔ kɛ̀ kɛ Yuda, nɛ́ ɓejekɛ ɓɔ ɓɛŋ sendi nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele mɛte yi wɛ kelɛ kɛ́.
Kɛto ŋgɛ mumɔ kwaɗyɛ nde, ɓomɔ dûkwɛ nyɛ, a ti kél yasi sɔɗyate na. Ma nda wɛ kɛ kelɔ nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele ɗete kɛ́, punjukwɛ yotu yɔ nɛ ŋguru wɔ kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ.»
Ko ɓemaŋ nɛ Yesus sendi tì ɓɛ kɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ nyɛ na.
Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ŋgimɔ te yembɛ tì pa ɗya̧ na. Yasi wɛtɛ kɛ yun, ŋgimɔ hɛnɛ kimɔte.
Ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka ti yaka ɓenɔ wunɛ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo ɓén mi, kɛto mi kɛ ɓɛŋɛ mɛkele man lɛpɔ nde, yo ɓeyate.
Wunɛ kwâŋ yun kɛ̀ jesɔ te. Kɛ ɓɛ mi, mi yeti kɛ kɛ̀ mbɛ na, kɛto ŋgimɔ te yembɛ tì pa yaka na.»
Kɛ nyɛ ma si lɛpɔ ɗete nyɛ ɓo kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɗiyɔ ndi kɛ Galile.
Ndana, kɛ ɓemaŋ ma si kwa̧ kɛ̀ jesɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ mbɔmbila kwa̧ kɛ̀ sendi mate kinɛ punjɛ yotu na.
Ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn ɗikima sa̧ nyɛ kɛ jesɔ lɛpɔ nde: «A we?»
Ɓomɔ ɗikima lɛpɔ kasi nɛ ɓuɗyate nɛ hi̧hi̧hi̧ kɛ njoka ŋgil. Ɓaŋa ɗikima lɛpɔ nde: ‹Mbam te kimɔ mumɔ!› Ɓaŋa nde: ‹Ja̧, a kɛ seɓile ɓomɔ kɛnjɛ kɛ ɓeya nje.›
Yasi wɛtɛ, ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì ɓɛ kɛ lɛpɔ kasi nɛ nɛ gbas gbas kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ na, kɛto ɓo ɗikima kambɔ ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn.
Ndana, kɛ mɛtu mɛ jesɔ ma kumɔ kɛ ɓembe kɛ́, ɛ Yesus kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kandɛ teɗya ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ɛ Ɓeyudɛn ŋgbakima lɛpɔ nde: «Mbam kɔ tì kelɛ yiŋa nyaŋgwɛ sukul na. Ma a njáki nje ɓɛ nɛ duwa̧ mɛkana mɛte yikɛ wulɛ nɔ we?»
Ɛ Yesus nje yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yasi te yi mi teɗye kɛ́ ti wúla kɛ ɗyanɔ ɗyembɛ nɛ ŋguru wombɛ na, yasi wɛtɛ, yo wúla kɛ yi Njambiyɛ, nyɛ Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ.
Ŋgɛ mumɔ jayɛ nde, a ta kelɔ yasi te yi Njambiyɛ kwaɗyɛ, mɔ te ta duwɛ, ho yasi te yi mi teɗye kɛ́ wúla kɛ yi Njambiyɛ, ho yo wúla kɛ ɗyanɔ ɗyembɛ.
Mɔ te ɛ lɛpɛ yasi te yi wulɛ kɛ ɗyanɔ ɗyenɛ kɔ sáŋ nde, ɓomɔ lûksa nyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, yɔkɔ ɛ kelɛ yasi sa̧ nde, ɓomɔ lûksa mɔ te ɛ tomma nyɛ kɔ kɛ lɛpɔ gbakasi. Sendi, a yeti mɔ kɔtu mɛkele na.
’Mɔyisi tì nyɛ wunɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ na? Ma ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ kɛ njoka yun yeti kɛ joŋna ɓeŋgwɛ mɛmboŋga mɛte na. Kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ sa̧ nje te, nɛ́ wunɛ wo mi kɛ́?»
Ɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte nɛ ŋgil te ɓaka yeŋsa nde: «Wɛ nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ kɛ yotu. Mɔ te nda kɛ sa̧ nje te yi wo wɛ kɔ?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi kelma ndi nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele wɛtɛ, ma wunɛ hɛnɛ kɛ ŋgbakima.

Mɔyisi nya wunɛ mboŋga nde, wunɛ pɛ̂si ɓɔnɔ ɓembam hɛnɛ. Yasi yinɔri ti kánda kɛ yi Mɔyisi na, yo wúla nɛ ɓesaŋmbambɔ ɓete. Yo kɛto mboŋga te yite yi Mɔyisi nya kɛ́, ko kɛ yesɔ *Saba wunɛ kɛ pɛsɔ ɓɔnɔ ɓembam.

Wunɛ kɛ pɛsɔ ɓɔnɔ ɓembam ko kɛ yesɔ Saba, kambɔ wunɛ mɛ nje jɔsiɗye mboŋga te yi Mɔyisi nya kɛ́. Ŋgɛ wunɛ kelɛ ɗete, kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ nje wokɔ ŋgambi nɛ mi, kɛto mi siɗya kɔn ndiŋgɛlɛ mumɔ kɛ yesɔ Saba kɛ́?
Wunɛ tî pɛsi jɔsi ɓeŋgwɛ mbɛri misi mɛ mumɔ na, yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ pɛ̂si jɔsi nɛ ŋgbeŋ.»
Ɛ ɓaŋa ɓomɔ ɓe Yerusalɛm ɗiki lɛpɔ nde: «’Yeti mbam kɔ yi ɓomɔ sa̧ nje te yi wo nyɛ kɔ na?
Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa ndi, a kɛ lɛpina kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ nɛ gbas gbas, ko ɗete, ɓo yeti kɛ lɛpɔ yaŋa nyɛ nyɛ na. ’Yite nde, ɓekum ma duwɛ gbate nde, nyɛ *Krist?
Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ mbam te yɔkɔ, wusɛ duwa̧ su mbɛy te yi nyɛ wulma kɛte nje nɔ kɛ́. Ndi nde, komɛ Krist ta nje kɛ́, ko mumɔ tí duwɛ mbɛy te yi nyɛ wulma kɛte nje nɔ kɛ́ na.»

Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «’Wunɛ lɛ́pi gba nde, wunɛ duwa̧ mi, duwɛ sendi mbɛy te yi mi wulma kɛte nje nɔ kɛ́? Ndi nde, mi ti njáki nɛ ɗeti te yembɛ na. Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ, nyɛ mɔ te yi ɓomɔ yâkaŋgwɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ nyɛ, ma wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ nyɛ na.
Ndi mi kɛ duwɛ mbɛ nyɛ, kɛto mi wúla pɛ yenɛ nje nɔ. Yo nyɛ tomɛ mi.»
Ɛ ɓo sa̧ nje te yi ɓiye nyɛ, ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì kɛnjɛ ɓɔ kpokɛ nɛ nyɛ na, kɛto ŋgimɔ nɛ tì pa ɗya̧ na.
Ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate kɛ njoka ŋgil tikima temɔ kɛ yenɛ. Ɛ ɓo ɗiki lɛpɔ nde: «Komɛ *Krist ta nje kɛ́, a ta kelɔ ka mɛyekambiyɛ kwa̧ yikɛ yi mbam kɔ kelma kɛ́?»

*Ɓefarisɛ̧ wokuma mɛyasi mɛnɔri yi ɓomɔ ɗikima nyiŋgila kɛ njoka ŋgil kɛ kasi Yesus kɛ́. Ɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ Ɓefarisɛ̧ tomɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ ɓiy nyɛ.
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde: «Mi ndi nɛ mɔnɔ ŋgimɔ te yi kwaŋɗye sinɛ wunɛ, kɛ kɔŋte, mi má yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ pɛ yi Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ.
Wunɛ ta sa̧ mi, ko wunɛ tí dolɔ mi na. Sendi, wunɛ tí kumɔ yun kɛ mbɛy te yi mi ta ɗiyɔ mbɛ kɛte na.»

Ɛ Ɓeyudɛn nje lɛpɔ tandɛ yan nde: «Yite nde, a ta kɛ̀ ɓa we yi wusɛ ta ɗiyɔ kinɛ dolɔ nyɛ kɛ́? ’Yite nde, a ta kɛ̀ kɛ yi Ɓeyudɛn ɓete yi ɓo wanjima ɓo ɓe ɗiyɛ kɛ njoka Ɓegrɛk ɓaka? ’A ta kɛ̀ mate kɛ̀ teɗye Ɓegrɛk mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ?»
Yiŋa nde: « ‹Wunɛ ta sa̧ mi, ko wunɛ tí dolɔ mi na,› sendi, ‹wunɛ tí kumɔ kɛ mbɛy te yi mi ɗiyɛ mbɛ kɛte na,› a kwáɗyikwɛ lɛpɔ komɛte nde ŋge?»

Yesɔ siyna jesɔ ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛ yesɔ jesɔ kwa̧ bosa mɛyesɔ mɛte yiri hɛnɛ. Yesɔ te ɛ Yesus tɛmɛ lɛpɔ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «Mɔ te ɛ gwe yɛsiɗyɛ, a njâki kɛ yembɛ nje hɔɓiye yasi te yi ta siɗyɛ yɛsiɗyɛ nɛ kɛ́.
Mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ lɛpɔ nde: ‹Mɔ te ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ mi, nyaŋgwɛ mɛɗuku mɛte yi nyɛ joŋgwɛ ta sokula wulɛ kɛ mɔy nɛ.› »

Yinɔri Yesus lɛ́pi nɛ kasi Kimɔ Sisiŋ te yi ɓotu ɓete ɓe tikɛ temɔ nɛ nyɛ ta ɓɛ nɔ kɛ́. Yo nde, kɛ ŋgimɔ te yite Njambiyɛ tì pa njesɛ Kimɔ Sisiŋ na, kɛto a tì pa yɔkiɗye Yesus kɛnjɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ mbɛy mɛluksa mɛnɛ na.
Kɛ ɓaŋa ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ njoka ŋgil ɓaka ma wokɔ mɛlɛpi mɛte kɛ́, ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nde: «Mbam kɔ gbate mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ te yi ɓo ɗikima lɛpɔ nɔ kɔ.»
Ɓaŋa ɗikima lɛpɔ nde: «Yɔkɔ gba *Krist.» Ɓaŋa nde: «’Yo Krist ta wulɛ Galile nje nɔ?
’Mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ ti lɛ́pi nde, Krist ta wulɛ kɛ kandɔ kumande Davit kɛ ɗya̧ Betɛlɛhɛm komɛ Davit ɗikima ɗiyɔ kɛ́ na?»
Ɛ ŋgil ɓaka kɛ ɓembe kɛto Yesus.
Ɓaŋa diyma kɛ̀ ɓiye nyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì kpokɛ nyɛ na.
Ndana, ɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ dolɔ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ Ɓefarisɛ̧. Ɛ ɓo diyɛ ɓotu ɓe ɓakiɗya mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ nde: «Ŋge kelɛ yi wunɛ tì nje nɛ nyɛ kɛ́?»
Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nde: «Ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ lɛpi nda mbam te na.»
Ɛ Ɓefarisɛ̧ nje yeŋsa nde: «’Yite nde, wunɛ sendi, wunɛ jayma nde, a sêɓila wunɛ?
’Wunɛ wokuma wɛtɛ yesɔ nde, wɛtɛ kum wusu ho Ɓefarisɛ̧ tikima temɔ nɛ nyɛ nde?»
Ɛ ɓo kɛ̀ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Ndi nde, gba ɓotu ɓaka yeti kɛ duwɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ na. Njambiyɛ ma kita nɛ ɓo.»
Wɛtɛ mbam nde Nikɔdɛm ɛ ka̧ kɛ̀ ɓɛŋɛ Yesus wɛtɛ ɗyoɓɔ nɛ tu kɔ ɓa̧ kɛ njoka Ɓefarisɛ̧. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde:
«’Yite nde, mɛmboŋga musu lɛ́pi nde, ɓo têɗya mumɔ mɛbɔnɛ kinɛ pa wokɔ mɛn mɔ te yi duwɛ nɛ mɛjɔsɔ mɛte yi nyɛ kelma kɛ́ na?»
Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Ma yite nde, wɛ sendi, wɛ mɔ Galile? Nɛmba kimɔte, wɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ nde, ko wɛtɛ mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ tì wulɛ wɛtɛ yesɔ kɛ Galile na.» [
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ mumɔ hɛnɛ tɔkɛ nje ɗuwɛ kɛ̀ tu̧ ɗyenɛ.
Ɛ Yesus kwa̧ nɛ kɛ̀ kɛ *Keki mɛoliviye.
Ɓemɛŋmɛnɛ sut, ɛ nyɛ yɔkwɛ kɛ̀ sendi kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ. Ɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ hɛnɛ kɛ̀ kɛ yenɛ. Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ kandɛ teɗya ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.
Ndana, ɛ ɓotu ɓe kɛtina mɛyasi nɛ̀ Ɓefarisɛ̧ ɓu̧ wɛtɛ nya te yi ɓo dolma nyɛ kɛ kelɔ wanja kɔ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ yi Yesus. Ɛ ɓo ɓu̧ nyɛ tɛmbiɗye kɛ mbɔmbu ɓomɔ kwa̧ lɛpɔ nyɛ Yesus nde:
«Yekele, wusɛ dɔŋgiɗya nya kɔ kɛ gba kelna wanja.
Kɛ mɛmboŋga mɛte yi Mɔyisi kɛtima kɛ́, a pɛsima nde, wusɛ lôŋ njɛl nyari nda yɔkɔ nɛ mɛtari wo. Ma kɛ yɔ, wɛ lɛ́pi yɔ nɛ ŋge?»
Ɓo lɛ́pi yinɔri yí lɛɓiye nɛ nyɛ, nɛ́ ɓo lɛpi nde, a lɛpinama ɓeyate. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ Yesus ɓutuma kɛtina kɛ ŋgbutu nɛ nyɛy ɓɔ.
Nda yi ɓo ka̧ ndi mbɔmbu yí diyɛ nyɛ mɛdiyan kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mɔ te ɛ duwa̧ kɛ njoka yun nde, a tì pa kelɔ yiŋa ɓeya yasi wɛtɛ yesɔ kɔ kânda ɓetɛ tari lu̧ nɛ nya kɔ.»
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ ɓutuma sendi nɛ kɔkɔ kɛtina kɛ ŋgbutu.
Kɛ ɓo ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo pundɛ wɛtɛ wɛtɛ kwa̧ kandɛ nɛ ɓetomba ɓete kɛ̀ nɔ. Ɛ Yesus tika nyɛpɔ ɓenɛ nyari kɛ mbɔmbu wenɛ.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus tɛmɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyari nde: «Nyari, ɓotu ɓete ɓe lɛpinama nɛ wɛ ɓaka mɛ we? ’Ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì teɗye wɛ mɛbɔnɛ na?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Ko na, nyaŋgwɛ mbam.» Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mi sendi, mi yeti kɛ teɗye wɛ mɛbɔnɛ na. Kwaŋgɔ, yasi wɛtɛ, wɛ tî ɓasiɗya kelɔ se ɓeya yasi na.»]

Ɛ Yesus nje ɓasiɗye lɛpina nyɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ lɛpɔ nde: «Mi mbɛ mɛjasi mɛte yi paniyɛ puyɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka. Mɔ te ɛ ɓeŋgwɛ mi, mɔ te tí kɛndɔ kɛ mɔy yitil na, yasi wɛtɛ, a ta ɓɛ nɛ mɛjasi mɛte yi teɗye mumɔ nda yi nyɛ yâkaŋgwɛ joŋna nɔ kɛ́.»
Ɛ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ kɛ lɛpɔ yasi te yi wɛ duwa̧ kɛ kasi yɔ kɛ́ nɛ ŋguru wɔ. Ŋgɛ ɓɛ ɗete, yasi te yi wɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́ gba ja̧.»

Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ko gba mi lɛ́pi yasi te yi mi duwa̧ kɛ kasi mbɛ nɛ ŋguru wombɛ, yasi te yi mi lɛpɛ kɛ́, gbakasi, kɛto mi duwa̧ mbɛy te yi mi wulma kɛte nɛ̀ mbɛy te yi mi kɛ kɛte kɛ́. Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ yun mbɛy te yi mi wulma kɛte nɛ̀ mbɛy te yi mi kɛ̀ kɛte kɛ́ na.
Wunɛ pɛ́si yun jɔsi nɛ nje te yi ɓomɔ. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi yeti kɛ pɛsɔ mbɛ jɔsi wɛtɛ mumɔ na.
Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, gba mi pɛ̂si jɔsi, pɛsina jɔsi mbɛ kɛ nje, kɛto mi yeti nyɛpɔ na, mi sinɛ Da, Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ.
’Yo yeti kɛtinate kɛ gba mɛkana mɛ mɛmboŋga mun nde, ŋgɛ ɓomɔ yiɓa nje lɛpɔ ndi kiya yasi kɛ yasi te yi ɓo ɓɛŋma nɛ̀ yi ɓo wokuma kɛ́, lɛpi te gbakasi na?
Gba mi nɛ ŋguru wombɛ kɛ lɛpɔ yasi te yi mi duwa̧ kɛ kasi mbɛ. Sendi, Da, Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ kɛ lɛpɔ yasi te yi nyɛ duwa̧ kɛ kasi mbɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ ɓo nje diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Sɔŋgwɛ we?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Ko mi ko Saŋmbɛ, wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ mbaŋa na. Wunɛ má dukwɛ mi gbate, ma wunɛ duwa̧ sendi Saŋmbɛ.»

A lɛ́pi mɛyasi mɛnɔri kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ teɗye ɓomɔ mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ mbɛy te yi ɓomɔ ɗiki nyɛ mɛyasi nɛ sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́. Ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì nyɛ ɓɔ kɛ yotu nɛ na, kɛto ŋgimɔ nɛ tì pa ɗya̧ na.
Ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ sendi nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi kɛ kwa̧ mbɛ, wunɛ ta sa̧ mi, wunɛ ta gwe ndi kɛ mɔy mɛɓeyɔ mun. Kɛ mbɛy te yi mi kɛ̀ mbɛ kɛte kɛ́, wunɛ ti yaka kɛ̀ yun mate na.»
Ɛ Ɓeyudɛn ɗiki lɛpɔ tandɛ yan nde: «Yiŋa nde: ‹Kɛ mbɛy te yi mi kɛ̀ mbɛ kɛte kɛ́, wunɛ ti yaka kɛ̀ yun mate na,› ’yite nde, a ta wo yotu nɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ wúla yun kɛ mɛnɛti waka, ma mi mbɛ mɔ kwey. Wunɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka, mi yeti mbɛ mɔ mɛnɛti maka na.
Yori yi mi lɛpima nyɛ wunɛ nde, wunɛ ta gwe ndi kɛ mɔy mɛɓeyɔ mun kɛ́. Kɛto ŋgɛ wunɛ ti tikɛ temɔ nde, yo gba mi mɔ te yi mi lɛpɛ nɔ kɔ na, wunɛ ta gwe ndi kɛ mɔy mɛɓeyɔ mun.»
Ɛ ɓo nje diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ yɔ ɓa nda?» Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ma mi lɛ̂pi sendi nde ŋge, ’yo yeti yasi te yi mi ɗiki lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ mɛtu hɛnɛ kɛ́ na?

Mi nɛ ɓuɗya mɛyasi mɛte yi mi yakama lɛpɔ kɛ kasi yun, pɛsɔ sendi mɛlɛpi mɛte yi ɓɛŋɛ wunɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi njesɛ kɔ, yo Mɔ te ɛ lɛpɛ ndi gbakasi. Mɛyasi mɛte yi mi wokuma kɛ numbu nɛ kɛ́, yo ndi yite yi mi lɛpɛ mbɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka.»
Ɓomɔ tì ɓɛ kɛ duwɛ nde, a lɛ́pi kasi Da nyɛ ɓo na.

Ɗete, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Komɛ wunɛ ta si ŋgba *Mɔnɔ mumɔ kɛ jeti tɛmbiɗye kɛ kwey kɛ́, yo komɛte yi wunɛ ta nje duwɛ sendi nde, yo gba mi mɔ te yi mi lɛpɛ nɔ kɔ. Wunɛ má nje duwɛ yɛy nde, mi ti kél yaŋa nɛ ɗyanɔ te yembɛ na, yasi wɛtɛ, mi lɛ́pi mɛyasi mɛte yi Da teɗya mi kɛ́.
Mi sinɛ mɔ te ɛ njesa mi kɔ. A tì tikɛ mi nyɛpɔ na, kɛto mi kɛ kelɔ yasi te yi nyɛ nyɛ mɛsosa kɛ́ mɛtu hɛnɛ.»
Kɛ Yesus ma lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate tikɛ temɔ nɛ nyɛ.
Ndana, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ Ɓeyudɛn ɓete ɓe tikima temɔ nɛ nyɛ ɓaka nde: «Ŋgɛ wunɛ kɛ̀ mbɔmbu tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ mɛtu hɛnɛ, yite wunɛ gba ɓejekɛ ɓembɛ.
Ɗete, wunɛ ta duwɛ lɛpi te yi lɛpɛ gbakasi. Lɛpi te má kelɔ nde, wunɛ ɗûkwɛ kɛ ɗiyɔ bala.»
Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wusɛ ɓenday ɓe Abaraham, ko wusɛ tì pa ɗiyɔ bala mumɔ wɛtɛ yesɔ na. Kɛto nan yi wɛ nje lɛpɔ nde, wusɛ ta ɗuwɛ kɛ gba ɗiyɔ bala nje ɗiyɔ nɛ yotu su nɛ ŋguru wusu kɛ́?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ joŋna kɛ mɛɓeyɔ, nyɛ bala mɛɓeyɔ.
Yo nde, bala ti ɗíy kpo nɛ kpo kɛ mɔy kandɔ na, yasi wɛtɛ, yo mɔnɔ kandɔ ɗiyɛ kpo nɛ kpo kɛ mɔy kandɔ.
Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, mi *Mɔnɔ mumɔ sôŋa wunɛ kɛ ɗiyɔ bala, yite wunɛ ta ɗuwɛ gbate kɛ ɗiyɔ bala nje ɗiyɔ nɛ yotu yun nɛ ŋguru wun.
Mi duwa̧ nde, wunɛ ɓenday ɓe Abaraham, ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, wunɛ kɛ sa̧ nje te yi wo mi, kɛto mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ yeti kɛ nyiŋɛ kɛ mɔy mɛtemɔ mun na.
Mi lɛ́pi mbɛ yasi te yi mi ɓɛŋma kɛ yi Saŋmbɛ kɛ́. Wunɛ kél ndi sendi yun mɛyasi mɛte yi wunɛ wokuma nɛ saŋgwɛ te wun kɛ́.»
Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Abaraham saŋmbambɔ wusu.» Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ má ɓɛki ɓenday ɓe Abaraham, ma wunɛ kɛ kelɔ mɛyasi nda nyɛ.
Ma ndana, gba mi mɔ te ɛ lɛpima gbakasi nyɛ wunɛ kɛ mɛyasi mɛte yi mi wokuma kɛ numbu Njambiyɛ kɛ́, wunɛ kɛ sa̧ nje te yi wo mi. Yinɔri Abaraham tì kelɛ ɗete na.
Wunɛ kɛ kelɔ mɛkele mɛ saŋgwɛ wun.» Ɛ ɓo lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wusɛ yeti ɓɔnɔ ɓe wanja na. Wusɛ ndi nɛ saŋgwɛ wɛtɛ, yo Njambiyɛ.»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Njambiyɛ má ɓɛki saŋgwɛ wun, ma wunɛ kɛ kwaɗyɛ mi, kɛto mi wúla kɛ yenɛ nje nɔ, mi nja̧ jakimɛ nyɛ, mi tì nje nɛ ɗeti te yembɛ na, yo nde, yo nyɛ tomɛ mi.
Ŋge ɓa nje kelɔ yi wunɛ ti wóku yun lɛpi te yi mi lɛpɛ kɛ́? Yo kɛto wunɛ yeti nɛ ɗeti te yi lɛŋgwɛ mɛtɔ wokɔ na.

Gba saŋgwɛ wun *Kum ɓeya mɛkele. Ma wunɛ kɛ kwaɗyɛ kelɔ mɛyasi mɛte yi saŋgwɛ wun ɓɛ nɛ mɛsosa kɛte kɛ́. Nyɛ mɔ wona ɓomɔ kandɛ njombu yaŋa. A yeti nɛ kasi nɛ gbakasi na, kɛto gbakasi yeti kɛ nyɛ na. Komɛ nyɛ kelɛ ja̧ kɛ́, a lɛ́pi ndi yasi te yi pundɛ ndi kɛ mɔy temɔ nɛ, kɛto nyɛ mɔ ja̧, yo nyɛ bosa mɔ ja̧.
Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ ɓɛ mi, wunɛ yeti kɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ mi na, kɛto mi lɛ́pi yasi te yi ɓɛ gbakasi.
Nda kɛ njoka yun yakama teɗye nde, mi kelma yiŋa ɓeya yasi kɔ? Ma ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, yasi te yi mi lɛpɛ kɛ́ gbakasi, kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ ti tíki temɔ nɛ mi kɛ́?
Mɔ te ɛ ɓɛ mɔ Njambiyɛ, mɔ te kɛ ɓiye to mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ, yo nde, yi wunɛ ti ɓíya yun to te kɛ́, kɛto wunɛ yeti yun ɓotu ɓe Njambiyɛ na.»
Ɛ Ɓeyudɛn yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yi wusɛ lɛpima nde, wɛ gba *Mɔ Samari, wɛ sendi nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ kɛ yotu kɛ́, ’wusɛ kelma ja̧?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Ko mi yeti mbɛ nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ kɛ yotu na, yo nde, mi lúksa Saŋmbɛ, ma wunɛ kɛ kpalɔ nje yɛliyɛ yun mi.
Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ ɓɛ mi, mi ti sáŋ nde, ɓomɔ lûksa mi na. Yo nɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ te ɛ sa̧ nde, ɓomɔ lûksa mi, yo nyɛ kɛ pɛsɔ jɔsi ɓomɔ.
Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ŋgɛ mumɔ ɓakiɗye mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ, ko a tí gwe na.»

Ɛ Ɓeyudɛn nje lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Hɛ duwa̧ ndana yɛy nde, wɛ nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ kɛ yotu. Abaraham gwa̧, ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ ma gwe sendi, ma ŋge nje kelɔ yi wɛ lɛpɛ nde: ‹Ŋgɛ mumɔ ɓakiɗye mɛlɛpi mɛmbɛ, ko a tí gwe› kɛ́?
Wɛ táka nde, wɛ kwa̧ saŋmbambɔ wusu Abaraham ɛ gwa̧ kɔ nde? Ɓotu ɓe punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ ma gwe sendi, wɛ táka yɔ nde, wɛ ɓa nda?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Ŋgɛ gba mi nɛ ŋguru wombɛ lukse yotu mbɛ, luksa yotu te yite gbɛlate. Yo Saŋmbɛ te yi wunɛ lɛpɛ nde, nyɛ Njambiyɛ wun kɔ, yo nyɛ kɛ lukse mi.
Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ nyɛ na. Kɛ ɓɛ mi, mi kɛ duwɛ nyɛ. Ŋgɛ mi lɛpɛ nde, mi yeti kɛ duwɛ nyɛ na, yite mi mɛ mɔ ja̧ nda wunɛ. Yo nde, mi duwa̧ nyɛ, ɓakiɗye sendi mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ.
Saŋmbambɔ wun Abaraham ɗikima takɛ nde, a ta ɓɛŋɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mi ta nje kɛte kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ wokɛ mɛsosa ɓuɗyate. Kumɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ ŋgimɔ te gbate, ɛ nyɛ sosa.»
Ɛ Ɓeyudɛn lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ tì pa kumɔ gbɛla mɛsew kamɔtan na, ’wɛ nde, wɛ ɓɛŋma Abaraham nde?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Piŋɔ te yi ɓo tì pa ja Abaraham na, mi mɛ mbɛ kɛte.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo tɔkɛ mɛtari, nɛ́ ɓo lu̧ nɛ nyɛ. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ sɔma kwa̧ pundɔ kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ.
Ndana, kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ tɔkɛ nje kwa̧ nɔ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ wɛtɛ mbam te ɛ jaɗya ndi nɛ ɗiɓina misi kɔ.
Ɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele, kɛto ŋge yi mbam kɔ jaɗya nɛ ɗiɓina misi kɛ́? ’Yo kɛto yiŋa ɓeya mɛkele mɛnɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ ho kɛto yiŋa ɓeya mɛkele mɛ saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Yeti nde, nyɛ ho saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ kelma yiŋa ɓeya mɛkele na. Yo nde, a jáɗyikwɛ nɛ ɗiɓina misi, nɛ́ Njambiyɛ punjɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele mɛnɛ kɛ yotu nɛ.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi yesɔ ndi kɛte kɛ́, wusɛ yâkaŋgwɛ kelɔ mɛsay mɛ mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ. Tu mɛ kɛ nje, ŋgimɔ te yi mumɔ ti yaka kelɔ se mɛsay na.
Piŋɔ te yi mi ndi kɛ mɛnɛti maka, mi mbɛ mɛjasi te yi paniyɛ puyɛ nyɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti.»
Kɛ nyɛ ma si lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ sa mɛsɛri kɛ mɛnɛti ɓulɔ yo nɛ mɛsɛri lɔmbɛ kɛ misi mɛ mɔ ɗiɓina misi
lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kɛndɔ kɛ weyɛ misi mɔ kɛ Silɔy.» To Silɔy nde Mɔ te yi ɓo tomma nyɛ kɔ. Ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ weyɛ misi. A yɔkwa̧ mate, a mɛ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi nɛ ŋgɛlɛlɛ.
Ndana, ɛ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗikima ɗiyɔ wɛtɛ ɓenɛ mbam kɔ nɛ̀ ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗikima ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ kɛ jɔmbɔ mɛyasi ɓaka lɛpɛ nde: «’Yeti gba mbam kɔ ɛ ɗikima ɗiyɔ mɛtiɗyɛ ɗiki jɔmbɔ mɛyasi kɔ na?»
Ɛ ɓaŋa ɗiki lɛpɔ nde: «Yo nyɛ.» Ɓaŋa nde: «Ja̧, ɓenɛ nyɛ ɓóŋnaŋgwɛ ɓoŋnaŋgwɛ.» Ɛ nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Yo gba mi kɔ.»
Ɛ ɓo nje diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yo kwaŋnama nan yi misi mɔ ɓutunama nɔ kɛ́?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Wɛtɛ mbam nde Yesus ɓulma mɛnɛti lɔmbɛ kɛ misi mɛmbɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ mi nde: ‹Kɛn kɛ Silɔy kɛ̀ weyɛ misi mɔ.› Mi ka̧. Kɛ mi ma si weyɛ misi mɛmbɛ kɛ́, ɛ mi kandɛ ɓɛŋna yasi.»
Ɛ ɓo diyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mbam te we?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Mi ti duwɛ na.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo ɓu̧ mɔ te ɛ ɓa̧ mbɔmbu nɛ ɗiɓina misi kɔ kɛ̀ nɔ kɛ yi *Ɓefarisɛ̧.
Yasi yinɔri Yesus ɓúl mɛnɛti ɓutɛ nɛ misi mɛ mbam kɔ kɛ yesɔ *Saba.

Yori yi Ɓefarisɛ̧ diyma sendi mbam kɔ yasi te yi kwaŋnama yi kelɔ nde, a ɓɛ̂ŋnaŋgwɛ ndana kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «A lɔmbuma mɛsɔpɔ kɛ misi mɛmbɛ, ɛ mi kwa̧ kɛ̀ weyɛ misi, ma ndana mi kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi.»

Ɛ ɓaŋa Ɓefarisɛ̧ ɗiki lɛpɔ nde: «Yeti Njambiyɛ njesɛ nyɛ na, kɛto a yeti kɛ jesɔ mboŋga te ɛ lɛpɛ kasi Saba kɛ́ na.» Ɓaŋa ɗikima lɛpɔ yan nde: «’Mɔ mɛɓeyɔ yakama kelɔ ka kwalɔ mɛyekambiyɛ mɛte yikɛ yi nyɛ kelma kɛ́?» Ɛ ɓo ɓaka kɛ ɓembe.

Ɛ ɓo nje kwa̧ sendi wolo diyɛ mɔ te ɛ ɓa̧ mbɔmbu nɛ ɗiɓina misi kɔ nde: «Wɛ lɛ́pi yɔ nɛ ŋge kɛ kasi mbam te? Wɛ lɛ́pi nɛ ŋge kɛ say te yi nyɛ kelma ɓutɛ nɛ misi mɔ kɛ́?» Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Nyɛ mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ.»
Ko ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn tì kwaɗyɛ jayɛ nde, mbam kɔ ɓa̧ mbɔmbu nɛ ɗiɓina misi, jayɛ sendi nde, a njáki nje ɓɛŋna ndana na. Ɗete, ɛ ɓo jeɓa saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ.
Ɛ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ diyɛ ɓo nde: «Yɔkɔ mɔnɔ wun yi wunɛ lɛpɛ nde, a jaɗya nɛ ɗiɓina misi kɔ? Yo kwaŋnama nan yi nyɛ mɛ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi ndana kɛ́?»
Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nde: «Wusɛ kɛ duwɛ nde, yɔkɔ mɔnɔ wusu, duwɛ sendi nde, a jaɗya nɛ ɗiɓina misi.
Ndi nde, yí lɛpɔ nɛ yasi te yi kwaŋnama nde, a ɓɛ̂ŋnaŋgwɛ ndana nɛ̀ mɔ te ɛ ɓutuma misi mɛnɛ kɔ, wusɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ yaŋa kɛte na. A mɛ mumɔ, wunɛ dîya ndi nyɛ, nyɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ ta yeŋsa nyɛ wunɛ.»

Saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ yéŋsaŋgwɛ ɗete, kɛto ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ kambɔ ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn, kɛto ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn ma nyɛ ŋgiŋ nde, ŋgɛ mumɔ jayɛ kɛ mbɔmbu ɓomɔ nde, Yesus nyɛ *Krist, ko mɔ te tí natɛ se mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya man wɛtɛ yesɔ na.
Yo kɛto te yite yi saŋgwɛ ɓenɛ nyaŋgwɛ lɛpima nde: ‹A mɛ mumɔ, wunɛ dîya ndi nyɛ› kɛ́.
Ɗete, ɛ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ ɓasiɗye jeɓa mbam kɔ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Lɛpɔ gbakasi nyɛ wusɛ kɛ mbɔmbu Njambiyɛ. Hɛ duwa̧ nde, mbam te mɔ mɛɓeyɔ.»
Ɛ nyɛ nje yeŋsa nde: «Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, nyɛ mɔ mɛɓeyɔ, mi yeti kɛ duwɛ na, siya yasi te yi mi duwa̧, yo nde, mi tì ɓɛ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi nɛ mbɔmbu na, ma ndana mi mɛ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi.»
Ɛ ɓo diyɛ nyɛ nde: «A kelma yasi te nda kɛ yotu yɔ? A kelma nan ɓutɛ nɛ misi mɔ?»

Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi ma si lɛpɔ yasi te yi kwaŋnama kɛ́ nyɛ wunɛ, ma wunɛ tì kwaɗyɛ wokɔ na. ’Wunɛ kwáɗyikwɛ nde, mi kâlaŋgwɛ yekiɗye sendi nyɛ wunɛ kɛto ŋge? ’Wunɛ sendi kɛ kwaɗyɛ nje ɓɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ?»
Ɛ ɓo toyɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Yo gba wɛ ɓɛ jekɛ wenɛ, kɛ ɓɛ wusɛ, wusɛ su ɓejekɛ ɓe Mɔyisi.
Wusɛ duwa̧ su nde, Njambiyɛ lɛpinama nyɛ Mɔyisi. Ma kɛ ɓɛ mbam te yɔkɔ, ho a wúla we nje nɔ, wusɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ na.»
Ɛ mbam te ɛ ɓa̧ mbɔmbu nɛ ɗiɓina misi kɔ yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Yo gba yasi te yi ŋgbakima yí wokɔ nde, ho a wúla we nje nɔ, wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ na, ma yo nyɛ ɓutɛ misi mɛmbɛ.
Wusɛ duwa̧ nde, Njambiyɛ ti jáya mɛŋgwɛta mɛ ɓotu mɛɓeyɔ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a jáya mɛŋgwɛta mɛ mɔ te ɛ kanɛ nyɛ tu nɛ yesɔ, kelɔ yasi te yi nyɛ Njambiyɛ kwaɗyɛ kɛ́.
Kandɛ nɛ ɓetomba mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tì pa wokɔ wɛtɛ yesɔ nde, wɛtɛ mumɔ ɓutuma misi mɛ mɔ te ɛ jaɗya nɛ ɗiɓina misi kɔ na.
Má ɓɛki nde, yeti Njambiyɛ tomɛ mbam te njesɛ na, ma nyɛ tì kelɛ yaŋa na.»
Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Kandɛ yi ɓo ma jáki nɛ wɛ kumɔ ndana wɛ kɛ mɔy mɛɓeyɔ nɛ pitik, yasi te nda yi wɛ ta teɗye wusɛ kɛ́?» Ɛ ɓo ɗuɗye nyɛ punjɛ kɛnjɛ sɛ̧.
Yesus wokuma nde, ɓo ɗuɗya mbam te ɛ ɓa̧ mbɔmbu nɛ ɗiɓina misi kɔ. Ɛ Yesus saŋgwa nɛ nyɛ kwa̧ diyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Wɛ kɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ yi *Mɔnɔ mumɔ?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, Mɔnɔ mumɔ te mbɛte ɓa nda? Lɛpɔ, nɛ́ mi tiki temɔ nɛ nyɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wɛ ma ɓɛŋɛ nyɛ, yo gba nyɛ ɛ kɛ lɛpina ndana nyɛ wɛ kɔ.»
Ɛ mbam lɛpɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, mi kɛ tikɔ temɔ nɛ nyɛ.» Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kusɛ mɛɓɔŋ kɛ mbɔmbu Yesus kanɔ nyɛ.
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nde: «Mi nja̧ kɛ mɛnɛti maka, nɛ́ jɔsi ɓɛ kɛte, nɛ́ ɓotu ɓete ɓe yeti kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi ɓaka ɓɛŋ yasi, nɛ́ ɓotu ɓete ɓe kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi ɓaka nje ɓɛ nɛ ɗiɓina misi.»
Kɛ ɓaŋa *Ɓefarisɛ̧ ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus ɓaka ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ ɓo diyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Yite nde, wusɛ sendi, misi musu ɗiɓinate?»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Misi mun má ɓɛki ɗiɓinate, ma wunɛ yeti nɛ mɛɓeyɔ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ kɛ lɛpɔ ndana nde: ‹Wusɛ kɛ ɓɛŋɛ yasi kimɔte,› ɗete mɛɓeyɔ mun ta ɗiyɔ ɓɔnɛ kɛ to yun.»

Yesus nja̧ kɛ mbɔmbu lɛpɔ nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: «Mɔ te ɛ ɗiyɛ kinɛ kwa̧ nɛ numɛy kakwɛ ɓesam yí nyiŋɛ nɔ kɛ mɔyte na, ŋgɛ nyɛ kpalɔ kwa̧ nɛ wɛtɛ nje dɛlɛ, mɔ te mɔ guɓɔ, nyɛ nyaŋgwɛ mɔ kelna ɓeya mɛkele.
Yo nde, mɔ te ɛ kwa̧ nɛ numɛy nyiŋɛ nɔ kɛ mɔy kakwɛ, mɔ te mɔ ɓakiɗya ɓesam.
Sanjele te ɛ ɗiyɛ kɛ numɛy kakwɛ kɔ ɓúta numɛy nyɛ nyɛ, wɛ ɓɛ́ŋa kɛ́, ɓesam kɛ wokɔ mɛn nɛ. A má jeɓa ɓo wɛtɛ wɛtɛ nɛ ɗinɔ ɗyan ŋgbɔsɔ ɓo pundɔ nɔ.
Ŋgɛ nyɛ si punjɛ ɓesam ɓenɛ hɛnɛ ɗete kɛ́, a ma kwa̧ mbɔmbu, ɓo kɛ kɔŋ nɛ, kɛto ɓo kɛ duwɛ mɛn nɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ko ɓo yeti nɛ ɗeti te yi ɓeŋgwɛ gbɛla mumɔ na, ɓo ta kambɔ nyɛ lɔndɔ kɛ̀ nɛ naŋ, kɛto ɓo yeti kɛ duwɛ mɛn gbɛla ɓomɔ na.»
Yesus lɛpinama nɛ nje kanɔ ɗete nyɛ ɓo, yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì ɓiye to yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpima nyɛ ɓo kɛ́ na.
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ sendi nyɛ ɓo nde: «Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Mi mbɛ numɛy te yi ɓesam kwa̧ kɛte yí nyiŋɛ nɔ kɛ mɔy kakwɛ kɛ́.
Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ɓe kandima nje nɛ mi ɓaka ɓotu ɓe guɓɔ, ɓo ɓotu ɓe nyaŋgwɛ kelna ɓeya mɛkele. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓesam tì lɛŋgwɛ mɛtɔ kɛ mɛn yan na.
Mi mbɛ numɛy, ŋgɛ mumɔ nyiŋɛ nɛ nje te wombɛ, a ta ju̧. A ta nyiŋɛ pundɔ dolɔ mɛɗye te yi ɗye.
Siya yasi te yi mɔ guɓɔ nje kelɔ, yo ndi guɓuna yasi, ndi wonate nɛ̀ girisate. Mi nja̧ mbɛ, nɛ́ ɓesam ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ, nɛ́ ɓo joŋna kɛ mɔy nyɛŋgwɛ.
Mi mbɛ kimɔ mɔ ɓakiɗya ɓesam. Kimɔ mɔ ɓakiɗya ɓesam nyɛ́ki joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ kɛto ɓesam ɓenɛ.

Yasi wɛtɛ, mɔ te ɛ nje ɓakiɗye ɓesam kɛto mɔni kɔ yeti gba mɔ ɓakiɗya ɓesam na, kɛto ɓesam yeti ɓesam ɓenɛ na. Ŋgɛ nyɛ ɓɛŋɛ ŋgwɛy kɛ nje, wɛ ɓɛ́ŋa, a tikima ɓesam sɛɗyɛ kwa̧, ŋgwɛy má ɗya̧ ɓiye ɓaŋa, ɓari ma si wanja kwa̧.
Mɔ te ɛ nje ɓakiɗye ɓesam kɛto mɔni kɔ sɛ́ɗyikwɛ kwa̧, kɛto yo ndi kɛto mɔni yi nyɛ ɓakiɗye ɓesam, yeti kasi nɛ nɛ ɓo na.
Mi mbɛ kimɔ mɔ ɓakiɗya ɓesam. Mi kɛ duwɛ ɓesam ɓembɛ, ɓesam ɓembɛ kɛ duwɛ sendi mi.
Yo sendi ɗete nda yi Da kɛ duwɛ mi, mi sendi kɛ duwɛ nyɛ. Mi kɛ nyɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyembɛ kɛto ɓesam ɓembɛ.
Mi nɛ ɓaŋa ɓesam ɓembɛ ɓe yeti kɛ mɔy kakwɛ te yikɛ na. Mi yâkaŋgwɛ ŋgbɔsɔ sendi ɓo nje nɔ. Ɓo ta wokɔ mɛn mbɛ, ɓo má nje ɓɛ ndi kuru ɓesam wɛtɛ nɛ̀ mɔ ɓakiɗya yan wɛtɛ.
Da kwáɗyikwɛ mi, yo kɛto mi kɛ nyɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyembɛ yí laɗye ɓu̧ sendi yo nɛ kɔkɔ.

Kinɛ mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ ɛ yakama pɛsɔ joŋgwɛ ɗyembɛ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, yo mi nɛ ŋguru wombɛ kɛ nyɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyembɛ. Mi nɛ ɗeti te yi nyɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyembɛ, mi sendi nɛ ɗeti te yi ɓu̧ yo nɛ kɔkɔ. Yo Saŋmbɛ lɛpɛ nde, mi kêl ɗete.»
Ɛ mɛlɛpi mɛnɔri kelɛ nde, Ɓeyudɛn ɓâkaŋgwɛ sendi wolo kɛ ɓembe.
Ɛ ɓuɗya ɓomɔ kɛ njokate lɛpɛ nde: «A nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ kɛ yotu, a kɛ kɔnɔ nɛ ɓoku. Kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ lɛŋgwɛ mɛtɔ kɛ yasi te yi nyɛ lɛpɛ kɛ́?»
Ɛ ɓaŋa lɛpɛ yan nde: «Mɔ te ɛ nɛ ɓeya sisiŋ kɛ yotu kɔ ti lɛ́pinaŋgwɛ ɗekɛ na. ’Ɓeya sisiŋ nɛ ɗeti te yi kelɔ nde, mɔ ɗiɓina misi ɓɛ̂ŋnaŋgwɛ nde?»
Ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ kelɔ jesɔ yí takɛ nɛ yesɔ te yi ɓo kaŋma nɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ te ɛ Yerusalɛm nyɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́. Yo ɓa̧ kɛ ŋgimɔ abekata.
Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ yombila kɛ mɔy mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ mbɛy te yi ɓo ɗikima jeɓa nde Nje Salomɔŋ kɛ́.
Ndana, ɛ Ɓeyudɛn nje litɔ nyɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Wɛ kwáɗyikwɛ nde, wusɛ ɗîy nɛ mɛso kɛ temɔ kumɔ kɛ ŋgimɔ te yin? Ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, yo wɛ *Krist, lɛpɔ nɛ saŋsaŋ nyɛ wusɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi ma si lɛpɔ nyɛ wunɛ, ma wunɛ yeti kɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛlɛpi mɛte na. Mɛkele mɛte yi Saŋmbɛ nyɛ mi ɗeti nde, mi kêl kɛ́ kɛ teɗye mi nyɛ wunɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, wunɛ yeti kɛ tikɔ yun temɔ kɛ yembɛ na, kɛto wunɛ yeti kɛ njoka ɓesam ɓembɛ na.
Ɓesam ɓembɛ kɛ wokɔ mɛn mbɛ, mi kɛ duwɛ mbɛ ɓo, ɓo kɛ ɓeŋgwɛ sendi mi.
Mi kɛ nyɛ mbɛ ɓo joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo, ko ɓo tí gwe yambile na. Sendi, ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ tí sukɔ ɓo kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛmbɛ na.
Saŋmbɛ, mɔ te ɛ nya mi ɓo kɔ kwa̧ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ, ko mumɔ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ yeti nɛ ɗeti te yi sukɔ ɓo kɛ mɛɓɔ mɛ Da na.
Sinɛ Da ndi kiya yasi wɛtɛ.»
Ndana, ɛ Ɓeyudɛn tɔkɛ sendi mɛtari wolo, nɛ́ ɓo lu̧ nɛ nyɛ wo.
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mi kelma ɓuɗya kimɔ mɛkele mɛte yi Da lɛpima nde, mi kêl kɛ́ kɛ misi mun, ma kɛ njoka mɛkele mɛte, wunɛ kwáɗyikwɛ lu̧ mi nɛ mɛtari wo kɛto mɛkele te yɛn?»

Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wusɛ ti kwáɗyikwɛ lu̧ wɛ nɛ mɛtari wo kɛto wɛtɛ kimɔ mɛkele na, yasi wɛtɛ, wusɛ kwáɗyikwɛ lu̧ wɛ nɛ mɛtari wo, kɛto wɛ kɛ gbutɔ nɛ Njambiyɛ, kɛto gbɛla wɛ mumɔ kɛ kpalɔ lɛpɔ nde, wɛ Njambiyɛ!»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «’Yo yeti gba kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ mɛmboŋga mun nde: ‹Njambiyɛ lɛpima nde: Wunɛ ɓenjambiyɛ na?›
Wusɛ duwa̧ nde, mumɔ ti yaka soŋɛ yasi te yi yo ma ɓɛ kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́ na. Ma ŋgɛ Njambiyɛ jeɓa ɓotu ɓete ɓe mɛlɛpi mɛnɛ lɛpinama nyɛ ɓo ɓaka nde ɓenjambiyɛ,
kɛto ŋge yi wunɛ nje lɛpɔ gba nɛ mi mɔ te ɛ Da tɔkuma tomɔ njesɛ kɛ mɛnɛti maka kɔ nde, mi kɛ gbutɔ nɛ nyɛ, kɛto mi lɛpima nde, mi Mɔnɔ wenɛ kɛ́?
Ŋgɛ mi ɗiyɛ kinɛ kelɔ mɛkele mɛ Saŋmbɛ na, komɛte, wunɛ tî tiki temɔ nɛ mi na.

Yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, mi kɛ kelɔ mɛkele mɛ Saŋmbɛ, ko ɓɛkɔ nde, wunɛ tì tikɛ temɔ nɛ mi na, wunɛ yêkiɗya tikɔ temɔ kɛ mɛkele mɛte yi mi kelɛ kɛ́, nɛ́ wunɛ duwɛ kimɔte kɛ̀ nɔ mbɔmbu nde, Da kɛ yembɛ, mi sendi kɛ yenɛ.»
Ndana, ɛ ɓo kala sa̧ nje te yi ɓiye nyɛ, yasi wɛtɛ, ɛ nyɛ bɔla kwa̧.
Ɛ nyɛ ɗuwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ kɛ ŋginjɛ Yurdɛ̧, kɛ mbɛy te yi Jaŋ ma kánda tɔpuna ɓomɔ kɛ mɔrɔku kɛte kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɗiyɔ mate.
Ɛ ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate nje kɛ yenɛ. Ɛ ɓo ɗiki lɛpɔ nde: «Jaŋ tì kelɛ ko mɛyekambiyɛ wɛtɛ nɛ wɛtɛ na, yasi wɛtɛ, yasi hɛnɛ te yi nyɛ lɛpima kɛ kasi mbam kɔ kɛ́, gbakasi.»
Ɛ ɓomɔ ɓuɗyate tikɛ temɔ kɛ yi Yesus kɛ mbɛy yinɔri.
Wɛtɛ mbam nde Lasar ɓalma nɛ kɔn. A ɓa̧ mɔ Betani, ɗya Mariya ɓenɛ maŋ wenɛ Marta.
Yo ɓa̧ Mariya te ɛ lɔmbuma lɔbinda kɛ mɛkol mɛ Kumande Yesus titɔ yo nɛ nyiŋɔ to nɛ kɔ. Yo ɗyɔmbu ɗyenɛ Lasar kɔnɛ.
Ɛ ɓeɗyɔmbu ɓenɛ ɓaka yiɓa tomɛ mumɔ kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ Yesus nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande ɓɛŋa, sɔŋ temɔ wɔ kɛ kɔnɔ.»
Kɛ Yesus ma wokɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nde: «Kɔn te yeti kɔn sɔŋ na, yasi wɛtɛ, yo kɔn te yi Njambiyɛ ta teɗye nyaŋgwɛ ɗeti mɛluksa mɛnɛ, nɛ́ Mɔnɔ wenɛ ɓɛ nɛ mɛluksa kɛ kɔn te.»
Temɔ Yesus ɓa̧ kɛ yotu Marta ɓenɛ maŋ ɓu̧ ɗyɔmbu ɗyan Lasar.
Kɛ nyɛ ma si wokɔ kasi kɔn Lasar kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ nje kwaŋɗye sendi mɛtu yiɓa ndi kɛ mbɛy te komɛ nyɛ ɓa̧ kɛ́.
Kɛ kɔŋte, ɛ nyɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ nde: «Wusɛ yɔ̂kwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ Yuda.»
Ɛ ɓejekɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Yekele, kɔŋte tì pa kikɔ na, Ɓeyudɛn kwaɗya lu̧ wɛ nɛ mɛtari wo, ma ndana ’wɛ kɛ kwaɗyɛ yɔkwɛ nɛ kɔkɔ kɛ̀ sendi mate nde?»
Ɛ nyɛ yeŋsa nde: «’Yesɔ wɛtɛ yeti nɛ hawa kamɔ jɔ yiɓa na? Ŋgɛ mumɔ kɛndɛ nɛ yesɔ, a yeti kɛ ɓomiyɛ ɓaki na, kɛto a kɛ ɓɛŋɛ mɛjasi mɛ yesɔ.
Ma yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ mumɔ kɛndɛ nɛ tu, a kɛ ɓomiyɛ ɓaki, kɛto a kinɛ mɛjasi kɛ yotu nɛ na.»
Kɛ nyɛ ma si lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Sɔ wusu Lasar kɛ jakɔ, yasi wɛtɛ, mi ta kɛ̀ jemɛ nyɛ.»
Ɛ ɓejekɛ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, ŋgɛ ɓɛ nde, a kɛ jakɔ, yotu nɛ ta ŋgbanjɔ lalɛ.»
Yasi yinɔri Yesus lɛ́pi nɛ kasi sɔŋ Lasar. Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ yan, ɓo takima yan nde, a lɛ́pi nɛ gbɛla jakɔ.
Ɗete, ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nɛ gbas gbas nyɛ ɓo nde: «Lasar ma gwe.
Ma ŋgɛ mi ɓɛŋɛ wunɛ ɗekɛ kɛ́, mi nɛ mɛsosa, kɛto mi tì ɓɛ kɛ mbɛy te na. Ɗete, wunɛ ta nje tikɔ temɔ nɛ mi. Yasi wɛtɛ, hɛ kɛ̂n mate.»
Ndana, ɛ Tomasi te yi ɓo ɗikima jeɓa sendi nde Ɓeadan kɔ lɛpɛ nyɛ njɔŋ nɛ nde: «Wusɛ sendi, hɛ kɛ̂n mate, nɛ́ sinɛ ɓe Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande kɛ̀ gwe mate.»
Kɛ Yesus ma ɗya̧ kɛ́, a njáki dolɔ nde, yo mɛ mɛtu yini yi ɓo pumbuma nɛ Lasar kɛ́.
Betani ɓa̧ kɛ kɛki Yerusalɛm, njokate tì kumɛ kilomɛta yitati na.
Ɗete, ɛ Ɓeyudɛn ɓuɗyate nje ɓɛŋɛ Marta ɓenɛ Mariya kɛ sɔŋ ɗyɔmbu ɗyan yí nyɛ ɓo mɛŋgitɛ.
Ndana, kɛ Marta ma wokɔ nde, Yesus kɛ nje kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ saŋgwa nɛ nyɛ, ɛ Mariya ɗiyɛ nɛ kɛ tu̧.
Ɛ Marta lɛpɛ nyɛ Yesus nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, wɛ má ɓɛki waka, ma ɗyɔmbu ɗyembɛ tì gwe na.
Yasi wɛtɛ, mi duwa̧ nde, ko ndana yasi hɛnɛ te yi wɛ ta diyɛ Njambiyɛ, a ta nyɛ wɛ yo.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Ɗyɔmbu ɗyɔ ta womiyɛ.»
Ɛ Marta yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mi duwa̧ nde, a ta womiyɛ komɛ ɓemuŋ ta womiyɛ nɔ kɛ njena yesɔ siyna mbokɔ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Mi mbɛ mɔ womiya ɓemuŋ, mi sendi joŋgwɛ. Mɔ te ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ mi, mɔ te ta ju̧, ko ɓɛkɔ nde, a gwâki.
Sendi, mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ joŋna tikɔ temɔ nɛ mi, ko mɔ te tí gwe na. ’Wɛ kɛ tikɔ temɔ kɛ lɛpi te nde?»
Ɛ Marta yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «I̧, Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande. Mi ma tikɔ temɔ nde, wɛ *Krist, Mɔnɔ Njambiyɛ, yɔkɔ yi ɓa̧ nde, a yâkaŋgwɛ nje kɛ mɛnɛti maka kɔ.»
Kɛ nyɛ ma si lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ mbɔmbila kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ maŋ wenɛ Mariya nde: «Yekele ma ɗya̧, a kɛ jeɓa wɛ.»
Kɛ Mariya ma wokɔ ndi ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ tɛmɛ nɛ ŋgɛt kwa̧ kɛ̀ pɛ yi Yesus.
Yinɔri Yesus tì pa nyiŋɛ mɔy ɗya na, a ɓa̧ ndi kɛ mbɛy te yi Marta ka̧ saŋgwa nɛ nyɛ kɛ́.
Ndana, kɛ Ɓeyudɛn ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ ɓenɛ ɓe Mariya kɛ tu̧ kɛ nyɛna nyɛ mɛŋgitɛ ɓaka ma ɓɛŋɛ nde, a tɛmma nɛ ŋgɛt pundɔ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo ɓeŋgwɛ nyɛ, takɛ nde, a kɛ́n kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ kɛ̀ lelɔ.
Kɛ Mariya ma kumɔ kɛ mbɛy te yi Yesus ɓa̧ kɛte, kaŋɛ misi ɓɛŋɛ nɛ nyɛ kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ ɓalɛ kɛ mɛkol mɛnɛ lɛpɔ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, wɛ má ɓɛki waka, ma ɗyɔmbu ɗyembɛ tì gwe na.»
Kɛ Yesus ma ɓɛŋɛ Mariya kɛ lelɔ, ɓɛŋɛ Ɓeyudɛn ɓete ɓe nja̧ ɓenɛ ɓe Mariya kɛ lelɔ sendi kɛ́, ɛ ŋgambi sɔŋ kwa̧ nyɛ, ɛ mɛtakina nje nyɛ kɛ temɔ.
Ɛ nyɛ diyɛ ɓo nde: «Wunɛ púmbu nyɛ we?» Ɛ ɓo yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, inja ɓɛŋɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus lelɛ.
Ɛ Ɓeyudɛn ɗiyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa ndi, a ɓa̧ kɛ kwaɗyɛ nyɛ ɓuɗyate.»
Ɛ ɓaŋa kɛ njokate lɛpɛ yan nde: «’Gba mbam kɔ ɛ ɓutuma misi mɛ mɔ ɗiɓina misi kɔ, ma nyɛ ti yaka kelɔ nde, Lasar ti gwáki na?»
Ɛ ŋgambi sɔŋ ɓasiɗye kwa̧ Yesus, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ. Ɓoŋsɔŋ te ɓa̧ ŋguku tari, ɓo ɓoŋma wɛtɛ tari ɗiɓɔ nɛ numbu te.
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nde: «Wunɛ njêŋa tari soŋɛ.» Ɛ Marta te ɗyɔmbu nɛ Lasar te ɛ gwa̧ kɔ lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ Kumande, a mɛ kɛ numbɔ ndana, kɛto yo mɛ mɛtu yini yi ɓo pumbuma nɛ nyɛ kɛ́.»
Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ nyɛ nde: «’Mi tì lɛpɛ nyɛ wɛ nde, ŋgɛ wɛ tikɛ temɔ kɛ lɛpi te yi mi lɛpɛ kɛ́, wɛ ta ɓɛŋɛ nyaŋgwɛ ɗeti mɛluksa mɛ Njambiyɛ na?»
Ndana kɛ́, ɛ ɓo njeŋɛ tari soŋɛ. Ɛ Yesus kaŋɛ misi kɛnjɛ kwey lɛpɔ nde: «Da, mi kɛ nyɛ wɛ wosoko, kɛto wɛ ma wokɔ mɛŋgwɛta mɛmbɛ.
Yo nde, mi duwa̧ mbɛ nde, wɛ kɛ wokɔ mɛŋgwɛta mɛmbɛ kpo nɛ kpo. Yasi wɛtɛ, mi lɛ́pi yikɛ kɛto ŋgil te yikɛ yi ma wesiɗya kɛ kɛki mbɛ kɛ́, nɛ́ ɓo tiki temɔ nde, yo wɛ tomɛ mi njesɛ.»
Kɛ nyɛ ma si lɛpɔ ɗete kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kembiɗya lɛpɔ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «Lasar, pundɔ.»

Ɛ mɔ te ɛ ɓa̧ ndana muŋte kɔ pundɛ, mɛɓɔ nɛ̀ mɛkol ɓɔynate nɛ mɛlambɔ, to nɛ̀ mbɔmbu ɓa̧ sendi ɓɔynate nɛ wɛtɛ pɛl kandɔ. Ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓomɔ nde: «Wunɛ sôŋa mɛyasi mɛnɔri kɛ yotu nɛ, tikɔ nyɛ, na kwa̧.»
Ɓeyudɛn ɓuɗyate ɓe nja̧ kɛ yi Mariya ɓaka ɓɛŋma yasi te yi Yesus kelma kɛ́, ɛ ɓo tikɛ temɔ kɛ yenɛ.
Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓaŋa kɛ njokate kwaŋma kɛ̀ dolɔ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ yekiɗye yasi te yi Yesus kelma kɛ́ nyɛ ɓo.

Ndana, ɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ Ɓefarisɛ̧ wesiɗye ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ kɛ njoŋ ɓotu ɓe nyaŋgwɛ jɔsi Ɓeyudɛn ɓaka lɛpɔ nde: «Hɛ ta kelɔ yikɛ nan, kɛto mbam kɔ kɛ kelɔ ɓuɗya mɛyekambiyɛ?
Ma ŋgɛ wusɛ ɓɛŋɛ nɛ misi nde, a kɛ́n mbɔmbu yí kelɔ mɛkele mɛte, ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ta tikɔ temɔ kɛ yenɛ, wɛ ɓɛ́ŋa, ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɗiyɛ nɛ mɛnɛti mɛ Rom ɓaka ta nje yaŋgile mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ su nɛ kandɔ ɗyusu.»
Ndana, ɛ wɛtɛ kɛ njoka yan nde Kayif ɛ ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛ kum ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ sew te ɛte kɔ lɛpɛ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ko gba wunɛ kinɛ ɗyɔŋgɔ na!
’Wunɛ yeti kɛ duwɛ nde, yo kimɔte pɛ yun nde, mumɔ wɛtɛ gwâki kɛ numbu kandɔ, laŋsa nde, ɓo gîrisa ndiŋgɛlɛ kandɔ na?»

Yinɔri yi Kayif lɛpima kɛ́, yo ti wúla kɛ ɗyanɔ ɗyenɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ na. Yo nde, a lɛ́pi kɛto a ɓa̧ nyaŋgwɛ kum ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ sew te ɛte, ɛ nyɛ punjɛ lɛpi te yi wulma kɛ numbu Njambiyɛ yi ɓa̧ nde, yo ta kelna kɛ́. Ɛ nyɛ kandɛ si lɛpɔ nde, Yesus yâkaŋgwɛ gwe kɛto kandɔ ɗyan Ɓeyudɛn.
Ma yo tí ɓɛ ndi kɛto kandɔ Ɓeyudɛn ɓepɔ na, yasi wɛtɛ, yo ta ɓɛ sendi yí saŋgwɛ ɓɔnɔ ɓe Njambiyɛ ɓe ɗiyɛ mɛmbɛy nɛ mɛmbɛy, nɛ́ ɓo nje ɓɛ ndi njɔŋ wɛtɛ.
Kandɛ yesɔ te, ɛ ɓo nyɛ ŋgiŋ yí sa̧ nɛ nje te yi ɓo yakama wo nɛ Yesus.

Ɗete, Yesus tì yombila punjɛ se yotu kɛ njoka Ɓeyudɛn na. Yasi wɛtɛ, a nja̧ ɗuwɛ komɛte kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ pɔku mɛnɛti mɛte yi kɛ̀ kɛki koŋgor kɛ́, kɛ wɛtɛ ɗya nde Efrayim. Ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɗiyɔ mate ɓenɛ ɓejekɛ ɓenɛ.
Jesɔ *Paska Ɓeyudɛn ɓa̧ kɛ wuta, ɛ ɓuɗya ɓomɔ tɛmɛ kɛ mɛɗya yí kɛ̀ pɛ Yerusalɛm, yite jesɔ tì pa kandɛ na. Ɓo kandima kwa̧, nɛ́ ɓo pa kɛ̀ weya sɛmbɔ ɓeŋgwɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ misɔn yan.
Ɛ ɓo ɗiki sa̧ Yesus, ɗiki lɛpɔ diyna tandɛ yan kɛ mbanjɔ Njambiyɛ nde: «Nɛ ɓɛ́ŋa nan? Nɛ táka gba nde, a ta nje kɛ jesɔ wa?»
Yinɔri ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nɛ̀ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ ma lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓomɔ nde, ŋgɛ wɛtɛ mumɔ duwɛ mbɛy te yi Yesus ɗiyɛ kɛte kɛ́, nɛ̀ nyɛ kɛ̂n lɛpɔ, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ ɓiy nyɛ.
Piŋɔ te yi jesɔ *Paska ɓukwa̧ mɛtu yitan jɔ wɛtɛ, ɛ Yesus kwa̧ kɛ̀ kɛ Betani, kɛ ɗya te komɛ Lasar te yi nyɛ joŋgwa kɛ njoka ɓemuŋ kɔ ɗikima ɗiyɔ kɛ́.
Kumɔ mate, ɛ ɓo kelɛ mɛɗye jeɓa nɛ nyɛ. Marta ɓa̧ nɛ mɛsay mɛ kaɓina mɛɗye nyɛ ɓomɔ. Lasar ɓa̧ sendi kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓete yi ɓo ɓa̧ kɛ mbɛy mɛɗye ɓenɛ ɓe Yesus ɓaka.

Ɗiyɔ kɛ́, ɛ Mariya ɓu̧ wɛtɛ ndaki nɛ yiŋa lɔbinda te yi ɗye ɓuɗya mɔni yaka lita kɛ ɓembe. Yo ɓa̧ nɛ sɛŋgɛlɛŋ, ɓo tì pa pulɛ yo nɛ yiŋa yasi na. Ɛ nyɛ ɓu̧ nje lɔmbɛ kɛ mɛkol mɛ Yesus kwa̧ titɔ yo nɛ nyiŋɔ to nɛ. Ɛ tul te si ŋgaŋgile ndiŋgɛlɛ tu̧.
Ɛ Yudas Iskariyot te wɛtɛ jekɛ Yesus, yɔkɔ ɛ ta ɗyaŋgwɛ nyɛ kɔ lɛpɛ nde:
«Kɛto ŋge yi ɓo tì ɗyaŋgwɛ lɔbinda te yikɛ yi yaka ɓuyɔ mɔni te yi ɓo gbo nɛ mɔ mɛsay kɛ mɛtu mɛsay gɔmay yitati yí kamɛ nɛ ɓotu ɓe ŋgwɛtɛ kɛ́?»
Yinɔri yi Yudas lɛpima kɛ́, yo yeti kɛto a nɛ kasi nɛ ɓotu ɓe ŋgwɛtɛ na. A lɛ́pi ɗete, kɛto nyɛ mɔ guɓɔ. Yo nyɛ ɗiki ɓakiɗye kpoŋgi mɔni. A ɗikima nyɛ ɓɔ kɛ yasi te yi ɓo ɗikima komɔ kɛ mɔyte kɛ́.
Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nde: «Pa tikɔ nyɛ nɛ sɛm. Tikɔ, na ɓakiɗye yo laɗye nɛ yesɔ te yi ɓo ta nyɛ nɛ mi kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ kɛ́.
Yo nde, wúnɛ ɓotu ɓe ŋgwɛtɛ kɛ ɗiyɔ mɛtu hɛnɛ kɛ kiya mbɛy. Kɛ ɓɛ mi, mi tí ɗiyɔ mbɛ sinɛ wunɛ kɛ kiya mbɛy mɛtu hɛnɛ na.»
Ɓeyudɛn ɓuɗyate wokuma nde, Yesus womɛte kɛ Betani. Ɛ ɓo kɛ̀, yeti ndi kɛto Yesus nyɛpɔ na, yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo ka̧ sendi, nɛ́ ɓo kɛ̀ ɓɛŋ Lasar te yi Yesus joŋgwa kɛ njoka ɓemuŋ kɔ.
Ndana, ɛ ɓekum ɓe ɓotu ɓe nyɛna sadaka nyɛ Njambiyɛ nyɛ ŋgiŋ nde, ɓo ta wo sendi Lasar,
kɛto nyaŋgwɛ mɛkele mɛte yi kelnama kɛ yotu nɛ kɛ́ kɛ kelɔ nde, ɓuɗya Ɓeyudɛn tûm kɔŋ ndana nɛ ɓo tikɔ temɔ kɛ yi Yesus.
Misi pupɛ nyaŋgwɛ ŋgil ɓete ɓe nja̧ kɛ jesɔ *Paska ɓaka wokuma nde, Yesus kɛ nje kɛ Yerusalɛm.
Ɛ ɓo pɛsɛ mbɔru mɛbaŋa yí kɛ̀ sosa nɛ nyɛ. Ɛ ɓo ɗiki kembiɗya nde: «*Hosana! Baba Mbokɔ nyɛ̂ki mɛkombila nyɛ yɔkɔ ɛ nje nɛ ɗinɔ ɗyenɛ nje namɔ kandɔ Isarayɛl kɔ!»
Yesus dolma wɛtɛ mɔnɔ tofu, ɛ nyɛ ɓendɛ nyɛ ɗiyɔ te ɓeŋgwɛ yasi te yi yo kɛtinate kɛ mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ kɛ́.
Yo kɛtinate nde: ‹Ŋgɔndu Siyɔŋ,*f1* wɛ tî kambi yaŋa na. Ɓɛŋa kumande wɔ ɓendima mɔnɔ tofu yí nje nɔ.›

Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yinɔri ɓejekɛ ɓe Yesus tì wokɛ to mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓa̧ kɛ kwaŋna kɛ́ na. Yasi wɛtɛ, kɛ Yesus ma nje yɔkwɛ kɛ ɗyoɓɔ ɓu̧ mɛluksa mɛnɛ kɛ́, ɛ ɓo nje takɛ duwɛ nde, yasi te yi mɛkana mɛ Njambiyɛ ɗikima lɛpɔ nɔ kɛ́ ɓa̧ kɛ kasi nɛ. Ɓo nja̧ duwɛ sendi nde, gba mɛyasi mɛte yi ɓo kelma kɛ́, ɓo kelma yo kɛto nɛ.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi Yesus jeɓama nɛ Lasar joŋgwɛ kɛ njoka ɓemuŋ punjɛ kɛ ɓoŋsɔŋ kɛ́, ɓuɗya ɓomɔ ɓa̧ kɛte. Ɛ ɓo ɗiki yekiɗye yasi te yi ɓo ɓɛŋma kɛ́.
Yo kɛto te yite yi ŋgil ɓomɔ ka̧ kɛ̀ sosa nyɛ kɛ́. Ɓo wokuma kasi mɛyekambiyɛ mɛnɔri yi nyɛ kelma kɛ́.
Ndana, ɛ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ lɛpɛ tandɛ yan nde: «Nɛ ɓɛ̂ŋa, yasi te yi wunɛ yakama kelɔ sendi ndana yeti se na. Ɓomɔ hɛnɛ ma lekwɛ kɛ̀ kɛ kɔŋ nɛ.»
Ɓaŋa Ɓegrɛk ɓa̧ kɛ njoka ɓotu ɓete ɓe ka̧ kɛ Yerusalɛm yí kɛ̀ kanɔ Njambiyɛ kɛ jesɔ *Paska ɓaka.
Ɛ ɓo kɛ̀ kɛ yi Filip te mɔ Betsayda kɛ Galile. Ɛ ɓo ŋgwɛta nɛ nyɛ lɛpɔ nde: «Nyaŋgwɛ mbam, wusɛ kɛ kwaɗyɛ ɓɛŋɛ Yesus.»
Ɛ Filip kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ Andere, ɛ ɓo hɛnɛ yiɓa nje kwa̧ kɛ̀ lɛpɔ nyɛ Yesus.
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nyɛ ɓo nde: «Ŋgimɔ ma ɗya̧, ŋgimɔ te yi Njambiyɛ ta punjɛ nɛ mɛluksa mɛ *Mɔnɔ mumɔ yɛy.
Gbakasi yi mi lɛpɛ nyɛ wunɛ kɛ́: Ŋgɛ mbumɔ mbusa tì pa kɛ̀ kɛ mɛnɛti pa gwe na, yo ta ɓɔnɛ ndi wɛtɛ. Ma yasi wɛtɛ, ŋgɛ yo pa gwe, yo ta nje wumɔ ɓuɗya mɛmbumɔ.
Mɔ te ɛ kwaɗyɛ kambiɗya nɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ nɛ ŋgom ŋgom kɔ ta ɗimbiɗye yo. Ma yɔkɔ ɛ ɗiyɛ kinɛ kambiɗya nɛ joŋgwɛ ɗyenɛ nɛ ŋguru wenɛ kɔ ta ɓɛ nɛ joŋgwɛ te yi kpo nɛ kpo.
Mumɔ hɛnɛ ɛ kwaɗyɛ kelɔ mɛsay nyɛ mi, mɔ te yâkaŋgwɛ ɓeŋgwɛ mi. Kɛ mbɛy te yi mi ɗiyɛ kɛte, mɔ mɛsay wombɛ ta ɗiyɔ sendi kɛte. Ŋgɛ mumɔ kelɛ mɛsay nyɛ mi, Da ta lukse nyɛ.
«Ndana temɔ mbɛ ɗekɛ nɛ haɓuɓu, mi duwa̧ nde, mi ta lɛpɔ nɛ ŋge? ’Mi lɛ́pi ka nde: Da joŋgwɛ mi kɛ yasi te yi kwaɗyɛ ɗya̧ mi ndana kɛ́? Ko na, kɛto yo kɛto te yite yi mi nja̧ nɔ kɛ mɛnɛti maka.
Da, kelɔ nde, ɓomɔ lûksa ɗinɔ ɗyɔ.» Ndana, ɛ ɓo wokɛ yiŋa mɛn kɛ wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ lɛpɔ nde: «Mi ma kelɔ nde, ɓomɔ lûksa ɗinɔ ɗyembɛ. Mi ta ɓasiɗye kelɔ nde, ɓo lûksa sendi yo.»
Ŋgil ɓotu ɓete ɓe ɓa̧ womɛte wokɔ mɛn yinɔri ɓaka lɛpima nde: «Mbiyɔ lumma.» Ɓaŋa nde: «Wɛtɛ jaki Njambiyɛ lɛpinama nyɛ nyɛ.»
Ɛ Yesus yeŋsa nde: «Mɛn te yi lɛpinama wulɛ ɗyoɓɔ kɛ́ ti lɛ́pinaŋgwɛ kɛto mbɛ na, yo lɛ́pinaŋgwɛ kɛto yun.
Ŋgimɔ te yi Njambiyɛ ta pɛsɔ nɛ jɔsi ɓotu ɓe mɛnɛti maka kɛ́ ma ɗya̧. Ndana Njambiyɛ ta ɗuɗye *Kum mɛnɛti maka soŋɛ.
Pɛ yembɛ, kɛ ɓo si ŋgba mi kɛ jeti tɛmbiɗye kɛ kwey, mi ta ɗulɛ ɓomɔ hɛnɛ njesɛ kɛ yembɛ.»
Yesus lɛ́pi yinɔri yí teɗye nɛ kwalɔ sɔŋ te yi nyɛ ta saŋgwa nɔ kɛ́.

Ɛ ŋgil ɓomɔ yeŋsa nyɛ nyɛ nde: «Wusɛ wokuma su kɛ mɛkana mɛ mɛmboŋga mɛ Njambiyɛ nde, *Krist ta ɗiyɔ kpo nɛ kpo. Ma nan yi wɛ nje lɛpɔ yɔ nde, ɓo yâkaŋgwɛ ŋgba *Mɔnɔ mumɔ kɛ jeti tɛmbiɗye kɛ kwey kɛ́? Mɔnɔ mumɔ te ɛte ɓa nda?»

Ɛ Yesus nje lɛpɔ nyɛ ɓo nde: «Mɛjasi ndi kɛ njoka yun yi yaka mɔnɔ ŋgimɔ. Piŋɔ te yi yo ndi kɛ panɔ ɗete kɛ́, wunɛ kɛ̂ndi kɛ puyɛ te, kambɔ yitil mɛ nje ŋgbakɛ wunɛ. Yo nde, mɔ te ɛ kɛndɛ kɛ mɔy yitil kɔ kɛ́ndi tukute.
Kɛ ŋgimɔ te yi mɛjasi ndi kɛ panɔ kɛ njoka yun kɛ́, wunɛ tîki temɔ kɛ mɛjasi mɛte, nɛ́ wunɛ ɓɛ ɓotu ɓe mɛjasi.» Kɛ Yesus ma si lɛpɔ mɛyasi mɛnɔri kɛ́, ɛ nyɛ kwa̧ ɗuwɛ womɛte kɛ̀ mbɔmbu yan kɛ̀ sɔma.
Ko ɓɛkɔ nde, a kelma ɓuɗya mɛyekambiyɛ ɗete kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ, ɓo tì tikɛ temɔ nɛ nyɛ na.

Yo kwaŋnama ɗete, nɛ́ mɛlɛpi mɛte yi Esayi te mɔ punja mɛlɛpi mɛ Njambiyɛ lɛpima kɛ́ si tondu. A lɛpima nde: ‹Baba Mbokɔ, ma nda tikima temɔ kɛ yasi te yi wusɛ lɛpima kɛ́? Sendi, ’Baba Mbokɔ téɗya nda ɗeti nɛ?›
Ko, ma ɓo ti yaka tikɔ temɔ na, kɛto lɛpi te yi Esayi lɛpima sendi kɛ́. A lɛpima nde:
‹Njambiyɛ ma ɗiɓɔ misi man, ɗesɛ mɛtemɔ man, kambɔ ɓo mɛ nje ɓɛŋɛ mɛyasi, ɓo mɛ nje ɓɛ nɛ ɗyanɔ, ɓo mɛ nje yeŋsa temɔ, ma nyɛ nje siɗyɛ kɔn yan.›
Esayi njáki lɛpɔ mɛyasi mɛnɔri kɛ kasi Yesus, kɛto a ɓɛŋma mɛluksa mɛnɛ.
Ko ɓɛkɔ ɗete, ɓaŋa Ɓeyudɛn ɓuɗyate tikima temɔ kɛ yi Yesus. Yasi wɛtɛ, ɓo tì jayɛ punjɛ yo kɛ misi mɛ ɓomɔ na, kambɔ *Ɓefarisɛ̧ mɛ nje lɛpɔ nde, ɓo tî nata se mbanjɔ mɛwesiɗya na.
Ɓekum Ɓeyudɛn ɓaka kelma ɗete, kɛto ɓo kwaɗya nde, ɓomɔ lûksa ɓo kwa̧ mɛluksa mɛte yi Njambiyɛ yakama lukse nɛ ɓo kɛ́.
Ndana, ɛ Yesus lɛpɛ nɛ mɛn kɛ kwey nde: «Mɔ te ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ mi, mɔ te ti tíki temɔ nɛ mi na, yo nde, a tíki temɔ nɛ Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi njesɛ kɔ.
Sendi, mɔ te ɛ ɓɛŋɛ mi, mɔ te ɓɛŋma Mɔ te ɛ tomma mi kɔ.
Mi nja̧ mbɛ kɛ mɛnɛti maka yí paniyɛ puyɛ nda yi mɛjasi panɛ nɔ kɛ́. Ɗete, mɔ te ɛ tikɛ temɔ nɛ mi, mɔ te tí ɗiyɔ kɛ mɔy yitil na.
